yerna nwiɣ as ad am d siwileɣ akken mi ara nili kan gar aneɣ
ur ttmeslayet ara yid sen
mačči akken i ilaq ad txedmeḍ
am wakken tezga dima ddaw n wayen ttxemmimen yirgazen
yiwen ur tt iḥsib
teɛɛuẓgeḍ neɣ d acu
yuba iceṭṭeḥ d tlawin
nwala ayen nebɣa
win igezmen taseṭṭa izzuɣer itt
slet d uqbel ad yi tferqem
tesseṛɣeḍ asent ten
imir n nella netturar akked tullas paypay akked ččir
ad k tt fkent
ilaq ad tḥemmel argaz is
ad ten tuḥwaǧeḍ ad k ɛiwnen
ajenwi i y iḥuzan yenta gar wul d tasa
tesṛuḥem ten
a wi iwalan tamurt ula deg targit
tečča aɣ tizit
ndewwaxeɣ
tekmez
wissen i wacu i yegzem van gogh ameẓẓuɣ is
tessakiḍ wid yeṭṭsen
ma ulac aɣilif efk iyi ad sweɣ aman
ad n sawaleɣ
berrḥen d tiwizi
tirni taɣelnawt i tlelliyin
fṛansa ṭelyan spanya swis biljik d timura i d yerzan di turuft
mi ara heddrent teffẓent imeslayen
ad m ten yefk
ur d keččmeɣ ara s axxam zik
tirni n yilemẓiyen imagdayen i tɣermi
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d asirem nsen
nteddu yas di nneqma
xas kkaten ṭṭbel ttɛassan aɣyul
tid fessusen ɣas ad ugtent
ibbuḥra d lḥal tameddit a
ɛebbaɣ as i weɣyul ticekkaṛin n zbel
anda nwiɣ tafat i ufiɣ lehwa tekkat
ur ṭṭamaɛemt ara
ndeh ɣef wat dwala ad kkren ad lḥun
negra d ur neẓri aniwa i d akud nneɣ i d tallit nneɣ i d tasuta nneɣ
srid ɣer tnawalt akken ad d tessew lqahwa
ulac am uxxam ik
ur teẓri amek i as d yekcem neɣ s wansa i as d yekcem
s teqbaylit i ttxemmimeɣ
ssawalen as asekran
uɣal s axeddim
sin agi ur ttemsefhamen ara
ad tɛeddi ad texdem aɛwin
ad ak tt in awiɣ azekka
werǧin i d mlaleɣ tom armi d ṣṣbeḥ a
ifyar a ad ilint di lxaṭer n mmi iḥemmlen ddabex n uḍar
amek i s qqaṛen i umdakel inek i tḥemmleḍ akk mliḥ
ad m yuɛer lḥal
yebna asen axxam
acuɣeṛ i tegganem aṭas
sarameɣ mačči d tuccḍa
awal am teṛṣaṣt mi yeffeɣ ur d ittuɣal
ur ilaq ara ad geɣ aya
ihi ɛlem belli tilelli iɣef tettḥewwiseḍ
ass nni d agfur dɣa tom ur yebɣi ara ad yeffeɣ
tesɛa yiwet n tyaẓiḍt tesseṛwa as d timellalin
tura mi temmut yemma d acu i yi icerken yid k a xali
yerna teẓriḍ d ayen yuɛren akken ad tafeḍ yiwet ad ak d temmeslay ɣef isental a wiyi
ḥsen u muḥ yusa d ad iwali tiziri tagawawt

attan teqbaylit nni i nuṛǧa acḥal aya
wukud yella

ffɣen t akk afus is
wagi d tom
gant tt
anwa i d yusan

ḥerrek iman ik

nečča aɣṛum

ad tṛebbiḍ tikesmatin

ad tent wansen

hmej

axxam yuɣal iyi d izem ufiɣ as ddwa i lexla
ulac lxilaf gar wergaz d tmeṭṭut
armi ṭṭaxreɣ ssya
ulac d acu i yuɛren am win iɣuccen iman is
iwacu ur tetteṭṭfeḍ ara tizmilin
acku timetti nneɣ ur treḥḥem ara
tsellemt tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki
tin yesɛan ul
deg tallit n nnisan i ssefruruxen yizerman
ay udem n tqejjunt
textaṛeḍ tent
ur d yusi ara

tfukkemt
farid yusa d d sliman
mazal yeḥma
rẓan asen snat n tqermudin
yiwen yekkat snitra armi i tt yerra d tazegzawt
ger tamawt
timucuha timseḍsa akked timseɛraq daɣen d tasekla
uɣaleɣ d akken yiwen n uslem ur t id ṭṭifeɣ
staxṛeɣ yiwen
ad tefaṛes seg s twacult is timetti is tamurt is
ur t ttxalaḍet ara
aḥuddu aḥunnu
yesɛedday amur ameqqran d yid s
di tefsut taberkant iǧadaṛmiyen nɣan ddeqs n yilmeẓyen wiyaḍ ɛeggben ten ilebda
iḍ ur semmeḍ ara s waṭas xerṣum tisaɛtin timezwura
nwiɣ tḥemleḍ iyi
sebɣeɣ t id
ladɣa ɣef usentel n tezrawt ik
bɣan ad ɣ sirden allaɣ nneɣ
i kunemti d acu i kwen t id igren di tessirt

tegdel

ur d tettasem ara
ur ttaǧǧat ara taseḥḥart ad tɛic di ddunit
win yesɛan izimer iwell as iziker

wali kan mačči d yemma m
irgazen seḥsaben fell am awal

ur ttargut ara
tesbeɣ iyi tt

tudert wezzilet aṭas
teddez kullec s umehraz
d awal kan i yettmeslay wama tidet u tt yessin ara
tibaktiryin mgarradent ɣef ivirusen

simmal tkeččem deg s

teffɣem

ur ttḥerrikemt ara
amer am wayen yeshel

ur qqimeɣ ara
ijmeɛ iten
ttuɣ t
acimi ttarǧun ɛemmden ad rewlen

ayen akk ara nexdem ad yili i teqbaylit

ṭṭixer kan
yeḥma wučči a
fṛeḍ zdat n tewwur ik qbel
win iɛetben ad iɣellet
deg ubrid n ddin i ḍegreɣ acḥal d ussan
neɣ ahat almi d tura i d teffeɣ ɣer tudert

ass ameggaz
awalen ijenṭaḍen
d tmanya mazal ur d teffiɣ ara seg tkuzint

gen di talwit a gma ḥamuda moḥamed d awezɣi ad k nettu
ur tt id yuli ara wawal

ad nsuter

iffeɣ lmal iman is ad ikes
ur ttceɣɣib iman ik ɣef ayen xedmeɣ
anda ara yili mmi s n ɛemmi crif
ur tufiḍ anda yettawi yikiddib

amezwaru izweǧ mbeɛd yemmut
ur tessineḍ ara leṣlaḥ ik
i neẓra mazal ad nẓer

ugaden

yelsa takiluṭ is
ma ɣef ayen irzan aɣawas ajdid ur k wufqeɣ ara di rray

ad sent t yeɛṛeḍ
temyagreḍ iḍelli d lwiza
terra deg s laman ɣas akken drus kan i mmeslayen
iseggex lɛaqel is
anti i kem yewwten
ur iyi tteg ara aɣbel
wayi d asɛujqer mačči d tameslayt
iẓur d axxam n ṛebbi
sliɣ tettɛawanem wid i ken id iqesden
uzzleɣ d akessar
deg iseggasen n ttɛin nella neqqaṛ deg uɣerbaz unnig n tsenselkimt di zzayer tamanaxt
ugmeɣ d
ssired akk isufar uqbel aten terreḍ ar teccuyt
d ta i d tiririt nkent
ddu d tom
ad nemyehḍeṛ
amzenzu nni n lxeḍra d lɛali t ɣer yimsaɣen is
saɛid u muḥ yemsefham d tiziri tagawawt
a tt an tcennef
nettan ur yezgil ara tamacint
xeṭṭan t di taddart acku yeṭṭef as afus i temdakelt is
yuba ixuṣ lḥir
yerna nekk d amyurar ameqqran
yessewhem itt wayen itt yuɣen
tom ɣas ini ur yettili ara yakk deg uxxam
ziɣen kif kif aɣ
yeɛni asmi i t id rran ɣer tmurt acku ur yesɛi ara lekwaɣeḍ
irden i yir tuɣmas
deg uḍṛis nni wis sin yella useqdec n tmeɣruḍt
ulac kra din
iga yas leɣrur
maziɣ isub
yečča aksum is
meẓẓi maḍi deg lqedd
ḍeyyfen t armi d ulamek
eǧǧ iyi ad ak d sfehmeɣ amek i ileḥḥu
ur t yettawi ara yid s
ad tessineḍ lbaḍna s
ddant ɣef teflukt nni
ɛelqeɣ aseggas a dekkeṛ i tneqlin deg iɣzeṛ ḥesna
fehmmeɣ kem qbel ad d theḍreḍ
tebɣa ad teqqim iman is
yensa umeksa deg lexla
tadyant is tesban d amennuɣ gar tlelli d uzaglu gar tafat d ṭṭlam
swiɣ aman deg ucabcaq
igelfan nni n leɛeskeṛ glan d s waṭas n yimrigen
s tayri i ttmeslayent taqbaylit
icab weqcic ur yuklal
as tiniḍ tefreḥ s wayen i as d yeḍran
ruḥeɣ daɣen ɣer din
d taqbaylit i d tudert iw
ibda wurar la iḥemmu
textaṛ iten
d tiẓrigin ɛeccab i t id isuffɣen ussan agi kan
ur tedduɣ ara d tom
d kra ilaqen i ssekṛa
yettmeslay d wungal a ɣef yiwet n tmeɣrast n tegrawla deg taddart n yiɣil umsed iwumi qqaren faḍma ibelɛiden
iger d nnehta
iwani teteddut
tutlayt iw d taqbaylit kan
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ yid s ɣer sinima
tɛerḍeḍ ayaziḍ nni
ayen i d tenniḍ iṣeḥḥa
acuɣeṛ i tneɛɛlemt
yewhem
yeɣleq
yessemlal tmanya n wudmawen i yekkin di tmesbaniyin am tari aziz terki zubir d wiyaḍ
nekk d asariẓri
yesḥus i yiman is yesɛa azal
suref iyi ɣef tfinyent a
ttxil k err tawwurt
sfuḥeɣ d kra n tɣawsa teṛɣa d
midyan iǧǧa d ɛiyfa ɛifiṛ ḥanux abidaɛ akked ildaɛa
bɣan qqazen iberdan i wakken ad sɛeddin aman
afud iw d tutlayt taqbaylit
tama ar tama
tibyarin a tekksent fad
waqila txuṣ deg leɛqel
netta yezga deg wallaɣ is
tettwaɛeṛḍem meṛṛa
tatut d anagraw yettṛebbi udabu azzayri ama s uɣerbaz neɣ s leǧwameɛ
yexra tamda
tban d tin ad yewten d imizaben
theggaḍ ad tessutred
mačči akka i tennum
mmeslay kan yid sen
ikna lqedd nsent
sreɣ a win ur nzeddem
ma teffɣeḍ akken ur telsiḍ ara mliḥ ad k iwet ubeḥri
anda i yeǧǧa aserwal nni
yexdem si ṣṣbeḥ ar tameddit
ad ruḥeɣ ad d beddleɣ asebbaḍ agi ur iyi d izga ara
mačči d učči akk ad tiniḍ s iḍarren is i t id yexdem
telliḍ d ḥedd
zzwaǧ yiwen wass aḥebbeṛ is aseggas
tfukkemt t
at en an ad d teddun zziyyaṛ kkan d si mekka
aqeddac ad yili ɣur k akka kra
lɛaqel iɛqel
uɣeɣ d tamacint n txeyyaḍt d tajdidt
simmal tetteddu tceqquft
maziɣ ur yeḥsi s wayen yeḍran

d ayla nkent
ad truḥemt neɣ ala
yefka am lɛez tuklaleḍ

theddṛemt s tazzla
taneggart nni axir

tedda yas di nneqma

ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d kkrent
isewway aksum
gen di talwit a gma mimun murad d awezɣi ad k nettu
fehmeɣ tt meɛna si tama nniḍen ur nwiɣ ara tesɛa lḥeqq
abrid itecceḍ
d ferḥat i ttɛassan amar ad d yini kra
anegmam unnig imunen n waḍaf n tefranin
sseṛɣeɣ awen tent
deg s tarwiḥt n lmalayek
ɣaya t uqcic agi

aregnet yerza taserdunt
tesɛiḍ aqziḥ
acu i t yeǧǧan ad yilli d ilelli 
yemmut cceṛ is
amek ara tsuqqleḍ tafyirt a seg tegnizit ɣer tefransist
henni iman im seg sent
yettfelliq deg yikiddiben i d yeɣlin ɣef tmurt is
kifkif aɣ akk
yussa d farid
ṭṭal iman ik
ur yečči ara awal mliḥ
acabcaq d ilem
yečča yuba imensi
ad iniɣ yewwet ik wugur
ilindi tarbaɛt n mmi tezga d d tis rebɛa taggara n telɣuɣa
a kenza a yelli ur ttru ara
anga teddiḍ lhu
tenɣam iyi ten
llan wid yebɣan ad sizedgen amawal n tutlayt nneɣ
a nnger ik a yul
aɛeṭṭar ameẓyan ayɣer akka
kemm d tabudit
d lawan ad tebdum tikli
ttemyasament tullas ɣef tqendyar nsent
ccbaḥa i as yefka yettaǧǧa yal win ara yeṭṭilen deg s
ɣer aya di tazwara
ur lmideɣ ula d yiwet n lḥirfa
s yidrimen nezmer ad naɣ kra yellan
yeǧǧa as d gma s iṣebbaḍen
ad imerreɣ ma yufa
eǧǧ amcic nni deg berra
afran n usentel
bren ɣer tama taẓelmaṭ
tettmekti d awal awal seg wayen i as d yenna
sewḥel inedfaṛen i ugar n tudert tusligt
iẓẓa ṭumaṭtic d texsayt bdan ttemmɣin
yal mi ara d tekcem ad as tessiwel akken ad qesrent
ansi tzemreḍ ad d tneggzeḍ seg leɛli
acku ayen ira yewwet it umezwi nni
taqbaylit tesɛa iɛessasen
yegra d i tmeṭṭut taqbaylit ad tesɛu tafekka s d ayla s
terra t deg uɛewwiq
ad t nernu uqebl ad ɣ yennaɣ
nweɛɛed akumt
kecmeɣ ɣer temkerḍit ufiɣ tt d tilemt
ttarun s tutlayt taqbaylit
ad t id tuqem
teqqim am tin iɛelqen
iqbayliyen zedɣen izuɣar d yidurar
anezgum is amek ara tqabel maziɣ d wacu ara temmeslay yid s war ma yella d wayen yuɛren
tḥemmlemt ad tecnumt
amcum i ɣ icekben ass n ad ten iru
ayɣer i teggummamt ad d tinimt tidet
mass deḥman at ɛli i yuran amawal n tfizikt
ur s ttaɣ ara awal
ɛawnemt iyi ad ffɣeɣ
ṛzageḍ ay awal
yiwen deg sen d ajenyuṛ n tsenselkimt isem is maziɣ
ruḥ di sslama n rebbi
tettak d daɣen timsal ur nelhi am lekteb
ad t sseɣlint
tura qbel neɣ qabel
tom mačči am kemm
di tmura n turuft tirebbaɛ n ddabex n uḍar d ikebbaniyin

qqim tṛankil
ikad yella
aseggas a teqwa tizegzewt
lemɛatqa ar mirabu
ayen iḍerrun deg yinurar iḍerru deg yexxamen
ur yefhim tigert
yeqquṛ uqeru is
ccum is mi ara s yini yiwen xdem akka
tenwa s ukanic ara tuɣal d taṛumit
ffeɣ si ddunit iw
ad izhu win ixaqen
ma d taqcict ɛecṛa n iṣurdiyen n lfeṭṭa kan ara s tefkeḍ

mazal ur qliɛeɣ

ad nurar ččir
qefzen deg usewwi
tekcem ɣer fasebbuk
ad d taseḍ

bnan as axxam d tiwizi
bezzaf yettaṭaf akud
isem s ittwassen si zik
acu yewwin inselmen irebraben yeffɣen mgal adabu ɣef sebba n tsertit
ad teḥnuccḍem deg udfel

dayen tura
myeẓẓan ilili
ɣleq aqemmuc ik

ugin ad susmen

s tayri i yettmeslay taqbaylit
kečči tkecmeḍ ɛemrayen

ɛass iman ik
d acu issaɣay urkaḍ deg ulawen
nnan as kra qqaren d yuḥenna aɣeṭṭaṣ
ur ittektili ara lehḍur is
yeḥka yasen taluft akken tella
akken kan i ttwaleqmen deg temẓi ara kemmlen deg temɣer
tom yebɣa ad d iɛawen maca bezzaf yecɣel
nettat ur as d ittali ara wawal
ma tufiḍ akli werreɣ armi ittwaɣ

yiwet n tikelt ifeddex iyi saɛid s uẓru
iselman deg izeɣṛan
ur yessefk ara ad ruḥen kan di rrayeɛ maca akken yeqqaṛ lwennas asfel nniḍen
amahil ik deg tsenselkimt
ad tetteddu
ibennu sliman ixxamen

ffɣet

ur tečči ara imensi

sani ttwaceyyɛen
ɛemmi yezdeɣ deg madrid tamanaɣt n spenyul
bab n lxiṛ ittenǧaḥ a waliɛad abṛaysu
karima iḥemmel itt gma
riɣ aṭas n yefsan
ttxil kent da tlaq tsusmi
am win yeṭṭamaɛen urḍan di lmegget
sseṛɣeɣ as tt
dduklet
tekcem akken tuɣ tanumi
tamacahut tekfa
bxiṛ akk i llant
yerfa mliḥ fell i yidir
ur cfin ara fell ak
tuɣal d lyaqut a tawaɣit
s tmara i nteddu ur neẓri alamma d ddaw n wakal
tewwiḍ yakan timgreṭ
tewqeɛ deg sen tmellalt
azul isem iw pecca i kečč amek i ak qqaṛen
iḥulfa am akken taqsiḍt a teḍra d deg taddart is
a kenza a yelli sbeṛ as i lmeḥna d iseflan neɣli ɣef lezzayer uzekka a kenza a yelli ur ttru yara
deg tnezzayt is yerɣa umelɣiɣ is

tecbeḥ mliḥ

bḍant ak tt id
aql i ɛummeɣ deg iɣeblan

yugi ad yeɛfu
waqila yettasem yidir si newwara
imi i s yefka akk ayen i tessaram ama d leḥnana ama d tayri
tura yiwen ur yettṣelli ɣef nnbi deg tejmaɛt n taddart nneɣ
ur as yebni ara axxam
ad tt id mmagrent

zmumeg

d acu i teččiḍ armi i kem teqreḥ tɛebbuḍt im
ad ɣ zellun yiwen yiwen
d tidet ad yi d tceyyɛem taɛelǧett tajapunit
ur tesɛiḍ ara txedmeḍ

ulac anezgum
d isemmaḍen waman

ur ixeddem ur igeddem

ɛyiɣ di tikli rriɣ tt i tazzla
ad tewteḍ ɣef teqbaylit
ddu d uḍar ik a mmi s n tmurt

yečča tent

aguẓ d aṭṭan yettaɣen amgerḍ n tlawin

ur yesruḥ ara lweqt

teṭṭuqqet ccada n rrya
tettaǧǧa tt tebɣest

ulansi ara tekkeḍ iberdan gezmen
ur tetteɣ ara lfakya
tettidir am akken ttidirent akk tlawin deg umaḍal n umalu
iban akka ara teffeɣ
inna asen d acu i yexdem n wayen n diri

i uḍellaɛ umi yekkes lqaɛ d acu ara s d gen yifassen

tom ur d yettaɣ ara aɣṛum
amek armi i d tmennamt akanic
yiwen ur igin
tettlusum tisekkadin
ma d kra n yiɣisi i yexdem ini aɣ d
ad d tuɣalem
ɣas ma iberdan nnḍen
sɛumt tirrugza
yeɛreḍ
tamda muceṛcuṛ
ǧǧemt iyi ad kecmeɣ
ččiɣ tacakulat yesɛan sebɛin ɣef meyya n kakao
ad d gren tasɣart anwa ara yebdun
yugi leɛqel d lmeɛqul
yeqqim akken cwiṭ iman is tama ufella n tḥeddanin
tḥemmel ad teqqim d yid s akken ad ḥkunt

s akken kecmeɣ
d amesfizik
anda i tenwa nettṛaju tt
ikemmel yettaru tiqsiḍin ɣef yiɣersiwen
ad tferqeḍ yid sen urfan
imsidag iqbayliyen swesɛen tamuɣli nsen
aydi yettwali i ṭṭlam
ad sen tent tɛeṛḍem
yettwali k id s yir tiṭ
ur yettqerriḥ ara
ar wanwa ara tt yaf
ad yelmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul is
teckeḍ
uḥwaǧeɣ kan ad yi iɛawen kra n yiwen
d askeɛwew kan
iɣeblan n lwert
ala tanemmirt
zeɛḍeɣ
ɣullen aɣ ula deg tili n teslent nsen
ddem ulman a err iten d takurt
asefru nni yefka as d tabɣest
aɣlif n temguri d yimɣuzen
tafaska a d tagnit akken ad mlilen yimedyazen ad seqredcen timsal
ikker uctal di lemleḥ
ǧeɛfer yettẓalla
d lawan n lmakla
tanmehla tamatut n teɣlist taɣelnawt
ilaq ad qqimeɣ iman iw i wakken ad xemmeɣ
d acu kan ulac tarewla i usiyeq
uklaleɣ ad yi tkeṛhem
nettan ad yezgel tamacint
ẓriɣ t yettazzal
takeṛṛust n muḥend belqasem tettarra yas d s teqbaylit
d yiwet n tmacahut tamecṭuḥt i iyi d tettmal yemma mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
xerṣum
aɣlif n tnazent n tiliywalin n tiknussniwin d wumḍin
swan aman isemmaḍen
semmeḍ wučči
ɣliɣ d amɣar
ma yella wayen illan yeḍra d wakken amek ara tgeḍ
la d qqaṛen d adfel
anda llan rrwayeḥ akked tmelsa ifazen i as yesnum
dinna neɣ dagi
ečč s leɛqel im
ddehmeẓ
awi tt ma truḥeḍ
eǧǧ aɣ
ṛwu zzhu deg boston
di temẓi s yezga muḥend s yiqeẓẓulen
tḥemmleḍ tent
tufam iman nwen
awal ur ilaq
kecmen yimariren s anrar bdan tturaren
wehmeɣ imi k ẓṛiɣ
yeqqim d ajedid usmekti
asmules seg wansi i d ttlalent
yal yiwen d acu i ad ittserriḥ
ad yili rebbi d mmi s ara yebḍun tudert is d yiwet am tihin
ikker wahruḥu di taddart
ad waliɣ tennecṛaheḍ
ḥku d
ad t leqqmen
lemmer kan ur terniḍ ara ttnefxa
teqqleḍ d aqcic
tehbel ɣef teqbaylit
tedda d d tislit
yeǧhed umutur ukamyun a inek
yeseww amezzir
idurar n at weɣlis sɛan aṭas n ukerruc
ibekkem it ṛebbi
yuba yeɣra deg uxxam
tzemreḍ ad yi d tiniḍ amek
ad nesseqḍeɛ ajenwi akken ad nezlu axeṛfi
leɛzib uḥcayci
dda qiqi ad sent id yebḍu i seṭṭac
d tuttra igerrzen
sɛant aman
d allen n uɣerda i yesɛa
ack it uqcic a
caylellah s sidi lmufeq imjuhad deg tɛinsrin
a tacriḥt n tedmert tekkes iyi kem tezmert
cukkeɣ yella kra i d yessewjad tom
teddem tilikumund
irgazen kettben iḥezzazen ḥettben
yenna asent aql i yid kent alma d lmut
berraɣ qerrceɣ
neḍsa merra nteɣ
salem yedda di lmendad i baba s
yugi tom ad dduɣ yid s ɣer boston
tuḥwaǧ idrimen
yir zerriɛa
arum temmeslayem taqbaylit ma tebɣam tutlayt nwen ur tettaɣ ara abrid n nnger
aẓ ar dihin
theggaḍ ad tṛuḥeḍ
usu ideg ara yeṭṭeṣ urgaz nni ad inǧes
tturarent tullas deg uzniq
ad truḥ teqcict
d acu ur tesɛiḍ
tufiḍ iman im di tmetti a
d allen n tfunast i tesɛa
yessibrek taxxamt
qadeṛ ilugan n tira
d imaynuten kunwi
lmut ɣef mmi xicen
yesɛa sin n wudmawen
tettgalla di mmi s
icedha tayri n tala
d acu i k yewwin ɣur sent
yettḥir ad yali wass akken ad yazzel ɣer tesdawit
isalli n tmettant n haǧer yusa aɣ d am tiyita yettunefkayen s tɣeffal
siwel as azekka
yuɣ iyi d baba aserwal
ziɣen ɣelḍeɣ
mebla lekteb neɣ adewwer

tɣab
ma ulac aɣilif awi yi d ahamburger
akanadi ur yejriḥ
ɣaḍent kent tidak
ɣriɣ deg tesdawit ɛebderreḥman mira n bgayet
isem iw ssnen t merra deg uɣerbaz
ur d tusim ara
tesneḍ ad telseḍ
aɛebbuḍ is d tasraft
afud nsen d tutlayt taqbaylit
gen di talwit a gma agri ali d awezɣi ad k nettu
tleqqeḍ newwara azemmur
d acu i kem yewwin ad d tneṭqeḍ
fessus am azul
sliman u muḥ yettaker
tikkelt nniḍen
iččuṛ uqeṛṛuy is d iɣeblan
ur tsetḥiḍ ara
taɣara neɣ addad n kra tɣawsa
ad as ṛekzeɣ talast
ur ttafeɣ ara iman iw deg unebdu
akka i d win yesɛan amddakel
iserdasen a d nettneggizen seg teflukt
tetteẓmaḍ ɣer ɣur s ad as tiniḍ tugad a as yerwel

awi t
ttwasusfen wid yemmuten ɣef teqbaylit

taɛemmurit

ur uggadeɣ ara tom
ur stufaɣ ara akk
texṛaḍ tala

d tin yebɣa seg wul is

kellḥeɣ awen
temẓi ad tt teẓẓem

iɣunfa tent

nezriri

yeɣli tom

tella tessexdam nniya n yixeddamen iqbayliyen deg fṛansa akken ur d ttarran ara i tiɣriwin n ugraw amaziɣ neɣ ad s nerwin timliliyin iskarayen

ruḥ ad tgeḍ kra n waddal

ad ččeɣ abbaɣ ik
ih sekkṛen ulamma d lɛid leqbayel mačči i rebbi i ttɛeyyiden

iɛedda fell as useggas n lḥif deg yir liḥala

ɣas ulama aseggas n rebɛa u ttɛin d win n uheggi n ugerdas aneggaru n unekcum ar tesdawit

d acu i tebɣiḍ ɣur i

d ṛebbi i yeẓṛan
yegdel ukeččum
taqcict mm ukebbuḍ azegzaw d yelli
ulac i d yeqqimen

ziɣ ur tettbeddileḍ ara a mass gringoire

yemmut

ur ttɛawazeɣ ara

ur tessinemt ara tasertit

ḥusin at ḥmed akked muḥemmed buḍyaf ttwanfan si tmurt acḥal d aseggas
ur ttxemmim ara akk
yir meṭṭu yif it beṭṭu

tidet ad yi tetteẓẓem

yettraǧu kan melmi ara d tɛeddi tin yewwin leɛmer is
anda i teddiḍ ad dduɣ
kateb yasin yessegrawel tasekla deg tmazɣa s wungal is neǧma
yebḍa yasent ten id
aḥlil yemma
yeḍfeṛ acrured n tsekkurt tikli n tyaziḍt teɛreq as
yezmer ad k iqerreḥ acemma
telha taɣect is
yuweḍ almi d imi n tala yuɣal d akken ur d yeswi
ad as tent tefkeḍ
d tagi i d tarbaɛt
ittɛawan yidir baba s di kra n lecɣal
kcem d s axxam
ad kent arguɣ
meɛtub lwennas ilul deg tewrirt musa deg at dwala
seg wasmi i yurweɣ ur ččiɣ lerbaḥ
d adlis kan i bɣiɣ ad ɣreɣ i ubeḥri
tmerru tɛebbuḍt im
texdem as taɣenǧawt n ssker
acimi ur asen d tettarraḍ ara awal
ṭṭuqqtent d fell am tlufa
a ddunit a lebḥer n lhem
nefka as i wuccen ad iɛas tiɣeṭṭen
drus i d yeqqimen
tɣunfa ten
win izedɣen adrar ur yettagad ara azaɣar
anda i tufeg i ters
azul a massi
iruḥ seg wexxam i tella uletma s
tzegreḍ yal tallit
umuɣ n yisenfaren i d aɣ d ikecmen yugar ayen nurǧa
steɛfu
ansi d tqeɛɛdeḍ takamira inek
ihi seg tallit nni ideg yedder esope armi d tin n la fontaine mmeslayen iɣersiwen
terriḍ iyi tt id
yekres tawenza s tom
issirid iman is
ur yenfiɛ ara akk usegzawal ayi
ifuk usendef n lesnin
ula d ddabex n uḍar d leqraya
maziɣ yezga d yid s
acu ik yewwin ɣur s
d leḥmi i yeglan yess
asmi ara d tuɣaleḍ d tameɣra k
iles aɣezzfan iɣil aquran
acuɣer ur yeqqim ara yidir
amussu n leɛrac yessergagi adabu azzayri
tufa iman is
ur ttruḥunt ara
d ayen isehlen maḍi
ay axxam iw yexlan
ddem ta
ulac win izemren ad yili akken yebɣa
a leḥbab iw leḥbab iw
nekk rẓiɣ as aqerruy is s temɛayin am tigi
deg useggas n walef u tteɛmiya u setta usettin muḥend aɛrab besɛud yesbedd agraw amaziɣ
d lawan ad kkreɣ fell i
cnu d di leɛnaya k
dagi i ttidireɣ
nettidir s teqbaylit
uḥwaǧent acrik
tebda tettserriḥ d i tmiqwa
ih tikwal
arut taspenyulit
adfel d acebḥan
anta i wen d yeɣṛan
amek i testeɛfayem mbeɛd axeddim
ilul d s teqbaylit
iṛuḥ tom
ferseɣ akk imɣan sɛiɣ deg tebḥirt
axxam yeččur
ur aɣ d tennimt ara ma ad d truḥemt azekka neɣ ala
ẓẓay uqerruy is
aṭas n yisenfaren n usideg ɣer teqbaylit i yellan
tugi ten lmut
yezmer ad yeddu yid sen
ččan timellalin tuftiyin armi qebren
teḥbes d sdat is
aṭas i d ittmennin tarewla
rrant akent tent id
ttḥebbiṛen ɣef teqbaylit
yestewtiwen
d lehyuf i teččiḍ
ali qbel ɣer ubalku
ɛyiɣ deg usqizzeb
wayeḍ nettmenni awer d yezzi ala aḍar is
menyif asnunneḍ asqummeḍ
xḍu k i tɣennant
refdeɣ aqerruy iw
jebbden tt ɣer ddunit leɛmer teẓri
ad d aseɣ ad k awiɣ ɣef sebɛa
ad tnadiɣ ɣef ddwa m
yedɣer
anagar urfan i tesseṛwa
am win yetteɛraḍen ad ileqqem ttejra deg tlemmast n wagu
yufeg asen uqermud
yid m dreɣ yes m ferḥeɣ
wwin aɣ waɛraben azgen seg umenẓaw n tefriqt
lliɣ ttmenniɣ ad yi d sekneḍ amek ara xedmeɣ aya
sefhem iyi d d acu i d inna
iban belli tessnem tent mliḥ
ur ikeččem ara s axxam
yečča times
tesɛam adlisfus
ur k id iṣaḥ ara wawal
ala walaɣ tt deg wexxam n yidles
acuɣeṛ ur yebɣi ara tom ad yeddu yid nneɣ
ifka yi d adlis
suref iyi kan ur d qsideɣ ara k gezmeɣ awal
yettwali asras d arfad
sima mi as d yettmeslay akken maziɣ
ur ttett ara imensi
terra yam t id
yuba d lmektub iw
a win ɣef yeshel walluy ḥader iman ik di trusi
d axerfi nni i d iṛebba i yečča
ddan as di nneqma
hwari bumedyen yemḍel ɛmiruc ddaw n texzant deg yiwen n uxxam n yiǧadarmiyen
nɣiɣ asen tt
inimt asent fiḥel ma tusamt d
ḥemmleɣ ta
ddant awent di nneqma
terriḍ aɣ t id
zedɣent nnig n ttjuṛ
izri d ayen iɛeddan imal d ayen id teddun tudert d imir a
ay abunniḍ
fehment
seg wassen ddreɣ s tmara
afaylu n weɣbaṛ
wwten deg i mebla cceḥḥa
myeḥmmalent
akud ur yettraju yiwen
kra yellan yerra t ines ig rebbi d ayla n jeddi
ḥfeḍ asefru nni i ssmanan i d iteddun
amek i tt ssnen
inuda fell as yufa t
tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen ik
awi tent ma tṛuḥeḍ
mačči d kečč i d lhiɣ a yidir
neffer
akka iberdan mgaraden wa fessus wayeḍ ẓẓay
taḥbult n tatut diɣen d tiṭ n leɛqel di tegnatin icebken acku ddunit teɛmer s temlel d tebrek
iseḥḥa wudem is
ih neɣ ala
anda ilaq ad neqqim
sers it deg lqaɛa
ar tufat
ur yettuɣal timendeffirt
ad nruḥ ma tebɣam
ur ttetteḍ ara imensi
a dayen ad yettfeggiḍ
lliɣ di wizgan
ili k d abɣas a jean aql ik deg ubrid yelhan
tizumag n maṣer bnant s tidi n waklan
teddreḍ
ur yewwi ara amḍiq is
yers mi d yeddem ad icum
aqel in yid s azal n sin n yiseggasen a
d tabrat i tettaruḍ
netta yerra kan lwelha s ɣer ukayad
rwan warrac urar deg uzniq
xaqeɣ fell ak s tidet
ahat ad tafeḍ deg tilawt
ur sṭebṭubemt ara
ad teddu cetwa
yelha mliḥ
ddunit d mm leɣṛuṛ
ad ṭṭsen d tzizwa
teǧǧa ten tmacint
nniɣ d ala lmeɛna s ala
ur tessinem ara ad turarem ddabex
ɛyiɣ seg uḥellel
imeslayen iw i kečč a masi
tettum idrimen nwen
ɣef waya i bɣan ad t nɣen
ur reffed ara ayen ur tettayaleḍ
ɛni iqṛeḥ it lḥal
ur d tettwiḍ ara
ad telmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul is
teḥnucceḍ akken tufa
acu yebɣa ɣur i umseḍḍeɛ agi deg tlemmast n yiḍ
mi ara yeqqim d yiman is
ittruḥu yal iḍ ar yiger
lukan ad tesseqsiḍ yal yiwen deg sen ad ak d yini
yemlal aɣ d deg ubrid yedda yid neɣ
ḥemmlen k
yufa d din din tifrat
beddlem iceṭṭiḍen nwen
winna yettɛic kan s tirga
ur d fiɣeɣ ara
aɣ abrid ayeffus
ɛni ssnent ad arunt taqbaylit
tettess aman
tasertit n tbaḍnit
anwa ara ceggɛeɣ
nɣellet
idurar n ssumam
neffer ddaw n wussu
fakken asent t
wa yekker wa yeqqim
iteddu deg ubrid yettkemmil deg wawal is netta d yiman is
wehhi
ɛeddan ssin nni n iseggasen n lḥif n tmara akked yir ussan
yella kra n yiwen i tettṛajumt
fkan awen abadaṛ
tura i d yemmekta
ilaq ad as tinimt tidet
ur ḥsiɣ ara d akken tom yessen ddeqs ɣef mary
kemmel ɣer zdat
rrant akent ten id
ad ɛeddiḍ tikkelt kan f ubrid dɣa ad cfuɣ fell as
imerkantiyen ttɛumun di rrbeḥ ma d iẓawaliyen suturen tin n ṛebbi
mazal lḥamu n uzal am akken tettali d si tmurt
tleqḍeḍ azemmur aseggas a
aweṭṭuf iɛac
katia taqcict n sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen tesseɣli d rrehba deg ulawen n luluf n yinselmen irebraben armi ssawḍen ar tmenɣiwt is
akken daɣen leqdicat is xḍan i tsertit d wayen i tt id yezzin
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d tennamt
anda i llan warraw nwen
ttusuɣ
yasin aman i d yugem seg uɣbalu n timuzɣa
unfeɣ akent
d asfuǧǧeɣ i sfuǧǧuɣent
tweddṛem t
ad ten tseggem
tteɣraṣeɣ mi ara t waliɣ

ass mi tekker di tmanyin
cḍeḥ cḍeḥ a ṭṭawes
sawleɣ as i saɛid ad yeddu yid i ɣer lakul
izem yedderɣel iṛuḥ s tazla
yebɣa ad yemmeslay d ḥed
ulac win yellan d ilelli am ufrux
ziɣ lqayed d amdan
anita i d tamdakelt inek
ɣur s tayuga n yizgaren
yya d ɛawen iyi
ɛeddi mad d yekker seg usu
nekk ad zziɣ udem iw ɣef umdan agi

iɛǧeb as i tom

iḥemmel ad yecnu

a dda yusef

dima yeskiddib iyi d tom
ma tebɣiḍ ad tettwassneḍ ddu ad texraḍ di tala

s tezmert im

aqrab is ɣef uɛrur is yeṭṭef abrid n uɣerbaz

agergur

ur inuda fell am ur kem yufi

bdan ttnaɣen merra
ya ad tent yegleb neɣ ad glunt yes s
d lawan ad tkecmem
ṭṭalayen d deg s am wakken deg leɛmer ẓran tt
sima yewweḍ d wass is anda i tebɣa ad tehder
ahat d taswiɛt nni n usmekti akked tmuɣli ɣer deffir neɣ d tatut n tilawt d uckenṭeḍ di targit neɣ d tarewla ɣef kra

n war lebɣi
ur tnuda fell asen ur ten tufi
ḥemmleɣ imɣan
ur d tuɣal ara

tsebɣemt t id
ad teswem lqahwa s uyefki
ssnen imukan yelhan deg tefsut
yemla as abrid yelhan
tessuker it temsulta
aseqqamu n uwanek
bɣan ad sirden allaɣ nteɣ
tisekkadin a nkent
tjerḥeḍ d
bɣiɣ yiwen ubiftik yewwan akken ilaq
tečča teɣyult ijeǧǧigen nni
bexlaf ṭṭir aberkan ad iruḥ ɣer udrar n at sellam
uɣaleɣ s iḍes
afellaḥ yekker
ur teččimt acemma ass a
heblen ɣef teqbaylit
akka imaṣriyen ad steɛeṛfen belli nekk d ameɣlal
tin yellan tessewḥac itt
ffeɣ ar beṛṛa teqqimeḍ kra dinna
ur k t terri ara tmara ad teqqimeḍ deg sbiṭar
imsex it ṛebbi
tuɣmas is tekfa tent lfula
bɣan ad nadin ula d nutni
mačči n wid yecban igerdan
ur tewwiḍem ara ayen i tettmennim
nteɣ yedlisen a
ad d ggalleɣ ar tceɣlemt
aɣbub yuɣal d adalku
amdan isfulluqen ur ittaf iḥbiben
akka i nwant
ad aɣ d tawi lhemm
asmel web unsib n mozilla yeffeɣ d s teqbaylit
tcennu s teqbaylit
bḍut as tent id
mi yebges yebda tikli abrid i yewwi ɣezzif
kkaten ɣef teqbaylit
aql ik tura tettedduḍ ad teḥluḍ
mazal ḥemmleɣ kumt
ad t ileqqem
ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥulfa iman is yefcel
la tleḥḥu
werǧin teḍra yid i yakan
times tewweḍ d lḥaṛa
aɣmis n yimaziɣen yesteqsa mass awcic yusef
han ɣef acu i km ḥemmleɣ
ur iḥemmel ara timellalin deg waman
ɣur i tif akk tutlayin
ass en d ass n lḥedd igerrzen ɣef yiri n yill n baltik
tesluɣ tala
azekka d aɣebbar
aɛrur ik senned it ɣer lḥiḍ
ad xedmeɣ ayen bɣiɣ anda i bɣiɣ melmi i yehwa
d yiwen seg inelmaden n baba
nudaɣ fell asent ufiɣ tent
ur aɣ d iṣaḥ ara wawal
iḥemmel ikent tom
yensa uselkim inek
berka k askeɛrer fell aneɣ
yebra yakent
ala aɣyul i i inekṛen laṣel is
addal mačči d aqesser
amzun d nutni i d inefqen
siḥ ay iẓri idim ifna
ɛeṭṭlen deg lqahwa
d ayen icebḥen mliḥ
tufam as ixf is
anda akken i turzeḍ tikerrist taneggarut
ur nesɛa ara idrimen
iɣaḍ iyi win yenwan yella kra ara ibedlen
ilef d ilef
zemren warzuzen ad nɣen taɣaṭ ma nnejmaɛen as
ad kent t id yawi
amaḍal umḍin iger as arebbi i teqbaylit
erret as i tom
katia truḥ d asfel d asfel i tmetti tatrart
ayagi ad d iqqim i tarwa nsen d asaḍuf i lebda
ulac tudert war aman
d acu ara yaru tura
berka aqemmeṛ
da swaswa i d teḍra
tura i t id mmektan
truḥ yemma s axeddim
inna yas wuccen ɛlayit semmumit
tufamt ɣef wacu ara thedremt
awit tent ma tṛuḥem
ilaq ad tenseḍ
tayet i t id ifahmen war ma tegzem deg s
d asɣar i tḥeqreḍ ara k isderɣlen
anwa deg sen i iɛelmen
tomi d mari ttemyarun dima
seg wakken nurar nekk d teqcicin
amussu n ufraniman aqbayli
ad ruḥeɣ
anwa i la tettṛaǧum akka
ansuf yes m ar uxxam
ala tissin ara d nas
simmal tettali tutlayt taqbaylit
iserreḥ yuba i yiḍan ines
yenqedwa ddwa agi di tmurt
ittlejlij ala s yisem is
anwa i tcukkeḍ yuker ak taxṛiṭ inek
bɣiɣ kan ad ak d fkeɣ afus n tallalt
ṭṭfeɣ tabrat sɣu k
mazal ur yeɣli ara yiṭij
mi t iɛreḍ yugi ad t isew
tagi d talwest iw
mi kfan imensi
d ayen tewwi yaɣ ddunit
ulac win i yemmuten
yekkes d akk tuɣmas is
ad sen neḍlu amsiḥ
deg useggas n walef u tmenmiya u sebɛa u settin yebda nḍam n tmedyazt timawit yettbeddil
akken teldi talelluct is sliɣ i uskeɛkeɛ n teṭsa
lukan ad tedduḍ d yid i ad nidir tasaɛet melliḥen
itess yidir lqahwa s uyefki
yessebɣas yidir atmaten is imecṭaḥ
fiḥel tuzzma

d acu ixeddem baba s
ugiɣ ddel akked lḥif
ay itbir siweḍ as slam
tebɣiḍ ad tṛebbiḍ awtul
tfakemt aɣ tt
ad necḍeḥ
err it d amecṭuḥ
d ucmiten i yettcemiten
tessnem laqanun
akken i sen txedmemt kifkif
yugurten u muḥ iḥuza tiziri tagawawt s teṛsast mebla ma yenwa
heggi iman ik
acḥal ay agi la nxeṭṭeb s wallen nnuda idurar n wat yiraten
ḥebseɣ walaɣ sya u sya
ddem ajenwi yelhan i uksum
tella kra n yiwet i yettmuqqulen
ɛiwen aɛiban ad yezger neɣ ad iserked takerrust is
win yellan am nettat
tella lḥaǧa tejbed iyi mliḥ ɣur s
tɛedda tmeɣra agi n cca i d yellan ass nni n lexmis deg tegnatin igerrzen anda ḥeḍrent ddeqs n twaculin

ad t xenqeɣ

awer icbek ṛebbi fell aɣ
yeqwem
mecḍeɣ acebbub iw

ad s d heggiɣ lmakla i baba k akken i tt iḥemmel

ttif ṛṛay uzzal
sḥassfeɣ nezzeh
tihuna

tenɣa yi tt
d aḥullu i ttḥullunt deg wawal
twala ifeṭṭiwjen

sefhem d awal ik
bniɣ tt
ini as i tom xir nekk ur ẓriɣ ara
saɛid u muḥ yers
ini d ayen akk i ak yehwan ur k ttamneɣ ara
surfemt i tom
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu yeḍran
imi urǧin tirga sɣarayent amezruy ur yesin ara umdan

tettnadim fell i
ad qesren akka kra
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ nteɣ
yewweḍ laɛfu n rebbi
terra as tasselt i lbaṭaṭa nni
maziɣ ɣas iruḥ ɣer tesdawit
aql aɣ daɣen lwaḥid
ixdeɛ ik
tezha ddunit
ad s yettɣemmiz deg ubrid nettat terra iman is ur d cliɛ meɛna ul is yeqqar as rnu ḍfer iyi d ar uxxam
yugi yas i tmeṭṭut is ad tmuqel ula deg ṭṭaq
ur ḥṣiɣ ara ad s yeɛǧeb

s teqbaylit ara idirent
yya d
win yebɣun imuqel
d taqbaylit i d tudert nneɣ

ur tqebblem ara

ad iruḥ tom
iḥemmel taqcict agi

ad tt id smesdeɣ

d taqbaylit i d yemma k
yuba ikṛeh halloween
yemmut uneɣlaf ur d nnin
yuɣ d taculliḍt n uyefki
s tayri i heddṛeɣ taqbaylit

attan tettru
d ayaẓiḍ daɣen
wehmeɣ qqureɣ ur ufiɣ d acu ad iniɣ
acu n tiẓri i tesɛiḍ ɣef ayen yeḍran
nebɣa kra n cṛab
kerhen k merra
d acu i la txeddmemt seg zgelli
tesɛiḍ ablug
tfukkeḍ axeddim ik
amɣaṛ saɛef it xas di ṭṭeṛṛ ik
yuɣal d yidir si tlemmast n webrid
cennun yefṛax deg tefsut
ad yeddu yid i
heḍremt iyi d
ikad ak d yeɛni icuba ɣer baba s
yečča s tmuɣli ssqef
netta i ifazen akk deg neɣ
ayen yexdem mačči akken
wissen amek ad as nḥulfu i lmut ass tmijalt nneɣ
qqen skud mazal lḥal
besmelleh ad nebdu ccekran
nnumeɣ d usemmiḍ a
bɣiɣ ad ḥewwseɣ yid k
xedmemt aya
nniɣ as ad tiliḍ da lawan n lefḍur
inha yi
s lxir d uɛiwen n wiyiḍ
ahat ad d yas
ad ruḥeɣ ad gneɣ tura
aɣyul n baba u jeddi rniɣ rrekba ɣer deffier
maziɣ iger iman is s wul is
tecrek aɣ tagella d lemleḥ
d acu i tettuḍ deg wexxam a yidir
yexser daɣen
d nettat ara ixedmen kulec
yessefk fell asent daɣen ad d afent tifrat i unbeddal n unezwi
s wallen is asmi yessusem
arumt taspenyulit
ul is d agris aberkan
ḥemmleɣ tutlayt taqbaylit
tettḥessis kan
dacu i teččam
yewel seg texxamt ar ufrag
ahat aɣwali agi d ameddakel ik
ttif tuṭṭiṣt tuffiẓt
kullec yebna ɣef ddin
ansa i ɛeddan warrac nni
anwa i yeddmen aselkim iw
lukan d nekk ad d sɣeɣ wa
leɛmeṛ nexdem akka uqbel
greɣ awen d rebbi xẓer bdant ttergigint tgecrar iw
awi aɣ d sin ifenǧalen n lqahwa ttxil k
yiwen irebba lehnak mmuten as
asgen asemmaḍ
d acu i d theyyaḍ i tagara n ssmana ya
amek alammi i t ikcem uxemmem a
ittenkikiz am win ččant telkin
yezwej
smuqulen
ay adrar gar idurar a wi yeccfan ɣef sser
lliɣ ɛelmeɣ ad kem yeffeɣ leɛqel
slemden iyi ten
ad ḥewseɣ fell as arma ufiɣ t
ad d mlileɣ d wayen iḍran
ttun ur sekkṛen tawwurt s tsarut
nenwa bucḥiḍ yenqeḍ ziɣen yuɣal d s wadda
azul tom tkecmeḍ yakan
yebda yettissin it
medden lethan ala d wiyaḍ
feṛḥent meṛṛa
win i tebɣiḍ yugi k
ur d lhan ara yid i
armi i tt cerweɣ meṛṛiɣet i sen slemdeɣ tussna n yimenɣi n ṛṛuman
tanemmirt nwen imi aɣ tefkam tagnit ad aɣ d tesmeḥsem
fetlent seksu n tmeɣra n tissulya n maziɣ
iger aḍar
ttaɣen d aɣrum yal ass
xlan t
ur iruḥ ur yeqqim
yuɣ ak t id
imyurar nneɣ ssuturen lmuḥal
efk as afus ik
aql aɣ nefreḥ s teqbaylit iɣef yuli wass
ad sen tt teɛṛeḍ
sliman u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad yamen tiziri tagawawt
maziɣ mi yeẓra akken lehwa tebda d tɣelli d
iruḥ yunag
mačči d imesbaniyen d taqeḍɛit uɣelmi
icebba yi ṛebbi yella wi yellan di taxxamt nni n zdat
fehmeɣ tanemmirt aṭas aṭas
giɣ taɣtest iw
aɛdaw yuẓ d di tikli s
ḥemmlen t akk
s teqbaylit kan i tettzuxxumt
ad asent tt tefkemt
siwel iyi d mi thedreḍ d tom
inna yas a baba wwten aɣ irra yas a mmi ɛeqlen aɣ
bezgen lecfaṛ is seg nnehtat d yimeṭṭawen
wukud qiment
tleɛɛbem tt tessnem
ameksa yufa agerruj deg iger nni n maxluf uɛetman
aṭas aya ur as hdireɣ ara
yerra yasent tt id
tatergit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
ferqen am ibawen ɣef luḥ
uliɣ deg tmacint nni iteddun ɣer london
heddṛeɣ s teqbaylit
taqcic tetturar
asekles s teqbaylit di common voice yelha
ṭṭlaba s la tettali
anta i kent yeslemden aya
sliman u muḥ yeṭṭeɛwec
tebrek netteqqen itt dima ɣer lmut
dacu i teččamt
ad kem tt id yawi
ma d wiyaḍ am wakken ulac iten
a dda qasi
ur bɣiɣ ara ad ttwaqneɣ
yessi s n ḥewwa i iḥer stukhulm ɣer tqarnit
ad ten leqqmen
mlaqacen lhedṛa
ayɣer i tḥemmleḍ ad teqqimeḍ weḥd k
d acu kan ul is ḥnin
ur sexdam ara awalen a
neɣ daɣen mgal adabu amesbaṭli
anef as ad yenced ayyur
ilha uqader n unefray
thedreḍ iy d ɣef yidrimen
ticki i newweḍ
ečč neɣ ur ttett ur nẓimeɣ ara deg k
a mm wudem ireqqen
netta d win ur neɛlim s wayen yeḍran i sima
amek tɛelmeḍ d ṣṣeḥ
d taɣara n tira ideg sbabben yimyura d yinaẓuren tilufa n yimdanen i yiɣersiwen akken ad d ifrirent tektiwin seg temsirin n tudert s unamek nsent alqayan
init asent
maziɣ d sima kecmen d ɣer tesdawit
iḍelli uɣeɣ d adlis n tmedyazt
ijmeɛ it id s leḥder
kenwi d iqezzaben
ɛeddi d ticki ar uxxam
mazal ccama n wass nni mi tejreḥ ul iw ar ass a yal mi ad d mmektiɣ
bezzaf i yexdem wallaɣ is
teǧǧa t tmacint n lxemsa d tin n setta
yid i i d theddreḍ
uriɣ iḍelli tabrat
amek tebɣiḍ ad xellṣeɣ aya
yuba d uḥṛic
ɣrant di tmenqas
izzenz adrum s uɣrum
ḍegger icelman nni
i yemudden tiṛwiḥin nsen akken ad tidir tmurt n zzayer di talwit di tlelli di teɣdemt tinmettit
abrid i tt yettawin ɣer tesdawit ibeddel
ur riɣ
deg leɛmer ixemmem ɣer waya
ula d nettat d aẓref is akken ad textir abrid tebɣa
ad ẓreɣ ayen yessen
nesɛa ccṛab
gen di talwit a gma ayad remḍan d awezɣi ad k nettu
yelli a tumliḥt n ccfer
kemmi d tageldunt inu
anwa ara tcukkeḍ
ala taseqsut ur nettkki gar asen
acimi ur iyi trujaḍ ara
ur iyi d yuli ara wawal
drus n tektabin i d yeffɣen s teqbaylit nessaram ad ilint aṭas n wannect a
llan ddeqs n wid ur yessinen ad ɣren
muqran yerfed aqrab is iṣub ɣer ugezdu anda yeɣɣar
agdal n zzna d yiwen seg iṭabuten iqburen maḍi n talsa
aneḍlib yebɣa ad ineɣ baba s maca tarsast tḥuz mmi s
ttetteḍ aksum n yilef
ma d kečč ay apukimun yesɛukkuzen ɣef lbaṭel
d tunḍa d tuzzya
ansa tent
annect a yark ilmend im
tsebɣemt asen tt
tenɣamt aɣ tent
ass a ur neẓri ara ayen ara d yeḍrun azekka
wisen ma yebɣa ula d netta ad yemeslay d yid i
ulamma yeɣleḍ
tḍemɛeḍ kra seg s
ala asaḍuf ara tt id iḥudden
ad tt id tekkseḍ
d acu tessewwayeḍ
amek i am gan wussan
sliman u muḥ yella iḥemmel ad yemmeslay d tiziri tagawawt
tasuta tettales itt id i tayeḍ
swemt yid i kra
tecčur tembult is
ad m t yefk
awal aneggaru
d azeggaɣ axiṛ
ḍemɛeɣ deg uɛeṭṭar yettmetran
azawan dayen yelhan
a yemma ɛzizen a yemma
melmi ara nruḥ ad d nawi tislit
d aberkan wul is
tella tin i iɣelḍen
yuba yesfex
atan yeqqaṛ tura
nutni akk d imellalen ala netta i d azewwaɣ
acḥal ara yeqqim da
ur ẓriɣ ara ɣef wacu i tennuɣem maca ayen nwiɣ
izux ɣef madden s wayen ur nelli d ayla s
abeṛṛeɛqu d gma s n ujṛad
di leɛnaya k ɣeṛ as
aɛebbuḍ yeṛwan ur yettnadi ara ɣef win yelluẓen
ur ḥṣiɣ ara ad wulmeɣ
baba m yettselim d fell am
taqcict agi d leḥrir n temdint
anwa i k iḥettmen ccɣel agi
ili kent d tibɣasin
acḥal i tettlusuḍ
deqzalla tɣelli d akk ɣef medden
yella kra n yiwen i d isawalen
twala t kra yekka yettnaɣ akken yezmer
tilawin deg sent ad ssutreɣ asuref wagi d inzi mačči t tiyita deg sent
ur d terriḍ ara agelzim s axxam
acuɣeṛ i tegneḍ ay agdud
yettafeg wakud
ata yella ḥedd da
kukrant
ijapuniyen ḥedqen nezzeh
tsebɣem iyi ten
hḍeṛ s ttawil
iqṛeḥ ik lḥal
amek tebɣiḍ timellalin nni inek
tettarraḍ ten deg uɛewwiq
kra tezga tettɛasa t akken ad hedren
ad k rreɣ d lǧens ameqran
megren t
imeslayen a ttezzin ttenḍen deg uqerruy is
iwacu tɛeṭṭleḍ ur d tuɣaleḍ ara ɣer uxxam
ḥbes ur ttɛeyyiḍ ara
ad sen tent id yawi
ur ttafent ara ayen ara xedment
tuḍen iẓi
ladɣa ayen yeɛnan talɣa
yufeg asent uqermud
ad tẓer maziɣ
ixeddem d ala taga taɣeddiwt d tbidest
sseṛɣeɣ am tt
awal nsen itezzi ɣef tsertit mačči ɣef tɣuri neɣ anadi ɣef tmusni
d acu i kem id iwwin ɣur i
ay aggur iwumi zzin yetran
anta i k iḥettmen ccɣel agi
d acu kan ɣur nneɣ
teɣli d gar aneɣ yiwet n tsusmi d taẓayant tesxelxel iyi mliḥ teɛreq iyi tririt
tettaǧǧa dima taxxamt is d tazeddgant
tasa muḥ usliman
mmet s leɛqel
ar wanda i tent tefkiḍ
iflisen n yilel
lliɣ deg ufurgu
qeblen yimawlan n newwara yidir
d annect nni i yi d nnan
ansi kent
tesṛuḥemt ten
d ayen i yi d nnan
ečč neɣ qqim ssuma yiwet
tid yellan deg leɛmer iw
mi d refdeɣ iman iw si tsumta ukiɣ d tamɣart iw tesfarfud deg i
lqayet tfidi
melmi tebdiḍ tira
wwiɣ t
yuɣ yelli s n taddart ufella
ggumaan ad kksen wawalen i as d yenna
d ayen yuɛṛen
acku aselḥu d uqeyyem ara xedmen waẓiyen imeqqranen
ifka yi iɣes ucekkab
ddiɣ d temdakelt iw
anda ara tt afeɣ
ur smuncufemt ara
ad nesmekti kan belli deg wussan agi iɛeddan xedmen yakan snat temliliyin nniḍen
amek i ten id tufiḍ
ad cnunt di temdint n bgayet
ameqqran n uɛebbuḍ yettaddam aḥric azuran
ḍṣant d meṛṛa
ayen akken i s ḥeṛmen wussan
tekker seg wussu ahat ad t tettu kra
tejjiḍ s tɣawla
tecfam ɣef tḥanut a
ad d yeddu yid i
qrib ifukk wass
arbaɛ n weǧda ddurin tarakna di lawan n tegrawla
yerfa axaṭer irkeb it
yettwali kent id s yir tiṭ
yeṭṭef afus i tin iḥemmel
ḥemmleɣ isebbaḍen xfifen
ur ttkeyyif ara
a taklit agi
win iteddun ɣef tidet yessawaḍ
ttxil k ttxil k ad k weṣṣiɣ
iḥemmel mliḥ tamurt n marikan
yeẓẓul
ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥulfa i usemmid
atent a tebratin im
deg tneɣrit llan isaḍufen ara netbeɛ
s teqbaylit i d yekker
netta yebɣa ad yeqqu taqcict nettat tugi
ttafent d senzent iman nsent s rrxa
dacu i yečča
d allen n weqjun i tesɛa
amzun yesɛuẓẓug umellaẓu
acu ara tebɣuḍ
ttuɣ ur k id steqsaɣ ara isem ik
taqcict nni tili truḥ
awah awah a tuǧǧal yeǧǧlen
tewwit lɣerba
d acu ara yi d tefkeḍ
ur sɛiɣ ara tuyat
ajeḥniḍ ubenferriw meqqeṛ
ad iyi ten id tawi
s tayet
nekk ḥemmleɣ akk ayen ara iǧǧen allaɣ ad yennerni
tura ɛeqleɣ kem id
aqcic nni amzun d mqidec
skidiben akk medden
d iḍ kecmet s axxam
asmi d tewwet lgerra s waṭas neflen d yisaffen
yečča aksum is meskin
yenna d ayen yelhan i gma s
teɛna taxxmat is
llan wid ifehmen ttaɣen idlisen n teqbaylit i lemɛawna kan
reḍleɣ am adlis ad t teɣreḍ
d acu kan taḥbult ur tettewwa ɣef yiwen n wudem
abrid a mačči kifkif
beddel lqecc ik
ur cliɛeɣ ara seg k
wissen acimi
ibedd ɣef nnaquṛ
lgaz ukarbun neɣ yettekki deg s
azger d awlay n tfunast
taqendurt tettemles s lfuḍa
nekk inem kemm inu
tikwal wwin aṣurdi d ipuṛsyunen u unfen asen d yiman nsen
igerrez
dima tettarra iḥulfan is ɣer daxel
ṣayddu yeqbel axeddim nni axir cwiṭ wala ulac maḍi
netta mgal asenfar
ahat tikelt a tezdeq as tyita
iḥedducen
iɛemmer usigna w yeččur
ur ɣlay ara yak
fell am i nettkel
sutreɣ d ssmaḥ
acku uɣalen uɣen tanumi d tudert nsen tajdidt
ad teǧǧ ayla s
ur yi mazal ara zemreɣ ad aruɣ
l ḥara n tessirt
tettnezziheḍ tiliẓṛi
negra d deg yir lweqt
lharaǧ agi yesɛuẓug imeẓaɣ
acmumeḥ
tid i yi skersen wussan
din a i tegzem tmiḍt is
taqcict meẓẓiyen i aɣ d yefkan taṛwiḥt is ad nɣeṛ ad nexdem ad nečč ad merreḥ ad nidir di talwit
laqen aɣ yidrimen
anwa ara tamnem
txeddem ɣef teqbaylit
sliɣ i ḥed ikcem d ɣer texxamt nni
teslufuy as s ttawil
ifakk am ten
ur ibɣi ara unefray ad iɣiwel s asufeɣ n tkerḍiwin tiwraɣin
ayɣer i tegneḍ almi d azal
fell ak ur yeddes lbaɛḍ
segger
mrafaqent tullas ɣer uɣerbaz
tusmem
ad teddum yid sen
akka i tesliḍ
tettwaɛeṛḍemt meṛṛa
yiwen ikcem d akken ad iɣer
sser ik ur t ttammal
ittqejmumuṛ ɣef iṣuṛdiyen
tezza tasa s
s teqbaylit ara idireɣ
la qqaṛeɣ
ttɛeẓẓireɣ iḍ kamel
d tom i d amdakel iw i ḥemmleɣ akk mliḥ
yebḍa yi t id
bɣiɣ ad ruḥeɣ s uvilu acku yebɛed uɣerbaz ɣef anda zedɣeɣ
d acu ara tiniḍ di yidir akked newwara
ayɣer i tneǧǧɛeḍ gma k
anta tamɣaṛt i yeẓṛan belli ilha zzit uzemmur i udeddic
anta akk ara nesteqsi
yedda yasen di lebɣi
nettawi deg ul nneɣ tutlayt taqbaylit
timẓin i yekrez uzger i tent iɛelfen d aɣyul
ad tissineḍ taqbaylit
azul
waqil ur yessin ara yakk d acu d aqeṣṣer
d acu i tent ixuṣṣen
yadda ad yali
tuḍneḍ
iɣerdayen n berra ssufɣen wid n uxxam
ɛni tuḍnem
ttagadeɣ tigḍaḍ n yiḍ
ilaq ad nɣeṛ i yimsulta
awwah ad tt niḥwiǧ tagi deg uxeddim
ṛuḥen metwal asif
gǧan asen d tarda leḥwal
tanemmirt si tura
ma yella d tura mi d nniɣ ayen iyi yeḍran
stut nni i d yeɛreḍ ugelliḍ ɣer tmeɣra teɣra timsal n tudert
katia d tameɣras mgal ddel d leqyud
maca yelha usirem
tettbineḍ d d tamelḥant tameddit a
iserdan imcac iqjan ɛacen yakk ččan ṛwan
tiktiwin caḍent ta tettdeggir ta
yebɣa ad yessers allaɣ is akken ad yili seg wid ifazen
tasdawit hwari bumedyen
simmal trennu sdat n lemri i as tettruḥ teflest
ur ttḍurrut ara mmi
err as lɣem i tecuyt mulac ad t kecmen yizan
ini d uqus ay udem ufeqqus
ad teččem čekčuka d tmellalin
bɣiɣ ad waliɣ asaru a
azzel ad d tawiḍ
ass kamel d učči
ad tɣeẓẓeḍ iḍudan ik
yettheyyi yuba imensi
d ifelfel atunsi
d ṛemḍan umusa i yuɣen akal deg at ɛebbas
ḥaca lmuṣenntin
bnin uɣrum aquran s zzit n uzemmur
agezzer nni n taddart ufella yenɣa tameṭṭut is
ad wen t fken
d asemmiḍ
ur tt iwala ara tom
qqimeɣ d ɛemmi
werǧin i d greɣ di lbal belli ahat d ameḥbus i d irewlen
anda i tettɛic setti k
ulac it dagi
sel a win ur nemɛin
d taqbaylit kan i ɣ yerḥan
semmḥen deg s ṭṭebba
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad yili d asaru imeɛnen
isers afus is fell as
di tecmatin kan i yeẓwer
ad qeyyleɣ
icreq d yiṭij
werɛad nekfi asmekti wis ɛecrin n tmenɣiwt n ucennay maɛtub lwennas
aqewwad
ur sɛiɣ ara
anwi i kent d yeɣṛan
sketres
raju iyi ɣef tis tnac akken ad nečč akken
aḍu nni yesserhajen imdaden ṭul n yiḍ
amek i t xeddmemt
tetteḥnuccuḍ di zzit
akken yexdem yeḥṣel
aḍummu n terkabin ibeddu s uwessawen
zik ara d uɣalen
acu i sen yenna
ilaq ad d tuɣaleḍ ɣer uxxam ɣef ttesɛa
jemɛet d sɣur wen lweɛda i umeɣlal
acuɣeṛ ur yebɣi ara tom ad yeffeɣ yid nneɣ
ay akken i ktaleɣ ur telhi
slemt d mliḥ
ha tt an ribka ɣur k
efk iyi d kan ciṭuḥ
tesqedceḍ tt
tekkes as leḥya
yebded yilemẓi yeǧǧa as i temɣart ad teqqim
d kečč i yeẓṛan d acu i k ilaqen
iɛǧeb ak lḥal anaɣ
tesseḥmam d ayefki
ṛajum kra
fell am i la tetzuxxu akka
ad nebdu tura
aḥeq taɛbuṭ nni ik id yesɛan ar iruḥ ar yekfa fell as ubiṭun
ttlaqaben deg s nettat tettaḍsa ur tenḥerwa ara mi walan akken uɣalen unfen as
nkeyyef
wamma tasertit nnan iyi d susem
ḥemmlent ad ceḍḥent
tettḥibbim ad teffɣem
yeččur wul
ad asen tt id tawiḍ
d acu i tessnem
nadi ɣef lefhama
ad rebbiɣ ayazi n tili
iban belli yeɣleḍ urgaz nni
teddem lqec is
teqqur tala
mačči d ayla k
tcennu s tutlayt taqbaylit
icaḍ
anda i tewteḍ
times tecɛel akk tamiwin
ṭṭal daɣen
tettwalimt iyi d
tamɣart inna temger d tirkimin si tmazirt
sliman yessen ǧeɛfer
lqum agi n tura yesseḍ
yuker asen
sliman d muḥend rẓan asalu
nezzi d i temda nni s tikli
yella yeqqim iman is deg uxxam anda tella tdukkli
cciṭan ur sen yexdim kra
netta d massi ttemlilin sbeḥ deg lkar
ad awen d yeǧǧ ṛebbi lbaṛaka
nenḍeb
sima tettḥessis i wayen d yeqqar maziɣ s imeṭṭi
ur yeẓri ara s anda ara yerr aqerru s
nkenti deg tmurt nneɣ
d ayen i ilaqen ad t xedmeɣ i xedmeɣ
swiɣ yiwet n tberkant ukiɣ d din din
deg imal i nra taswiɛt ad tbeddel
yettban yezɛef ass a
tettneẓma i tmeddit is
ul iw idehhu yes sem
ur t yeẓṛi ara tom
qqim akken tufiḍ iman im
yiwen ur d yehdir yid i
d acu d lmeɛna s
d lbaṭaṭa yeqlan i tessewwayemt
kkateɣ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
awelleh ɣef ayen iḍeṛṛun deg tmura nniḍen
aḍris a zegleɣ t ilindi
d acu kan abrid a n timawit ur idum ara
mi ara yeffeɣ yiwen seg wid ixeddmen di tiddukkla ɣer unnar d acu i ilaq ad yini
win yeɣlin ad tiliḍ sdat s
usan d
wehmeɣ deg lqern xmesṭac
ur tettɛemmideḍ ara ad t issexdem bab is s leqsaḥa
sskreɣ t id
tessal as kan ɣer medden
samil rezki nunu samya mark facebook yeṣṣawaḍ tizeɣwin n uheggi ṣṣawaḍent
anwa ara yebdun
ttamneɣ t
d lxir i ak m id yewwin
i kečč a maziɣ
aṭas i ḍeyyɛen
anda tt setti k
tamedyazt taqbaylit tewwi d amecwar d alqayan di tmetti taqbaylit telḥa d armi d tizi n wass a
yuzen aɣ d tabrat
wissen acimi ur d tusi ara
anwi i k yeslemden aya
mi ara iliɣ yid k ferḥeɣ
yezga yesluffuẓ
aleqqim aleqqim taẓallit teqqim
ɛni zwarent kem
ur tessinem ara ad turarem
yekkat apyanu xir iw
yenna as a wi yufan ilel d iɣi ma d igenni d tameḍluɛt
yiwen n wass ad d nuɣal alamma d da
ulac ula d aṭaksi dɣa wteɣ t ɣef uḍar armi d axxam
ad ɣ tt id awim
ɛelqen ɣer s ijlujal
ḥess d di leɛnaya k
di lebɣi s ḥeṣleɣ
ur d issusuf ḥedd tament seg imi
ileddi ṛebbi tibbura mebla tisura
ṛwaḥ a baba ad nurar lwaḥid
yuweḍ iyi d waluḍ almi d amgerḍ
uɣalent d zik s axxam
netta yettneɛtab ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
ihi walit tt di tensa agi
fakk ikem imeṭṭawen
anida i tettedduḍ akka
ur yeḥmil ara timellalin
yesɛa tirmit
tiwwura n umeyyez lqayen
yerfa mliḥ yidir ass a
ur ttissineɣ ara isewwi
teṭṭfem tt id
ur akent t ttakkeɣ ara
taggara n leɛmeṛ
teffeɣ d ɣer tebḥirt ad tessumer cwiṭ n tafukt
teẓẓel
teddam asent di nneqma
ad tawi abrid is
lɣella nsen d timẓin irden
d netta i iɛerken d netta i imeslen d netta i isewwayen
meqqar
yettwaxneq tom
kra yerregregren ur yeswi
slemt d i waya
lliɣ ceɣleɣ
nɣan nnig n miyya n yilmeẓyen imelsa
tezga tecɣel
iruḥ ar wanda i yeqqim baba s
ahat ad telhu d lfal
neɣ deg leqraya s
ad d theyyi tdukkla tadelsant anegmu n taddart at sɛada deg sidi ɛli bunab
d acu i yezwaren d axeddim inem neɣ d tawacult inem
yerna kra zgiɣ xeddmeɣ akken
iɣaḍ iken
nekmez
deg alaɣ is tessekles yal taɣawsa i as d yezzin
nɣil d aksum tewwim aksum
deg tegnit yecban tagiiwwi d ad neddukel
argaz im llan wid t id iẓerren di lḥebs
sami yesszul assaɣen
ad yenfeḍ ula d ciṭ yebnan
annect a nessen it
acḥal teɣriḍ d idlisen
anwa i d abrid ay uḥric
d taqbaylit i nettnadi mačči d akersi
yesɛedda ṛejṛaj aṭas
ur zmireɣ ara ad idireɣ mebla tliẓri
usiɣ d d wis xemsa u ɛecrin di lakul dɣa yewwet iyi baba
ad ixdem lutu i yiman is d wid i t yuḥwaǧen
yuba yewwi t nadam
urgaɣ tt nekk la tt ttarguɣ ssefraɣ tirga s tiyiḍ
tedduɣ asen di nneqma
s wacu i d cnan s teqbaylit neɣ s tefṛansist
zik ara tekkrem azekka
ffeɣ
mi d wwḍen sin n yimddukal
mari tḥerr d amḍiq
tamazɣa tewwet seg umda n siwa d maseṛ ar d tigzirin tikaniriyin di spanya
yak yuba yeẓṛa
d nutenti ara ak id ṭṭafern
yettarra tilimlin
d baba tkent tom
ansa ara ɛeddiɣ
meqqṛeɣ d s teqbaylit
amussu amagday imetti
zik nni yella yiwen n urgaz d amakur
anwa i kem yewwten
s tezmert nwen
sarameɣ xaṭi
di leɛnaya k ṛuḥ d
tessnemt ad tesselḥumt tamacint a
a tiṭ ɣlayen timmi tekka d sennig m
ṭṭuqqtent fell ak tlufa
anta deg sent i yeččan
axaṭer tugwad dɣa inna yas nniɣ am teḍṣiḍ
aserwal nni iruḥ akk d tifawtin
tembɣam ad tesɛum takeṛṛust
saɛid u muḥ yerra d ṭlem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
yerna ula d imdanen zgan deg yixxamen
d mmi m
ɣaḍen kem widak
txuṣṣeḍ deg leɛqel
taneɣlaft n usegmi aɣelnaw temlal akked imḍebbṛen n tkadimiyin iwakken ad heggin ikayaden bakaluṛya
allaɣ n lusyus yeqqim d win n wemdan kan
dayen ur ken uḥwaǧeɣ ara deg uxxam iw
lsas n teqbaylit d igerdan
acḥal i tettlusum
taqbaylit n wid i tt ḥemmlen s tɣuri d tira
kemmel kan akken ar zdat
yettṛuḥu ar ssinima yal ssmana
tebɣiḍ ad tesɛuḍ takeṛṛust
d acu i k id yewwin
meẓyan u muḥ ur yeḥbis ara tiziri tagawawt
d nitni i yeqqimen dinna
ul iw baqi yettxemmim ma ad iruḥ neɣ ad yeqqim
tettidireḍ s teqbaylit
yewwi aɛwin yid s
ilaq aɣ ad d naf kra n yiwen i izemren ad ɣ iɛawen
ahat wid izewǧen merra nedmen
dɣa yemmut
anef as kan
ur ẓriɣ ara s anda ara rreɣ aqerru w
terwel anda ara taf talwit
a win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna
amejjay idawa lǧarḥ is
bɣiɣ ad sɛuɣ aqjun g uxxam
ur tbeddlem ara akk
kra n yiẓmi ma ulac aɣilif
melmi ara d teffɣeɣ
tamurt n usemmiḍ lɣerba lqella n usuṛdi yerna temɣer
asentel agi yegla d s waṭas n lexsarat deg terwiḥin di tmurt nneɣ
ad tt id yawi i warraw n haṛun yellan d lmuqeddmin
a leɛmer iw a leɛmer iw d idurar i d leɛmer iw
yelli yesmermed itt uṛuḥani
yelha mliḥ akya
d acu i turam
aseqqamu n ymcawer n tdukli n tmazɣa
ttnaɣent ɣef teqbaylit
ur tt id iṣaḥ yiḍes ar ad yali wass
ur lliɣ d win n zik
ur yeswi tibṣelt yerkan
iḍ a yuɣal as d netta i taduli s
d lawan ad tekkreḍ fell ak
ɣuṛ k ha
yal yiwen wissen d acu n tmentilt i t yerran d aḥerki
ass n lḥedd ḥman iqerra
terwa leɛqel
nebɣa kra n lḥaǧa tajdidt
cukkeɣ d abrid yelhan
tasa tendef d mi tt walaɣ tezzi s axxam
timuɣliwin is rḥant iyi
aṭas ara yeffɣen tamurt nsen
mi wwḍen
anwa t wagi
uɣen as awal dɣa ddan yid s
d lweɛd
iḍ a ad ǧǧeɣ boston
ilaq iyi kan ad fakkeɣ aya
awi abrid ayeffus
tamhersa texdem axessar deg yimawlan n tmurt
tesɛa axxam deg temdint
ad d galleɣ s merra lawliya ara akken i d teḍra
ad yebnu fell i
anwa i yebɣan kra n cikula yeḥman
d nekk i yerran tom ar umkan is
tuɣal d zik s axxam
ad isiwel i kra n yimddukal ad as d afen amkan anda ara ines
d acu ara teččeḍ a yidir
nnan d d akken d imsulta i yenɣan maɛtub lwennas
ayɣer i teffreḍ fell asent akk annect a
tanalt nreffed itt gar yimekli d yimensi
timellalin n tyuẓaḍ n tmurt ifent tid n tyuẓaḍ n trisiti
ur tmesxiret ara
teḥbes ur tettmeslay ara
ttaruɣ s teqbaylit maca ttaruɣ s tutlayin nniḍen
tamdakkelt iw karima tewwi iyi d akadu ass n umuli w
ɛiwen imeɣban
ɣas rnu d am tidak
yessen ad ileqqem
mačči akka i yella lḥal
iɛǧeb iyi lfilm a
maziɣ ur yefhim kra
deg tazwara ad awen d sekneɣ amek i tetteddu
ur ttcekkir ara iman im
ass agi d ass n tlelli
tettafeḍ yir tirga
ad tḥewwsemt yid s
wa samir awi d ibarriqen nni ad nandi yis sen i yefrax
lebɣi meqqer afus wezzil
tin ur nezwij ad tezwej
yettriḥi d aẓidan
ugin ad serrḥen
yetḥeyyeṛ tom
ilaq aɣ uɣella amaynut
mi yeffeɣ ɣer lecɣal is tesserwateḍ deg yiɛeggalen
aqjun ifka yas ṛebbi sebɛa leṛwaḥ
ttasen d yal aseggas
ttwaṭṭfeɣ
yuba u muḥ ur yettemsefham ara d tiziri tagawawt
qqaṛeɣ idlisen agi
wissen ahat mad d nemlil yiwen wass
ires uferṭeṭṭu ɣef ujeǧǧig
acuɣer ur d tusiḍ ara ɣer tmeɣra
ad k wwteɣ ad ak teɛreq yemma k
amek nnekwa k
neɣ ahat tsetḥaḍ
ḥemmleɣ ibawen
lxiṛ d amengur
ǧeɛfer iɣuc ayla s
anta i d tamurt ik
gezmen as aṭar is imi ysserka as t waṭṭan n ssker
yemmut unaẓur ɣas ma yeǧǧa aɣ yeǧǧa d lǧerrat ur ntekkes
iḥemmel yidir ddabex n uḍar acu kan di tiliẓri
ilaq ad neddu ar zdat
sseṛɣent ak tent
inelmaden ttalsen d deffir s i wayen i d yeqqar
ziɣen ilaq ad teɣli acḥal d abrid akken ad tegzu tudert
nḥemmel taqbaylit nneɣ
aglim is d amellal
ass a d ass nnwen
bɣiɣ ad zziɣ kra zdaxel n temdint n bgayet
addal d lsas n tezmert
ad aliɣ ar wedrar ad ḥewseɣ kra
yussa d farid akked djamila
ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel cna
d ayen iyi ǧǧan qqareɣ ak d ad tt ǧǧeɣ
nebɣa ad neqdec ɣef teqbaylit
ma yella ur tkemlem ara
yefka as t i yemma s
yal awal i as d yenna
maca kemm a t an tessawḍeḍ ad tessufɣeḍ ayen i akem iqerḥen
anfem iyi ad wen d sekneɣ yiwet n tɣawsa
tḥemmel tutlayt taqbaylit
ayen xedmen deg sin
tuɣ itent meskint deg allaɣ
annect a yak af udem im
isres sin n ibuqalen ɣef ṭṭabla
izdeɣ iten ulac
bḍan as tt id
d acu tḥesbeḍ iman ik akken ad yi d tessiwleḍ akken
ɛni ttbeccicent tyuzaḍ
ahat mazal it igen
agdud ur nefriẓ lehna
ur ttneẓnuẓet ara
zgan deg tneččiyin n marseille
qrib ad ikfu lweqtmfaraqent snat nni n trebbaɛ mebla iswiyen
učči yid m d afelleq
mzulen
ičča lmal yefṛeḥ bab is
nniɣ as ad neffeɣ ad nečč imensi
ayɣeṛ ur tessineḍ ara taqbaylit ay aqbayli
lkimya tekkat abrid
ad k t id yawi
yerna ax ad ak d ǧǧeɣ fasebbuk inu
urmen
terriḍ iyi tent id
deg sbiṭar ttmektiɣ d kan acḥal d tisegnatin iyi ičexxben
ttasen d si yal tama
ur ilaq ara ad tettafseḍ akken deg učči
ilaq ad tt tissinem
ečč ugar igumma
anwa yeqqaren sseḥ
newwara d tameṭṭut iḥercen
sufɣeɣ lmal ad yeks
yesnuzu iselman deg ubrid
ɣef udriz i tent ɣunzan
ur am d tuqiɛ ara
azekka ad ruḥeɣ anwa ara yeddun yid i
ziɣ akken ad d nawi imekwan
ur telhi ur tecmit
irman i ten yessemrasen anagar imazzagen n kra n taɣult
tqerḥeḍ iman ik baṭṭel
acampanzi d ibki nni iqerben maḍi ɣer umdan deg adn is
la itezzi leɛqel im
tkesbeḍ lwiz ur nettseddid
tegla yes m
keṛhen t
d acu kan tessaram ad mlilen deg tesdawit
ffɣen d akk medden ar iberdan
yeggull ɣef uksum yemceḥ aseqqi s
tezdel tyaẓiḍt
ɣur kent takeṛṛust
bɣiɣ ad yi terjumt
leǧnas ad ṛǧun deg yisem is
iḥninet d fell i ciṭuḥ
tiwwura n tmussni
ass a dayen ɛyiɣ
d acu kan llan wid i d yettaran rruḥ
iṛuḥ ar ttberna ad d isew kra n tebyirin
wissen ma yella ad d yili wejdid
taddart n tizi hibel teǧǧa d amaru mulud ferɛun
d izmawen i trebba tsedda skeɛwiwen d wuccanen
yeqqim ɣef tesɣimt yettxemmim d acu ara d yini
ḥemmlen tasekla
llant kuẓ n tsemhuyin di teqbaylit tagrest tafsut anebdu amwan
i wacu i tɛeṭṭleḍ annect a
ad kem ḍefṛeɣ

werɛad

d taqbaylit i ken id yefkan
argaz ur yefhim ara seg lferḥ yeqbel akk ccerṭ n dunnit
nɣiɣ ak tent
adabu azzayri yugad ad tufrar teqbaylit neɣ ma ulac ad yeɣli
awi d afus ik

terfa tmeṭṭut
nenneḍ nettel

ikad ak d yeɛni iɛemmed mi iga tuccḍa ya
uɣalen beddlen leɛwayed nsen
issebbaḍen i d uɣeɣ iḍelli ur iyi d zgin ara
am wakken lesqen lɛib kan ɣer tmeṭṭut
teẓmeḍ iyi yelli ger ifassen is
imarawen nneɣ ǧǧanaɣ d taqbaylit akken ad tt neḥrez
yella d deg ttiɛad agi adelsan
leɛmer ur yefni deg uxxam yeǧǧa d muḥend crif
fkem d tikti tamatut n uḍris teɣram

layes ad tt id ittemuqul

rniɣ tt

nekni ur nezgil ara tamacint

am akken yalla wacu i ten iɣurren
ɛmiruc at ḥemmuda yemmut akked si lḥessaw di tama n busɛada

maziɣ yegza taluft

waqil ɛelmen merra
maca abrid a a t an ad mlilen deg tilawt yerna alammi i myefken ttiɛad
ad nruḥ
ur fhimen ara d acu i d tenniḍ
tufrar d gar tizyiwin is
mačči d tisdawiyin ara iḍebbṛen ɣef amek ara tili teqbaylit
yesɛa sin imcac
acuɣer ur d testeqsayeḍ ara
anwa i wen d innan belli ad ken ɛawneɣ
yeswa tabuqalt n yiɣi iman is
ittruḥu yettuɣal
yuba d igellil
d amellal am izimer ites aman am uzger d acu t d acu t
tugna s ula d nettat tura tegguma ad as tesserḥ
inezgumen urfan lemḥan ur ten ttaǧǧaɣ ad d zzin ɣuṛ nwen
a yemma ɛyiɣ ttxil m rfed iyi
mmi ur ittṣubbu ara yid wen
ṣṣenf agi n tezrawin ur yeṭṭuqet ara d ayen aɣ yeǧǧen ad d nefren asentel agi

i aɣ d yenna uselmad is n tmaziɣt

d asfaɛfaɛ

ay itbir afeg ur ttrusu ara ɣef ufus n umdan
ad ɣ tt tefkeḍ
ilaq aɣ ad nceyyeɛ tabrat a azekka ɣurwat ad nettut
amzun akken teḍfer iyi tucerka
rnu tameqqrant
tewweḍ d teswiɛt is
nutenti ttxemmiment kan ɣef teqbaylit
walaɣ awal i d yeddan deffir n udlis taɣellaft tis rebɛa d tukkist seg usefru wis rebɛa

ad d yaweḍ lweqt n rrḥa kul wa ad yessefqed tasraft is

iḥma wurar ass a
yeggugem am yisɣi
ahat teḍra d tuccḍa ɣef udebṣi neɣ abrid ummid meqqeṛ aṭas
yuɛer lḥal ad d tessuqqleḍ tamseḍsut ɣer tutlayt nniḍen
ad iyi zzment wallen iw
ad ffɣeɣ d abugaṭu ameqqran
senned ɣef safari sakin fren imsewḥal n ugbur
d yir lfal ma yerreẓ ubuqal
inelmaden ḥemmlen aṭas ad cnun deg tneɣrit
tin ur nečči ara seksu yagi d tameɣbunt
yegguma ad d yuɣal anda akken i yedder tudert n zzelṭ
d acu i ak texdem
iban ad d yaweḍ deg lawan ilaqen
wisen ahat yella
s teqbaylit ara tidirem
zik ttaggadeɣ gma ad iyi iɣdeṛ
atan dagi
yugi ad tent iffeɣ ubeḥri
gen di talwit a gma aribi yamina d awezɣi ad kem nettu
ukiɣ d
yessers d ifassen is ɣef yedmaren iw qrib yedda laɛmer iw
ur d yeǧǧi acemma deg s
ay ul ru ad ruɣ fell ak
tella kra n yiwet i yettnezzihen deg tom
zahra tettzad di cbaḥa yal ass
neɣ ad ɣ tcudd tannumi
iḥemmel yuba taẓuṛi
ur d tettasem ara
ulac win i d yekkren yessen
ad iyi tessurfeḍ
anwa t urgaz nni i iɛeddan zgelli sya
yes s i trewwi irij akken ad d yefk cwiṭ n uzɣal
ur bɣiɣ ara kan ad s qqaren medden ur zmireɣ
mi ara tetteddu tettecrurud am tsekkurt
feclent
ih ala
tcemteḍ
ma drus i nesɛedda akken
snat agi am umcic d uɣerda
a taɛeggunt
d acu ara tiniḍ di tezlit a
yuker ik
yal yiwen ɣef acḥal i tt yebḍa yal yiwen i ɣer yettara talalit n tmedyazt tatrart 
yeɛweq d acu ara ixemmem
bɣiɣ tilelli w
tettaggadem imcac
terriḍ aɣ tent id
d ɛemti iyi tt id ixaḍen
simmal yettɛeddi lweqt
srid seg burǧ buɛrariǧ
ɛni d ajapuni netta
amasal n teẓrigt
ṭṭejra tettwaɛqal s lfakya s
aman grur
ad nettweḥḥid netḥeyyeṛ
ha t an da iferres ha t an dihin ileqqem iẓebbjan
ẓummeɣ
ihuh ur teṭṭiseḍ ur teǧǧiḍ wara yeṭṭsen
ɣas llan ur ttmeslayen ara aṭas
kker fell ak a tom teẓṛiḍ belli d afutay inu
ɛeṛḍemt ur d ttaḍṣamt ara
ayen yellan sdaxel yettfaka mi ara tbelleɛ adlis
ibecc deg userwal is
tḥemmel ad tecnu s teqbaylit
asegbar d win yetturaren deg umezgun neɣ deg isura n ssinima
ayaw ad nger tiṭ
d acu i yuɣen imawlan ik
bdumt tazzla
ad s t id awin
ittas d tikkelt deg useggas
myeḥmalen yerna mliḥ
ulac akk deg k lefhama
ahat ad d yuɣal
deg lehdur tɣelbeḍ tamɣart
acḥal n tikkal i truḥeḍ ɣer lebḥer anebdu agi iɛeddan
ass a d lawan ad d nekker
wwḍent d tebratin
yeččur webrid teddun medden
nekki ad akem ǧǧeɣ
iha iha tamuqint n naɛnaɛ cceḍḥ im ass a iwenneɛ
d agerbi kan ay zedɣen ikemmel yeɣli
yettban ɣef udem ik
awi yaɣ d asefru
yewweḍ d wučči
ur yeffiɣ ur yekcim
ay ṭfen ma fɣeɣ d ɣef teqbaylit iw
tenwiḍ mxelleɣ
temliḍ iyi d d acu ara xedmeɣ
d lawan ad uɣalent
ladɣa tamuɣli n medden ɣer teqcict
ad as teḍru am win ifuden yeswa
seg wasmi akka ur as tettmeslayeḍ ara
yura kem s yidammen
cukkeɣ d lekdeb
ur bɣin ara ad d slen
sṛuḥent tt
anita i yessnen ad turar ddabex n uḍaṛ
ur heddṛet ara yid i
ibeqqa yasen slam
bɣiɣ ad ak d fkeɣ yiwen n usteqsi ɣas ur yemɛin ara
tessardeḍ akk leqlud nni
ɣeṛṛeb neɣ ceṛṛeq
gganen ɣef udekkan
ɣuccen anemhal nsen
tlata n yidlisen ara d iffɣen deg waggur agi n yulyu
ibɣa ad yennaɣ mgal maḥyaf
yuba yettmettat
yak nhedder nettfaka
kunwi d kunemti teččimt
sṭebṭebet ad wen d teldi
yal tagnit ara iɛeddin tessaram tayeḍ
annaɣ a ṛebbi
d tiyita izemten
zgiɣ ttḥewwiseɣ
tḥulfa yas i wezɣal
acu n ugummu tḥemmleḍ ugar
zreɛ ayen i tzemreḍ ad t tmegreḍ
ass amaḍlan n temsetla talsant
ad iyi txedmem aya
llan d aṭas n yinagmayen i ixedmen tizrawin ɣef umecwar i d telḥa tamedyazt taqbaylit
yewwi t anda ur t yettaf ula d yiwen
theddṛem s teqbaylit
ffɣet aɣ ay at ɛziz teɛṛeq yemma d yemmat wen
ula d nettat tettḥusu akken yettḥusu urgaz
sew yid i kra
ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell i
unan iẓra belli dderya ara d isɛu ur tettili ara d ayla s
nɣant aɣ ten
tesseḥmaḍ d ayefki
ad neggiɣ deg yiḍ deg uzal
tura mi d llint wallen iw yid wen ad mḥasabeɣ
ḥemmlen tutlayt taqbaylit
amek ara d tessumreḍ ad yemmag
imi d agfur iyyaw ihi ad neqqimet deg uxxam
d allen n wemcic i tesɛa
d taqbaylit i d yemma tsent
zemmem qemmem
ur awen d ssukkseɣ acemma
tettagadem amaynut
ur yelli lɛib ma tessarem teqcict
shu iyi
yeqqen ɣer lferḥ ara s d yawi maziɣ mi ara heddren
acku d nettat i d tameqqrant deg twacult is
d aṭṭan n tawla i d yeslalay ubirus n anflwanza influenza yesɛan ddeqs n leṣnaf
tewhem d acu i ad tt isegren akken ad tebɣu ad temlil yid s
kemm d taǧeǧǧigt iw
yiwet ttnadiɣ fell as yiwet tettnadi fell i
d ḥedd i tettḥufuḍ
ur ifeɣ ara yidir di tefransist
ad iyi teqqen
iɣli d ubruri d iwedcen
acḥal i tesɛiḍ g leɛmeṛ ik
ad teslemdem tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw inwen
werǧin tḥulfa s tayri ɣer urgaz is
ǧǧet aɣ t id
tebna t
tessegdel fell i awal
tmerrɣem ɣef tferracit
wa samir awi d taqqurin nni ad nandi yis sent i yefrax
faqeɣ
ad k nernu tirni
cqerwaɣ k
yuli wass ad nekker i ufras
anzaḍ n temsetla taɣelnawt
tikwal ikess ulli d wakraren is
sers imru yik
yuba yečča tigaṭiwin
yiwen n uɣrib yekker ad d ikcem ɣer tmurt yekcem di lḥiḍ
tedda d akka kra a t an iqubel itt id maziɣ
d kečč i yebɣan tigi
tettaɣeḍ d aɣrum yal ass
acimi ur d tsawleḍ ara iḍelli
ur d iqqim ara aṭas i wakken ad ines uselkim inek
yif ddunit
ma mačči akka anef i tessirt n wawal ad tẓeḍ awren is ad t yeddem waḍu ad t yeḍlu i tɣeltin n tatut
myerjamen
d acu ugadeɣ imennan
ḍefreɣ abrid n tlelli
anda akka i teffɣem
acḥal cebḥit lecfaṛ im a lwiza
d amahil i d yellan ddurt iɛeddan deg tnarit n tiddukla
iwwet afus is ɣer lǧib is ixelles tibyirin neswa
lbena m deg s teɣli
weɛṛeɣ aṭas
asqizzeb ur teǧǧi ara aɛeddi ur tɛedda ara
rrant tt kan i ucali
d wigi i d imeqranen nsen
anda i teǧǧa tiqcicin nni
tafsut tenhel igenni yettusfeḍ seg usigna nni aberkan
sima tekcem ad texdem
ad naf daɣen daxel ammud n yinzan akked kra n tmucuha i tɣuri
ẓriɣ ten
tiremt n tnezzayt d lqahwa
awit t ma tṛuḥem
amennuɣ n yizem yiwen wass ma d amennuɣ n uydi yal ass
yuba d amcum
dewren d anda i llan qqimen
ṛuḥ ssefhem asen tura kečč
ur ẓṛiɣ ara anect a
yezdel deg uxxam ur d iteffeɣ ara akk
ur asent ten id yuɣ ara idlisen nni i yessi s
ilaq ad fehmen medden belli ddunit tetteddu ar zdat
massi yella d ujdid deg tudert is
aṭas i d as yenwan lqahwa d aman
tusa d ɣur sen tin ijebbden allen
tettemsefhamem yid s
igerdan nniḍen ḍsan
ḥess mliḥ
ur tewɛir ara tseftit taqbaylit
tutlayt taqbaylit tettali kra kra
tesṛuḥ iten
sima tella tezdeɣ iman is
yettban d meẓẓi
yewwet iyi yikerri
ɛeslama nwent
teddmeḍ n leḥwayeǧ ik
tasa n tyaziḍt
mazal ttraǧuɣ ayen i d sutreɣ
teḥnuccḍem akken tufam
acimi ur as terriḍ ara awal
neḥḍer i tlata n lgirrat
isewweq uqerru s
ini d anda tufiḍ aya
teɛǧeb am tiɣmi ya
ad tɛedi ad texdem imensi
awi iyi d acapun iw
argaz iw d asewway ifazen
ad k tent fkent
tameddit ulint d tjirra ɣumment amkan nni anda i sbedden wat ɛebbas iqiḍunen nsen
acuɣeṛ ur k isqelliq ara waya
d yiwen uɣbel ameqqran i d ttmagaren akk meden
merrɣen ticki yella uzɣal
hettken t id si ssuq
ad tizmireḍ ad yid tɛawneḍ tikkelt nniḍen
teḍra as am uḥuli yefkan azuɣer ɣer zdat
winna tura dayen yenṭeyyar
ṣṣuṛa m tugi ad temḥu
ad iniɣ tḥemmlem t
seksu s yeḥricen
tteḥnuccuḍet di zzit
ma d win i d tesɛa yemma s iruḥ yeǧǧa t di leḥzen
sdegdeg
deg s yettwali tafat
fiḥel ma tennḍeḍ i udrar aɛmam
ur ssinen kra
wissen d acu i aɣ ḥesben
am wi ittagmen s uɣerbal
yiwen yeɣli d ṭṭlam fell as yessebzeg it
akken qqaren ulac ddexxan bla times
anwa i ken yewwten
ttwaṭṭfent i tlata
tebɣam ad teččem
ḥaca timira nwen
mačči ɣer tmeɛnanc ur nesɛi azal
sseṛɣen am tt
ungalen a n tmaziɣt
tfukkemt almad n teqbaylit
walit kan ma tejba d
iɛawed tom lqecc is
yeɣli d ɣef wanzaren
wteɣ wayeḍ s lbunya
ahat ad yali wass
ad tejbuḍ ar at wasif
ur smuhbulemt ara
teččiḍ imensi neɣ mazal
tewwet iyi tmagart nkent
ikukra
ṣeggem
aql i d ilelli tura
ddment t zgelli
ad tkemmleḍ ayen tebdiḍ
ili kem d tabɣast
nniɣ as i tom acimi mary ur telli ara da
ttɛawaden d kan i wawal n uxeddim gar asen
bezzaf ččuṛen yemdanen d cceṛ
nek semman iyi fermac lqed ulac yerna ḥemleɣ amecmac
mmekti d aya
rrant iyi tent id
anwa i k yessnen
yidir iḥus i ṣṣura s teḥma d ayen kan amzun tuɣ it tawla
julien yettarra nnwaḍer d timdewṛin am tid n john lennon
maziɣ mi yesla i yimeslayen n sima
ad sen ẓmeɣ lebṣel s allen
ayɣer i tt id tuɣem
tweddṛeḍ tt
yeǧǧa ten ad frun timsal yellan gar asen
ad ak d rreɣ s wawal asmi ara yi d terreḍ uqble kečči s wawal
tḥemmleḍ ad tecnuḍ s teqbaylit
maziɣ akken yennum
anzaḍ nni iferqen tisselbi d leɛqel yuɣal yerqiq ugar
nettat tḥemmel ikem aṭas
ngen
anda i tezdeɣ setti k
ma d win ara yeṭṭfen alamma d taggara ad ittusellek
d alexxax
ad m ten fkent
taggara ai ṣṣḍen akk lɣaci
nettwali kan taqbaylit
isnawanen n tallit nni
ur ibeddel kra deg i
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel nneɣ
tom yuzen as i mary takarḍa n umulli
mi ara tturaren
ad afen d acu ara hedren
twalaḍ acḥal i iḥemmel yidir newwara
d acu ara ɣ d teḥkuḍ
dda ḥmed yesbedd d aɣerbaz axxam n tmussni
ma d cabḥa leqdic akk n uxxam ines
azwu yesɛa taẓẓayt akked tufsin
lmed ugar
afriwen refden
ad wen tt teɛṛeḍ
tuzzel lqebla nni ar tqarɛet nni n larkul tebbeɣ ifassen is
yeṭṭef d yuba amkan
ffɣent meṛṛa iḍelli
thedder mebla tilas
ur telliḍ ara yakk timsekkeṛt
yerwa muḥend amceččew
llan medden deg yal amkan
qqim kra
mačči d kečč ara yi d yinin d acu ara xedmeɣ
yettazen iten uqbel ad ten id yefk
imesnallunen mmugren ten id kra n lɣaci akken i d iruḥen s leḥmu la ttsuɣun ttserfiqen asen
kemmel mmeslay
ad nali ma yella tuli teqbaylit
anagraw n tɣellist firewall
kra n udellel iṭṭafaṛ tirza inek ɣer izmal web ɣas ur tsit ara ɣef udellel
tecfiḍ i ṭṭrad iɛeddan
ad d imudd ayen yezmer
mgirred
awimt ten ma tṛuḥemt
yedda yas di nneqma
nekcem s axxam naf ikem tegneḍ
siwa kemm i d tameṭṭut n lebɣi w
tḥemmlem ad tceḍḥem
wissen ma yella da
terɣa tkatidralt ur d yecfiɛ deg s rebbi
anda ten yimcac im
ihi wwet aqeṛṛu yim ɣer lḥiḍ
yerna d sami yiwen n umeddakel amaynut
asɣar iḥeḍmen ittifsus
yella wayen i beddlen
a win ijebbden amrar ixef is atan ɣur i
ur ak d ssukkseɣ acemma
tebda amermeɣ d ujbad deg tɣeggaḍin i tt yurzen ɣer umeṭreḥ
tamamart
iwet iyi d s rrkel ɣer yimellalen
ad sen tt id awint
llan qqaren lqaɛa timdewwert
simmal ttewwant ttiẓident
akken ad d uɣalen s axxam
ɣer wussan imezwura n unekcum afransis
acuɣeṛ i s isawal i wettma s tikwal kan
teṭṭfeḍ igenni terniḍ lqaɛa
d aya kan i tebɣam
tezdeɣ dinna d walebɛaḍ nniḍen
tettban tuzert ɣef udmawen nwen
awi d kan ur d ɣellint ara wallen is d tid n sima
kemmel asmeḥses
i yes nerḥa iɛdawen
ar deqqal
yeqqers ṭṭbel ik
err d ɣef usteqsi
nekk mačči d mmi m
kcem
maca yettak asen d afud
deggreɣ iɣes is
yewwet taẓẓelt deg uzeqqur
tettnahareḍ tumubil
texten as imma s s ibeddi
si bgayet ɣer tizi ay ul iw zzi
seg zik i rriɣ akal i tudert iw
mačči s lebɣi s i ixeddem aya
wissen ma ad teddum yid i
ɣeṛ wa
assa ad d yali yetri ara inewwṛen udmawen
ad s laɛin i dda brahem
ad sent ten tɛeṛḍem
tafellaḥt tesrusuy aqerruy tettaččar aɛebbuḍ
yettmerriɣ deg uɣebbaṛ
d isbayɛiyen wawalen i yessidir deg usefru
d tayri i yebnan tudert
ur ceffun ara
ddexxan diri t i tezmert
ayɣer a tettruḍ
ssuq ṣṣbeḥ
ur t infiɛ uxbaḍ wala armaz
nniɣ as ahat d ayen yessehbalen
win ara iyi ikksen tilelli inu
ɛmiṛuc u muḥ ffɣent waman
d acu k yeṭṭfen
ɣret kan ad tifem leǧnas
maca ɣur s mazal ixus kra
bɣan ad sɛun takeṛṛust
urar n uɣyul d aɣẓaẓ
d netta kan i tebɣa
ad tḥewwsem yid s
kra ar tecwirt kra ar tayeḍ ma ulac ad ɣlint
d aya i kkateɣ ad k d iniɣ
ad truḥeḍ
bɣiɣ ad idireɣ lqern
yettaweḍ d alamma d iles is ad terr
afenǧal n watay ma ulac aɣilif
am win icetkan i lexla
ula d imɣaren rfan
kemmlet axeddim nwen skud teḥmam
win ur nettnawal ur as ilzim wawal
terra yi d takeddabt
keṛheɣ lqahwa
aɣrum neɣ seksu ur nedhin ara s zzit n uzemmur mačči d učči
julien yettarra nnwaḍer d timdewwrin am tid n john lennon
yettwajreḥ d tom
berka ken aseglef
isem n umsedday n unadi

ugint ad amnent s wayen yeḍran yid sent
d amaziɣ
aṭas i yexdeɛ lemri ɣuṛ k i k tḍeṛṛu am nutni
teḍlem
ru ɣef yiman im
ur iyi d temliḍ ara d acu ara xedmeɣ
ur yeqbil ad t ggzen
ssruɣ t
wissen ma d tidet tella tudert umbaɛd lmut
ɣer ṛebbi ad t id iciweṛ
akken beddeɣ
hatan wacu i y iceɣɣben
inuda fell asent ur tent yufi
a ssiɛqa lmumnin 
d acu ten iɛewwiqen i d temmugreḍ
ẓẓiḍer
dda brahem yesɛedda d azgen n tudert is deg lɣerba
kecmen ɣer daxel
teččam imensi
ur txeddmeḍ ara ccɣel ik
yebɣa ad tesbur talwit tanezzayt akked tmeddit
yiwen ur tt ittelḥaq
ibedd as seksu
seg ansi i m d kan idrimen nni
aṭas n leqdic aya
ass a teqqel as d tamwanest is
terriḍ ten deg uɛewwiq
ḥekkmen yidrimen ḥemqen yemdanen
yudan uyaziḍ yefrari wass
asmi i meẓẓiyit nerwa urar n uḥnucceḍ
irbeḥ aḥmam aɛṛab
ziɣ tčefčefeḍ
ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d tekkremt
anwa ara yi mmlen anda ara afeɣ awalen n tezlit n newwaṛa
xneq i layas
ad d taɣemt ayefki
wa yettaɣ wa yeznuzu
sliman u muḥ yettban yefṛeḥ
tesseweḍ lqahwa
ur cfiɣ ara fell ak
ttzuxxunt s tutlayt taqbaylit
tezga tettmekti d amek i hedren d wanda i qqimen
am win yellan gar ẓẓebra d ufḍis
wellah alukan ur ttagadeɣ ara idamen
ad yeg rebbi ḥala aḍar is
ɛelmeɣ s wannect nni
ili kent d tuḥdiqin
d ṛṛay is i yas tt igan
acuɣeṛ i s ulac win yettɛawanen tom
iseglaf aṭas uqjun a
ǧeɛfer yeččur d iweṭṭen
nndama ur telli
teẓriḍ
anita i yebɣan ad tezweǧ zik
ulac am ccna aqdim
la tent ttnadint
tuḥwaǧ iṣurdiyen
beddemt
arrac uraren lwaḥid
yella diɣ deg ugraw n tniyen u ɛecrin n ukabar n tirni n uselelli aɣelnaw i ifernen amenzu n unbir
iḥḥu rebḥeɣ deg luṭu
ttṛajun akk medden ansa ara d yekk
yella win ara tt yeẓren ma mačči d caɛban azwaw
ssaɛa d uzgen nekk ttrajuɣ
di leɛnaya k qqim
zedɣen da yakan
wali akk iceggiren n uzegrir agi
axxam yeččuṛ d lɣaci ulac win tebɣiḍ ay ul
tettɛawazemt
mačči yiwet n tikti i yellan deg uqerruy
yella tom d yiwen n unelmad iṭagen
ax n affus iw a win yes s yegla wasif
ad ffɣeɣ d baba azekka
heyyim iman nwen
ttaggaden akk yidir
abrid i wasaḍ mačči i uḥreḍman
weḥd neɣ i nella
azzlemt
ussan n tugdi kfan
d axeddim yelhan
tayerza s yizgaren xas ini tura tenger di tmurt n leqbayel
inzan weɛrit i tsuqilt
ur ten izgil yiwen
wali akk wid yettwassnen
lhu yi ad ak lhuɣ
srugemteɣ tarsast n tmeẓyant
tamurt teččur d lxiṛ agdud yectaq talqimt
d azɣal ɣef madden meṛṛa mačči kan fell aneɣ
iwacu i tettwaxdam tsarutt a
uqbel aseggas ɣer deffir iyi d yebda kullec
yedda kra n yisurifen deg ufrag yettnadi ad yuɣal s wansa i d yekka
ad ten teddmemt
yerra as mselxir
d lawan ad tuɣal

ayen tesɛeddaḍ d lesnin iman im
ɛni zwaren ken

ur ččiɣ acemma
ad awen d nawi lqahwa
yal yiwen s tigawt is
sarameɣ ad urareɣ agiṭar
ur yeẓri ara imiren d akken yuḍen
ɛeddant tilas
takebbanit n ddwa deg xedmeɣ tessufuɣ d ugar n umelyun n tbewaḍin deg wass
ifehhem tom
deg lɛerc n at waɣlis tella tɣiwant n tinebdar taɣiwant n cmini akked tin n leflay

d tameɣar ad thuzz tammast
tura ad d taweḍ
yeffeɣ d sami

ɣileɣ teẓriḍ
d firefox ios i yebɣan ad yeldi asnas nniḍen
tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart d tin yesnernan tamdyazt tamensayt
ahat ur tseɛɛuḍ ara ẓẓher am wa tikelt i d iteddun
yewwet it rebbi ar tura ur yessin leslaḥ is
neɣ ayen iccuden ɣer tulmisin n ugbur ama d isentalasemres n tgemmi tagreɣlanit
tuɣal tettruḥu ɣer tkebbunay yessekruyen tinezduɣin
isem iw amaziɣ
tettamnem tent
yugurten u muḥ irḍel d idrimen ɣer tiziri tagawawt
acḥal aya d asefhem deg k tugiḍ ad tfehmeḍ
asmi i d yessuḍ waḍu ass nni mi yeɣli usalas
ad yesɛu idrimen
tanemmirt mi tebḍiḍ ayagi yid i
ad t nernu uqebl ad aɣ yennaɣ
iqbayliyen ur ttarun ara aṭas idlisen s teqbaylit
wissen anwa akkit ara yeddun
rrant ak tt id
melmi ad kent tẓeṛ
wid akk yekkaten ɣef tdamsa
marry tettqerrib
yefka ayen yelhan
tebɣam ad as ssiwleɣ
mkerracen sin yeɣyal di tala mi ṛuḥeɣ ad ad d agmeɣ
anda i yeffeɣ weqcic nni
udem is yekkaw yuza t lḥif t yeṭṭfen gar wuglan is acḥal n yiseggasen aya
ṛju da
ɛyiɣ di tikli rriɣ tt i tazzla
ttidireɣ s teqbaylit
ɛni d tidet ibeddel tom isem is
d ikɛeb
iḥrec mmi di ddabex n uḍar
ddu s leɛqel
nettat d win i as izedɣen allaɣ is
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad d isellek tiziri tagawawt
d ayen i d iḍeṛṛun
lliɣ ur sɛiɣ ara ččeɣ
tezziɣ ẓelmeḍ yeffus qqimeɣ ger tsumtiwin
tfukk tegmat gar watmaten
agemmay n tmaziɣt
tessexdameḍ asegzawal
acu yeḍran d medden din
nella nezzuzun iman nneɣ s tuɣac nni tirumansiyin n tkerkas
tesɛa aṭas n lemɛani
d tuttra lɛali
tefka lqima i tlelli is
kemmlen ttmeslayen
ur tezmiremt ara ad trefdemt wa
ma d tamsalt n unadi acu ara ten yesddukklen i wakken ad negrawen ɣef yiwen yiswi
ṭul n yiḍ ur yeḥbis axemmem
ḥnuccḍent iḍelli di taddart
ad sent t teɛṛeḍ
yeṭṭes tom
george tejreḥ tasa s
tinzer
ad ak d awiɣ lqahwa
wid iqqal uṛumi neɣ wid i d iqqimen seg sen segmi ikfa tṛad

iseffeq

anwa
snulfan d tilafsiwin
yal mi ara nennaɣ qqareɣ as wellah ma tɛawed as
d acu i ak nexdem a winnat
ur yi teǧǧiḍ ara ad tt waliɣ
ẓṛan belli tasertit d askeɛrer
kecmen ɣer tesdawit
d nnuba w tura
tetḥeqqeḍ ɣef tririt ik
beṛka ken imenɣi di leɛnaya nwen
yeswa lbira
beṛka k leɛyaḍ
yiwen ur t yettamen
ɣef waya ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yis s axater ur ssineɣ ara ilugan is akken iwata
ma yeɣli d uḥewwes
ttasent d deg lawan ur tnewwuḍ ara
iḥbiben n lekdeb am tfirellas ttasen d deg tsemhuyt yelhan akken ad ruḥen deg n diri
tidet ma tenna d tidet ilaq ad t xelleṣ amur is
ad s tiniḍ bellɛen imeẓẓuɣen is
iwacu nxeddem akka
ad d tuɣalemt
tuɣal tedyant deg ccfawat kan
ili k d aḥeqqi
tesbeɣ as t
ad d nemlil ticki
ahat ad rewleɣ
urfan ur lhin
tikwal tettafem tt id
ass kamel d asnuffeẓ
taddart texdem tiwizi
uriɣ asen tabrat
ur tt id beddu s besmelleh
i wuccayen agi daɣen ansi d kkan
kemm issuk am tt ɣef tamart tajennit ad kem tawi
sseṛɣent aɣ tent
imezdaɣ n uqqas ttheyyin yiwen n tmeɣṛa telha mliḥ
ur tezmirem ara ad ṭṭfen deg yiwen neɣ deg yiwet alamma d taggara
nekcem s axxam naf itent gnent
kemmel fellu
qebleɣ lecruṭ ik
d tidet meẓẓi uxxam n yidir
yeqqim sami daxel n tkarust
kullec yuɣal d iɣed
yeḥbes seg tissit
ilaq ad nexdem annect a lwaḥid
imarawen nneɣ ur xememmen ara fell aneɣ
cerken taswiɛt i as d yewwin ala lferḥ d usirem
sliman u muḥ yefka afud i tiziri tagawawt
d sellum n yiɛdawen

txeddem deg berra trennu deg uxxam
ulac maḍi
ad regmeɣ uqbel iman iw
ɣad bbubent arraw nsent ur d ttcetkayent ɣef leɛtab
tebɣa ad ternu tiɣimit yid s
ilaq awen ad twejdem i kullec
ẓran kulec
i nutni i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect a
tamurt nneɣ d yiwet
a leḥbab tikkelt a yid wen dayen
ad ǧǧeɣ amkan iw
d aqrab iw
azul a mmi ḥebbu
d taqbaylit i kent yerran d timdanin
setti tger iyi aẓeṭṭa n ubernus
i fell i nekk ad hedreɣ
ad nemmet ɣef tmurt d asfel wal tudert n ddel
yal ass ttargunt s teqbaylit
yeqqar iyi d wul iw yella wayen deg acu i s lliɣ d ssebba
ur itettu ara yidir amulli n yimawlan is
tizi wezzu d taqbaylit
tadyant meqqren i d yeǧǧan deg neɣ ccama acku nella d isnawanen
tsebɣeḍ iyi tent
yemlal iten id deg ubrid yedda yid sen
ffudent
ṛuḥ a yasif di lɣerḍ ik
tetttqellibeḍ iyi
maziɣ d sima mmeslayen ɣef yisental i asen d yeɣlin
beddlent ilugan
a talwit win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna ad as yini ccetwa teḥma
ur t ẓrint
lameɛna ccbaḥa d thuski n ugama deg teẓgi a tejbed iten id i tikkelt tayeḍ
ad yaf afus is

d acu t waya

tfehmeḍ kra deg s
awimt t ma tṛuḥemt
weḥd i i lemdeɣ tira s teqbaylit
ini yi d amek ur tḥemleḍ ara yiwen ubuqal mebla lqaɛ am wa
win akken yenɣa wuzzu n wissen win ittuɣellben nnig tezmert d ulac
ur yi d qqar ara kan belli tesselmadeḍ tamaziɣt
ttkemmilen wussan idelsanen deg temdint n wehran imi yal akud s wanaw adelsan i as iwulmen
ɣas ma nettmagar d yal as ẓẓerb

aṭas i ččan
yečča
yennerna d i tsekla taqbaylit umaynut s wazal is yerna tikkelt a yemgarad ɣef wayen i nuɣ tannumi nettwali t
tesɛiḍ izen amaynut

ẓriɣ aniwa t
