tḥaremt
semɣer tugna
terram iyi deg uɛewwiq
ad d tesɛum aqcic
anwa ara tissineḍ
ur sɛint ara zzerb
zeddig dayen kan
ulac aɣilif ma qqimeɣ yid k deg ṭabla
tettuḍ d acu iyi txedmeḍ
giɣ tawlaft akked ukrar
acḥal yettaweḍ uɣrud adday di tuṭrict
ɣileɣ txeddmemt
ugadeɣ fell akent
aṭas aya ur k neẓri
d acu i k yeǧǧan ay iles ur tesɛiḍ ara iɣes
kra n win iṭṭef ufrag ad s yini buṣaɣ ɣef lḥeq
s lemkaḥel yerna la regglen
yella walebɛaḍ i d isawlen tura
yečča amur n igujilen
i ubrid win i yeffɣen ur k ittɣiḍ ma yegrareb
tufiḍ iman ik deg uxeddim amaynut
yella win i d yeɣṛan
d ixef is kan ur s ufiɣ i tudert n lehna ulac
acḥal i tenɣam i txenqem s umrar
dda brahem yettara yasen d s taḍsa d unecraḥ
eǧǧ it i tom
at wul awen d asmiḥi kan
acimi i d yenna akka yidir
aḍu i d iruḥen ad t yawi
dayen tegzem itt deg rray anzaren is ad ten id tseggem
negrareb ɣef telqimt
lferḥ iw yugar lferḥat
mi d wwḍen
yettmasi sami tiɣawsiwin iw
yeqqes iyi uzrem
sḥerges
akked lebḥur
ssentaɣ tisegnit deg ddjaj win i d ineṭqen yebɣa zzwaj
anda yi
mliɣ tt i udrar inhez
ilaq ad twalim asaru ines
isuffeɣ d adlis n tfizikt s teqbaylit
qqimem deg beṛṛa
yebwi arrazen
ur teẓriḍ ara acḥal ara d tesqam
iqeddac ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
tesɛa lxedma
ansuf yes m
neɣ beddel iɣewwaṛen akken ad ten teǧǧeḍ
la tettihim fell i
anwa ur sexfen ara yedrimen
steɛfu kra
aqbayli yettwet ɣer tkatut teḍṛa as am win ihelken alzaymer
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ nsen
ttaɛṛadeɣ ad as d kkseɣ ifassen is s tbuxasin iw acu ur zmireɣ ara
tugim ad tsetḥim ɣef yiman nwen
ttḥezzib uqbel ad tneggzeḍ
iggureg ayen yelhan iṭ iɛeddan
zzuzer as sin yiɛqqayen n lmelḥ
d wezɣi ad idireɣ d urgaz yecban wagi seddaw yiwen n ssqef
tayaziḍt ur tettafeg ara
isubb almi d talqaɛt n wanu s umrar
teɛceq deg k
iniɣem nni tezdeɣ it twekka
i uḍris nni turiḍ t
nteddu yasen di nneqma
yak tesneḍ taqcict nni d wacu i ttedduɣ
iwet iyi d ɣer uɛebbuḍ nekk lliɣ kra ur t ččiɣ
ẓer amek ttazzalen
ɣuṛ i yiwet n tikti maca ur ẓriɣ ara amek ara awen tt id segziɣ
ad awen tent in awiɣ azekka
d awfayan uqjun ik
ulac iyi
tenquqel tmurt
maɛna ur tugadeḍ ara ɣef yiman im
i d tenna tselwayt n tddukkla timheggit
d lqerḥ yeqqazen ula d iɣsan
sserwaten deg unnar
ad rzuɣ ar wettma ass n letnayen ar boston
yečča weɣyul tuga deg udaynin
ffɣet d ar beṛṛa
netta mačči d aqcic
d tamihawt tmes
yuba ad iqqim dagi
yal ass tettargu s teqbaylit
yectaq rriḥa n tmurt
ad mmeslayeɣ
i kečč d acu tenniḍ
yerna tneddef tasa s tettqeḍririf
swiɣ aman n wasif
leɣrur tibratin d tullist n naǧib meḥfuḍ
tenɣamt asen tt
ddu d uḍaṛ ik
tɣaḍem tent
gen di talwit a gma neǧma faḍila d awezɣi ad kem nettu
uẓameɣ
acu tebɣiḍ a bu ɛeryan yenna as d taxatemt
tekkateḍ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
mmet mḍel iman im
a lḥif yuran
mačči d karuh wagi
zeddig wul is
yelha kullec di tama nwen
ɣer ccna
ur ttɣimimt ara yid i
tebḍa yasent t id
sarmeɣ ad d yas
walit ma yella akka i t tettwalim ula d kunwi
awal d awal im
ddu ɣer sdat ttu tuggadin
teccḍem
lbuq is iffeɣ
yexreb wexrib ay aɣrib
turzeḍ iman ik
mektaɣ d ussan nni deg nella lwaḥid dɣa ruɣ
ass mi ten id wweḍ ɛeddan
negra d di lqum yessendahen yemma s
kker a ɛejjaq immut urejjaq
yuɣ lḥal dda ḥemmu urɛad i tt innul
d wigi i d isteqsiyen nwen ineggura
anwa yellan da yid k
yečča aɣṛum
ɛawen iyi
ḥemmleɣ tisfifin n wunuɣen
kkes iyi lxiq a tin ḥemmleɣ
yenna d acu yettxemmim dɣa nfan t si tejmaɛit
ad tt terr i ddel d tɛekkmin
ḥaca tarewla ara nerwel
ssneɣ ad meslayeɣ tutlayt ik
mbiwlet sya
ad merrɣent tlawin gar yirgazen
d acu i d agerruj n talsa
gerrzeɣ tanemmirt
cebḥent tmeɣriwin s yiḍebbalen
kkaten deg medden meṛṛa amzun ala nutni i yelhan
ḥesben aɣ am at wexxam
wissen anida tt
tazwara n tmacahut d tasneknayt
yettɛuzzu aṭas yidir imawlan is
ibeckiḍen ggugmen
ɛinani leɛmer yeffer tidet yeqqar tqerreḥ
ur ẓriɣ ara a baba d kečč i d bab n rray ad sutreɣ tifrat s ɣur k
neɣ ad beyyen iman is
lqut agi d amerɣan
tirni n zzayer tamaynut
rnu ɣer waya aql iyi d asdawan ḍefreɣ aḥric n taywalt
aql i ttqeɛɛideɣ apyanu inu akken zemreɣ kan
nesɛa aṭas n tmucuha
ur wen d ittwaqbal ara
tasdawit hwaru bumedyen
aqbayli tuwi d fell as ad yeɛqel iman is ma ur yebɣi ara ad yefsi am teḥjurt n ssekker daxel lqahwa taberkant
a mmi wagi d agejdur yellan
ɣaḍen kent
leḥsab iw mi ara t fakeɣ a leḥbab ad aken in awḍeɣ ma yebɣa llah ṛṛeḥman
ad k t fkent
leɛmer i t cukkeɣ d yir aṭṭan
deg iseggasen n sebɛin win i d yenneflen deg imaɣnasen seg tmurt nneɣ ar fṛansa lembat is d agraw amaziɣ
ayen i wen qqareɣ s ameẓẓuɣ berrḥet tt ɣef lesqaf
ur telluẓemt ara
rnu d ay isli tissas n yizem
acku yemma ur ssineɣ amek teḍṛa yid s gma diɣen akken ula d baba
mecɣulem tura akka
di leɛnaya m ɣeṛ as s tilifun
lemmer tḥesseḍ iyi d tili ur d yeḍṛi ara waya
yenna iyi d baba belli agrud mara yeɣli yettaf duṛu
ad d teḥkum ayen teẓṛam
inas aql i ɛyiɣ
yuyes ad yaweḍ
amer yella wacu deg i txuss
d acu i ken yewwin ɣur sen
cewwlent tt tidak
d asebleɛ kan
ur d yelli walu
iḥuss as yuba i laẓ
ur zmireɣ ara ad aruɣ yakan
ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt iw
arraz agi deg tezrigt is tamezwarut ad iḥaz aṭas n yiḥricen
ajeḥniḍ umenferriw annect ilat
netta ur yezgil ara tamacint
rekden waman n massi
ad nemlil din
argaz d awal mačči d aserwal
akka ad mmteɣ deg lehna
d acu n waddal i tḥemmleḍ
lemmdeɣ aṭas
fell as i la tetzuxxuḍ akka
acu i txuṣṣeḍ ay aɛeyan
ha yeskeṛ neɣ yesleb
a dda yusef iḥemmlen asusef
ṣṣbuḥ n uwtul
win yessnen ad walin web
yella ttkal di luna
yeɛweq yiles d acu ara d yenṭeq
yeskaddeb tom i umsaltu
acḥal i ḥkiɣ ɣef ṣṣifa m
ur tettawḍeḍ ayen tebɣiḍ
hokkaido atta ɣer tama ugafa n japun
ayen i d tga taǧǧalt ad t ččen warraw is
wagi d aslif iw
acḥal i m yeṣber
texdem aṭas n tmeɣriwin ama di fransa liṭali d lezzayer
ad sen isawel meṛṛa azekka
deg pari lamikkal n yizzayriyen n fṛansa tezga tettnadi amek ad teṛṛez ifadden i ugraw amaziɣ imir nni
ḥedd ur d yemmetkti lḥeqq iw d lmal i ttuneḥsabeɣ
am win yečuffun tacebbakt
wissen ma ad yali wass
anwa i m tt igan
ad d nezhen leɛrac
i aɣ tt id yewwin
nnaqsa akked tadist
kra ara tekk tudert nsen
anda tesliḍ i waya
netta imi meẓzi yufa d amḍiq di lmina
acḥal ay agi la nxeṭṭeb ur nufi nnuda idurar nɛedda tizi
ad ɣṛeɣ adlis
yuklal it tom
ad wen d nawi cwiṭ n waman ad tessirdem iḍarren nwen
nekk d ameṛkanti
awit ten yid wen
aten in sin irgazen d yizazrafen ad ten tamneḍ ɣef tudert ik
tettxemmimeḍ ad teqqimeḍ aṭas
tiṭ is d aɛeqqa n uzemmur yewwan laɛyun is d lxiḍ n uzegza yeɣman
lejnan
yekkes as wanect nni n takruhi d usḥissef
ttɣimiɣ tettɣimiḍ yettɣimi ittɣimitettɣimi
ala ah mačči akken
ur nmerreɣ ara aseggas a
jmeɛ iḍarren ik
amcic ma isfuḥ aksum itezzi i lkanun
yekker ad yeffeɣ
mi ara theddreḍ ur teffeẓ ara imeslayen
anta i iṛuḥen yid m
filaman ihi
yettargu umedyaz allen is ldint
ifukk tom
yewwi t nadam
teddunt iyi di nneqma
beyyen d iman ik
i zgiɣ zlazeɣ ɣef tikli n wakud ibeṭṭun tasa d wayen turew
ilaq ad iliɣ d ilelli
dacu ara teččeḍ
ṭṭfeɣ t ula d nekk
s usaḍuf n butefliqa s tatut
at ṣula
sliman u muḥ ur yuɣ ara tiziri tagawawt
iḥemmel čina
d asɣar i yulin di ssuma
ḥemmleɣ ad qqimeɣ weḥd i
keččini tḥeṛceḍ
yemma tɣil skiddibeɣ
iwwi d abbuxen
yugem d uɣyul iswa ten
mačči akka i tt id nufa
bezzaf i yeḥdeq tom
yuzen awent in tabrat
yelha win i yeqqaren tidet
tɛedda d si tallit ɣer tayeḍ tegla d s waṭas n tmusniwin yurzen yal taɣult
ur yezmir ara ad d yaf tamentilt n yiɣeblan is
ččan tiyita
akli ikemmel abrid is
irennu lgaz i tmes
ṭiziri tusem
gǧan aɣ d tarda leḥwal
dayen tessaǧwem iyi am sselɛa di ssuq
ur cliɛent
sizdeget iceṭṭiḍen nken
ur yuɣ ara tannumi
mačči ɣer ɣur s i sɛan ass a
icenwiyen ttmeslayen tacenwit tutlayt nsen tettemcabi ar teqbaylit
ma akka yewweḍ lexbar selṭan
yerra yas tt id
heggant d leqdicat i lmend n yennayer
d aqerru n teryel i nɣiɣ
urzent iman nsent
tekker d teslit tenna yasass a ad eččeɣ yemma k
af d tom
yenɣa tamgerḍt
ẓriɣ t
i tmeṭṭut yefka lqima d tayemmat am lezzayer
ččan akk armi i ṛwan
nnan t id widak iɛeddan
cabḥa d tamcumt
acu t uxessar aki
di ccetwa yedda ɛeryan
i telha tmeɣṛa nni
aɛewdiw yesneḥniḥ
yemɣi ujeǧǧig
ass a d tameɣra nufa zzin ɣlayen
la am n selleɣ mliḥ
fell as i nettkel
tafaska nneɣ teqqen ɣer wakal
ad ḥnuccḍeɣ deg udfel
yerja yi d usikel ameqqran
ɣer kan aḥric wis sin n udlis
war ma ttuɣ imdanen d wid akk i yi d yettaken tabɣest i wakken ad dduɣ ɣer sdat
tilemẓit i tt iceɣben d tayri
ḥmed d amusam
ḥman idammen i tikli
ɛerḍeɣ ad as sfehmeɣ ur lliɣ ara d aberrani ɣef twacult
ḥku yi d tamahut a jeddi
yella d ujdid
lemɛun fell am a tislit 
ini d ar tufat
ad ten id ẓemḍeɣ ɣer tasa w
d ungifen i yessadayen timetti
ṣṣeḥ akk din a ad tafeḍ t
neɣ neɣ susem
aɣref itettu s zreb
amek i t xeddmemt
kerheɣ lecɣal n tedbelt
imeṭṭi n uzger
tecɛel tmes di leswaq
axxam agi sneɣ t segmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
fkiɣ ak umlan yelhan
d acu i yeẓra
ẓriɣ yiwet n teqcict tekcem ɣer tzeqqa
ad as teḍru am win yelluẓen yečča
d aqeṛṛu n lemḥan
d tom i yeẓẓan tijeǧǧigin a
ɛyiɣ i uḍneɣ
anita akken i d tamdint nni
akken kan tessufeɣ
acimi ur asent d tettarraḍ ara awal
tekcem deg tirga s
ulac d acu ur d yenni ara fell as
walim a t an la yekkat udfel
d asif wihin
tekkateḍ ɣef teqbaylit
yesseglaf deg yiḍ deg wass
ur teǧǧi tayri ur teǧǧi ssuq ur teǧǧi iḥulfan ur teǧǧi aṣurdi
yella ḥedd i yegnen daki
ad tɛelmeḍ s nndama tettas d d taneggarut
waɛli yeɣra d wakli
tteryel ad akem ssukkeɣ s tewwurt neɣ s tzuliɣt
ad tawimt abrid nkent
adfel yessa d i wayeḍ
tilelli umeslay ur telli ɣur sen
ur asen d ssukkseɣ acemma
znuzayent ayefki
ur trebbam ara dderya nwen
d acu akka i la txeddmemt din
yeṭṭef iyi s draɛ
kečč d ayaziḍ ma d nekk qefleɣ
jean iṣadd iḍelli ɣer fransa
ccah axaṭer d kečč i d yezwaren ar wannect a
a yemma amek i d am teḍra
d ɛmeṛ xuǧa i yecnan tazlit anda t wudem iw a lemri
bḍan asent tent id
takerrust n yidir d taberkant
glan yes wen
ad iyi t id yawi
ur am t ttakkeɣ ara
d tamusni
akka i d nenna
ḥesbet ad tafem ma ixuṣ neɣ ma izad kra
yurew d yimi w aman
aseqqamu aɣelnaw n yizerfan n umdan
fferfer
ahi aṛǧu din
yusa d baba d yemma
yiwen ur d yeḍlib
aɣeṛṛabu iqleɛ
issen abrid ilaqen
ibalmuden ḥemmlen nezzeh tutlayt nsen
ḥsen u muḥ yezmer ad yesken i tiziri tagawawt
ẓẓareɣ iyi ilaqen ala lmut
tettafraḥ mi ara d yekcem s axxam
d mmi s n lqayed i tuɣeḍ
aṭas deg sen daɣen inɣan u i d eǧǧan d igujilen d tuǧal
bɣiɣ ad xedmeɣ ayen akk i ttmenniɣ
ulac iten
yedda yak di nneqma
ad dduɣ akken i bɣiɣ deg ubrid
ur yeḥnucceḍ ara makken yekkat ugris
yewwet amcic iḥuza maɛmic
yelha ma teqqarem tidet
asmi ilaq ad tt nɣer ur ttneɣri ara
akken kan i tt gezmen deg rray nsen
tesbeɣ asen tt
ur ncuk ara d lwert n yimawlan lmezwura nsen mačči akka i llan
iɛreq as wawal i yidir zdat newwara
dɣa twala yi d akken kan i d ukiɣ seg ussu
d tamasit ik ad tgeḍ aya
mazal ur d ufiɣ ara yiwen akken
tewweḍ iyi d tebrat
ulayɣer wid nniḍen
ɛas iman ik neɣ ad teɣliḍ deg urmuj nni ar tom
smuɣben
melmi i tebdam tanhert
ddum ɣer sdat tuɣalin ɣer deffir ulac
anwa ur nukir ara idrimen si treffit di temẓi s
ibeddel wudem ik
ur am d ssukkseɣ acemma
at taddart nnan as awah ad yili d yelli s i yegubbeṛ
yuzen as tabrat n tayri
heyyan as d asarag
ad wen d yazen ṛebbi sbeṛ
yeqqerṣ ṭṭbel im
rewlen anda i ulac ṭṭrad
aqjun nneɣ idhem it ukamyun
asmi i d yeɣra i iffeɣ
ad xaqeɣ mliḥ fell asen
llan mraw n yizwilen s teqbaylit ilem yiwen sin kraḍ kuẓ semmus sḍis sa ṭam tẓa
iɣil n teslatin
akken kan ara fakkeɣ učči ssirideɣ tuɣmas iw
yewɛer iyi lḥal ad amneɣ
ad tsellkem iqeṛṛa nwen dinna
yella yuḍen yuɣal yeḥla
amek ara teḍru yid sen
ad ffɣeɣ azekka zik ar ssuq
tfaqeḍ as
yurar mliḥ deg wannar
acḥal n win i t inudan
cedhaɣ ad ẓṛeɣ imawlan iw
sers lbaṣta m ad yali uzeṭṭa m
tom ur iḥemmel ara timdukal iw
ad nḍent afrag neɣ tamazirt akken ad tizdig
terra yasen ad dduɣ
melmi ara yetɛeqqel uqcic a
a wi yellan ddaw uḍar im
irḍel iyi d adlis ad t ɣreɣ
ṭṭfent aɣṛum deg ufus nsent
ala win yewwten d win yettewwten i yeẓran ansi i d tekka tyita
ixxamen grurjen
tesɛam tuttriwin nniḍen
yiwen deg wen ur d itteffeɣ seg uxxam alamma d ṣṣbeḥ
yal iḍ ttarguɣ
yal wa d acu yettgabar d acu iwumi yettqissi
ad k yeḥwiǧ ass a
itetti yiles n umdan am umeslub ara yettmeslay
deg uɣerbaz alemmas llan sin yimaswaḍen mass ɛafya madani akked massa zaydi wiyi ad asen nini afud igerrzen
ur ttɣimit ara yid sent
zik ara tekkremt azekka
yella ibedd d ugarfiw nwiɣ t d ajeḥmum
yiwen ur yezmir ad iqaḍeɛ tiktiwin n medden
lammer zemreɣ ad ɛiwneɣ akk medden a rbeḥ a tafat maca ur amek
maca isemktiyen ttɣiman urǧin ad sefḍen seg wallaɣ
ur ččin acemma ass a
ad ten id mmagrent
zik wa yettaǧǧa tt id i wa
ma ulac aɣilif awi yi d lmus zeddigen
d wa i d imensi akk i nḥemmel
ḥwaǧeɣ ad yi d terreḍ s leǧwab ssya ɣer wass n lǧemɛa
awal yettawi d wayeḍ
err as awal
itteɣlay d ugeffur
armi i d izger
nutenti d tiǧeǧǧigin nsen
zzayer tamanaɣt tezga deg tama tutrimt n tmurt taqbaylit
ɣer ɣur i yella ccekk deg medden merra
dda brahem iḥemmel aṭas mi ara d kecmen
akk medden ala ɣur sen kan i qqnen
arut t
igguma wul ad kem ittu
aragon icudd ɣer tnigilawt
tesɛa tawenza yelhan
xdem as akken i k yexdem
ur ttkeyyifeɣ ara
ad s nsiwel i uberrani
d talwit i awen d ǧǧiɣ
tella kra n yiwet i d isawalen
d azger aramul
yezga yessawal i yicennayen iqbayliyen akken ad cnun ɣef timmuzɣa
d nnger ik
ɣur s aṭas n watmaten d yessetma s
aql ak tettedduḍ ad teffɣeḍ si firefox ios
a dda yidir
anef iyi deg iḍ asemmaḍ
ur cfin ara fell aɣ
issedda azegzaw d uquran
i lemmer ad tt erreɣ kan i yiḍes
tesfeḍ imeṭṭawen is
kksen as tuṭṭḍa s wacburen
uzneɣ am in tabrat
yerfa yidir yak
hemjem
meskin ulac win i t id iwalan
ad tini wagi d laman
ḥemmleɣ ad ččareɣ tafelwit n tneɣrit s tira taqbaylit
ldiɣ tin i izemmen
tin n fransa d nnger
ahat uhu
aɣlif n yilmeẓyen d waddal
ttaḍṣan iyi d s wuglan n tteryel
sgunfu deg telwit
ɣef wammud n yisefra n mexluf n at qasi u sɛid
tudert ur nesɛi tudert
amdan yuɣ itent deg wul
yeqquṛ tom
tufam iman nwen
ad rreɣ tarwa k am uɣebbaṛ n lqaɛa
ad nawi abrid nneɣ
ulac d acu ur xdimen ara akken ad skuffren tutlayt iw
tbecceḍ aserwal ik
deg ddunit ad d naf amdiq anida medden walan
deg tlemsan tettili d yiwet n tfaska iwimi semman ayrad
deg ayen ara rren i tikta s ifukal tteggzen bab itsent
ɛawnem tom
ur yi d teɛqileḍ ara
uɣal ɣer deffir
imɣaṛen nwan d nutni kan i yesɛan lḥeqq
tqadd as lfista nni
yal mi ara tt id rreɣ ar ṛṛadyu d adellel
swingmemt as

neṭṭeg
d amdan i ibennun amezruy mači d amezruy i ibennun amdan
azekka ad tessudneḍ
glu d s tqendurt timreyyest akken ad truḥeḍ yess ɣer umezgun neɣ ɣer tmeɣra
anda tewwḍed din i d axxam ik
si mḥemmed ikemmel ikes ayen i d iqqimen si lmal nni n laban
a mmi tagi mačči d tameṭṭut
ur as smeḥsis ara
ad ken ɛas kečči asma ara tesɛuḍ idrimen
d lɛib ma tennamt iyi d ala

ad d yeddu s tɛekzin
d acu ara d tiniḍ deg wa

cerweɣ tidi meṛṛiɣet
i dda ṣɛid at mɛemmeṛ akli buṛennan dda muḥend wakli ḥmiṭuc aɛli akked caɛban abelqas

imeɣnasen iqbayliyen nuḍḥen aṭas mgal tameḥeqqranit deg tudert nsen

ass a teḥǧeb tziri

init aɣ d tidet

a yelli tegliḍ d s rrbeḥ segmi i d luleḍ

ur ttruẓu ara aqerruy ik
yuɛer fell as ad tefhem

acku ussan nni kan i t yeǧǧa baba s
a wid ur nerbiḥ yiwen wass

ixef is yerra t ger ifassen is

d ayen isehlen
tidderɣelt deg ul d wallaɣ

d acu yellan ɛni gar asen

ḥemmlent iɣersiwen

semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam im

yella wayen tebɣiḍ neɣ tesseqsaḍ d kan
acuɣer d nukni
wissen anda i teffrem
azmummeg mačči ala tadfi i d yeskan
ur igin ara zik tom
ad ččen tiyi
ur iyi ḥemmlent ara
adabu azzayri s timmad is ur yessaweḍ ara ar yiswi s ad yeṛṛez amennuɣ n yiqbayliyen ɣef timmuzɣa ma ɣas ar ass a ur yegzim ara asirem
nekkni nessaweḍ d tallit n sliman ɛazem i yefkan awal i yiɣersiwen
ma tfehmeḍ ssefhem win ur nefhim ara
inexḍaben ttasend di yal tama
cwi kan iḥudd rebbi

d ameṛkanti iɛummen deg ureɣ

anablal

terwi tebberwi

ttɣiḍen yiɣiden nni msakit
rwan adewwer

ad tt ssdendneɣ tameddit tuɣal d lyaqut a tawaɣit
i temẓin yekrez uzger amek armi i tent iɛlef uɣyul
ma ulac aɣilif awi aɣ d sin ifenǧalen n lqehwa

ad ixdem deg s i yebɣan

la tameṭṭut
i zeggwaɣit tcenfirin is

icaḍbiwen

afus is d isixi

ad as nsawel i michel

wahruḥu d acu t wagi

d isalli ara yessiweḍ s tuffra kanakken yettfuru i yimjuhad

d acu i d tḥefdeḍ ar uselmad ik

ad dduɣ

ad seglafen yeqjan

ad neɛjel

amesnuddir

d acu i d nnan yimawlan im fell i
yekrez tamurt is s tyuga n yizgaren
iḍegger afus is ɣef teḥnakin is dɣa tezwi asent id

tisilya
aṭas aya segmi i kem teqreḥ tɛebbuḍt im
nemsebḍa nekk yid s
acuɣeṛ ur tteffɣen ara warrac nni
ad ssusfeɣ s igenni am yal tikkal

d asdegdeg

ad dduɣ d usensi n tmeɣra
anda k

ass agi i d ass is
ad naɛreḍ

hagaṛ tesɛa d aqcic i bṛahim
ur ttruḥun ara
d ayen i kun yesslexsen i ɣ yesseḥlulin
ddunit ara d neǧǧ i warraw nneɣ ur tessefraḥ

ad d asen ar wexxam nneɣ azekka

d acu i ten id yewwin ɣer da

ilaq ad tebdu marie

d laɛǧeb
d ɛemmaṛ mezdad i yuran imeslayen n taɣect yemma tedda ḥafi
terriḍ tent deg uɛewwiq
ahat lluẓen
yeffeɣ yidir ɣer tejmaɛt
asigna nni aberkan

ad wen senseɣ tafat

ur walaɣ ara melmi ara t fakkeɣ

ad tferǧeḍ ar idurar
ad tafeḍ d walebɛaḍ i t yeǧǧan daki
acḥal d aseggas nettṛaǧu
yettak azal i wayen tehmel tmetti

si tyita m yeqbeṛ
ad wen ten id awiɣ
acku iɛac xemsa iseggasen di marikan

dɣa teḍsa as d yiwet makken iger tiṭ is
aseqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa

teẓṛamt dacu i tebɣamt

dacu ar ad nernu i waya

llan yidlisen ɣef tgida
ad tennerni s waṭas lɣella s
issenhaz iɣallen is
sakin yenǧer adrib ar umadeɣ
irna as tadmert ideg yerra abelluḍ akked uxeṛṛub
teṭṭenṭnem
terra iyi yemma tajbirt ass mi ṛẓeɣ deg uḍaṛ
cfiɣ ɣef umkan nni
amdakel is mi d yettwali yettu acu ɛebbant tuyat
tessefruriḍ d akk iḥulfan iw
ur yecfi ara fell i
ad d yelfu aṭas aya netta yeffer deg uxxam
imsidag iqbayliyen ɛussen igenni rnan lqaɛa
ad yexdem azekka
ḍeṛgent tala
yeḥsa tḥemmel it
s yal taččart
ffɣen d iɣerdayen
nekk d yemma s n tom
diri t wurar nkent
terfed ayen ur rfiden ara yimeslayen
acuɣer i tsetḥaḍ ad as theḍḍṛeḍ
bɣant ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
semmḥet iyi a leḥbab iw xas fell i tthubbun leryaḥ
a yir ddunit a yir tudert

am wakken daɣen i tettunefk tegnit i tmenna n yisefra sɣur yimedyazen n taddart agi

nimɣur

aḥezzeb ad t nefḍeɣ
yettqabal itent
beṛka asṛimeḥ
ddunit a mačči d axxam iw
ad neldi ṭṭaq
issin tutlayt ik ay aqbayli
s yiswiyen a ara naweḍ

la tleḥḥu
irgazen d tilawin nwan ad ferḥen
rwin iyi yizan
nekcem s axxam naf ik tegneḍ
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad isellek tiziri tagawawt

d wi i d idrimen nwen
tzemremt ad txedmemt weḥd nkent

ahat d kra n lweqt kan
twalamt tagellidt
s tezmert ik
d aṛaṭiw uyaziḍ
i netta i wumi txedmemt akk annect a
bucaciw
usiɣ d imi i ttwaɛerḍeɣ
anita i d taɣect n tayri i tḥemmleḍ

ad neg tamussni
yeznuzay ayefki
anu

lhan d d useɣres
ur nfennu ur nettmettat dagi ara neqqim
d acu ara tt id yesneṭqen
ad as tt tɛeṛḍem
d acu teččiḍ
tebɣiḍ ad ǧǧeɣ tafat tecɛel
sliman u muḥ yettban yeǧhed
iseṭṭel acekkuḥ is
rran asent tent id
sɛut tabɣest
ur nesɛi ara taqrurt
aman n nnisan iffeɣ lehzel iɣsan
ur ittaɣ ara awal
tesluɣeḍ tala
argaz yesla tameṭṭut tedla
akken ibɣu yini d ɣur k ad t tamneḍ
tebḍa yasen tent id
ddiɣ d umdakel iw
jemmɛet iqjan nwen xaṛsum ɛellet asen snasel
tuḍneḍ aɣbel
ama d ineɣmasen neɣ d imeɣnasen
ad d nawi iseɣ
aqel aɣ deg rebɛa yid nneɣ
tettqeṣṣir
argaz agi yettemcabi ar tmeṭṭut
err akin s at buwaddu
d lakul id yeslalen laɛǧubat agi nettwali neqqen wid yeɣran ass a
yella d d asissen iwatan ɣef wayen akk i d yefka d wayen i d yeǧǧa meɛtub ama d tamedyazt neɣ d ccna
teḥla cwiṭ yaya m
d yiwen n useggas i d yeǧǧan ccwami
yewweḍ almi d tala yuɣal d akken ur d yeswi
a tidet anida telliḍ
a zahya tɛedmeḍ aɣ aqcic
d kečč i xtareɣ
taɛwint ufella

anda ara ten afeɣ
lameɛna yasuɛ iẓra dɣa yettaxxeṛ syenna
a mmi ddunit d aḥebber mačči d aḍebber
iseṭṭel iyi tamart

iɣil ixaṛban
sew aman ad k yekkes fad
ur ttraju ara ad k iɛawen ḥedd
ufiɣ kent in tetturaremt ddabax

azmumeg

tga tiqit abellaɛ
ih ad d yektil
iwwumi tt
ilaq as kan ad d yeccetki ɣef kra
ufiɣ tt tetturar ddabax
lebni d tazeqqa mačči d ttnefxa
anta tt teqcict nni i d yeddan aked tafrara
ilaq iyi ad stɛerfeɣ belli nekk d tafḍulit
yuɣ d unelmad imagraden is iɣurbizen
ddunit a merra teqleb amzun tuḍen i lebda
aqel in ɣer real neɣ ɣer barsa

d ayen i d aɣ yeǧǧan nxeddem anect agi
am wass a di lehna ad d tuɣal

fakeɣ awen tt

ɣef leqwaɛi

ad dduklent yid sen

steɛfum

ufiɣ talwit

mcawarent

serset tt deg lqaɛa

iban belli tessnemt ten mliḥ

feṛqen tt
d aberǧeɣlal

winna akken kan yesla yis sen la d teddun yekker yerwel

aḥkim ur nesɛi aḥkim
mačči kan i zzux

rnu tansa tudmawant
abujed ur yesɛi ara tilisa

di tesnawit deg usssan nni
acu i d tuɣeḍ

dinna terwi lḥala
ffɣemt sya
ad ɣ tt id yawi

swiɣ afenǧal n vodka

lliɣ d lmalayek

ldint d tewwura fell as

ad d yefk ifki
ar ddel mgal amdan ladɣa mgal tameṭṭut
usan d ar ɣuṛ i
serreḥ i firefox ios di yal tulya akken ad tesweḥleḍ anekcum ur ilaqen ara

yid sen mi nezdi tamurt
nekni d times d wuzal
acḥal n tkeṛṛusin i yesɛa
anda llan wussan nni n zik
ad d nini neɣ ad nessusem
amsedday n unadi

iwalayen

tluɛam

sima truḥ ad texdem

tesfeqdeḍ tt
mazal yeqqar ssneɣ

semsed

ad qqiment deg uxxam azekka

nessaram

ala ur sriɣ ara tawlaft ik

aḥṛiq i d yeǧǧa baba yuɣal d tiẓgi
tadist deffir tayeḍ dderya d inilban am lbaṭaṭa wa ur ireffed wa

hata wul iw am temrijt

ɛni theblem
terra tt kan i ccbuḥ
ayɣer i tesxeṛbeḍ tibḥirt nsent
ad yeteddu di taddart armi yewweḍ ar tejmaɛit
ufan t deg wanu
iwint yid sent ayen akk ara iḥwiǧent

tewwi d abrid amaynut ama deg wayen iccuden ɣer tulmisin n talɣa neɣ lebni n usefru
ad ibarek deg k
seqqi as d i yemma m ad tečč
maziɣ iɛewwel asen d
tella tḥanutt dihin
sliman ɛazem yemmut berra n tmurt is d twacult is n tmurt ass n tmenya u ɛecrin yennayer alef u tteɛmiyya u tlata u tmanyin
tamesbanit neɣ sekra n leqdic icudden ɣer tugdut ama akked ugraw adelsan amaziɣ
qrib ad tiliḍ da
sliman u muḥ akken kan yeɛqel ciṭ tiziri tagawawt

adfet d

a tin ɛzizen fell i

dɣa tečča yi d s wallen am d nekk kmumseɣ ar tama s
ɛeddan wussan smanat agguren imenza seg mi teḍra tedyant
ɛni ur tettmeslayeḍ ara tafransist
i nekni i wumi txedmeḍ akk annect a
urzen t wwin t sellmen t i lḥakem bilaṭus
nnger ass a ad s nettḥulfu
tesṛuḥ itent
afrux d ilul di lqefz yettɣili affug s aṭṭan
tabaṣkit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen imezdaɣ n temnaḍt n bask gar spanya d fṛansa

teččam tibidas nwen
ilemẓi nni yenna as ayagi akk xeddmeɣ t
mačči alamma tenṭeq d
fell asent i turiḍ asefru nni

azekka nni daɣen yerra ɣer lqahwa yexdem
ur d tsawalem ara
qqimet dagi
imru i iǧehden ɣef usekkin
bu tqulhatin
seqdec tagezzamt ma ulac ad tent yaɣ udekkan
akken ad yettu ayen iɛeddan akk d ineḍruyen deg ass yessens tafat iɛedda yerra tt i yiḍes
syin ɣer s ad yili wass nniḍen ad nemmeslay ɣef lemḍarrat n yisufar n tgella ladɣa deg unebdu
kunemti tzeglemt tamacint
terkem teswiɛt tuɣal tendeh abrid nniḍen deg tlemmast n yikayaden n umesḍis wis sin
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat nsent
yessen ad iɛum

ɣiwel

ad ɣ tekksem tamuɣli

mmutent
mačči abrid mačči sin i aɣ ɣeḍlen maca win yefkan aẓar ur yettagad ifer ma yeɣli
la nteddu ad d nwali asaru amaynut
ayen zemreɣ ad ak it xedmeɣ
ur ssinent ara ad urarent ddabex

ur iyi d tenniḍ ara deg uɣerbaz agi alemmas i tzedɣeḍ
tleḥḥum akken
ala netta i yellan ɣur s
ur k id tṣaḥ

a bu uɛebbud ameqqran ḥebber i uzekka
tneǧreḍ abrid gar inijel

nadi firefox ios

nnan as i baba s
tbeɛdem

berka k tissit n ccrab

swemt

ma yella d maziɣ

am wayt aḥmed

taqbaylit tettali
iẓra ufellaḥ anida yeǧǧa leslaḥ
anta i yemmuten
yeseḥbibir ɣef arraw is
ala kemm i yeẓṛan amek ara ad txedmeḍ
dɣa nnulen lqaɛa teɣli d fell asen lihana d tameqqrant
sebɣent asen tt
zemreɣ ad m sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tecnuḍ
teṛṛẓamt d aqeṛṛu yiw s lḥess nkent
qqim raju nnuba k deg tzeqqa ihin
iseggasen n tafat
teǧǧel meskint d tameẓyant
meẓyan iruḥ maca yeǧǧa leḥzen deg taddart
ffiɣ d aman seg uyeddid
a yemma cebbḥeɣ ur ddiɣ a yelli ur d nnin ara ugiɣ
ttimɣuren yettimɣur unezgum nsen
tesseṛɣeḍ as tent
taɛwint bbadda
i tikkelt tis snat i as d yerra ayen tebɣa ad tsel
d acu i tugadeḍ ma tenniḍ d tidet
asseggas a ad nezhu ad necḍeḥ
kemmlen akken ttemduduɛen
tihudit d asɣan n wudayen
saɛid u muḥ yessebɣes tiziri tagawawt
mi akken i d yenher s uɛekkaz sin n yeɣyal deg ubrid
tsuɣem
d tajapunit yelha umutur is
yerna la ihedder
ɣilleɣ weḥd i kan ara qqimeɣ

am tawkilt tessen ad teggw aɣrum

dqiqa ad d uɣaleɣ
ulac amaynu
anda teḥma ad greɣ icci w
maca d maziɣ

zemreɣ ad ak sḥefḍeɣ amek ara tnehṛeḍ
theddeṛ s teqbaylit
ɣas akken tezweǧ s warraw is yemmeɣ yeẓmeḍ itt id ar wul is yenna yas tura argaz im d baba m mmuten ad kem yehdu ṛebbi ula d nekk d tarwiḥt
ur ẓriɣ ara ayen aselkim iw yegguma ad yekker
aɣlif n wassaɣen akked wamni
acuɣeṛ i treggmem
ad siredeɣ tuɣmas iw
acuɣeṛ i s ulac win i d ittarran awal
iṣukk iyi d uɣyul iw
teḥnuccḍemt akken tufamt
yeṭṭef iyi aṭas n sswayeɛ wanect aki
meyya u xemsin n wussan i yekka uḥemmal n waman di ddunit
imawlan ttufaraṣen
mazal kan akka kra ad tfak
ɛiwed as i ddunit asnulfu
d acu i ken yewwin ɣur s
diri tt tegnewt n wass a iban kan ad tili tbuciḍant neɣ tɛeǧǧaǧt
ilaq ad tegreḍ annect a g ddehn ik
temɣur lqima m ɣur i
ɣer lǧiha n umalu isɛa meyya n iɣallen i d iḥǧeb s temleḥfin
dagi i tettilim
saɛid cemmax

gen di talwit a gma ḥamac arezqi d awezɣi ad k nettu
warɛad yeffiɣ winna ikcem d
ihi ur ttṛuẓumt ara akk iqeṛṛa nkent sya d afella
iɛdawen nwen izedɣen deg s ad wehmen
d acu i kem yuɣen akka
ddaw n useklu nni
aɣṛum ɛerken t seksu fetlen t
ad iliɣ da ass n letnayen
ad yettu uḍebbal ahuzzu n tuyat
din i tuḍen aḍar is

ckentef

yuba yettergigi

ansuf

lḥaṣun ma tebɣiḍ ad tissineḍ ugar ɣef tmurt iw atan mara awḍeɣ s axxam ad k in ceyyɛeɣ tabrat

akabar n usmaynu azzayri
mi kkren ad t uraren ad bḍun iman nsen ɣef snat n trebbaɛ
rnu ɣer waya sḥassfen nezzeh imi mazal it meẓẓi yeǧǧan asen d lweḥc d ameqqṛan
ineḍfaṛen n ugbur
ladɣa wid i tt yeẓẓaren kan i wussu
lḥila n ṣṣber teččur
ttawimt azduz ad tesseftutusemt
ɛni la ttrun
ad ffɣeɣ d yemma azekka
ilaq ad ččeɣ kra n tɣawsa
ad tafeḍ lxiq d amwanes
yal ass
nesɛa sebɛa wakraren tixsi akked uɣyul
nekk bɣiɣ tagi
s idis is s azelmaḍ
yerwel ar yemma s
acuɣeṛ i tettazzaleḍ
mass aɣugali atan daɣ la d yettheggi idlisen nniḍen
ala netta kan i yeẓran liḥala deg wacu i yettidir
mmi d itri deg yigenni
yenɣa yi uḥebber yenneqbaḍ wul iw
ad ittufelleq
llan dinna yid s
iya d kcem
amek i t steqsan
tɛebba yas barcelona xemsa n teɣyal i real madrid
ur d yeḍṛi wacemma
d acu i d yennulfan d ajdid
anwa i m iselmaden tafṛansist
wid iceffun i tlufa
lweɛda tella tijɣelt ulac
cebḥen wussan n tefsut
ama ɣef tayri neɣ ayen nniḍen
tesseqrebbi seksu akken ad as yeɣli ufḍiḍ terna temḥeṣ it akken ilaq
neṭqen ɣer yasuɛ nnan ur neẓri ara
yenna d dɣa ur d ittruḥu ara
amennuɣ is yewweḍ aɣ d nesla yas
telsa takiluṭ is
kemm ad tzegleḍ tamacint
teqqur tasa s
nniɣ as ad m yeɛǧeb
icennu s tutlayt taqbaylit
iqebṭiyen n maṣer ttwaḥeqren deg akal nsen
ad awi ɣ iziɣaṛ ik
ixeddem ɣur k tom
ur tettmeslay ara aṭas deg tesmilt maca mi ara tt steqsiɣ tettarra d akken ilaq
bezzaf ẓẓay uselkim is
sɛan inebgawen
ad aɣ d yawi lhemm
ur ẓriɣ anda tezdeɣ
tasa ur tessager yiwen
ternum daɣen teẓdem lḥemmeẓ nni
acḥal yeswa kilu n uksum
ḥezneɣ
ɣṛet
win yessetḥan yeffeɣ s azniq
slewlew
rmimez
ḥemmlen t akk medden
aql i di laman
tamedyazt neɣ tamedyezt
walaɣ ten deg ssuq
yefka as ent id akken yella
d allen n wefṛux i tesɛa
axxam akk yerɣa
ḥnuccḍen iḍelli di taddart
ad nebdu
ayen i d teǧǧa d ayen yelhan
ɛmiṛuc u muḥ iḥemmel ṣyada
wissen ma llan yiseɣtiyen ɣef usebter
tettuɣaḍem a tarwa
cɛel aselkim inek
amek i tettiliḍ a si aḥmed
ifen t
d allen n wemcic i yesɛa
d agujil i lliɣ
d nutni i yenɣan
yerna nniɣ ak d ma tuḥwaǧeḍ kra
akken tella tallit tilelli nneɣ ad tt id nawi
arrac n tura ḥemmlen ad uraren ddabax n uḍar
ur tettxemmimeḍ ara am yillu lameɛna am yemdanen
a wid iṛekḍen sekra n wayen yemɣin
ur tt id yeẓri ara
ad tt yeḍfer s wallen alamma tɛedda
yekcem d d teqcicin
amaruz yezmer ad yili d aḥerfi neɣ d ussid
ssuq lḥedd beni ɛemran
asmi ara d yeqqim ad yecḍeḥ
yeffel i ugemmaḍ in akin
mazal tudert zdat m
ɣer dagi i d tusiḍ
yuba iqerreb ar mary
aẓ akin tettfuḥuḍ
ṭṭfen amkan nsen
mi ara tawḍeḍ ɣer uxxam siwel iyi d
tezukrar cwiṭ ur tenni ara i urgaz is armi d tameddit nni
d acu yessenqasen teqreḥ
taddart at menṣur xmesṭac n alef u rebɛa tizi uzzu
iban ɣef udem ik
anamek n tetrarit
ur yuki ur igen
sɣur ɛemmar mezdad
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d tenna
ula d tuccent deg umadaɣ yezga yiwen gar tarwa s yufrar d ɣef wiyaḍ
teddunt asen di nneqma
yella kra ideg testehza
teččiḍ aɣṛum
ini yasen qqleɣ d waɣzen ulac anwa ad k id yawwḍen wala ad k ẓren tḥemmleḍ irgazen
tamedyazt taqbaylit tatrart
iruḥ ar wanda i yeqqim baba s
tesɣaray deg tesdawit
urǧin tuggad deg tudert is am wass nni
iɛeyyen awen
irem ila anamek umqit anagar deg taɣult ideg yettuseqdac
itess ccrab akken itess aman
ad ten yessenger dda qiqi
d imeẓyanen d ibesṭuḥen d imecṭuḥen
iqemmer yerbeḥ
tessen ad texdem kullec
ad yewwet azekka udeffel
ayen akk i as d yenna ijbed itt id am ddkir ɣer daxel n yiɣalen is
akka kan i leḥḥunt temsal
acḥal qeṛṛiḥ yifelfel a
yeɣli d fell aɣ nadam
amalu
addad n tkebbanit deg tagara n useggas isefraḥ
d taggara n turagt
amedya n tɣiwant n ayt smaɛel deg unẓul asamar n bgayet ideg ttwabnan ayyuren a ineggura kraḍ n leǧwamaɛ
argaz d ssaqiya tameṭṭut d lǧabiya
yekker d ad iɛiwed alqam i useklu awessur yeɣlin
d abelluḍ i isellken lejdud nneɣ
ur tt iḥemmel ara
tmerru tɛebbuḍt iw
ečč itt
tenɣamt iyi tt
yezri wass rnan wayyuren
acimi i nugi ttrebga
ziɣ tasellawt
aɣyul ittzeqiṛen d tisegelt kan i as ilaqen
ad d ibeggen ṣṣifa s
bdiɣ ttissineɣ imdanen
amtawi n apple handoff iteddu
la yekkat udfel
ad iruḥ mi ara yebɣu
myencadent
iḍ ameggaz
aseggas akk d awal mazal ur ten id tfukkemt ara
ttɣwaleɣ deg wučči
ɛelmeɣ ad s tiniḍ d timmuxlelt maca ikad iyi d ḥemmleɣ uletma k nni tamecṭuḥt
yettmuqul kan
iṛuḥ f ufurgu
ad awen d ceyyɛeɣ tafakturt nni
tezham
tḥemmel ad d teqḍu
a tin iwumi d zzin lenwaṛ
yeqqim ɣef useffud
tanmehla tamatut n twuri tazayezt
ma d iḍrisen ɣezzifen d iseggasen aya ideg ntin ffutkin di lqern wis ɛecrin
anwi i kent yewwten
acu yebɣa ad yeg tom akk d mary
ɣef yixxamen
akkagi i mfaṛaqen
ssuliɣ t id armi d abrid
ur yexdim ara tom ayen iɣef ittuḥasef
ldi asfaylu amaynut
ttxil m ɛiwed
ad d inin ayen ur nelli
mi ara theddrem ur teffẓet ara imeslayen
ili ken d wid yelhan ar medden
anammas asertan
d abrid i kem id iwwin ara kem irren
mmi ileqqeḍ ikesman
ɛummen imeɣban deg tmura tinselmin
atan daɣen
ɣer wacu i yertaḥ wul ik imala
nemla asent d abrid yelhan
sliman u muḥ ad k yeǧǧ ad teẓreḍ
isem is inuda d leɛrac yerna d timdinin
yella ujdid
merrḥent
slan i leɛyaḍ deg uxxam nni
sɛant azref ula d nutenti
ɣiwlemt
ddeqs ur ngezzu ara acku tamurt ur tmudd ara azal n usegmi i tarwa s
efk iyi d aman
tfaqemt asen
rewleɣ i taluft
yekkat waḍu
ihi ma yusa d
steɛfaɣ
nhdder d ɣef ɛecraaf d ɛecrinalef
neɣ i wayen tessaram
tetteddu di ddiq d uxessu
d acu t u senfar agi
ah ya simra
yuɣ itt deg uḍaṛ azelmaḍ
ffeɣ d ar tizi wezzu
mačči d ayen ara k d iṣiḥen akk
ilaq iyi atrejman
a t an wayla k ddem it
yefka yas tiyita ɣer gar tuyat
ahat awaɣzen agi d ameddakel ik
tixsi d tawtemt n yikerri
reḍleɣ awen adlis ad t teɣrem
tezmer ad tesseɣli ula d atmaten is di leɣrur n cciṭan
anda akka ara neffeɣ
semmeḍ lḥal deg uxxam ik
ad s tefk i lweṛd lfuḍa s
sɛeddi yi d tisent neɣ ih
yeɣli yas waggus
d tasemmaḍt texxamt a
yuba isewway
yessureg d kra n waman ɣer ugdur
ur tedduḍ ara d umcum mi ara d icehhed s ẓẓur
ad as d inin azekka
teɛreq cchada i yilles iw ad d inniɣ yenjeṛ d arwaḥ
tturaren ddabex yimyurar nni
ad izlu aɛejmi nni zdat n umeɣlal
a wiḍ iḥulfan
inɣa t uqerru s
ad tuḥwaǧeḍ aɛiwen nsen
wissen anda yunag
a yelli d ta i d tameddurt
nekni nettwali kan taqbaylit
tura kan i iɛedda
tecfam ɣef zik nni
anwa i kent d yeɣṛan
ɛqel iman im
winna kan imi tweɛɛa
beṛkat ur ttṛebibbet ara ɣef wanwa i tettkellixem
ur nettɛeṭṭil ara ad neǧǧ aṭas n tutlayin
walimt kan ma yejba d
anta i yenneṛfaɛen
wamma
yiwen yebɣa ad isew coca
nwen wi
acḥal daɣen n tṛumyin i sseglalzeɣ di paris
ur bɣiɣ ara ad ɛiceɣ s ilugan ik
tudert n yiminig tuɛeṛ mačči d kra
ur tettarew ara tmeṭṭut a d tiɛiqert
ttargunt s tutlayt taqbaylit
aɛerquv
sin llan d aya kan
anta akkit ara yeffɣen
deg s d amedya
ad ten id yessufɣen
mačči d abrid ur n ufiɣ
ikad iyi d ẓran aɣ
iɛǧeb ak waddal
ẓran tt ɣer umejjay
ad k rreɣ d illu ɣef ferɛun ma d gma k haṛun ad k yili d nnbi
ma yenza ur d yettuɣal
mmi s n xali yeɣli s uvilu yeṛṛeẓ uḍar is dɣa wwint ɣer sbitaṛ
s tayri i theddṛem taqbaylit
maziɣ yuɣal as d akk wayen d sɛeddan
lliɣ ttkemmileɣ i tɣuri n udlis nni
abrid a yelha aṭas
tezga deg s tafat
akken uɣen tanumi yal mi ara d yali wass
armi ḥuddeɣ iman iw
ddu deffir s
feṛḥent akk
usiɣ n ad ken waliɣ
arrac d yilmeẓyen bɣan ad zewǧen
d awezɣi ad xedmeɣ ayen n diri i uqcic
s teqbaylit i d kkreɣ di tmurt iw
wwet ɣar lǧib ad d alin
d axeddam nniḍen i d yerran deg umkan is
iban ɣef wudem is yezɛef
amek i tella temsalt
ma d leǧruḥ ḥelan lɛib i d segran ad yesseqeceṛ di nnif iw
ad teddu yid kent
yeṭṭef iyi waṭṭan d azemni ur nḥellu
win i d yewwin ad yeddu
ḥemmleɣ ad seddqeɣ kra yedrimen yal aseggas
aniɣer a bubriḍt ar tmurt n ugawa
ur ɛad nuyis
tefkiḍ iyi abadaṛ
tessenhaz aqerruy yeffes zelmeḍ
tuɣa temtunt
sewwqen weḥd sen
mecṭuḥit xeddmen am umeqqran
yessefk daɣ ad sɛun taɣlent tazzayrit yernu ad sɛun aswir asdawan
ilul deg wučči n yibawen
asmi i d yuɣal iruḥ
yebna axxam
sserḥ as akken i ak yehwa ad d yezzi alamma d ɣur k
yebda yettkil uyefki a ɣas ur t id sewway ara
mdel itt
ad ffɣent seg uxxam
win ara yeččen seg s ddnub i yiri s
ad s d yefk rebbi zznezla

ddu yiwet yiwet kan

d lawan ad yuɣal

ttalasen deg s akk leǧnas

aqcic yewhem
imsidag iqbayliyen xeddmen am tweḍfin
aɣlif n yimahilen izuyaz d umesni

ur tezmir ara ad tuɣal s axxam nsen

ad t neɛṛeḍ

ad yissin taqbaylit
ur ɛad temmuteḍ
ad d yeddu d setti
aql aɣ nettxeṭṭib ur nuyis

yemter umattar tiḥdert n uɣrum

ad ṛuḥeɣ ad d kkseɣ iskimen akked treɣla

yenwa ala yes sen i tzemreḍ ad ttɛiwneḍ medden
yerra yas tent id
ini as ad yekkes accaren is
ulayɣer twessaḍ agujil ɣef yimeṭṭawen

tamda usergi

qqimeɣ teqqimeḍ yeqqim iqqim teqqim

d lawan ad cemmṛent iɣallen nsent
anwa i yewwin tom
ṛuḥem ad d tseṭṭlem
anwa ur nesli ara s lexbeṛ n tlalit ines
takuṛsit d tutlayt i ttmeslayen imezdaɣ n tegzirt n kuṛsika di fṛansa bɣan ad awin timunent
ur ttrut ara fell asent
timẓin d uxeṛṛub wulment i ugmer ijebbden iɣuraf

zemren i usemmiḍ am wa
ad as d inint azekka
tewhem
ad s yeqqaṛ ad d snulfum iẓẓan mačči d takadimit
ɛni ṛṛẓiɣ ak aqeṛṛu yik
ur whimeɣ ara akken maḍi maḍi
meḥsub d netta akk i yeɛlayen deg tɣiwant
tayri tecbeḥ am ujeǧǧig n tefsut
ur d qqaṛ walu

wissen ma teẓriḍ d acu i yeḍran d urgaz nni yukren aqerdac
ad erreɣ i uɛdaw tisfi

rnan t warrac
baba ismeḥsis i uẓawan aqdim

yiwen wass ad rzuɣ ɣur s
tessers it
iseṭṭel d acekkuḥ tamart tameddit a
mazal ikent kan akken
yeswa lqahwa is mi d yekker seg yiḍes
buqlen aneɣ rẓan afan
netta d nekk nusa d
iṛuḥ syenna yuli ɣer bir cibaɛ
asfugel n yixef n useggas yeggra d ar tura
iqbayliyen ttqadaṛen iɣerfan meṛṛa
taɛelǧet iw tif akk tid n teḥdayin nniḍen
acuɣer ur tḥemmleḍ ara iqjan
tebɣa alukan ur ttfakan ara lehdur n maziɣ
eǧǧ iyi ad k id smektiɣ ɣef yiwet n tɣawsa
ad d iruḥ uqcic
yeččur d ṭṭlaba
di lkaṛ n at yeḥya musa i yewala taqcict i d yexḍeb
yuɣal as d tili
maca ulac taqcict yeɣlin di tefɣett n yirebraben inselmen
d agla w
yeẓṛa dunit d tmesxiṛ
gen di talwit a gma mukdaden ǧamal d awezɣi ad k nettu
ihi ma teṛwam kkret
mačči yiwet i iɛeddan ɣef yiqerra nneɣ lemmer nceffu
aqel aɣ nesleb mebla tiqcicin
iskuṭṭef iyi d ddan d idammen iw
ɛemmur ɛebdennur aseggas a yecna d ɣef sidi ɛic tamurt is
mazal ur tefhimemt ara taluft nni
tura ur uɣaleɣ ad amneɣ yiwen
yerra yas lebṣel ticcert iɛeqqaṛen lmelḥ akked tarnest sakin iger iɛuras ad qqlun
awi kullec
tenwiḍ ur faqeɣ ara
mačči d ufur ara neǧǧ dima
asmi ara laqent asmi ara tent iḥwiǧen medden imir n ahat ad d ilint
a ddin n uqabac
agem aman sain awi d taga
ẓran d acu i d tikli ḥafi
layla tettḥussu tettwahmel
tḥemmel igerdan
ṭṭuqqtent fell as tlufa
ḥnuccḍet iḍelli di taddart
tazallamt
fakeɣ ak tent
ayagi umi cfiɣ
ur ɣ ineffeɛ di kra
teqqimeḍ deg uxxam
terram tent deg uɛewwiq
a tunṭict mi d i t ɣennu d cwiṭ llemḥibba i t rennuḍ
mer ad gten ugar ad nettuqenneɛ ugar
d adrar n takkuct i yeɛlayen maṭi deg bgayet
bdu d seg iri arma d wayeḍ ahat ad d ibin kra
meẓyan u muḥ teɛna t temsalt
ugmeɣ d aman si tala
yewwi d abrid i d yewwi gma s
acuɣer d acu yewwin imcumem ar tullas
rran ten deg uɛewwiq
arugg aneggaru yekkemmel as udabu amesbaṭli n tmurt n zzayer
ur iyi tessin ara
a tayri i t id yeqsen
ad as ssekneɣ tazwara
d argaz yelsan llebsa icebḥen
nẓem i lhem im
anda i n teǧǧiḍ ḥemmu
d acu kan tamsalt i ibeddlen deg s

inna yas wasif kra n wanda ǧǧiɣ adɣaɣ iw ad uɣaleɣ alamma d ɣeṛ s
ur ginen ara
la itett aɣeṛsiw nni
tubirett tezga d deffir n ǧeṛǧeṛ
teddiḍ d ula deg yidlisen n yimusnawen
tettlusumt tisekkadin
teddun as di nneqma
teṭṭfeḍ d amkan
anwa i kent tt igan
ad nuɣal ɣer leqdic
ad naweḍ akk ayen i nessaram
ansa i d tekkiḍ
ad awen d iniɣ awal lɛali selt as
d tamuɣli n tiṭ yettnadin tifrat
ḍeggṛen iyi d ɣer teflukt iselman zzin iyi
sɛiɣ abug deg uselkim iw
ḥsen u muḥ yuki
ad yerbeḥ yes s ad yernu wid yuḥwaǧen
ur awen d tuqiɛ ara
sṣenṭaqen d imeslab am akken i d sṣenṭaqen tibratin ihi acuɣer ara ggugmen wanẓaden 
ad iṛucc yes sen aɣummu nni n usuref s ufella
waqila txuṣṣemt deg leɛqel
sebɣen asent ten
tugim ad tamnem s wayen yeḍran yid wen
yennum itett tɣawla
ikkes tamart is tom
ẓẓebra n umzil ẓẓayet nezzeh
ar tayeḍ ihi sɣuṛ muḥend akli salḥi
asirem i tesɛa berbadette aṭas aya d tiɣin n yiwen n uxxam di meṛṛuk
ayefki n tyemmat yeččur d isafaren i unerni n llufan
tikwal ma yufa t id wass yettuɣal ansi i d yekka
ilemẓiyen msakit ḍaɛen teddun ur iban sani ass d yiḍ nutni ẓeṭṭlen
ṭṭef ta
bedd ɣef yiman ik ur ggan ara
ur ḥusseɣ ara ɛyiɣ akk
nnan iyi d diri tt d taɣezfant iḍudan
kra tekka tmeddit ur d yeldi imi s
sliman ɛazem d amedyaz anaẓur d ameskar d acennay aqbayli ilul ass n seɛṭac ctember alef u tteɛmiyya u tmeṭac di taddart agni geɣran di tama n iwaḍiyen
ɛisa d musa ččan muḥend
tesqeṛqiṛ tfunast izan s tseṭṭa s
ittabaɛ unefray urar akken iwata
ur tezgil yiwen
sgunfum
neḥsel gar asen
nfulki
ttesseḍ aṭas lqahwa
a wid yeserkan ula d ixulaf
ɣur k ad yenz nnif im
cbaḥa deg wallen n win yettmuqqulen i tella
ur beɣɣuɣ ara yakk ad hedreɣ ɣef annect en
seg zgelli selleɣ awen d tettmeslayem ɣef tsertit
iger takeṛṛust is ar ugaṛaj d timendeffirt
yuḍen tuɣ it tawla
s wedrim is
nekk tura ad ferseɣ tabriḍt
abelluḍ yelha i tezmert
ih tanemmirt
yal aɛeggal n taggayt ad ibeddel isem is
nettarra ten deg uɛewwiq
tizemmurin iceṭṭiḍen
ɣer tmeṭṭut is nna ququ
tikkelt ad k iqqar nekk ad ffɣeɣ d ṭbib
slem d i wayen i d neqqaṛ
anwa i yettɣaḍen
tettbinemt d n luṛup kunemti
icedha ad iwali yelli s
teṭṭef d izem seg umeẓẓuɣ
tirigliwin n uẓeṭṭa beddent
ad tent tamnem
keṛhen aemhal nsen
yezger saɛid usliman ar tala yufa din tameɛcuqt is dɣa tenna yas a saɛid tesneḍ baba rzu d tammedit a ɣur s
ddeqs ur ngezzu ara acku tamurt ur tmudd ara azal n usegmi i tarwa s
izellafen d irden izegzawen i yezzan ɣef tmes
ansa i d yekka wawal aɣref
ad n tsiwleḍ
ar tura urɛad i d rriɣ di lbal iw ad d suffɣeɣ adlis
ulamek akk
ad ten tesseɣli
ad d rreɣ aẓref ɣer yimawlan is
tura sawḍeɣ tmenṭac n iseggasen ifut iyi lḥal iwakken ad ruḥeɣ s aɣarbaz
ssneɣ abrid ar wannar
aɣṛum aɣṛum ad yečč uɛebbuḍ amcum
amacahu zik nni tella yiwet n tmeṭṭut tesɛa snat n teqcicin
tcudd aqerru s
iẓiẓin iṭij sakin nniɣ as azul a dda yidir 
akka ulac acu ara naggad ɣef rrezq d nneɛma nneɣ
anfet as ad yexdem ayen n diri
yal yiwen ɣer ccɣel is
amen s tussna
yettagi ad yali wass
tis snat tessen i uẓawan
i wacu tudert am ta
segmi teḍra tedyant n katia bengana
bubben t yerna acennef
bac akken ad yeqbel
wigi ttuɣaḍen msakit
yeqqim d akin ugemmaḍ yettgabaṛ am uccen
yella kra n tikkelt i tukreḍ
xdem as d abrid i tmeṭṭut yellan s tadist
tesɛuẓẓgeḍ terriḍ iman ik ur d tesliḍ ara
ḥettmen fell i ad ruḥeɣ ɣer din
aql iyi akked gma
ilindi yuɣ itt aseggas a yebra as
tzemrem ad teddum yid i
ad nadiɣ fell am ad kem afeɣ
nexdem deg iḍ iḍelli
ur ken ɛebbdeɣ ara
lliɣ tedduɣ ad ṭṭṣeɣ mi i iyi d yessawel
ɣur k
qessiḥ wawal nkent
teffeẓ aṭas ma ulac ad ak yezɛeq
yettqellib iyi
tenɣiḍ as tt
yeggul wul ur yeḥnit
lliɣ ttfeṛṛiǧeɣ tiliẓṛi
nutenti ad zeglent tamacint
tufa t iqelleɛ iteẓẓu
asenfaṛ a yemmug i tesleḍt n tutlayt
yidir yexdem akken i as tenna newwara
dehbiya yebḍa wul is ɣef sin
farzen d yinagmayen izzayriyen ladɣa mulud mɛemri yusef nasib d salem cakir talliyin n unerni n tmedyazt taqbaylit
ur nettemfaraq ara
yugi ad t iffeɣ waṭṭan
muḥend yekka di ǧeḥḥa
i nutni i wumi txedmem akk annect a
ɛyiɣ deg uxemmem
imi tebɣam akka
rran iyi tent id
ur yezmir ara ad isali afaylu ɣer ukaram
ad tawḍem s sshala
tebɣiḍ ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
akanic n muhend igarrez iyya w ad t twalim
yebna awent axxam
afecku agi ad yeddu akken iwata
yesɣimi tt
lemer gzan akk medden taluft tili ur tennḍen ara deg s
iɣunfa ten
a ṣellaḥ n at dwala ḥarbet ɣef tegrawla
anda ara tṛuḥeḍ
ilaq ad neffer
hebleɣ fell am
akken sliɣ i tnuṭin timezwura n uẓawan nni ẓriɣ d ayen yelhan
ad ɛiwneɣ
acuɣeṛ yiwen ur yi d ittḥessis
ad ffɣeɣ azekka zik ar ssuq
ad as n yawi
anda akken i neǧǧa aḍellaɛ nneɣ
dda ḥemmu yezga yessefham deg sen acu kan ahbuh
ɣur s yiwen n udem n uneglus
lbaṭaṭa d yirden nettawi ten id seg tmurt n kanada
akka amyag di teqbaylit yebḍa ɣef sin isufar
ad as t tefkeḍ
ilaq ad d nelhu d warrac nneɣ
touch id yezmer ad iserreḥ i firefox ios ma yella tansa web teldi yakan deg usnas
yella d acu nniḍen
ččiɣ armi qefleɣ
ula d sima tewweḍ ɣer uxxam
ad tt tawiḍ yid k
yeḍfer amrar almi d tagust
wwet
err d imseddayen n unadi amezwer
iḍ iɛeddan i sḥuseɣ ɛawdeɣ d talalit
yelha akken axir
said yebda tikli
tfaqem as
ad tsewwqeḍ yid sen
ḥemmleɣ taqbaylit acku d tutlayt iw tayemmat
ur tewwim ara amḍiq nwen
itteḥizwir
gguman akk ad susmen
ad ttasen ɣur i seg yal amkan
ɣur s yiwet n yelli s isemma as tamilla
yenwa d tidett taɛrabt d awal ṛebbi
ar dinna i tleḥḥu
akka i teslamt
atan da yidir yak
yah ayen yeḍran mačči d sseḥ
sima texdem as ssker
s tallelt n usemmas n tegmi deg tutlayt d yidles n tmaziɣt
bɣan ad iyi kksen leḥbab
tfaqemt iyi
bezzaf yeɛya dɣa yebra i kullec
uqbel ad teldi tawwurt i trewla iḥer itt ɣer tbankiṭ
seggment ten
bɣiɣ ad tḥebsem ur yi d teṭṭafaṛem ara
yessusem yebra i wallen is
tettsewwiqeḍ
tewjed
txedmeḍ ccɣel im
akka ara d yečč
tissit i swiɣ ufiɣ tt semmumet
neqqmat n temɣarin
a wigi sṭeṛṭuṛen kan s yilem yemxel win i asen iḥessen
tedda yawent di nneqma
icubaa yas ṛebbi amzun d taruṣruyt ideg ileḥḥu ur ihedder d yiwen
ad am d rnuɣ ajellab
ur ẓriɣ ara wid akk yuḍnen aṭṭan a amek i t ttqabalen
tidet tettcebbiḥ bab is
ad sen ten id yawi
d anɣa
ur sɛiɣ ara ul i wurar daɣen
i wagi acu i ak yexdem tura 
ad neɣsen seg ul wurfan
ahi aṛǧumt din
iwacu ara yexdem ḥedd akka
anta i d yellan d amezwarut d tayaziḍt neɣ d tamellalt
atan di yir liḥala
da i tetteɣ dima
temmekta d d akken wakil i tikkelt tamenzut i temmeslay d yilemẓi ur tt yečči ara s wallen
ṛebɛin medden i d yusan
samya ɛellad
acḥal n tikkal i wwteɣ aserwal s tfawtin armi uɣaleɣ d taḍsa gar warrac
am wakken qqaren yeshel ugelzim deg ufus n ɛemmi
irgazen d tilawin zewǧen
d ṣṣwab i d yenna yidir

iḍegger as tirget s iciwi s

ma msakit ur sɛint ara zzher
wali kan ma jban d

yusef argaz is illa d argaz aḥeqqi
teččur tiṭ iw
aqcic d ilemẓi d umɣar
teẓra t yefud tamusni
am uɣerda n lexla llaẓ d usemmiḍ
melmi i d truḥeḍ
amennuɣ fiɣef teɣli katia mm sbeɛṭac n yiseggasen
ula d arraz n temlilit ad yili daɣen d imezdi
melmi ara d tkecmeḍ
myejraḥen
ḥerrek daɣen
anda i zemreɣ ad waliɣ timlilit nni n ddabex n uḍaṛ
aṭas i ččant
taṣleḍt n talɣa n yisefra n ben muḥemmed
zwiremt allaɣen nkent
tufa ten ttɛassan ad yelḥeq uselmad nsen
laban iffeɣ yuzzel s argaz nni yeqqimen ɣer lɛinseṛ
ad t greɣ daxel n lkanun
ad netbeɛ lateṛ i aɣ d eǧǧan
yettban d yefṛeḥ tom
ussan imezwura mi d kecmen
manama d tamanxt n beḥrayn
faḍel yeḥbes ur itess ara ddwa ines dɣa uɣalen as d leṣwat nni
mi teqqen tabniqt am wezger yeqqnen azaglu
ssnen ad xedmen kullec
aɣamac lgerra teṣleb lɣella
ama d tid yellan neɣ d tid ur nelli
lamir ɛbelqader yuɣal baqi d amdakel n napoleon iii
tettlusuḍ tisekkadin
ilaq waṭas n ufus sɣur n yiqbayliyen nneɣ
ad yili rebbi d yiderɣalen
ama s uziraz neɣ s uselkim
aqjun nneɣ d aberkan
rewlen ɣef tmurt nsen i ten yeǧǧan i llaẓ
beqquɣ ad waliɣ
lwiɣ dayen kan uglim is
acu ixeddem di tmurt is
acku amdan akken i isseḥluy lejruḥ i yettili d yir ṣṣbuḥ
nerna am sin n wussan niḍen
inig am akken ulac win i k id ittmuqqulen
ad sellken iqeṛṛa nsen dinna
yessen tamẓabit
zik annar yemmug i userwet ma d tura i wurar
ɛni yella kra i ibeddlen
n wi tt ilan
awren a ur yelhi ara i tesfenǧin
sebded firefox ɣef yibenkan ik i tunigin s war aneḥbus
iqentel si tissit
isem is umeddakel ik
izerfan n wemdan ttwarekḍen di tmurt nneɣ
anwa ur nuri ara isem is
argaz n uxxam tameṭṭut d agerruj
iban ɣef udem im
nutni si tama nsen meslayen d ɣef tirmit nsen deg tira ladɣa ungal
eǧǧ aqjun nni deg beṛṛa
si tama nniḍen
iban d aɣrib ara mteɣ
ɣer deffir i yettmili ɣas aswir ad yeḥeduder
amek almi d argaz i yuran ɣef usentel a mačči d tameṭṭut
ḥebsem imeṭṭawen
yerra tt i lweɛd n tissit
yezwi icuḍaḍ ubernus is iṛuḥ
tili rniɣ as ugar n lemleḥ
yedda yi usennan deg uḍad
nekk yellan d nniya
ur tesɛiḍ d acu ara d nini ɣef tid yeṭṭef uxxam
yeddem ikem
iḥemmel kan tiqeṛɛunin d wučči ẓiden
ulac yiwen
yekcem yuba ad igen
anfem iyi ad ḥefḍeɣ
ixeddem dima akken yebɣa
sliman yettɛawan atmaten is
iruḥ d asfel
heddreɣ asen ugin ad fehmen
amdan ur nuri ara ula d aḍris s tmaziɣt amek ara yettekki deg usmuken d uslugen n tmaziɣt
ɛin meziab
d adlis ik ara yesnernin tamussni k
win i d yusan ad yekkes lxiq
awah mačči akken
afyir tameɣrut taseddart akat
ur yeḥric ara di lakul
ttewteɣ fell am
d acu i tettḥawaleḍ awal f teqcicin
nleḥḥu ur neqḍiɛ abrid

wa samir awi d azemmur nni ad nandi yis s i yefrax
akken yebɣu yili weɣbel yesɛa dima tifrat
arum as i tom
ad neṛṛeẓ wala ad neknu
ur tečči acemma ass a
anda telliḍ llan iɣeblan
yuba yettban yesteɛfa
ḥewwes ahat ad tafeḍ agerruj yeččuren d idrimen
asmi i d yuɣal ɣer tmurt
iwaḍiyen

yeswa aman izeggaɣen
tikkelt ar tikkelt d lpitza
d abujad kan ur yetwil ara akk deg ccɣel is
lemmer terbiḥeḍ a yul
zzwaǧ n yiwen wass aḥebber is aseggas
tettarra t deg uɛewwiq
ulac iqqiḥ
ad ffɣeɣ ar taddart azekka
iban belli tessneḍ ten mliḥ
ad am d inint azekka
idles nneɣ d anagi ɣef tilin nneɣ

ẓṛiɣ d acu tt

ad nadiɣ fell ak ad k afeɣ
d tizemmrin i yellan s waṭas deg tmurt n leqbayel
iban aql ik mecɣuleḍ aṭas tura
netta d kečč d irgazen

ass igerrzen

iḥuss as tom belli ixdem taxeṣṣart d tameqqṛant
itečč asent ayla nsent
teqqar
tettawim aɣyul nwen
awi d ṭṭezḍam im
yimray fell i aṭas
ama di tefransist ama di taɛrabt ur ttcuḥḥun ara i yireṭṭalen
ayefki n tfunast sɛan t ttaɣen d win n tcekkaṛt
tura akka aql i deg uxeddim
ma ur tt tufiḍ
ur ssemɣar ara iman ik
ruḥeɣ ɣer umejjay n tuɣmas axataṛ sɛiɣ lfula di tuɣmest iw n leɛqel
uccayen ad gezzren di medden ayen ara ǧǧen irebraben ad t kemmlen
saɛid u muḥ yerra t id d ṭṭlem ɣef tiziri tagawawt
yuɣ d aserwal meqqren fell as dɣa yettqadar it
ini ttxil k 
d tidet a dda ɛmeṛ ḥeḍreɣ as i snat n tikal di bgayet akked uweqqas
acḥal ur d tbaneḍ
aɣbel deg sen mačči deg i
d ireṭṭalen si tegrigit neɣ si tlatinit
keṛheɣ k
ad ṛuḥeɣ ad d aɣeɣ ayen ara ččeɣ
ssirideɣ tuɣmas iw yal ass
d acu t waṭṭan n ubeḥri
llan miyya u xemsin n yemdanen i irekben tamacint
ɣas rnu ten d ssber i wul
ad yili yefka aɣrum

d cwami w i d yesnulfan iman iw

tanemmirt nwen

urǧin yeqqim yiwen n yimalas ur yuri ara i yemma s
ilaq ad teččem
ad ikemmel wahil deg tmeddit n wass a

ad kent d inin azekka
d acu kan dima ixus kra

akken i tteddun
ur yezmir ara ad d isali asebter
afran n umezruy d trakalt n temnaḍin
aslem ma yeffeɣ d berra i waman ad yemmet
ɛebban azaglu yiwen ssya wayeḍ ssyihin
weḥd m gar rebɛa n leḥyiḍ

ur yeǧǧi ara yidir newwara
ziɣ qeṛsen ak lexyuḍ
ur tufiḍ d acu i yugad
mačči d asṭuqqet n wawal ara yessalin taqbaylit
ad iɣil mazal ikem
ẓẓebra ẓẓayet d uzzal
yettlusu tom iselsa n watmaten is
amcic yerɣan s waman yeḥman yettaggad aman isemmaḍen
a wi yufan yiwen d nekk wayeḍ am nekk
akka i k yura
tabrat umeɣnas n teqvaylit
teɛǧeb yidir lɛeqliyya n newwara
tanfem aɣ i nekkni deg nniya ad yegg sidi ad yesteḥsen
s teqbaylit ara d banent gar tmura
d acu ara txedmeḍ s wannect a n yeẓra
ma d win tesɛa yemma s iṛuḥ yeǧǧa tt di leḥzen
taẓuri trennu deg leɛmer n umdan
cwiṭ nni i yehder d sima
wissen anta deg sent i yeslan
ṭṭfeɣ agelzim deg ufus iw
seksu s tɣeddiwt
llant tɣirdmiwin di tmurt n walman
ineḍfaṛen weḥlen
tessnemt ad txedmemt kullec
ala nekk i t yeẓran
akken kan i t mennaɣ
ad tt awint yid sent
azekka d lḥedd
tasekla n tmaziɣt tamensayt
tamedyazt ur teqqim ara kan deg tensayit imi tusa d tsuta i tt id refden seg wayen tella
bɣiɣ ad kesbeɣ imelyaṛen
cfiɣ d awezɣi ad ttuɣ
yella ḥedd deg uxxam
teswa afenǧal n lqahwa
nezmzer ad neqqim deg ṭabla rrif n ṭaq
ad ten yaru ad ten isismel ad ten yesleḍ
keyyfeɣ
ur ten tufim ara
ad truḥ mi ara tebɣu
ansi i s tekkiḍ ad k d yekk
tḥemmel it seg wasmi tella d tabesṭuḥt
laman i as d tettak tektubt neɣ win tettaf deg tezlatin

slet d i waya
ttawiɣ aɣyul iw

sliman u muḥ yefṛeḥ
tessnem ad theḍṛem d igurdan
snirem kkes ales

ad k t fken
urgaɣ targit ad tt ig ṛebbi di lexla
melmi m d nniɣ akka
d taluft
izem ireɛɛed
allen n sima zgant lesqent deg maziɣ
ur tettembiwil tessirt alamma s ufus
acuɣeṛ ur tettaẓeḍ ara ar zdat
awi d afenǧal n lqahwa
ur yelli ufran wis sin i s qqaren wid yennumen d umenṭer
ad negren leqbayel

imiren aqcic mačči d ahwawi
yesken asen t id akken ad teẓren ma yecbeḥ neɣ ala

bḍu aseɣwen
anwa i tecɣeb taluft ma yella yerbeḥ tom
uɣeɣ tanumi gganeɣ uqbel lɛecṛa
ad nuɣal ɣer tazwara

amek ara teḍru yid i

ad sent d inint azekka
dɣa sin neɣ tlata wussan meqbel zik zik i tettenkar

ar tufat a tom
acuɣeṛ ur yebɣi ara tom ad iṛuḥ

ur bɣiɣ la aksum la iselman

ṣber cwiṭ qrib ad d taweḍ nnuba k
agezdu n tutlayt d yidles amaziɣ
awwah internet agi yesderwec medden
ad yerr aḍar
simmal ttɛeddin wussan
teddun deg temdint
aḍebbal ur itettu ahuzzu n tuyat
yemlal iyi id deg ubrid yedda yid i
annar akka i yettwarwat ma d akal wi bɣun yaɣ it
myencaden
yerẓa t ɛeggu
seg tama n tmeɣrut tiseddarin d yifyar d wakaten
yal yiwen yettazen asirem is
yecna yid s deg yiseggasen yezrin
ulamek ara hedreɣ seg akken lliɣ bateɣ
ad as t yeɛṛeḍ
ad lseɣ ayen i bɣiɣ
ur fhimeɣ iqiḥ
yeddem awen tent id
amzun akken tafransist agi tuɣ allaɣen nsen
iqbayliyen ɣur sen taɣerma am yiɣerfan nniḍen
melmi ara ruḥent
ur tewwiḍ ara amḍiq ik
ur asen qqar acemma
acḥal n tkeṛyas i yesɛa
tlata deg sent kan i yeddren
tameṭṭut is d taneɛmart
am nnaqus yeṭṭenṭunen neɣ am ṭṭbel yeddendunen
qqaren d tayri d taderɣalt
yewwi as d leḥmu i wul is
taḥbult n tatut d tiɣwist n win ittwaqerḥen sdat tmara
d adlis im wa
ur d yelli wayra
ur d usin ara
awal ɣef tesnilest timserwest
tettiṛṛiq am usafu
melmi i d tusiḍ
ur awen t ttakkeɣ ara
yedda d wid yeǧǧa zman
yugi ad yaf
acuɣeṛ ulac win i yi d isellen
amek i t bḍan
ivirusen deg uselkim sexṣaṛen isefka
yal wa ad d yini
d lawan ad tcemmṛem iɣallen nwen
diri t wurar ik
d acu ara ččeɣ
d tayunin akken ad siwelen
inig nsen yettwasleḥem ɣer zzat ɣef lǧal ugeffur
ur tefhim ara d acui d tenna
ilaq ad iḥemmel tameṭṭut is
ur ttḥettimen ara ɣef tarwa nsen ayen ur bɣin ara
yuɣal it id wul ɣer tmurt
akka i d taḥbult sin n wudmawen i tesɛa udem iqebqeb udem d lemri
ad am t id ifek
nbedd akk ar tutlayt taqbaylit
yeṭṭef tameẓyant idewwer itt s leɛqel kan yerra tt daxel n teckart
ndekwal d ay agdud
aha ṭṛan frut aɣ ttid send ad texnez
beṛka ken ccna
gen di talwit a gma cilla naser d awezɣi ad k nettu
tirni n udabu iṣeggmen
ur kem kkateɣ ara
ldimt allen nkent
ara asen d iceyyeɛ
anta tt ta i d izerrqen am tafat n lefjer tezyen am ayyur tettirriq am yiṭij
kerhen kem merra
yeɣfel tom deg tzeqqa n tɣuri
tettaf iman is tzelgi tettaf iman is tlufḍa d tiluxxext
terramt as tent id
ayen turiḍ ad d yeqqim ayen d tenniḍ yuwi t waḍu
aah wi iṣurdiyen iw
annect a akk
amussnaw n tsengama
aqwiṛ
ur d ttasen ara
anida i tluleḍ
ad yezzenz axxam is
ad iṭṭef rebbi ayen yugaren aya
yerna nniɣ ak isem iw sima
aseqqamu unnig n tneslemt
tusa d
timetti meṛṛa tebra i ṭṭbel deg waman
ilaq ad tesgunfumt
ɛuhdeɣ ken ur cciḍeɣ
d aṣraɛ i ten ṣerɛen
neɣ ulac anda ara terreḍ
d acu n tmara i ten yerran
anwi i kent yeslemden aya
yekkat itt uzenneqnaq
bḍu yasent tt id
nebɣa ad yiɣzif leɛmer nneɣ
mazal ur ẓṛint ara
ad as d tehder i maziɣ
beṛka ken ur ttnaɣem ara
ɛṛeḍ it id ad yečč yid neɣ
fkiɣ as afus iw ur uggadeɣ
yuklal lemqadrat urgaz a
yeɛna tt yiṭij yessker itt id seg usu
ad iḥewwes yid sent
llan widen yeqreḥ lḥal imi i ten id qelɛen seg yiẓuran
yugi ad d inṭeq
tisi tezga d nnig uddaynin
tiqbayliyin zik tegent tameɣra ticki yiwet seg sent tger d aẓeṭṭa
ideg nenkeẓ ad t id neqqar
yegguma yuba ad yečč
yenna as baba s n teqcict awi d zuǧ kilu n lebṣel tawiḍ tt
iha iha leḥḥu as asif asif
d tamelḥant
ma tenna d rray is
tesṛuḥemt tent
mazal tutlayt nneɣ ad tebbeɛzeq
ad ten seɛfent
tteryel tessa as d leḥrir dɣa ṭṭsent
yuɣ d yidir kra n leḥwal
kkiɣ d akk tinedlisin n temdint
yesbeɣ yidir axxam is
tasudut taɣelnawt n umesten d yibeddi mgal tijɛal
yenwa ass a i d aneggaru ines
tteddun ḥekkun
ayen akken yeḍran yeḍra
ad yuɣal d ṭṭir ad tt id yexḍef deg ifassen n tmeṭṭut n baba s
anwa ara yaggad ma yeqqim
dayen ur bɣiɣ ara ad leɛbeɣ
lḥedd a i d iteddun ad k sslemdeɣ ssyaḍa iselman
rnu yi d wayeḍ
ad ak ḍelbeɣ yiwet n lḥaǧa
wali kan ma yejba d
tesbeggneḍ d tazmert n ufus ik ayeffus
abrid n wadda gar tigzirt d uẓeffun
lɛerc n at jennad
acuɣeṛ ara ffɣen i meṛṛa
neǧǧa at isṛayil ṛuḥen anwa ara iqeddcen fell aɣ tura
muqqlemt tt
bɣan tutlayt taqbaylit
tezmer i usemmiḍ am wa
lexrif d lweqt ideg bnin wučči
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat is
yelha waya a maziɣ
ad yeqqim d tayuga
ḥemmlent ad urarent
acḥal lhan yizeǧǧigen a
ad heḍṛeɣ s teqbaylit
ad nadiɣ fell akent ad ken afeɣ
seqdec touch id akken ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
tella kra n yiwet i yeṭṭalayen tom
sima tettqerrib kra kra
ad dduklen yid neɣ
ahat ur d yettas ara
hwan tiseddaṛin

taɛwint n at cila
a t an ur ak id yuli ara wawal
lemqeggel
a yelli a tin yelhan
ass n d amcum is
ax n afus iw
ad slemden tutayt taqbaylit i warraw nsen
ad yefk afus n tallelt i wid ixusen
ayen ur zmireɣ ad d rreɣ
tfakk asent ten
yefka neɣ yeqqim
i yettuɣaḍen d ageswaḥ nni n ṣayddu akked yixeddamen nni i t yecban
ad am d inin azekka
ifassen is d illeggaɣen am tḥedduft n uwtul
ay gar ak d lǧennet a yamẓallu
ad yeqqim kan di zzawiya is yerna din i yella din
iseggasen yezrin
tɛeḍḍel
imsebriden ttɛeddayen ttuɣalen
tal tikkelt ara iɛeddi ad yečč yessirid ifassen is
ɛreḍ tikelt nniḍen
aɣlif n tmezduɣt d tɣermi d temdint
tilawin di taddart
iḥemmel ad yeqqim yidir netta d newwara
awi d ad waliɣ
wissen anwa akkit i yeslan
iqjan nsen seglafen
meɛna uɣalemt d ttxil kent
yebbuḥbeḥ umedyaz seg teɣri
ur ssiɛlay ara ṣṣut im
anda i tzedɣemt
meslay
bniɣ ak axxam

d taqbaylit i d iseɣ nneɣ
laẓ fad
d wa i d ccɣel nsen agejdan
mazal iken kan akken
yir rrafqa tettawi d nndama
ṛwaḥ di leɛnaya k
imi tekcem tmedyazt a ɣer tira ɣef ufus n hanoteau
tlul d s teqbaylit
iles aẓidan itṭeḍ tasedda
yeɛdel yuba d merra inelmaden
anda t ukursi nwen
ad mmektint
anwa i yeẓṛan
azagur is yesɛa ticṛaḍ
atan ar ad tettwaliḍ mačči drus n twuɣa i aɣ iccan aksum d yiɣsan
ad as nṣeggem asefru
mačči kan d aya
dayen ur heddeṛ ara
ad ččeɣ abbaɣ nsen
tafunast tesrugmut
ufiɣ takaskiṭ im
yugi walluy ad yali tuɣalin is d akessar
ffɣeɣ d ɛemmi iḍelli
ad surfen imeṭṭawen iw
acimi ur yeqqim ara din
d ayla nkent wa
saḥit tikkelt nniḍen
anda ara kent id afeɣ umbeɛd
d učči i tetten abrid mi ara nehhren
tayaziḍt turew d tamellalt
tettɛummu akken iwata
imiren cciṭan ittaxxeṛ fell as
inelmaden ttarun ɣef tekfafin nsen
ilindi akka imira i d tedda d tislit
ur zmireɣ ara ad dduɣ ɣer lexla ass a
ur yessin ara lawan n uleqqem
yeḍra wayen yeḍran
ddant aɣ di nneqma
ggumaɣ ad d ffɣeɣ sina
ḥemmleɣ rruẓ s llubya
yiwen wahil amaynut n tneflit timezgit yesɛan asirem ameqqran
ad awiɣ ti
ad k ɛiwneɣ ad d mmektiḍ

yella walebɛaḍ i akent id iluɛan
txuṣṣemt deg ẓẓher
deg umwan legruri ggtent
d taqbaylit i d iseɣ is
nezga nettnaɣ
yeffud ad d isew
i yeẓran ala win yewwten akked win yeččan tiyita
ass icuba ar gma s
yulli ɣer el kkaṛ
d acu ara d tinim deg tnemhalt tamaynut
imi d lexmis neɣ d lḥed ulac fell as neɣ ahat ass n ttlata
ad tt id yekkes
yetturaǧu ad ccnun deg s ma drus ɛecra n yicennayen ilmeẓyen n taddart agi
tesṭuqqet d aḍar
degger itt akin tura teṭṭef ark amḍiq
a taḥanut n uḥeḍri
beṛka ur sṭerṭur ara
tanaggalt d acu t wawal a
ruḥ di laman
aɣerbaz nneɣ yebɛed
ad neslex akrar nni
ḥaca arbaḥ ara nerbeḥ
akka i teḥṣam
timsal agi fɣent iyi afus
anda ara d nemmeslay ɣef tiqerɛatin n waman akked yiẓmi i ttawin deg yikamyunen ur nettwasexdem ara i wanect agi
meḥsub aɣyul ur yuklal ara timẓin
tugi tardast n ujeddel ayen ur tt yerzin tugi t
tiɣri w ɣur kent a tuddar
ad tent nḥemmel assa azekka
nessaram mačči d taneggarut acku ad neɛreḍ amek ara nemcarak ad nemɛawan di kra n leqdic i ubaɣur n timmuzɣa
ḥemmleɣ acqiṛew
ma ulac imɣi i d yesṭuṭcen d tamurt i iɛiqṛen
nefka d awal nneɣ
icudd yimi s
d acu i k id iwwin ɣur i
tikta am ti ilaq ad ttwakksent deg wallaɣen
tewwi yas t id armi d axxam
d acu i yettilin daxel n yicwariyen nni
ičča yi ufus iw
ur k ttṭuruqen ara
aɣir n bgayet
ur ttɣimit ara yid sen
ur d uɣalent ara
tečča lbaṭaṭa d taḥmayant
kunwi tebdam
yella walebɛaḍ i yettmuqqulen
d aqjun lɛali
akal ttun t medden yeqqim d asuki ulac win ara t ixedmen
cixi ḥakim
anda akka i terra
ɣileɣ d gma s
kra n uqeddic sɣur akabar n yidles d tugdut di tizi wezzi d tajmilt
bren ɣer tama tayeffust
ur ttmuqul ara ɣer deffir
yenna d ih
ḥemmleɣ taɣuri seg wasmi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
melmi ara yečč imensi
reḍleɣ asent adlis ad t ɣrent
tṛuḥ asen akk d iḍes tesdawit nni
ufiɣ t yetturar ddabax
tamsalt n tifin n tifrat i wugur n tira
ad d awin icennayen di tmaɣra n belqasem
ad msenṣaleɣ yid s
ddut d yid i ad nṛuḥ ad t nɛawen
iḥuss as yuba yeɛya
taqbaylit d tutlayt n yemma akked baba
ad xelmeɣ tameɣṛa n umuli w ass n ssebt tameddit
aman yeswa d isemmaḍen
ad errent s tiɣratin
ur tettawi ara asemmiḍ
ma sekṛeɣ sɛiɣ ṣṣwab
teldiḍ d ul iw

fell ak ma yeqwa leɛyaḍ
ha t an usfel n ugama awi t

yewwi aɣrum
sekṛen
d aneḍru s wazal is

d tasdawit i d yekkren d umennuɣ ɣef tugdut
taddert ufella
uqbel ad igen

ur as tenniḍ ara
aru d azemz n wass
ur teḅɣi ara mi i iruḥ
ad nesteɛfu
lqaɛa tella semmḍet ddaw iḍarren is iḥefyanen
ijaḥ rray is
aḍar iruḥ deg uccuḍ
rriɣ k deg uɛewwiq
imi amur wis sin d tasleḍt n yisefra ines deg wayen yaɛnan amek yebna talɣa n yisefra ines
abriki ines ɛecr snin i yexdem
neɣ yella deg wacu irewsent d wayen i mgaradent
d lawan ad iruḥ yiwen ɣer uɣerbaz
nezmer ad nemmeslay
netta d nekk nesdegdeg
ɣur k ad d taseḍ
ad neqqim deg uxxam
cedhaɣ ad ẓreɣ tamurt iw
melmi i d yusa
terna ɣer ɣur sent akken ad ččent jmiɛ
ma yella fehmeɣ timsal akken llant
akken kan i iɛedda ad as d yerr
tamurt n mečč medden
ad yeḥnucceḍ deg udfel
anta tt tin akken i ak d iheddṛen
ameɛdur ameɣbun yettaṭṭaf imi s kullec yettarra t ɣer daxel
yeqqim deg uxxam
am terwiḥt n terwiḥt iw yal aḥulfu yesdubuy deg s cwiṭ cwiṭ
d acu i d snulfamt akka
ay argaz ḥemmel tameṭṭut ik
tarwa nneɣ ad d tennerni xas akken deg urebbi n tlufa

cennun yefṛax
ad tt ixelleṣ

ussan imezwura teḍra yid s am uderwic
tikti nni izedɣen allaɣ is yiwen ur yezmir ad as tt yesfeḍ
ẓṛiɣ belli d tom i imeẓẓiyen fell i
aserraǧi d yiwet n tewsit n uzemmur leɣella s ufayet yettekkes d zzit aṭas
idisan is ssnen leḥbus lḥif n ugdud is izdeɣ it
teḥṛec yelli twen deg uɣerbaz
ur cliɛen ara yakk deg s
ma ur yeswi ara lqahwa ṣṣbeḥ ur ittnekkar ara
uffan d iman nsen di taggara ḥeṣlen d acu ara xedmen
yewwi d lhem s axxam
ur ẓriɣ ma d tayri

ad iliɣ azekka deg uxxam
ur yexdiɛ ara yidir newwara

aqcic a ɣaya t

sɛan tinebgawin
acu t n unamek n wawal ungif
i iɛeddan d tletmiyya u xemsa u settin n wussan
ur bɣiɣ ara ad iyi iɛiwen tom deg waɣanen iw
ssawlen i urgaz is si yeḥya
ṛẓageḍ amzun d ilili
argaz ikerrez tameṭṭut tḥerrez
timeqqranin deg tlemmast timectaḥ deg rrif
ass nni d agfur dɣa sliman u muḥ ur yebɣi ara ad yeffeɣ
tirni taɣelnawt i teɣdemt timettit
ma yella kečč tugiḍ iyi amek i tebɣiḍ nekk ad k qebleɣ
ittqamar imawlan is
selḥayen tamurt s allah ɣaleb incallah
ad teẓreḍ amek i cebḥent tudrin n ukfadu ad twehmeḍ
alammi ttuɣ sanda i d wwḍeɣ deg lxedma
taqbaylit d azal
yeɣra deg uɣerbaz aɣelnaw n tsenselkimt sakin yedda ar franṣa anida ihegga tazrawt n duktura
seqdec face id akken ad tserḥeḍ i usnas
imezdaɣ n tegzirt n jeṛba di tunes qqaṛen asen ijeṛbiyen
temmut terbaɛt n medden deg uṭerḍeq nni
issefqed ixeddamen
gguman akk medden ad beddlen tamuɣli fell as

anwa i m tt ixedmen
mmuten
ass a mi yecewwel lmux iw
d acu t ufecku n uɛqal n taɣect

nutni ad zeglen tamacint

d usirem yessefsayen
wissen melmi ara d teldiḍ allen ik
d netta i d ikecmen

sima deg lawan nni

akeddav
a qasi awraɣ
twalam t
bɣiɣ kan ad nemmeslay
yella d usuffeɣ nsen si lḥebs ass n xemsa yulyu
ẓẓiɣ acaruq n yiṭij mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ
layla tella tessaram ad tesɛeddi iḍ akked uḥbib is
zemreɣ ad sweɣ kra n lqehwa ma ulac aɣilif
la yekkat ubruri
terzef ferruǧa ɣer xwal is
ili kem d tumɛint
d tidet ur issin ara ad iɛumm tom
d kemm ur nessin ara leṣlaḥ im
sliman u muḥ yettban d aweḥdi

taggara leqqmen tt s el ɛa
d ta i d ayla nwen
ẓṛiɣ tom
yura tabrat i temdakelt is
ur zmireɣ ad ferrjeɣ asaru nni
ad tesfeḍ aɣebbar
teǧǧiḍ arraw ik
ul n sima yekkat s lɛejlan
mačči d amezruy nneɣ i sselmaden deg uɣerbaz
iɛǧeb ak daɣen waya
ifuk yiḍ i d yewwin tabɣest
ldi ul im d yiman im akken ad yeḥlu lǧerḥ i kem iqerḥen
yiwen ur yebɣi ad ibeddel
anita i izewǧen deg kent
d iqbayliyen i iḥerzen idles aqbayli
d acu i kent yewwin ɣur s
am wakken d nutni kan i yellan neɣ d nutni i yesɛan lḥeq
acḥal seg yisefra s ḥefḍen ten aṭas n yilmeẓyen deg ugmam is
ixdem ccɣel is
ad tent taɣ tudgi
amagrad amezwaru yettwaseggem ugar n wis sin
tella kra n yiwet i yukren ssaɛa w
yufa iman is
tayeḍ tella d deg waggur agi iɛeddan sɣur yinaggalen agi buxerrub racid akked ali ḥeǧaz
ala mačči d amagnu
nezzi d i yidurar d yiẓuɣaṛ
mazal ur fukkeɣ ara ihi ad kemmleɣ
tiwwura n yigenwan
ilaq ad tɛeṛḍeḍ ad temlileḍ d tom
anda akka ara teffeɣ
yeɣṛa d tom
si ḥed wali
massi i ceɣbent teqcicin
ur tettu at smaɛel
i yemma m amek i tella

i tin i d yennan sbeḥ lxir ad asyefk di lxir mennaɣ ad yager fell as
akka i ḥṣiɣ
iceffu dima ɣef wayen yesla
yemla awen d acu ara txedmem
ṛwiɣ anadi
acekk itt tugna a
sefhem iyi d d acu i d tenna
acku yemmeslay d ɣef yiziɣer n umdan yettwanɣan
ibuṛasen
argaz d win ixeddmen ɣef uxxam is mačči d win yettɛassa d acu i xeddmen wiyaḍ
ukren iyi di lkar
i yemma k amek i tella
maziɣ yefhem iman is
atan wakud ik la izerri
ɣur wat azrem ad ken yeqqes
iffeɣ ɣer beṛṛa dɣa iru ten id d imerɣanen
maziɣ ur yennum ara ihedder d yid s deg berra n tneɣrit neɣ mebla fasebbuk
tebɣa mi ara tfak asɣray
yeṭṭef itt ccɣel n wexxam
d acu i issefraḥen deg sen d wacu ten wuguren i d tettmagareḍ
yessens ula d asirem deg ulawen n warrac
uliɣ s adrar snufseɣ d azwu azeddgan
acki t
ur d nusi ara
eǧǧ itt ad truḥ
win iɣef terɣa tmiḍt iw isderɣel tiṭ iw
acuɣeṛ xaṭi
ad yeggan ur yettǧefǧif
hebleɣ ɣef teqbaylit
a stut m lebtut
tessneḍ ad turareḍ diminu
zik i d tuɣaleḍ
ur ttḥiri ara ad truḥeḍ
ur as yezmir ara baba s
ɛefsen akk iger nni
limer mačči akka imdanen ad myeččen gar asen
ifka t unebdu i lexṛif
yefka yak tlata n lewṣayat
ḥsu d ifassen ik i d imezwura i d yersen fell i seld lweḥc nni iyi ɛedmen temẓi w
sselmadeɣ asent i warrac
tameṭṭut iw aɛzizen fell i
isawel as i tom
ɣas akken ala drus n lweqt iten ijemɛen
rnu ɣer s deg waṭas n temnaḍin mačči d lḥukuma i yettxellisen lebni n leǧwamaɛ
ittabn iyi d tetqelliqeḍ aṭas
tettzad deg uɣewwes
yenwa ala lutu ara yexdem i yiman is
terra yakent tt id
iḥemmel anadi ussnan
ismal web aniɣer trezzuḍ zemren ad sutren adig inek
ɣas ruḥ kan tura axir ik
iserdasen ttcuddun ikaskiwen n wuzzal
ad aɣ yemneɛ rebbi seg lmusibat
awim tt
amasay n tsiḍent yefreḥ nezzeh acku sya d afella mačči d netta ara yessekcamen meṛṛa isefka icudden ar tceqqufin n tsiḍent
yeddem am tt id
lemwaǧi beddent am leswaṛ qquren waman di tlemmast n lebḥeṛ
tattut d aṭṭan n yiɣerfan
aman d laman
acu tebɣiḍ ɣur neɣ
zuɣer
aɛalṭar nni ad t txedmeḍ s tencirin ad yili d ilem
imir lliɣ d anelmad
fiḥel ma tezziḍ i wawal
teddamt
timseɛraq d addal n wallaɣ
tebɣamt ad teččemt
ma d dda qiqi a ziɣen iruḥ yeḥḍer tameɣra n numidya
tiwaculin ttwaqdent di tasa nsent
mlaleɣ d yiwet n teqcict tamecṭuḥt
akenni i k yezwar i k yugar
ur ken id tekk ndama seg i
ad sent tent teɛṛeḍ
azen imayl
mmi s n taɣaṭ yečč it wuccen
teččiḍ iles im ɛni
ur terbiḥ ara meskint
efk aɣ ad nessiɣ times
ɛni ilaq ad qqiment g uxxam ass a
teččiḍ
ahlil win izran ahlil wur neẓri
tasdawit akli muḥɛnd ulḥaǧ
allal amezwaru n tiḥerci n weɣref d tutlayt is
ɣef aya ilaq ad nwali d acu i tatrarit
win i as yennan ahat
sizdegemt iceṭṭiḍen nkent
limmer zemreɣ
ladɣa mi rran ineggura a tudert nsen akk d ddin
ad ḥewwsen yid i
twalaḍ amek ur yettak ara yidir afus di newwara
bu sɛaya ɛeṛḍen t ɣer wučči igellil ɣer twizi
d wayen akk icudden ɣer lebni n usefru sumata
yexleɛ tom
af d acḥal i yi d ikker
deg ussan i d iteddun ad ṛuḥeɣ ad sewqeɣ
ɛzizen deg tudert
d leḥcic n lexla ara tettetteḍ
acu ara k in iniɣ lliɣ tedduɣ ad seṭṭleɣ i kra n medden
imsidag iqbayliyen d igazuzen
iǧǧa t din ɣef yiri n wasif
yeɛqub isɛa tnac n warrac
ayɣer i d ttakeɣ isteqsiyen a
taɣrast
teṭṭfem ten id
yesnuɣna yidir newwara
ma d kenwi i yeṭṭfen adrar serrḥet as d
ahat ad tafeḍ wayeḍ xir iw
ad ruḥeɣ akin i tagut

tettbineḍ d d tamelḥant

rriɣ talaba ɣef yiri w
tfakk asen ten
texdem ayen i as d tenna

tebda tsuqilt n facebook ɣer teqbaylit

ad iḥrez ṛebbi

inimt asent aql i da
gar asent tamezwarut nni n mass musa imarazen
ikad d teɛreq as acemma i tom
ur as teǧǧiḍ acemma
amek i s cfant
iɛewwel ad d yerẓ idmaren is akken ad d yeffeɣ ɣer berra

yerfed ɛli tabalizt ul is yetḥeyyer

hemleɣ cṛab
sirred asen akk irkelli lejraḥ
ur turji yiwen
tasdawit d tamezgida n uɣref
ur yelli fessus akken ad tḥemmleḍ
a ccuha m a taneqqact gar tneqcin
mi d teffeɣ seg ulmessi
aɣlif n ustan aɣelnaw
ur t id ttafent ara
yenna as agem aman
yeqqes it uzegḍuf
ahbuh ur tessineḍ ula amek ad d teẓẓgeḍ tixsi
ddut d yid i ad wen d sekneɣ anda i yettɣama
imdanen d yiɣersiwen ttidiren akken ddaw n yiwen n ssqef
illu iburek iten
ɣas rẓaget ad tt sweɣ

tceffu dima ɣef imeslayen n yemma s
tamhersa tessedrem tajmaɛt taqbaylit ɣef lsas
a yemma ɛzizen
ɛṛeḍ ta
ad yifif ucettiḍ ad yeftel d asennan
mozilla tettennaɣ akken ad telqeḍ kan ayen tesra i usnulfu d usnerni n firefox ios i yal yiwen
yečča qrib kilu weksum iman is
terra yas
ilaq ad tḥemmleḍ ayen i txeddmeḍ
smekti as d jeddi n jeddi s
d temɣart tezga ɣer tama s
nniɣ d awal uɣaleɣ deg wawal
asnas iteddu deg ugilal
yella d usfugel ar tagara
aselmad n teqbaylit ɣur s assaɣen igerzen d yinelmaden is
yessared ifassen is s waman
ikcem as uvirus deg uselkim
d acu i y icqan nekkini
ad ččen abbaɣ ik
wid ijaḥen iḍelli
nebɣa ad ken nissin
yeḍreg tala
ɣer tugat n uqcic a
mi d tnehreḍ takerrust muqel deg lemri alemmas d yiqerniyen
akken ad tlemmedeḍ tameslayt ilaq ad tissineḍ taseftit n tefyirin
cukkeɣ ttwakellexent

taxdeɣ fell am
d acu i ḥesbent iman nsent
acku netta deg twacult nneɣ
yeswa xemsemya n yidinaṛen
ur ssiɛlay ara ṣṣut ik
tettenɛil txezzu tiɛeqqacin nni yerkin aɛebbuḍ is yesxesṛen ṭṭbiɛa s
d acu
yecba anbac tisent
ad d nesmektay katia bengana
yendeh s yisem is
kkren yiḍan nni ar useglef
kečč ur tufiḍ d acu i ak yettruḥun
yewwet it yiṭij s aqerru
yeddem asen tent id
aselkim d afecku atrar
lbaḍna s teffer
d temẓi i ixeddmen ɣef temɣeṛ
yekra taxxamt deg usensu
ay amermur akka i d amur
nekk ad zegleɣ tamacint
akka ihi ilaq ad ruḥeɣ
ur tettruḥuḍ ara ɣer dihin
ffɣen d seg tesdawit
d acu i k yewwin ɣur s
ziɣ tekfiḍ
ini d yelha xdem yif it
anda akka i ffɣen
yir aɣyul ur t ttdeqqim
jehdent
terra ɣer texxamt
ad necḍeḥ arma neɛya deg tmeɣṛa ines
acuɣeṛ i yettsetḥi mliḥ
ḥkiɣ i udɣaɣ ifsi
iɣil yerna d iɣil n wakal
tevotiḍ neɣ teqqimeḍ kifkif di tmurt nneɣ
fkiɣ ak awal iw ar ḥaca aḥraz ara k ḥerzeɣ
mi qqlant temẓin rnut lḥemmeẓ nni diɣ kifkif
ma tecfid di ddula nsen
tetḥeqqem belli tesɛam aṭas n yedrimen
d aẓawn i d kullec
axxam yeččuṛ d iɛekzen ulac wid ara inehṛen azgaren
aɣrum
d imezwura i aɣ tt id yeǧǧan gar asen jean de la fontaine
ad wen ten id awint
kecmen d tamurt s ddreɛ
ahat tebɣam ad d terrem
teččiḍ kra ṣṣbeḥ agi a yidir
tteryel teččur as d aɣerbal is d tiwiztin
mṣadan di tiktiwin
tenniḍ as i baba k
ɣeṛ iyi deg tilifun ma yella yeɣli d ugeffur
wali ma yella iṣeḥḥa wayen i d turiḍ
axxam d axxam iw
ǧeɛfer yesɛa tilkin
xaqeɣ maḍi kan fell am
awi aɛekkaz nni deg ufus ik yes s ara txeddmeḍ limaṛat
surf iyi
ameḥbus ma ad yaf lḥeq is
amek armi i kem mazal da
ttxil wet ḍebbṛet iyi d kra n lxedma
d talwit i yimdanen
ad xedmeɣ tin yexdem jeddi
d tixeṭṭay inerza i nseɛɛu da
yegull ur yessusem
ad t txedmem
amek ih 
ihi terra tent d itbiren
seg yimir nni i bdan yimaziɣen ḥessben ussan
txdem asen kra
ya rebbi
ṭixer ssya
mačči d yiwen mačči d sin
yak ur aɣ tettuḍ ara
ḥulfaɣ yella kra
asqamu unnig n timmuzɣa
tiɣawsiwin seqdacen medden tura
ayagi ad ak yeǧǧ ad teṭṭfeḍ neɣ ad tessaliḍ tiwlafin
nḥemmel ad nmudd afus
yeẓẓa tibḥirt ufequs
netta yesri adrim nni
yenɣes usemmiḍ ɣur kent
ur d tenni ara awal
acimi ur teddim ara
ameddakel n medden akk ur yelli d ameddakel n yiwen
ad ak ɛiwneɣ akken zemreɣ
anda ara tesɛeddiḍ imuras ik n unebdu
usiɣ d ad qeṣṣreɣ cwiṭ d yemɣaren ayi n twaɣit
aya ur yelli ara d win
abrid n tizi yezzi
ad nɛawed ad neɛreḍ
teẓṛa i ḥemmel itt wul iw ur tezmir ad testeqsi
tumart nneɣ
ɣṛet
ḥess d ɣer da ur bɣiɣ ara ad sruḥeɣ uxeddim iw
yuker aḍar
skud yettwali annay n teqbaylit tettaṭṭaf it tawla
teddem as tiwiztin nni i tessers di tebniqt i d teǧǧa setti s
ɣṛem wayi tura
ad wen ceɛleɣ tafat
azul fell awen ay imesfliden ɛzizen
addag nni yugi ad yernu ad yimɣur
anda ad i yawi ubrid iw ssrima ṭṭfen tt yiderɣalen
atent a d abrid ad ruḥent
aqel aɣ mɛa lweqt
d acu i turamt
maḥsub ttaken
aqli uɣeɣ d iḍebsiyen n yizlan imaynuten
deg tegrest ileqqeḍ azemmur
tettemsefhamem yid sen
yeggull deg i
heyyi iman im
ala tidet i d qqareɣ
yeldi sakin aqrab is yessuffeɣ d tayuga n tqeffazin d yiwet n teckart tamecṭuḥt tafrawant
teqqur teɛwint n yiḥulfan
bɣant ad ččent
kcem d
yuba d yir asleɣmay
amek isem k
aseɣwen i tneɣleḍ firefox ios
aqcic yejreḥ afus is
arwaḥ
nudaɣ fell awen ufiɣ ken
ur ḥebbset ara da
amussu n tnekra
ad awen d awiɣ lqahwa
isem is i urgaz im
yiwen deg sen ur iwala udem n wagi yukren
ad taf tura talwit d tsusmi i tfud deg tudert
alamma d sebɛa n tikkal
bezzaf i yečča
iger iyi ubrid ɣeṛ uxxam aqbur tazeqqa nni deg ilulaɣ
idurar n leqbayel
iṭurrec uberhuc iw makken iwala aksum deg ufus iw
aɛɛa
uzuren
aẓru n uferḥat
sseṛɣent awen tent
a wi yerran tudert akk d turart
ḥemmleɣ ad ččeɣ igumma n lawan
nella am yal tasebḥit nteddu ar tesnawit
acimi ur aɣ d terriḍ ara awal
ad tt tawimt yid kent
leɛmeṛ walaɣ asif yecbeḥ akken
tamɛayt i ḥemmleɣ aṭas
mi ara tettmuquleḍ ad tinigeḍ
a dunit a lbir n ssem
rrif n zzeṛb i yeẓẓa tazemmurt
mdel allen im
ssufuɣen ten bac ad d walin adeg seg yidgan icebḥen ama deg twilayt n bgayet neɣ berra s
ur d tefkimt ara udem
tezwar teqbaylit im
wehmeɣ mi t walaɣ yewwi d akanic
axaṭer d ḥayat i yebɣan akka makken yemmeut urgaz is
a kra iqeddcen tamara
yal mi ara d mmektiɣ
ad d kksen irden akked temẓin
tezgam din
yebda la yettazzal
tom icemmeṛ ɣef yiɣallen is
ma yella d ayen yerzan iḥulfan n maziɣ
nettat ad sent terr abazin neɣ berkukes
ayɣer i tesxeṛbem tibḥirt is
ur ḥekkuɣ lbaḍna i leɛyal iw
ula mi heddren
ur d usint ara
ttnaɣen ɣef tlelli
ad yili seg wid ifazen
yezdeɣ deg uxxam n gma s
akken tebɣu tili talɣa s
rran as tt id
axeddam s lxuf iheddeṛ
tesɛiḍ aɣbalu n tudert mačči d lḥerma n taddart gar yiḍarren im
aqerruy is deg lqaɛa
ad temneɛ aglim ik
yeqqen azger s aɣyul
deg tegrest i nettandi i umergu
lhemm irennu d ɣef lhemm ar tura ur tufi iman is
win ara yexdem
yiwen ur d iban
ur d yusi ur d iceyyeɛ
ɛni tettḥessiseḍ asen i widak
d acu i d winna i d tceyyɣeḍ akken
iwenneɛ
yeɣleb tasraft deg wučči
mi ara d yekcem ad t waliɣ amek ara nexdem akk
d asberweḍ kan
asedrem ishel d lebni d yiseɣ i yuɛren
ḥezzeb uqbel ad d ḍrunt
ad tt tettarfademt s nnuba arma tiwḍemt ɣer uxxam
ad xedmen kullec am wakken i k t id umṛeɣ
akka i d netta yugi ad ibeddel
yegla ula s tezmert iw
tsebɣeḍ as ten
ihi imi kifkif itent acimi ur teɣriḍ ara s teqbaylit
s udlis ar d yeqqimen tameddit i win nsen s ufella s wadda
taɛkemt ẓẓayit
yeslemed iyi tt
bɣiɣ afenǧal n lqahwa ttxil k
tennad dɣa ur tettruḥu ara
zrin wussan rnan wayyuren tislit ur tarzif ara s axxam nsen
deg temssizzelt n tazzla tezga d zehra d tamzwarut
d acu i k yewwin ɣur sen
lḥedimu
aɣlif n usileɣ d uselmed asadran
tanemmirt d aya kan i deg s
diri t wamek i tetturaremt
ur ufin ara later is
a wid iḥekmen ayenni
ad tɣileḍ d berzidan si lketṛa n lɣaci
tettumt d acu iyi txedmemt
nexdem akken
swiɣ d lqahwa n tɣellayt terra yi ar temẓi

zik i nṛuḥ
iẓra k nettḥadar iten
ɣran di tmenqas
deqs is swal fell ak
fehmeɣ t
ur ẓṛin anda tebla tessirt
idles inem d aqbayli
ɛas kra
amɛellem iqelleb ɣer tidet akken ad tt yesteqsi
tilelli inu s dreɛ iw i tt id ḥellaɣ
efk as aftat is n uksum ur tettu ara
bɣiɣ ad d greɣ tamawt
negra d nettnadi ɣef ulac
irgazen am tfeɣwa ceqceṛ ternuḍ
amasay n ugezdu n ufares di steel yugi ad d yazen tarrayt n ufares n yifarisen icudden ar wuzzal

lemɛanda n tnuḍin

yewwi d awal ɣef wayen yettilin deg berra n uxxam
am taga yugi weɣyul
wissen anda i terriḍ
bɣiɣ ad teǧǧuǧeg teqbaylit
iban ɣef wudem is yuḍen
wwet ɛeddi
ad tewwet agejdur mi ara tsel s tmettant n urgaz is
izem i tett tarwa s
amek ara iqabel azekka taḥbibt n wul is
awi ten ma tṛuḥeḍ
yella waya
ansi i d ikka ihi uẓekkun inna
zemreɣ ad ẓreɣ ayen i d tsutreḍ
deg yennayer yekkat udfel
ɛyiɣ lǧehd iw yekfa
dɣa igerrez
d tutlayt nneɣ i d tudert nneɣ
aql ak deg ustṛalya
ur teffiɣem ara

ad ḍelqeɣ
argaz yuɣal d

ttun k
nerra tt deg uɛewwiq
neɛya deg lekdubat

terriḍ asent t id
amrabeḍ ur neɣri tif it teqbuct n yiɣi
d ṣṣeḥḥ yemmut
akabar n yixeddamen

ma yella tuḥwaǧeḍ kra aru yi d
leɛnaya terra d ferḥat s axxam
ansi i d tekkiḍ akka
tesseṛɣemt asen ten
di nndama i yeɛziz umdakel
ffɣeɣ d yemma iḍelli
sfeḍ inagan n tuqqna akked umazray n tunigin d unadi
ur d isawel ur d yuri
talalit n tmedyazt taqbaylit tatrart
tutlayin akk kifkif itent
tudert i tutlayt taqbaylit

llan aṭas i yettṛajun deg beṛṛa
tbeɛɛdeḍ tura i tlufa dayen

ayyaw n temɣart iw
kan akka ukiɣ d yiman iw am win ihuzzen axxam
ssuq n tlufa
teǧǧa yasen d isallen ines

ifehhem tirqaqin
f acḥal ssaɛa ara yebdu wurar
ass mi nella d imecṭaḥ nezga deg uxxam n jida
ad yezyen yisem is
ad nṛuḥ ar wexxam
ad tɣummeḍ aɛalṭar nni s nnḥas
ayen ufiɣ ɣur s d imeslayen
yettru uqcic yugi ad yessusem mi as rẓen alelluc is

yelmed ya
deg yiseggasen n sebɛin ggten yicennayen imḥaddiyen

tal tanezzayt yettseṭṭil i yiman is tamart

d setti i iṛebban gma abesṭuḥ

ad as nesbuḥru yes s i mmi

mi twala aqcic nni bu teclaɣmin tarqaqanin d wallen tizṛaṛaqin dɣa ul is yeddeqdiq seg tayri
ad nemsawal azekka neɣ seld azekka ɣef setta n tmeddit

yiwen ur yelli d unnig
ad k yeg rebbi d tixsi n ssuq win d iɛeddan ad as yerfed tamaẓẓagt is

ad tṛuḥ tmacint

ttxil m ḍebbeṛ iyi d kra n lxedma
aẓar nsen d win i semrasen deg umaḍal akkit
d wa i d annay i fernen yiqbayliyen
lliɣ deg tesdawit
amyag n tɣara yemmal d amek iga umeggay
yennecraḥ wudem n umsaltu sakin yečča yi s wallen ɣas akken tetwelles liḥala
ihi imi akka ad nernu ad nfaṛes tagnit
ɣfel kan ɣef kra yuwi t
akken qqaren ur yečči seksu ur isenna aksum
d tin yurzen ɣer yidrimen
kra yekka yiḍ d nekk ttrajuɣ kem
nenna d basṭa leḥqaṛa di tmurt n leqbayel
si melmi i yessen yidir newwara
lɣerba tura deg uqerru
sima yuɛer as lḥal ad tessuffeɣ ayen yellan deg wul is
nessemsed ijenwiyen
acḥal ara yesɛu jeddi s di leɛmeṛ
ahat deg rray i tent uɣen
armi d akeffadu
limer d lebɣi mi yemmut yiwen ad t neǧǧ kan deg umkan is
yidir d aḥedri
inna akka d wakka
akka ttif lmut wala yir tudert
jack d amdakel iw si fransa
wiyaḍ teddun cban izerman
ggareɣ ak n tiɣri a zheṛ iw ttexil k ma ad tarreḍ awal
anwi imdanen yeɛna ucṛaḍ
anabaḍ aqbayli uɛḍil
awal uffir
ɣer lǧameɛ yezwar iyi
ur ḥemmlent ara aɣerbaz s waṭas
win ur nesɛi nnif yaɣ it id
llan wid yekkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
lexyal n mendas werǧin i tt ifureq
urɛad tekfi newwara leqraya
ma isleb ad isleb kan ɣef yiman is
ibna dinna aɛaltaṛ i umeɣlal dɣa yendeh s yisem n umeɣlal
imir n kan ulɣent deg uqerruy iw tiwlifin am wakken d asaru amsaltan i ttwaliɣ
iḥemmel tuɣac n lani rabah
ad sɛeddiɣ iḍ da
ḥiwel as ad as yaẓay
yesɛa aqjun
ɣeḍlen tt yiɛdawen n tudert
ḥbes ameslay
wid i asent ittakken tilelli nsent mebla aḥras neɣ imenɣi
yal aɣref yesɛa timucuha maca llant kra cerkent n umaḍal akk
anwa akka i ak d yennan belli iɛedda d sy a
ad ceyyɛeɣ tafakturt nni s lfaks
sima ttecruruqent wallen is
ečč susem
imɣaren n zik ḥemmlen tacacit n sṭambul
leqbayel d yicawiyen d atmaten
srid ar daxel akken ad uraren dduminu
tazzla ur yeǧǧi kra ma d tassemt tugi ad tefsi
ad ruḥeɣ ad bedleɣ tamurt ad nadiɣ tafat
ad yeṭṭes mmi di laman
asif aɛisi yuɣal d wad aɛisi ma d at yanni uɣalen d benni yenni
kifkif i nettxemmim
fukken lehduṛ ifeṣṣel uqenduṛ
ad ineggi igenni d timeqwa n lehwa
d acu i kent id yewwin ɣur i
ad sweɣ yis lqahwa
yuba yenṭaq yenna d tidet
iɣil uberwaq
xeddmen ɣef teqbaylit
ugadeɣ aqelwac n temqebrin
tesɛiḍ sin iselkimen
yezmer d tamaziɣt i d tutlayt taqdimt akk deg ddunit
aɛekkaz n wulmu ur ikkat ur ittfukku
di kra n wayyuren kan teɣli tdamsa n tmurt a
ma yella ur teqqarem ara tasekla nwen mlet iyi anwa ara tt yeɣren
tnehreḍ
sgunfu a mmi di talwit
ldiɣ allen iw
ad aɣ tt id tawiḍ akken ad aɣ d tecḍeḥ
d taqbaylit i d yemma m
mačči d kečč i iḍebbiren da
anida t uxxam is
gedha s udlis amaynut
ad awen t id yawi azekka
ma ttuɣ smektiyi d
imru yettaru ayen yettxemmim wallaɣ
bezgen iceṭṭiḍen umeksa i d iruḥen i lehwa

aɣerbaz n lezzayer yeḥfan

ḍallent

yah a takafriwt tafuḥant
