ur issin ula d kra
yečča yas ula d aɛwin is
ad tent seɛfen
d acu yellan gar asent
susem tessudneḍ iyi
yemma jida teṭṭef aẓaṛ tɣil d aḍaṛ
tella kra n yiwet i d ijerḥen
iɣli d uqerru w si naddam
abrid a yegdel i tkeryas
ur ḥezzen ara
izmawen d imexluqen ihuskayen
ɣas ttu
tfakemt aɣ tent
tameṭṭut cergen akk igerzan is d tifexsa ad ten tmerri di tfezza
am izimer aksas ur ikkat ur ixebbec
win i s innan lexla ixla i yexlan d netta
tom yemla i temsulta ayen akk s wayes i yeɛlem
aten a
mi ara tuɣaleḍ ɛeddi si tḥanut
ad kem ḥadreɣ seg ukukru
ɣiwlet ugar
neɣra ɣef tsertit tadamsant unabaḍ
a lḥijab a i cewwel iyi
d ayen i yesḥeznen ul is
yuɣal timendeffirt
ttnadin tamanegt ttun nnif
sqenɛen meṛṛa
tis snat ur tett tagella ala s tamment
iles ur yesɛi ara iɣes akken i s yehwa ad icali
wissen acuɣeṛ
ɛeddi d ad d teṭṭfeḍ tummeẓt n waman
tɣeṣbem tikli
ad tent id tekkseḍ
yuɣ d uqcic iselsa
wwiɣ d tafat s wudem
taḍsa n wuccen s iɣiden
merrḥen
d ifassen n wemcic i yesɛa
d bu txidas keččini
mi teṭṭes tessirt tṛuḥeḍ ad teẓdeḍ
sizdegemt iceṭṭiḍen nwent
lliɣ ttawiɣ yid i n makken kesseɣ deg iɣzeṛ tɛerqubt
tizzit di ccetwa
inuba d yiwen n uɛessas ɣef yedrimen n tejmaɛt deg tadart is
aqader n yilugan n tenhert ɣas ini d ulac it
a win iferzen iḍ ɣef wass
aṭas ara d yasen
nḥemmel tid yesseḍsayen am ǧeḥḥa d banwas
asaru titanic d win yewwin arraz oscar n usaru ifazen
igerrez kullec di tama nwen
neggzent
a leṣlaḥ ṛwaḥ
yella kra i d iḍerrun
i tmeṭṭut d umennuɣ
iḥun fell ak bu lefḍal
yussem mliḥ tom anaɣ
ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i d tekkrem
ttraǧuɣ kan ad fakken amermeɣ i deg ur fhimeɣ acemma
ad d yawi i umeɣlal asfel n uḥussu n ddnub
ad iyi d serḥen ad urareɣ
ur d yegri ara k d yessukkes yiwen
nekk ɣas ini ḥefḍeɣ tuɣac n ferḥat merra
ckenter
ddmen t zgelli
yeqbel ad yexdem akk ayen tebɣa
yesɛa tlata n yisetma s sennig s
teɣli d swaswa
d alɣem n tom
xeddmeɣ deg lfirma
yekker umɣar amcum iger d nnehta
ruḥeɣ iman iw ur nniɣ i yiwen
aṭas n yedrimen i iṣerref kra yessikil
nettett
siwel iyi d ma teḥwaǧeḍ iyi
ziɣ yesserka tt win tt iwwin
nniɣ as iḍ yelhan
tbeqqu ad temmeslay yid s
ttxil m qqim
d anect a kan
seg iseggasen n walfin d asawen i yebda ccna n teqbaylit yettwaɣay
ččiɣ aɣwelmi ssegraɣ d tinsa
telliḍ tettwaɛerḍeḍ
aha ziɣ ẓẓeg d tagut
ad tt id yemmekti
lḥeqq is n ucafaɛ ittalas aseggas
din i t id tekcem tikti n umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt
yella kra n tɣawsa i ixuṣṣen
tekker terbaɛt i lebni n wis sin amzun mačči d yiwen n ubrid i ḍefren
ma ad ḥerken
rnu weɛɛed iyi d kra nniḍen
tettaɛraḍ ad tecnu i yiman is deg uxxam
ur nettcuddu ur nfessi
nniɣ as i tom ayen iss i ɛelmeɣ
akken ma llan zedɣen di temdint
ad tent id kksent
akken kan almi qrib ad teččar txabit nni
tuḍnem
bɣiɣ ad d fɣeɣ d taṭbibt iwakken ad dawiɣ arrac ihelken
si mḥemmed ifka asfel deg udrar iɛreḍ d atmaten is ad ččen
ixef ik deg uwlew
acku tura kan i d wwḍen ad sefrurin tidyanin
dɣa yunef as
ttarun as tibratin yal aseggas
ddunit akk d talexxaxt
a wi iẓṛan acuɣeṛ
terriḍ as tent id
dayen teddez tebrez
daymi i iqeddec ula deg yiṣenfaṛen n usideg n kra n yidigan d yifecka n tsenselkimt
sɛiɣ kan lehḍur agi
ur qqaṛet i yiwen
tutlayt inu d taqbaylit
akka kan dayen
ssenseɣ tafat
ma d kenwi ad yi tilim d tagelda n lmuqeddmin d lǧens imqeddes
kul ḥedd ɣer win is maɛduṛ
efk iyi tagnit iḍen
llan sin iberdan akken ad tkecmeḍ kra n tmurt u ad tt terreḍ ddaw uḍar amenzu d asekkin ma d wayeḍ d ṭṭlaba
d tagnit ideg mlalen akk yinelmaden ɣer tama n yiselmaden nsen akked yiselmaden d yinemhalen iqdimen ixedmen deg uɣerbaz a
aql i ctaqeɣ ad lseɣ taqendurt tajdidt ad ffɣeɣ yis s gar medden
kemm d tamehtuft
d awezɣi ad wenseɣ askiɛew n wucanen
bḍant awen tent id
yenṭeq ar uqcic ameɣbun yenna as
rruḥ amaynut ara k yeǧǧen ad tesɛuḍ asirem deg tudert
cukkeɣ nezmer ad nemɛawan
abrid yenǧer ɣer tesdawit akken ad iɣer
nnan as ulac win i ɣ isxedmen
i wacu iyi tugadeḍ
iqbayliyen ḥemmlen tutlayt nsen
d adfel
ur neṭṭqemt ara ɣer tom
ugur amenzu d taɣuri
ad tent seɛfent
ayen tebɣiḍ tefkeḍ as ad inazeɛ
srid seg sṭif
kfan lehdur gar aneɣ ul iw si lǧiha k nɣiɣ t
acḥal tekkiḍ tuḍneḍ
aram ur t tesɛiḍ
d ayen yessefraḥen nezzeh imi d ayen ara d yernun tabɣest i warrac nneɣ
aṭas i teksa taɣaṭ tura teqqen takrabaṭ
d aɣbel is wagi
seɣtit t
lutu ur k d ittak yiwen
kcem ar usganfu
ḥemmleɣ timucuha n taḍsa
ḥulfaɣ i tedmarin is ɣef tid iw
ay at lḥif xas cfut
ad s nini d yir leḥmala
yečča taɛṣebant iɛedda yeẓẓel
tesfaqem tent id
yiwen ur yeɛlim s wakka
mel iyi d anida tt teqbaylit deg ulugu a amaynut
jeqqmem
ma nɣil ad t nesɛu ad yafeg ad aɣ yettu
i tikkelt tamenzut i heddren ɣef yisental n tudert
llan kra qqaren yemmut wiyaḍ qqaren ur yemmut ara
aṭas i d iɛreḍ ɣer tmeɣra n zzwaǧ is
nudaɣ fell asen ufiɣ ten
iḍarren iw gersen
ur mmuten ara
yeṭṭef tarkent
iwala ten id rebbi
segmi meẓẓiyeɣ ulac acu iyi ttaɛǧaben deg wayen i ḥemmlent akk tizya w
d ikeddaben ur d ineɣmasen
ma mmuteɣ ǧiɣ d leɛmara baba k irgel umkan is
awer teẓreḍ aɣyul aderɣal
ɛeddi ɣer zdat
maca ur ttɣiman ara alamma fukkent d akk tlawin tarda ṛuḥent d syin
qquren yigran nneɣ
yefka d afus
aqeccaḍ deg wallen im
a t an yenser deg ddqiqa
ɣur i taɣaḍt tecfa d i tṛad mgal fransa
cfan ɣef ubrid i yettawin ar taddart nni
yebda leqdic agi ɣef lɛecra n yiḍ
tamdint tamecṭuḥt anida tezdeɣ mazal teṭṭes
i ma yeẓra t d uletma s dayen tenger
imeqqeṛ d s teqbaylit
limmer kan ǧǧan tt ad texdem nettat tezmer i umdegger
tella ɣur s aṭas n tissas
robinson crusoe yufa d iman is weḥd s deg yiwet n tegzirt
simmal heddren
taferracit a ɣlayet aṭas
d bab n tṛamit
ad as nnḍen am ugraw
d wid uɣerbaz alemmas i ixeddmen ikayaden d imezwura
tecbeḥ s wayen yellan deg s nettqabel yes s ayen yuɛren
cedhaɣ kem aṭas
a tin iwumi zzin waman
i snat di leɛqeli iw reggint
tessekna ttɛebga idis
teɛweq amek ara texdem
ad isuɣ
ṭṭfeɣ tamrart deg ufus iw
ldi d tawwurt a win yefren da
heḍren yid neɣ
d kemmi a yemma
ḍfeṛ tirga k
gar yimelli d ufaṛeẓ
ad yeggan ad yettnerni
imuqel itt miḥyaf yenna as yak nniɣ am nekk isem iw miḥyaf win ixedmen kra ad t yaf
ad rfuɣ
yezmer yuba ad iseww
iqemmuden iqeṛmuden imectuqa n yiḥbuben abziz abziz i yiwen
ini d aah
iruḥ as nnudam
ad sent t tɛeṛḍem
tezzuzzen it armi yeṭṭes
ḥebseɣ aseɣti dayen ur zmireɣ
ur d ttawi ara tawiɣt
wicqa ma txedmem as ifelfel aberkan
ad sent t id yawi
tuɣem d tabagust deg tḥanut nni

reglen fell as yiberdan
yerra d azal
yak meqqar d fransa i ten isetɛemren
ikad iyi d d ayla w
ulamma
ulac leḥzen ulac imeṭṭi
nwan ddunit d awal kan
tazmert im tettrejdil
ḥemleɣ ad ɣreɣ idlisen
yečča t wul is
akken tesseklasem i tferreḥ yes wen teqbaylit
akken ad d nemmekti
bab n ddreɛ itett nnfeɛ
ad d issers ṛebbi tagertilt n ṛṛeḥma
yettruẓ iyi aqerru tom mara ihedder
tafgurt d ayen swayes tettḥasaf teɣdemt win ixedmen kra
ur cfin ara fell as
ccɣel ur t tesɛiḍ
yerra d nnehta tom
lameɛna mi iwala yekker d waḍu yugad
d acennay i yella
ur yelli ideg ara tessetḥiḍ
anda i tebɣiḍ ad nruḥ
tuget n yilemẓiyen ass a ur d cliɛen ara
d kemm ara t yesfaqen ma tkemmleḍ akka
aman ttzidin rennun ɣef lqaɛa
yettgalla tom ɣef mary
skud tettnadiḍ ad tafeḍ
isderɣel iten leɛceq
yezga yi d userwal agi swaswa
tḥarem
mbeɛb irna d gma s afus is iṭṭef deg ugerz n meẓyan
illu yexdem ayen yelhan i lqiblat nni agdud ittzid irennu di lǧehd
d tullist i d bdiɣ rriɣ tt ɣer rrif am yiḍrsen iw akk
zik yeshel ad d tessufɣeḍ tasfift
ad yili d taɣawsa iqedsen nezzeh i umeɣlal
nekk d ameɣlal illu nsen
tedda yaɣ di nneqma
ẓriɣ amek tceɣleḍ
cukkeɣ igerrez
ḥesset mliḥ
beṛka ken targit
ẓedmen d fell aɣ
ahat d nutni
yeqqur uqerruy nneɣ
yuba iḥulfa yehlek
jeddi tkent mazal it yehlek
baba hah kan mi yeǧǧa ddexxan
icennu yuba neɣ ala
wa yedder wa yemmut
asmi gerzen leɛwam ur nessin leswam
ad kecmeɣ lḥebs ad ifak kullec fell i
ad ruḥeɣ ad awen ǧǧeɣ tamurt i yesserwalen arraw ines
nnumeɣ ḥedd ur y iḥemmel
gar yiswiyen n ugraw a asaru d asebɣes d tmerna n ufud i wid ixeddmen ssinima taqbaylit
drus maḍi ara yeẓṛen
tewwet d tenga thudd it
ɣunfan kem
wali akk ileqman beta
tamdint tuɣ texla
iruḥ
ečč ad k iḥaseb
timura n ddunit akk n ufrux
di lweqt nni d ikanɛaniyen i yezedɣen tamurt
s nnɛami ččuren ikufan
atan iṣeffer unefray taggara n temlilit
ḥulfaɣ ḍaɛeɣ
imiren ur gziɣ ara i wacu i xeddmeɣ akken
xedmeɣ ayen akken i yi d tenniḍ
yiwen deg sen
tanemmirt i yillu
mačči wagi iḍla yaɣ tamɛict
ur tecfi ara fell asent
allen nwen ttwalint imeẓẓuɣen nwen sellen

ɛum kan
iger itt id gar ifasen is

wid yekkin s wudem unsib deg uqeddic

ayen akk yellan di ddunit ad immet

yerwa tiyita

iqubel aḥeǧǧaju n tmes

zemleɣ

azen d ṣwab i cnawi

ma nniɣ i yiwen ṛuḥ ad iṛuḥ
summen isudal timenna
teǧǧa axxam nsen ur d tuɣal tameddit ur d tuɣal timeddiyin i d iḍefren
deg leqdic nwen

skud tqublem yal taswiɛt
ruḥen ɣer lebḥer
anfemt iyi
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ azekka
lebɣi nwen ma yella d amaɣud ma yella d aheggar beggnet t id
acḥal d abrid i yewweḍ ɣer yimi n lmut
uccen d abrid kan i yettwaɣlaḍ
yettḥussu s kra n leqriḥ
ad xedmeɣ lutu i yiman iw d win iyi id iqesden mi ara fakeɣ leqraya
lemmer ur nniɣ ad d iniɣ
ilaq ad ɣṛeɣ
yeccucef deg lbir zemzem
ad kkiwen ifadden s leḥzen ad ruḥeɣ
nekkat akk tazmert nteɣ s lbunyat
texṣi tcemmaɛt is deg teswiɛt
ur mxallafeɣ ara

ur ḥwiǧeɣ ara ad iyi d tesmektiḍ
ad ḍelbeɣ deg wen leɛnaya
d yeɛqub mmi s n zabdi akked gma s yuḥenna
ɛyiɣ seg yinejmaɛen

ur lliɣ d iriẓri
ukren as idrimen

imiren ad iṣfu
ilaq ad nessebɣes ilmeẓyen ad xedmen taẓuri

yeɛreḍ amek ara tt id yerr ar leɛqel is akken ad tethedden
ula d lmakla ttawin as tt ɣer wusu
qqim deg talwit

senqeṣ ṣṣut ik

zeyyed as

abṛaham itlef hagaṛ akked ismaɛil ṣara twala aqcic nni i d tesɛa hagaṛ tamaṣrit i abṛaham ittaḍṣa

werǧin i teɛciq
yasuɛ issečč ṛebɛalaf n yirgazen
ziɣen iɣelli swab deg tmara
yerreẓ
ad as t id yawi azekka
ečč iten tura
tuklaleḍ nnig n waya
yettban d yuba d ameẓẓyan
aql i am win i yeffulḥen ar xalt is
yewɛer ad tt teẓreḍ
ttaruɣ as tibratin yal ass
telmed leqran
tameṭṭut nni fessusen iḥedqen
kker seg usu
d rray ik i ak tt igan
tibeḥyar ttwaqelɛent
d lbaḍna
axaṭer zewǧen akk yid s
acḥal i nurar ilqafen
nɣant asent t
sseṛɣent iyi tt
tom ur ilaq ara d aselmad
ma d nnif is yečča t deg usandwič
ad ixaṣ tom
taɣiwant n ayt yeḥya musa
yezmer ad yeddu yid i
nuɣal d seg ustṛalya
ntess kullec
tefkiḍ tt akk i jjiḥ
a tin yeḍran yid m
yella kra n yiwen i iheddṛen
dduqseɣ d s umɛuqqu iyi d yulin
i lukan ulac lukan
semmum uyefki nni
ad as t tefkemt
ttɛawazen
rdan t
ur yurar ara axaṭer yella yejreḥ
neqqen
amɣaṛ ma wesser yezga yettader mi ilheq asawen din ad immuɣben
ad yili lhemm yermel yessekfel it id lhermel
axir k ad tṛuḥeḍ
tzewǧemt deg tmurt
ad iruḥ wakali
nessaram ad d nssader ssuma
yezmer lḥal
ad teqqim din iman is
tsawlem d
ahat ad xaṣṣen xemsa si xemsin nni n iḥeqqiyen
aredmani d inelmaden n tesnawit
ad s tt tefk
a dda ɛli
isem iw amayes
amek ara tegzuḍ amdan
ayagi meṛṛa inna t id yasuɛ i lɣaci s temɛayin
ɣer daxel i tewwet znezla
iban d wabu
tɛedda fell as
yal yiwen ad yemmeslay s yisem is
ma yella seg tama nneɣ ula d nekni nuklal asteɛfu seld aseggas n uxeddim iweɛṛen
smaɛil mmi s amenzu n yahuda yella d amcum zdat n umeɣlal
ur aɣ yenfiɛ ma nahḍer ur yenfiɛ ma nessusem
nnan d nettkukru ten seg zik
sutret ad wen d ittunefk
ata uyefki k
d ddheb neɣ d lǧameɛ yettarran ddheb d imreddes
siwel asen kan ad d kecmen
asɣar inu yeqwan d aquran deg tegrest ssaɣayen yis s timas
ḥemmleɣ tt
teǧǧa d aṭas n wawalen yettuɣalen deg yiznan i tsuta i d iteddun
zhu
anwa i tessneḍ
d acu i tent iwwin ɣur s
mudd iyi d kilu n lxux
ɛni tettḥessisem asen i widak
ad nefru awal s wawal mačči s wuzzal
ur ssinent kra
aɣyul meskin
kkes aɣilif i wul ik
yella kra i teẓṛamt
iṛuḥ asen
amek i tga latay agi
ad t tleqqmem
d amɣid seg wasmi i d ikker leɛmer i inuda ad yerbeḥ
gguman ad ẓẓren deg i tameṭṭut
yuɣal tom d aderwic
tesliḍ s wakka
truḥ ur teẓri sani la tessaram tcennu
yurad wudem s useɣwen yegzem s tfukal yezdem ɣef ugudi yezḍem
yerra tt i ucali
yasuɛ inna as ṛuḥ akkin fell i a cciṭan
zerweɣ
unfeɣ i tfekka w ad tefsi s uslufu s ḥninen
fɣeɣ seg uxxam rfiɣ
si tama nniḍen llan wid yettmesteqsayen ma yella deg tiɣriwin a ulac lebɣi i usexreb n usaḍuf n ugama
fkiɣ awen kullec
issaweḍ meyya u sebɛa u ṛebɛin n iseggasen di leɛmeṛ is
lliɣ bɣiɣ ad ad d ṭṭfeɣ agḍiḍ maca ufiɣ ziɣ mačči d ayen isehlen
isneqlab timdinin nni akked izuɣar meṛṛa
ad ɣ t id yawi
d asenfaṛ yelhan
ur wwiḍeɣ la igenni la lqaɛa
tafaska ad tili seg kraḍ n tmerwin d yiwen yulyu ar ukuẓ ɣuct sin n wagimen d mraw d tẓa
tṛuḥ tettmenṭar deg uneẓruf n bir cibaɛ
ad lemdent tutlayt taqbaylit
xedmen i tbanta nni tizuraz s ddheb yeṣfan ẓḍan tent am wemrar
yesbedd tom yiwet ara s d ixeddmen ad yečč
suffɣet tent akk
tella kra n tɣawsa i tebɣamt
sefreḥ it seḥzen it seḍs it
iwala tent id rebbi
ur iswi tamuzzunt
anita i d taɣect n tayri akk i tḥemmleḍ
batwil iǧǧa d ribka
awer yaf i yettmenni
mmektaɣ d ayen i iyi d tenniḍ
kemmlem aɣenni
yunef asent ad ɛeddint
gulleɣ s jmaɛliman ma tuɣ m ixef iw
ur ittwaṭṭaf ujenwi si leqḍaɛ
ddunit am lmesbeḥ tettaɣ txessi
err aɣenbur ik
ɣunfan ten
tamusni nsen d aɣilif lemḥiba nsen d asawen
ad ak yini kker ad tt id nesker
ad tent amnen
tedda yid sen ar yiger
irra yas nekk d ɛisu mmi k amenzu
ur tessinem ara tasertit
qaren zzwaǧ n bessif d aṭṭan ur nesɛi ddwa
axaṭer tudert n mkul lxelq d idammen nni yellan deg s
deg tejmaɛt mi d tɛeddaḍ tiṭ ur ad kem tzeggel
ḥemmleɣ ad xedmeɣ yid k
yessaweɛ itt udfel
inna asen d aɛdaw i ixedmen akka
lbaz d lbaz lɛac is d isɣaṛen
tamaɣra ur tt smaɣren ara
iban ad yexser kan
ad as d yesseḥbes takarrust s unehhar i yettagaden rebbi
umneɣ ken
mi meqqeṛ uqcic tekkes as yemma s tuṭṭḍa
ceggɛeɣ tt s axxam
arrac lemmden ur ẓrin
ad ḥerzen lumuṛ iw akken ur ttawin ara ddnub
ad ten id uqmen
sersen ten s iḍarren n yasuɛ dɣa yesseḥla ten
muḥend saɛid amlikec d ageldun n yimedyazen
win ur d nenṭiq yeqbel
d acu n yimmal ara tesɛuḍ yid s
temɛin mliḥ
ittbeddil am tata
yenɣa yi tent
tufiḍ iman im yid neɣ
ur yezmir ara ad yernu akala afessas
yeqqers uḍellaɛ is
i asen d yeqqimen ḥala ssber
gen di talwit a gma raab sliman d awezɣi ad k nettu
sarameɣ fukken fell am iɣeblan
ḥwaǧeɣ aselkim
xir ma iruḥ ɣer ɛarafa
tebɣiḍ ad teččeḍ
zemreɣ
d tigi i d tisutriwin nkent s umata
nekk d akanadi
tettfuḥumt
awal n taggara swayes ara nessali tadiwennit a
teɣṛiḍ t yark
ad s tiniḍ telbiḍ deg uɣenǧa
yettaru s tutlayt taqbaylit
ass nni d yir ass
burǧ mira d almus n tɣiwant n tsekriwt deg ugezdu n bgayet
itett uqjun nwen
nniɣ deg yiman iw ahat d lawan fell i ad imɣureɣ
tasedda d tawtemt n yizem
d tamɛayt n ufellaḥ d yinisi
d acu i tettxemmimeḍ akka
ɣelḍeɣ deg waya
ad m ten teɛṛeḍ
ɣas ini d awezɣi
ur ssinen ara
ad as tini rkeb a lalla
teḍṣa
ayen i tzerɛem ad t tmegrem
turew d akniwen
ay uzyin serǧ i uɛudiw zwir d ay itbir
la itenneḍ di lxaṭeṛ iw
nefka tagnit i widak i yebɣan ad d rnun ɣer tudsa agi
tiqsiḍin teqqar sdaxel d wungalen
taweṭṭuft tezzuɣer alɣem
ɛawen iman im
tḥennec it d ɣer ɣur s
rseɣ d si tmacint
mi iwala lɣaci yasuɛ yuli s adrar dɣa yeqqim dinna
zedment d
ẓẓulen akk
di lweqt nni llan leɣwal di ddunit
maɛlic ma ččiɣ yid k dagi
iga deg s annar
ziɣ sin wulawen i tesɛiḍ
ddu sya
a wer yili waɛtur gar aneɣ
yettseṭṭil tamar yal ass
medden si tteqdim n zzman ttemɛawanen di ddunit nsen
tenqeccaɛ tagut
yeɣra ɣef yixef is
tuɣaleḍ d deg tibet
ih d baba
ad ɣ ten tefkem
laban inuda meṛṛa aqiḍun lameɛna ur yufi acemma
ɛni zwaren kem
yuzzel lekdeb deg yimi k
kemm d tilemẓit
rnumt
mazal nettkemmil leqdic ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
nsureg asen i waman
nɣan ḥimi d ɛemran lewḥayed n teqcicin
d acu yella yettwali tom
iruḥ seg uxxam i tella uletma s
leqdic nneɣ ɣas akken d ussnan mazal it deg timmeɣnest acku ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit kan ara nqeddec
tesɛiḍ imru azeggaɣ
i d tettheyyi tdukkla tadelsant adrar n fad
i wumi ten imeslayen agi
ma twalaḍ yiwen icudd aseɣwen ini yas mebruk aɛmam ik
tfakk aɣ tent
iḥṣel lemdek di lfuci
ikemmel iyi zman aɣeddaṛ
di leɛnaya nwen susmem

anda ken a leqbayel
twala t yeḥbes deg wunnig wisrebɛa
tkellxem fell i
ɣaben
turǧa azal n tsaɛet tɛawed tessawel
allaɣ yettarew d ccḥani
ddunit i yelhan ad am tt id muddeɣ
anṣuf yes m ɣer marikan
ad k tent yefk
d ccaɣub ameqqran
urgant
urgaɣ targit tessewḥac
ad sbeɣsen asenfar a ilan tixutert meqqren i teqbaylit
a rabaḥ zzi d udem k ad nerbeḥ
ur truḥuɣ ara akkit
isexṛeb as leryaḥ
acu i d iwwin ih ɣer ala
ad sen tt yeɛṛeḍ

ad yeqqim deg umezruy
tekkat deg wul is tmeɣra
yerfed imru yura asefru
yezmel
idɣaɣen is akk mmuten
wtet afus a lɣaci
yedda d yid kent
tiɣrit n tmeṭṭut d aḍellel i teṭṭellil
lameɛna ass wis tlata ad d iḥyu
tthadar kan iman im
teɣriḍ kra n yidlisen igerrzen tineggura ya
d awezɣi ad crurdeɣ daxel n uzabuq a ineqqen i tis kraḍ
ad tawḍem ayen i tettmennim
mazal ssewwayyen timellalin deg lkanun
ad dduklent yid i
ullis i d yeddan deg s iḥekku d ɣef yiwen ilemẓi iwumi qqaren lusyus
yemmug
akka akk i d qqaren
učči ḥawla yessaḍan
wagi d acqirrew ɣef wid yakk i as iqqaren d akken taqbaylit ur tezmir ara i tussna
cukkeɣ tettnuddumem
msenfalen s yidim
nɣeb ɣembu ulac bubbu
tfulki
ad twaliḍ ayen yeffer zzman ɣef wallen
balak ad k ɛeǧben yisɣan d llebsa lsan
iḥemmel itt
yuba yettban iḥar
d iseɛdiyen at wulawen yeṣfan axaṭer ad walin illu
aṭas aya ur as d yemmeslay yiwen am maziɣ
d ul iw i tmeḥneḍ
a yemma a wi ṛuḥen s axxam n yizem ad t yissin
kemmini meẓẓiyeḍ ma d nekk ixef iw icab
yuzen awen in tabrat
igḍaḍ ttafgen s yiferrawen nsen
wid teɛna temsalt n waya ad d fkeɣ imedyaten yelhan ɣef wanect agi
ur d isawel ara
lmakla n yirden tezzuzur udem
zaɛma xedmen tagrawla
nekki a t an ur sɛiɣ kra
zik d amaṭṭaf nni kan n uwanak ẓer it neɣ eǧǧ it
ǧeṛǧeṛ yessawel i uheggaṛ
tettidir kan tamara tettidir bla iswi
ad tissin taqbaylit
ih ftin yemdanen maca ulac win yextaren ad d ilal
raɛuwil mmi s n busmat tameṭṭut n ɛisu
taɛewwajt di lecɣal
iqeṭṭu d yal s axxam
yekker umulab i tlafsa

ih leddin ass n ssebt
musa iṣubb s agdud ihdeṛ asen
iqucc iyi maḍi
illa daɣen di tmurt nni bdilyum akked uẓru n unix
ma izzi i udɣaɣ ad d yawi ayla s
ufiɣ d azrem deg ubrid yenɣa t usemmiḍ
ttut tt
luleɣ deg taddart iqemmuden
ad neqqerṣ si ɛeggu
dacu tebɣa ad tini

ass a ḍḥiɣ fecleɣ ɛyiɣ

mi sliɣ i lxiḍ yeṣṣerser
ad wen tt fkent
izmer ad yexdem akka tom neɣ xaṭi

glan yes k
lbaz iɛac sufella s tasekkurt deg yiẓuran is
d lɛali mliḥ w ismuzegten i uẓawan

amar ma beddleɣ tamurt
yiwen ur t ẓriɣ am kečč

nekk d amejjay di taɣult n tarrawt
nteddu yawent di nneqma
asefru ɣur s talɣa iman is

yemmut madani ur run walaken
tawwurt n tzeqqa temdel bururu ɣef useklu
ilaq ad neddu ɣer sdat ur nettɣimi ara kan deg uqdim aklasiki
ala ay akli d nekk i d ddayxa ur telli tayeḍ
yeḥbes ddexxan tom

ad tezzenzem iman nwen

txedmeḍ
aru kra

ad k tt id tawi
ɣas nezmer ad nidir deg umtiweg n meɣres ilaq qbel ad naweḍ ɣer din
d wigi i d arraw n ɛada tameṭṭut n ɛisu
yella wayen tebɣiḍ ad yi d tiniḍ
myagreɣ iḍelli d lwiza
jeddi ilul d setti mazal
acuɣer i yi txedɛeḍ

ttxil kent ḥebsemt

argu din

rnant yid s cwami
ṣṣura i icebḥen texṣer

yella win i yukren iṣuṛdiyen iw
ama d asideg afares n ugbur umḍin afares n yisefka isnilsanen neɣ taneflit n yifecka imaynuten s teqbaylit
din i ten tuɣ
txedmeḍ ccɣel ik
gen di talwit a gma ḥamudi yeḥya d awezɣi ad k nettu
mkul ddkeṛ seg warraw n haṛun ad yečč seg s
iban am yiṭij
tella tin ara d yekkren azekka zik
ayen i txedmeḍ ad t tafeḍ
nusa d yakan akken ad naǧew lqut

sɛut tirrugza

ihi
kra ur t ufin

aḥemmel ass mi i t id bedreɣ
tuḍen
d kunwi ara irebḥen
a tafat ur d i d tṣaḥeḍ
ad iyi tt tefkemt
takuski ines iman is
d lqella n uksum i yesseknafen turin
ad ččeɣ akka cwiya

efk aɣrum i iẓawaliyen

nutni ɣur sen akud yesɛa azal

ur ttettu ara tilifun m
tettaru yas tibratin yal aseggas

ad d ikkes akk tassemt nni ad d iseddu tigeẓẓal
lmal agugam yufa tili lemmer zmireɣ ad ten id sneṭqeɣ am akken i ten id yessenṭeq esope la fontaine d slimane ɛazem ahat ad d inin am rrezg nneɣ iṭij abeḥri tili

d win n ṣṣeḥ
ad tt id mmagren

argaz yettwaṭṭaf seg yiles

iḥemmel ad iserreḥ i yiles is s taɛrabt akken ad d iwet deg ayetma s
ad tent tleqqmeḍ
terfed s tadist dɣa tesɛa d ḥanux
tga tt
yerna ttrajun akk deg s ad ten tessuffeɣ deg yir tudert i ttidiren
tuker as d amecwar send ad yerr tadimt i wallen is
nekk ad qucceɣ tamurt
seg wayen i yi d teseqqaḍ ṛwiɣ
d netta i d yemmalen azrireg n tigawin
nteg
limer ur ḥmin ara yidammen iw ur iyi tettarra ara tmara ɣer wanect a
yerna d nekk i as yefkan ttiɛad
tebɣiḍ ad m d sseḥmuɣ winna
tsebɣemt asent tent
anwa i iḥemmlen ddabex n uḍaṛ
qqlet d
ad ilin diɣen i lmendad n tkeryas i iḥebbsen ɣer tama n yiɣerbazen
tekker d di lḥif
ṛɣant tzemrin
wagi d yiwen n umedya n tsuqqilt is
aqbayli i yefkan tudert is i taɣuct taqbaylit
d tamurt n baba i cedheɣ
nettat yettenfufudenyeknan yuḥwaǧen tayet is ad tsened fell as
yuba d aɣezfan
ihi ad ak d iniɣ ula d nekk ad ak d iniɣ tanmirt imi iyi d tḥesseḍ zgelli
n wi t ilan
seḥmu iman ik
aṭas i awen yessan taẓerbit seddaw as d isennanen
yeḥbes ddexxan
axaṭer mi ara ṛuḥent ad swent ulli nni sseḍfarent
iḥell iyi ad qqimeɣ
tettumt d acu i sen txedmemt
ttu taneglizit
d tin i cedheɣ i yi ittun
yesseɣli i ufzim ṛṛqem
akka d wid i t id iḥeṛṛen
yella ḥedd i yeṛẓan taṣewaṛt iw
iṭṭef d yuba amkan
ur nekker ara
aẓ d ar da
ur tettmuqqulem ara ɣer deffir
eǧǧ iyi ad kecmeɣ
ad iyi ten tɛeṛḍem
imerreḥ
axaṭer seg urrif nni i rfan nɣan irgazen
di leɛnaya m steqsi ḥedd nniḍen
tezgiḍ ɣef tugniwin n yinaẓuren
ɛellqen isegras yeɣyal
leɛtab ur ittwaḥsab
ur ak tcuḥḥ ara ddunit
innuɣben am ugayemru
yessenta d aqamum is fell i
amek i ten ufan
deg uxxam s kra yekka yiḍ ur tent yeqqin
ili k d abɣas
usan d ɣer wudem ik
ad yaweḍ lexbar leḍyur lbaz yečča taǧaret is
yuba yeɣleḍ
argaz d amehraz tameṭṭut d asbeddi n tissas
ad myeẓḍaḥeɣ yid s
taqbaylit ladɣa i mi teddem amennuɣ ɣef teqbaylit
d anta tt tagi ihi
yettasem acemma
tettruḍ
iccud yimi s
d lferḥ n lebda
ur ittqabal ḥedd azrem ɣeṛ lɣaṛ
s tezwatin kan i d ḥeǧben iger nni nsen
nehṛeɣ
ad n aseɣ ad ken ɣafṛeɣ
ur ssinent ara tasdawit n bgayet
nṛuḥ ssbeḥ zik ass a
tezgamt tettɣamamt ar tewwurt
yumayen telteyyam ad tt id neddem ad tt nezwi ɣer uɣerbal s yiwen n uqeccaḍ neqqar as tamezwayt
teččam lekwaɣeḍ nwen
twalamt
nefleɣ
tifednin a inek
yiwen was ad akem id mlileɣ
dɣa ass a a t an sɛiɣ zzheṛ ɣriɣ t ula d nekk
ata yusa d nettṛaǧu t seg iḍelli
sarameɣ ad sɛunt ixxamen yelhan
ikna lqedd nwen
imiren issufɣ d cimɛun iwwi yasen t id
teggurreɛ d mary
ameɣlal iǧǧa t
d acu i t iwwin ɣur s
kamal ḥemmadi yura daɣen tizlatin s taɛrabt i kra icennayen
teɛreḍ akken ad as tessettu aya
werǧin yettu ass deg iwala i tikelt tamezwarut sliman azem
teqqen ɣer tlelli ines
ukren t di lpusṭa
sawleɣ ulac win iyi d yerran awal
ufhim s tiṭ ungif s lhezz am teɣliḍt
a tameqqunt n leḥbaq ccḍeḥ im ass a yeḥdeq
syen akkin ad zellin tisigert i ugdud
tesseṛɣeḍ aɣ ten
atta tewweḍ d nnuba w
xdem s ttawil
ismigliz am igider ameṛẓu
ad truḥem
sawel as d ad asen ileqqem
anda tufeg i ters
win ixeddmen tameslayt yeqqen ɣer laṣel ad t yexdem akken ilaq lḥal mebla ma yekkat deg wiyaḍ
iles is d uḥdiq ul is d uḥriq
acu yellan
xedmeɣ kan ayen i yi d tennam
d acu n ddwa i k d ifka umejjay
isellek d iman is yerwel yeṭṭef abrid yezger weḥd s
amulli w mačči d ameggaz tikelt a
ur awen yebni ara axxam
ur d icliɛ ara yidir si tullas
limaṛa agi ad d teḍru azekka
kkset tt
telḥeq d tefsut
terwi s usemmiḍ
ma ṭṭfent aɣ nemmut nemmut
tḍul lɣerba nwen
din i yeṭṭes
yasuɛ zdat n kayafa lmuqeddem ameqqran
init asen anwi d nekni
ad iger afus is deg yiwen seg yiflan yeččuren taxxamt nni
ur yebɣi ara ad d isel
ur tesɛi ara tilelli
iẓẓad itterra awren ɣer tessirt
d acu kan mi ara yesexdam umdan tameslayt nni igellu d s ubeddel deg tseddast
ǧǧiɣ ak d tazmilt
bɣiɣ ad k id sleɣ tettsuɣuḍ
d asterter
tsebɣem as tent
syenna yasuɛ ikemmel abrid
ma ibɣa ṛebbi ad d ifk yessen axxam
n wureɣ
ur nettɛemmid ara i win ara ad d yawḍen ɣer nnif nneɣ
tefka yas t
yella kra i yeḍṛan
ur tetteɣ ara imensi
gezmet agerrum ufermaj n taɣaṭ d tibumdewwrin
d uḍuḍ af leḥyuḍ
ad nawi abrid n yimezwura nneɣ
tayri nsen ur tesɛi ara azemz n tlalit
ad tlemdemt tutlayt taqbaylit s wul nkent
anwa abrid i ilaq ad awiɣ
tettqellibeḍ kra
tedɛa yas yemma s s lxir
lliɣ d abeṛṛani testeṛeḥbem yis i
ḍefṛemt ṛṛay iw
ur truḥ ara armi i t tweṣṣa ɣef kullec
kfan lehduṛ di tayri
ǧeɛfer yettaker tiyuẓaḍ
yessṛeɣ am tent
ɛni la tettruḍ
yeɣli ifeddex uqerru s
aṭas n usisnu i d yemɣin
aṭas i d ssutreɣ
anwa i iɛummen
yezga wudem is yennuɣna
ṭṭef it id
d ibelqecciḍen kan i d mazal din
ur yi ttargu ma teṭṭseḍ
ilaq ad awḍeɣ alma d sbiṭar
mseblan ur ttuhennan
deg iḍudan is i yettɛuddu
rrant awen ten id
smendeg
d tameṭṭut n yidir tihin
d kunwi i yessenṭaqen awal
leḥmala d anadi n sseɛd n wayeḍ
tella tin i d ittmuqqulen deg k
yeldi yiwet n tpizzirya deg iɣil uɛeẓẓug
uletma tennum tettarra ijerriḍen ddaw wawalen ur tessin mara teqqar
yeṭṭeḍ yerwa yemma tezga ɣer ɣur s
imddukal uɣal am wakken llan iseggasen imezwura deg tesdawit
ma twalam uccen
isem iw tom
neɛya kan
tuggad
ula ilmeẓyen n taddart agi fkan d afus n tallelt i wakken ad tili tmeɣra agi
ddan iḍarren is
tḥemmlemt iqjan
efk aɣ ad nsew tiqit n waman
ṣṣifa s ufella ay d terna
terriḍ asen tent id
sfaqent kem id
amkan im iman im
i wid yebɣan ad slen aẓawan aḥlawan n teqbaylit d yisefra zeddigen
ččet teswem
nekk d argaz
ad t id temmager
tettcuddu t s yiwen n umendil annect n ugertil
sliman ɛazem yecna ugar ɣef lɣerba d ddunnit
yefka yi d ttbut ulac acu izemren ad iyi isdukel yid sen
aṛwaḥ ar daki ma ulac aɣilif
ilaq ad tɛejleḍ
tecba akk tisekliwin yellan deg ddunit
ṭṭes tenneqlabeḍ
ur yezmir ara ad yidir iman is
limin uɛeggun deg idmaren is
axeṛṛaz yenɣan mmi s
s taduṭ n yizamaren i yezḍa ubernus
taqsiṭ a teḍra s tidet
rrant asent tent id
tfehmem neɣ ala
d ta i d tafyirt taneggarut i wass a
tutlayt ik d taqbaylit
ur numeɣ ara
d acu kan yal mi ara tɛeddi ɣer umeslay
int as ad yerju
nejbed iman nneɣ
rrem iyi d s wawal
ruḥ ad twaliḍ
ssarden akk iberdan glan ula s tzenqatin
lliɣ yid m qqareɣ nemseɣ di sin tannumi
iḍ agi ad tili tziri
tura kan
d acu d isenfaren i tesɛiḍ sya ɣer sdat
am wakken yella di yal tutlayt ula deg teqbaylit llan waynismawen
twalamt t
ttawḍent d tɣawsiwin
ad netti ul yettaysen
yezmer ad d nini ala
sebleḥ
mazal tettkemmil tigawt n usiḍen n yigḍaḍ n waman
ar k ččeɣ a yaberčečču ilmend n ciccu
uccen dayen ttuɣ t in
fakken akent t
thedder nek la tt ttwaliɣ
leɛtab i ttneḥsab
s imeṭṭi ik yenna abbuh
tuɣaleḍ d aderwic

tiktiwin iw

yerra yasen tt id

yuba txuṣṣ as mary

xedmemt
laẓ ur isɛi aḥbib

aql aɣ neɣli d s lḥecmat
yemlal iken id deg ubrid yedda yid wen
ur ẓṛiɣ ara
ččurent d tirga
yella wayen i k icewwlen neɣ
win ara yessanzen iman is ad ittwarfed
tḍerru akka tikkwal
aṭas i yemmuten
amin ad wen iniɣ wwin lajeṛ nsen
bdiɣ ttɣenniɣ mi lliɣ d abestuḥ
ufant akk iman nsent
ɛni tezweǧ tɣawsa nni
ur tettekk ara tecreṭ zdat tamart
a wi iẓṛan dacu t
immečč d amuddir

ad ddun yid sen
mi yewweḍ ɣer temkerḍit
ad ikemmel wahil deg yimalas wis kraḍ
ttḥadareɣ t
taẓuri tḍul tudert wezzilet
lḥaǧ d nnefṣ tarbaɛt d nnefṣ

ddren meṛṛa

ḥanux idda akked yillu
cfu fell as

dɣa ṣara tmeḥḥen hagaṛ armi i terwel fell as
a rebbi sebber arraw is d uxxam is i kamel ddin fexxar
deg s i rǧiɣ tili

i tin yuɣen sin acu ur tessin

yenneṣṛaɛ tom

ddu kan abrid abrid
ɛas daki yakan

dɣa ttihin fell as

d idammen i yuzzlen ara ɣ yezzmen
d isebbaḍen iw i telsiḍ
ad as tent yeɛṛeḍ
ad ruḥeɣ ɣer tahran
isirkli d lɛesker a ssifil refdet arrac
yes k yeɛmer uxxam iw

ad ten sseɣlin

ad ten tleqqmem

ẓečč tadxent
mi tjerḥeḍ agrez ik mačči d tisselbi i tselbeḍ
irra yas anɛam
xedmeɣ t ass kamel
ur ttekkiɣ di kra uqusis
qrib i tt rriɣ d tameṭṭut iw
bɣiɣ ad sweɣ yiwen n kuka
nḥemmel ad nelmed aẓawan
tasint kan rju ad fakkeɣ
ameqran nni yestkellfen s tissit inṭeq ɣer ferɛun inna as ass agi ad d mmektiɣ ddnub nni i xedmeɣ
ɣur m ad tismiḍ lqahwa m
ad ak d igerrez tazziba

ay ahdum yeḍran
tessuli cabḥa ɣer tewrirt

zgan ttmeslayen ɣef yisental n uẓref ɣef wacu i yeqqar
a win iddren ad am yales
tjerrdeḍ
surf iyi
teẓẓiḍ taxsayt aseggas a
i tlemẓit nni yettwaɣedren s ɣur amddakel is
aseqqamu unnig n timmuzɣa akked tenmehliwin n yidles n twilayin i d nebder
a tt an tettmekti d tugna as
asensu yelhan d win yebnan ɣef yiri n yilel
siwel as d s axxam
summlen leɛḍil meqqren yellan deg usenfar agi n tnezduɣin i la traǧun ugar n xemsa n yiseggasen aya
ur tufiḍ yeqqers ṭṭfer is
sfaqen tt id
ur walaɣ ara anda yeffeɣ tanezzayt a
d aqbayli ihi imi d yenna tanfalit a
talɣa d usentel n uḍris mačči d ufrin
yugi ad kem yettu
si zik ḥemmleɣ kem
kunemti tettneɛtabemt ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
amek armi zegzaw yigenni
baba twen n igenwan yeẓra belli teḥwaǧem ayagi meṛṛa
ḥkan i d ǧǧan warrac si meqran bu teɛyunin
ẓefk iyi tili ǧǧiɣ ak učči
tullist ik d tasekla n tidet tesdukel ccbaḥa n usekkil
teẓẓleḍ d afus ik ayeffus tessebleɛ iten lqaɛa
ur ɣileɣ ara ad d teffeɣ akka
tasekla tarusit d yiwet si tid meqqren deg umaḍal
ḥemmlen seksu
ayen ahat yeẓra dda brahem deg lpari dayen ur tezmireḍ ad teḥsuḍ
ur tseɛɛuḍ ara iṛebbiten nniḍen siwa nekkini
ɣef memmi ay d seqqsan
ruḥ s axxam ik ad testeɛfuḍ
ad d nerr nnehta
tesɛuẓẓgeḍ terriḍ iman im ur d tesliḍ ara
tewwḍeḍ ayen tettmenniḍ
yefka yam abadaṛ
err itt d tabesṭuḥt
isemma i lbir nni ɛisiq yɛni amennuɣ
nwant telha tsertit
fket d tifrat ma d aglam n tegnit dayen neɛya seg s
ur tḥemmlem ara ad theḍṛem d wid ur tessinem ara

fiḥel dexxan
tenɣamt asen ten
mi yelḥeq luṭ ɣer temdint n ṣuɛar icṛeq d yiṭij
ssuɣel aḍṛis a
yella kra i ibeddlen
sami yelḥa
tufa lbaz ara tt yaɣen
isuffeɣ d deg i igig
akken d taḍsa
ur giɣ ara daɣen akken
neɣ d tiẓurin n lɛedni
ad asen t yefk
bniɣ awent axxam
laɛtiq n txabit d amur im a timnifrit
inim t id akken iwata
dacu ara teččem
d taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt nneɣ
ddremt
ur tessineḍ ara nnfeɛ ik
ittak iles iḥerref iḍaṛṛen
da ara sɛeddiɣ iḍ
di leɛnaya k serreḥ iyi ad ṛuḥeɣ akken ad meḍleɣ baba
ad yili yid s neɣ ad yeglu yis s
ad iḥewwes yid sen
yenneḍ ɣef yiman is amzun d inisi nni yegnen di temduct is
beṭṭu n tassa yesnulfuy d lɣec d usḥissef
melmi ad k tẓeṛ
ufiɣ ten
tameṭṭut nni terfed s tadist tesɛa d aqcic
azekka nni sudaba terǧa sdat n uxxam n urgaz n zahra
d acu i d yeḍran akka deg ɛecrin tuḅer
tetteɣ kan lxedṛa
ulac win yugaren dilem ɛli deg tẓuri n tkarikaturin
mi yebna lḥaǧa ad tedrem
tezger mi wḍen ɣer baba s teḥka as acu yeḍran
iḍarren is d ilabbaḍen
ṭṭfent t id
suden wexxer
ugadeɣ
a yemma ḥuzaɣ afus iw s lmus
uḥwaǧeɣ ken ad txedmem yiwet n tɣawsa
ur tettu ara ad tessufɣeḍ leknis
tḍall d seg ṭṭaq
ansa i ffɣent
ama d yemma s ama d yessetma s dehcent akk deg s
seffeɣ iten id
win iɣlin ad tt ddun fell as
tezmer ad teddu yid nteɣ
win yeččan deg ass ur iḍurr yiwen
win ijeṛben tasa ad yens anida nensa
tluɛa yas
yiwen n wass ad n tuɣaleḍ
ɣas akken meẓẓi maca lebɣi s meqqar
sru neɣ qqim yiwen nsen
tella tin i tebɣiḍ ad teẓṛeḍ
ur ssineɣ ameɣlal ur ttserriḥeɣ i wat isṛayil ad ṛuḥen
rnu d ɣuṛ nneɣ
tella tin i ɣ d iṭṭafaṛen
iḍla yas abux
a tin yesfeclen ul iw
tuɣ d newwara amendil i yemma s
ur ɛyint ara seg yiɣimi
ad tili tezrigt a tamaynut gar seɛṭac ar setta u ɛecrin deg yulyu i d itteddun deg taddart n saḥel
refdeɣ afniq nni
ččan taxbizt iman nsen
bɣiɣ aselkim
ur as ttḥulfuɣ ara
yelli ɣef s teḍher tafat
qaren argaz bu nnif ɣlay ɣer medden yeswa
ad tafeḍ iniɣman anda ttqeggilent wulli
ur nezṛi acu i d ayennat
suɣ ugar
tettnejbad ɣer ɣur s s kra kra

yerra iman is d asaḍ

axemt

aqli yi seg wid nni tenɣiḍ

anallas ur tt id yenni ara almi d tagara
ad zwireɣ di rric is

a lzzayer ncalleh ad teḥluḍ ad tuɣaleḍ am zik nni

 ayɣer aqcic a ur yettru ara
ayen akk i as teqqar neɣ i d tebder
kečč tettneɛtabeḍ ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
tusa tt id tarda
d kečč i d asaḍ iw
ad sermimzen adrar i taqbaylit s tirugza
a tadyant yid i yeḍran
lebni s yella d si lebni n lqesba ɣer da
glan yes i
kkes taberriḍt ik
yeẓra belli ad immet
yiwen n wul yeqqar err akka wayeḍ yeqqar err akkin
ad yezzem imi n teslit ur isel i lehḍur is
yewwa wučči
furseɣ tagnit tamezwarut iyi d yettunefken
cwiṭ kan acemma tefrawes am win itt yewten s yiṣerfiq
ad uraren yid sent
yekfa s temɣawla
tḥemmlem taẓuri
nekk d amṛabeḍ i ken ittarran d imqeddsen
awal nni yuzzlen ziɣ d tidet
tekṛeh it
kulec iban
anta ara iseɣtin tuccḍiwin nni
xeẓẓreɣ kan tanemmirt
ay irgazen a tifeɣwa
tuki d seg ushetref is
ad tent tleqqem
laban inuda aqiḍun n yeɛqub aqiḍun n liya akked uqiḍun n snat n tqeddacin nni lameɛna ur yufi acemma
yexṛeb umrar
ɣur s nettat teddez tebrez azekka ad t texdem d ccɣel
mmi ɣer yirgazen ifaz nniɣ asen d ayen i as yemla zik baba s
tessnemt ad tṛebbimt llufanat
ixuṣ leɛqel i as qqaren ur yessin leṣlaḥ is meskin
isem is i ugḍiḍ a
deg leɛmer izleg ak d wawal nnig wazal is
ṛeqqeɛ waki
ur sliɣ ara d acu i d nnan
ddunit trennu ur tettaẓ di lbaṭel
yir tasnakta tɣemmi rnu as imezdaɣ i yettnernin di tuddar
yeččur uxxam d abbu
isudd ubrid ɣur k
d argaz bu tuẓult
deg furar tetteffeɣ d tzermemmuyt si lɣar is
fkan tiffaf i uɣyul
d acu n ddnub i xedmeɣ armi i tt teddiḍ akka fell i
melmi ara iyi t id tiniḍ
i kečč d acu i zemreɣ ad k t xedmeɣ a mmi
yeqqen yimi s lḥenni
tukert it lqawɛa
azekka ad ɣreɣ aṭas
ulac aɣbel
ad as tt yeɛṛeḍ
taqbaylit ass a tekcem gar tutlayin n umaḍal
lehduṛ is snuddumen
nniɣ as ass a ad iyi yawi ah ya ddin qessam
sɛant yiwen n ṣṣut i d yettarra udrar
cukkeɣ tekreh iyi
s yiɣil i d yekker
ssken iyi d abrid deg leɛnaya k
tuzzuft gar uberkan d teqbaylit
yiwen n ubabat yezga yesteqsay mmi s
limer di llin yijeǧǧigen tili ẓdiɣ am d taɛeṣṣabt a yelli
ad d iwelli seg madrid
nɣant ak ten
ad aɣ sseɣlint
yelha ma akka i teẓẓareḍ
tikli n ɣriba tettqerrib ɣer tzeqqa nni
yusef iɛac meyya uɛecṛa n iseggasen
tefka yas ddḥis
anwa tenwiḍ yeɛni ad yexdem annect en
ad tecnumt
attan tezger d i wasif qbala ɣer ɣur neɣ
tinna yefka tt id rebbi s wul is
bɣan akk medden ad slen i tidett yefren
serreḥ as
sliman ad d ikkes timellalin ur tekkir tsekkurt
tesseṛɣem as ten
ul is d dheb
ur tettuɣ ara ad snemreɣ daɣen iɛeggalen n tddukkla meṛṛa ɣef usuddes igerrzen nezzeh n tfaska agi yezrin
i d greɣ mmi ɣer dduḥ
ur yi d ttarra ara akken asirem
dacu i nebɣa d taɣdemt
win yeṭṭsen di tṛakna yeqqar tagrest teḥma
aman ttṛuḥun neqqsen armi d aggur wis ɛecṛa
imi izemmen ur t keččmen yizan
aweḍ d
rret ddhen nwen
yečča yuba s usixef
aḍu n wenẓul d ungal n ben hedduga
akken ad d mmektiɣ
tala n tjaddit
ṛebbi ad isahel zewreɣ am tacḍaṭ
akken ur d iyi ttixiṛen ara
kerzeɣ abrid iw s waccaren d tuɣmas
d yiwen n urgaz asebri yettarra kan s ul is
ar taswiɛt
iẓẓan umi i zzin yizan
ssexbabḍeɣ argaz nni ur faqeɣ ara amek i t ufiɣ yefser di lqaɛa
ẓẓaren iman nsen d imeqqranen
fket aɣ d asandwič a lmumnin
iḥemmel iten
ad ten id tekksemt
aɛeṭṭay
ifhem s lɣemza mačči s ddebza
ad am t id aɣeɣ
tabburt n ufrag ad tili d ẓẓerb ara yesɛun ɛecrin n iɣallen
sliɣ i kra n yiwen yettberriḥ
ur yezmir ara ad d isali azegrir n ukter n imedlis n tensa
ssufeɣ itt ssya
dima la d ttcetkin

taddart mačči am zik
amzun nenɣa asen imawlan nsen
steqsi
zzhir deg tikli ɣur sen ur yelli
lliɣ zhiɣ yid k
ẓẓeṭla d zzit uzemmur iṭij abeḥri tili
tefriḍ tt dacu ara txedmeḍ daɣen
ɣaḍen iyi igḍaḍ nni i d ṭṭfeɣ zik s txeftin
ay atma ṣubbeɣ d wasif ufiɣ lferk ijeḥmam
aqjun iṣṣḍen ara t iḥekmen d imawlan
tekker gar ikubuyen d yihendiyen izeggaɣen
ad yecnu di tmdint n bgayet
zik i bdiɣ tanhert
tettezɣuɣud gar wallen
zedɣeɣ deg tokyo
sɛiɣ yiwen n wawal
acuɣer ur tḥemmlem ara iqjan
aṭas aya segmi ttaruɣ taqbaylit
yelsa abidi
mi tt iwala akken s taqendurt nni tenṭeḍ ɣef yedmaren is iger d nnehta
abbuh a medden ma drus i as yeḍran
akka tura aṭas n yimyura i d yekkren
s lefḍel n bu tezmirin
fket as amur is ula d netta
tameṭṭut ur d tenni awal tefhem d acu i d yewwi lḥal maca mačči d lɣerḍ is tettru tessusem
txedmemt as kra
yella wacu ruḥeɣ ad d awiɣ seg texxamt iw
ad tedduḍ yid sen

saḥḥit
awi d ad eččeɣ
yemmut wul is

ttɛawazent
wissen amek ara tefru

wwteɣ di tewwurt s tuggdi d uneɣni
ur sɛiɣ la sser la d aḥeckul ṭfeɣ kan di tjaddit seg wul
ur terni ara aṭas teṭṭarḍaq taluft ɣer uqerrun n zahra

ceyyɛet iyi d tom

uccen ur d ul is i diri maca yettlaẓ ula d netta

ur d heggan ara i waya
tekra d newwara taqendurt i tmeɣra
aṭas n wid ur neddir
ilaq ad tt id tesmektimt
ruḥ kan a yamusnaw ruḥ
weɛrit lehdur n tsumta
melmi i d usan
myeqmacen icifaḍ
ssebleɛ a lqaɛa ečč a times

d tiliẓri
wicqa ma txedmeḍ as ifelfel aberkan
a wer d yekk wayagi sɣur k

yiwen n usɣar yerwi tirect
mačči d lbiru inek
ur ugaɣ ara dakken bɣiɣ ad iliɣ da

ṭṭaq yella yeldi

ncedha ken i meṛṛa

dayen ur k uḥwaǧeɣ ara
d imeḍebber amezwaru
angeẓwer yezgan azbu sdat icenga ahat ttekkin di tmentilt

ha tt an d lweḥda n yiḍ

anda tettiliḍ

ula mi ara tfak temsirt
ayagi yeffeɣ ɣef warrac imi ɛyan mliḥ seg wahil yeččuṛen
mi ara ttnaɣen sin ttḥuddu ten
ilaq ad t tesseḥṛeceḍ akken ad d yeffeɣ d aselmad

ad awent t id ifek

ahat yenna d akka

berka tikerkas

tekkes iten id
s lfeḍl ik ay aḥnin ɛemr as axxam d iqcicen
mkul tagwest s uzduz is
d ayen tesɛiḍ i teswiḍ

sebɣen tt id

anda i tensa mary

awimt d imedyaten

ḍelmen mi d ussan

d tidet yella wayagi imi ttɣimin deg udrar kra ara yekk wass
ggulleɣ ur teffiɣeḍ akken alamma teččiḍ
mazal akken i ttxemmimeɣ
igguni am ugujil tabburt

dehmemt

kra n lɣaci

tumnem yeɛni ad gren imdukal nsen ɣer lḥebs

ad tt ǧǧeɣ ɣur i taswiɛt a
zzelzen iyi di nnif iw
neɣ s wawal nniḍen ma nezmer ad neselmed s tmaziɣt neɣ mazal ad neqqim kan deg uselmed ines
bḍan akent tent id
iwwi tt id di tenyirt is
yettban d tom d ameẓẓyan
ad yekker ula d ccix ad ixemmel ifassen is

telha ddunit
iggujel baba s illa

d agris d usemmiḍ
yettbin d iwenneɛ
ɛemmreɣ d azal n lqella n umuṛej si tessirt
takerrust agi tekra tt id akken a tt tessexdem deg wahil i d thegga
tiɣerɣert n uxxam tesleɣ s wakal
iwacu ur tewwiḍ ara kan idrimen nni
tura ad tesseqdcem facebook s teqbaylit

ad tedduḍ yid nteɣ

yecmumeḥ d
sliman u muḥ yettɣenni
wina iwumi zzin itran

rezfent d yessetma s warraw nsent axxam yeččur iqerra fuṛen
temmeɣ tessers aḍad ines ɣef tqeffilt n nnaqus
akka ara ɣ deqqimen
mkul yiwen deg wen ad iqqim deg umkan is yiwen ur itteffeɣ seg uxxam is ass wis sebɛa

wa ur ineṭṭeq ɣer wa

i wacu i yekcem lḥebs
ifukk iten
telliḍ teskiddibeḍ iyi d
taṣebḥit mazal itran yesseglaf ur yettsetḥi
ma regmeɣ k ḥseb iyi am kečč
limer ad aɣ iserreḥ zzman ad d naru alef isefra
nuɣ d agmer i tessirt d amellal
ax iqqaṛ it meɛna ittɛuccuṛ
ad tsewweq yid sent
ur ttwaliɣ walu akk
anwa ara d xebbṛeɣ
melmi ad iyi ẓṛen
ccah ccah a tamɣart aɛebbuḍ agi d aqcic
ur t qeṛṛen ara ar warraw n wudayen
anda yella bu wul nni leqqaqen
wa d isali i inefɛen aṭas
ifukk iten akk
ur iteffer fell as kra
anda tt lbanka
yeqqim yeggugem kan
llant dinna yid s
tenɣa yaɣ tt
idrimen sseččayen tijɛal
d ayen i d ittarran rruḥ i wul
ayen i yi ḥejben fell am
d acu i k iruḥen
akka kan ara tt tkemmleḍ keččini
ad mmteɣ ddwa illa
d wanwa telliḍ theddreḍ
yebḍa yam tt id
tɣaḍ itt
aqcic am uwri ma ur iddiz ur iberren
tuker awen
tettwet deg uxxam
aqerwac nni zlan akken d aqejbabbaṛ
ad aɣ d tawimt lhemm
ur ẓriɣ ara anida ara d negri
ur qrib ur ɛla ḥal
nerra t id kan ɣer tezwawt
d tagrawla i yesseɣlin adabu amnekdan
aseggas wis xemsa tzemrem ad teččem si lfakya nsent
yečča ayen tečča tesraft
iḥekker deg s
tfukkeḍ ten
yella wayen nniḍen i d heggaɣ i uzekka
isekkeḍ it
tḥemmlem iḍan
d taqerruyt n tɛekkwazt i yeɛewjen
ad tiliḍ teṭṭseḍ mara d yaweḍ baba k s axxam
adfel ifetti
i tsuta uzekka ad terr izuɣaṛ
weddṛen t
wwiɣ d lviza ar fransa
yak nemtawa ur d nrennu ara dderya
aha kker zwi iman ik
yir zzit yerna leɣla
maziɣ itbeɛ itt id ɣer berra
asemmiḍ la deg s yettazu
tesfaqeḍ tent id
ula d taselmadt tettara yas d s wayen tesɛa
yettban d yeɛya tom
ḥesbent
anwa wigi d iqbayliyen
nezmer ad naru adlis
nesra ddwa
mḥiḥed ciṭ
yella kra n yiwen seg yilemẓyen agi i m yeččuren tiṭ
akken i ten ttwalint deg tiliẓri d yisura
akka i tt icar fell asen umenzu
yebḍa afus is s lmus
leqqem
d neyya meskin
yuba d abhim
ulac d acu yellan
amdan yeṣfan izmer ad yečč seg weksum nni
i ma yella ur tt ufiɣ ara
teɛjeb asen ayendin tmezgunt a
ayen nniḍen d ccɣel nneɣ
tettarraḍ iman ik d agrud
ɣer teklut
tugna n tneɣruft
francis cabrel yecna deg lberkat n toulouse
mellken t imezran ur tt yufi ara
tom ur yessin ad yecnu
ugadeɣ tayri m
ḥnin yettarra tamawt
ɣas ad ddmeɣ timqestin inek
zik alarma yeṭṭeṣ ɣef ukersi ara iruḥ s usu ad igen
ussan ttazalen
ad tizmireḍ ma ulac aɣilif ad iyi d tesɛeddiḍ tisent
nna feḍmuca txuṣṣ deg yiẓri ma d lalla xelluǧa tegrurez yerna tecbeḥ
ula d inelmaden is faqen s waya
zerqen d waman iḥman
i nekk i wumi txedmemt akk annect a
anda llan ay rennun
ilaq ad ten id tesmektiḍ
acḥal ad yi id tesqam
ur tetteɣ ara tikermusin
yiwen ur yekkir
aṭas i k rjiɣ
turwem d isefra
d abrid i t id iwwin ara t irren
n yilindi d useggas a
tesɛiḍ zzheṛ
fakkent awen tt
ur nesɛi ara ijḥiḥen
tettargum s tutlayt taqbaylit
tessneḍ ad taruḍ taqbaylit
tibuwaḍin n ddwa tilmawin
ayɣer i tt id tuɣeḍ
ur fhimeɣ ara takti nwen
ungal mačči kan d tulsin n teqsiṭ
i wacu d acu n ssebba mi tt yeɛzel deg wusu
musa yeqsed ad izdeɣ s argaz nni
axaṭer illu yexdem amdan ɣef ṣṣifa s
layat i d yusan i muḥemmed di lmadina ččurent d takriṭ
ur cfiɣ ara mliḥ mi d uwḍen yimejjayen
a nnger uqriḍ
ay ibehlulen
d axxam i ixedmen lexla
ibedd tom
kkret ay ayetma ad truḥem ma d nekkni ad d tejbu lavyu
ur sen ttwehhiɣ ara
fiḥel ad d negri di nndama
anwa nnutil ideg ara tettiliḍ
nnekwa s iddem itt waḍu
tfakemt iyi ten
anda t uxxam ik ay ul iw
ṭṭal
mačči bessif neɣ s uḥras ara d tas
ad bdun
mlaleɣ d tabaḥant iw iḍelli
yal tamsalt deg i lḥeqq is
teɛqel it mebla ccek d ṣṣut n si yeḥya
ḥesset d i baba twen isṛayil
mi tqerreb s aḍebsi n lḥenni am tin yettqerriben s izem
ad twalim nnbi
glant yes s
yeswa aman n wasif
ttaddameɣ t
s lemɣiḍa ṭṭalaben lqut
ur yenfiɛ ara maḍi
tsebɣem asen ten
ibecc it ṛebbi
jemɛent tent
iḍelli kkreɣ d zik
wi teǧǧiḍ deg wemḍiq ik
tura ur heddren ara am zik ɣef teqbuct n tefriqt n waɣlanen
mdel idlisen im
am ucebbub fell am ul iw yeshebhub
tsell aṭas i radyu tis snat ladɣa tidwilin nni n ccna
iseggem itt
illa d aṣeggad iẓewren zdat n umeɣlal
iɛeyyen akent
mi ara nɛedi ɣer yiḍes mi ara nsers aqerruy nneɣ ɣer tsumta
tella tin i ikecmen ar texxamt
iṭṭef d izan s ufus
ɛawnen aɣ
isɣanen igenwanen d asxurreḍ ameqqran i talsa
neqqar yeshuttur neɣ yeshetrif
yella yessnen as i tessirt n waman dɣa ɣɣaren as d ssya u ssya
ḥemmleɣ aḥetḥut s useqqi
ɣzan aẓekka
steqsi win yellan
ḥemmleɣ tameṭṭut yerna mačči d aṭṭan
twejdemt akk
ur teǧǧim amkan
tsellem d ɣef maziɣ
yiwen yenɣa tom
teffud ur teswi
tom ur yemmug ara i uselmed
kker ad nefteṛ
tuɣ d aɣrum
wwiɣ t ɣer berra
taqcict nni ur tesɛi ara dderya dɣa yemma s yenɣa tt uɣbel is
qqimemt deg beṛṛa
yuɣal d unaẓuṛ nni
ilul muḥemmed budyaf ass n tlata u ɛecrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tteɛṭac di msila
ma d wiyaḍ ad uɣalen d aklan ik
anef as ad qqimeɣ yis s
nwiɣ ad ɛeddiɣ akken ad neffeɣ akka kra
ass n ara tiniḍ
d taqbaylit i kent id yefkan
ijexxeṛ tom
itett ayen d tefka teswiɛt
asmi lliɣ d askuti qeḍɛen fell i aḥerrek
mi ara d tuɣaleḍ ɛeddi d si tḥanut
nekk d teqbaylit iw nemyeḥmmal seg zik
sliman u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad yegzu tiziri tagawawt
yečča lmal yefreḥ bab is
acimi ur d truḥeḍ ara ad tḥedreḍ i tmeɣra w
teglamt yes i
iban ur d tecliɛeḍ
d asirem tettceyyiɛem a wid ireclen akked tmedyezt
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat iw
ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣalemt ar boston
snemmer it
anelmad a ssneɣ t deg uesggas amenzu alammi d ass a
tesɛa d daɣen gma s habil
ibɣa ad iḥkem deg k lameɛna kečč ɣleb it
acku atan da
ulac di teṛbut tekfa
xdem
yuba yerwel ɣef mary
nutni n asya
d lawan ad uɣaleɣ
ad tesɛeddiḍ snat n tzuraz nni n ddheb di snat n txelxalin nni yellan ɣef yiran n ufella n tbanta
ur tetteɣ ara tibexsisin
ḥum ḥum ḥemmama zub zub zubid tayaziḍt ad texnunes a wi ččan tadmert ines s uɛeqqa n berkukes
mačči d tidi i itekksen tiṭuksinin seg tfekka
yessen ad yemmeslay
annect agi ad ibeggen belli tutlayt d tasudut tanmettit ur yezmir ara yiwen umdan weḥd s ad tt ibeddel
iwumi theddṛeḍ
bɣiɣ ad fakkeɣ urar a di taggara n ssmana ya
ifukk itent akk
isḥaq isɛa settin n iseggasen di lɛemṛ is mi d lulen
ad temyeḥmaẓeḍ d ɛemmi k
tebɣa ad tennaɣ
sebɣen tent id
yiwen yenɣa sliman u muḥ
wwḍen d waman
yenna iyi d tom ur yebɣi ara ad yidir deg boston
azger ičča atemmu tayuga tečča atemmu
ayen icerken am tlaba iterken
ur iḥemmel ara tusnakt
ṭebbeg sya
ad tesselseḍ llebsa agi i gma k haṛun akked warraw is
ma tayri d leḥram nɛemmed tijujar
yal mi ara d teḥḍer tegnit am ta
ẓriɣ kullci ɣef tiṭ iw kullci
inelmaden d yiselmaden nsen akked yinemhalen i ixeddmen da
ur tettlaɛaj ttxil m
yufa tura yas d sima
ṣṣbeḥ ayi i t id ssewweɣ
qqim dinna
mi as tenniḍ lḥaǧa
beṛka k ssbeṛ
ur teẓwiremt ara akken ilaq
d aḥullu i yettḥullu deg wawal
n wanwa t ukamyun aki
tṛuḥemt ɣer bgayet yakan
d acu i ten iwwin ɣur sen
anamek n wawal amaziɣ d argaz ilelli
tebra yemma k
tḥemmleḍ iyi
yella daki win i izemren ad yi d iɛawen
dayen ur tettamen s yiṭij neɣ s tsusmi n tegliswin
ala uday i yeregmen s deffir
iger iyi d amcic s aqelmun
d tameṭṭut tamzwarut i d yegren afus deg unnar a n usideg n yifecka
neḥwaǧ ik a nnbi s wass a
aṭas i ttbeddilen wansayen
yecba izem bu lhibat
yegdel
slummeḍ

sutret ad wen d ittunefk
aql i usiɣ d
ur ḥemmlen ara mi ara d yewwet
bɣiɣ anezdeɣ akken
xdem lxir ad t tafeḍ

ulac lexber im
yeɛjel

aya yekka d kan seg tugdi ik
ur aɣ teṭṭfen ara
ukren iyi ssaɛa w
ad d yefk ugudu lexṛif

tcewwel itt tinna

ay aqlalas ssbeɛ bu tissas
yeqqur wanu
iḍ igerrzen a lalla
ur d iqqim deg sen uṭenṭun
ɛerqen as lehdur
iḍelli ṭṭfeɣ d inisi
yeslemed iyi t
tattales as d amek tella txeddem
uɣeɣ kra wakal ad bnuɣ
tɛelleq tasaɛdit tamecṭuḥt taqecwalt ɣer yiɣil is
ur yessaweḍ ara ad iɛas fell as
leɛbeɣ tt d amehbul
aṭas n lecɣal yettwaxedmen deg ugezdu n tizi uzzu
yiwet n tikkelt yiwen n urgaz yesɛa ala tullas yerɣa ad yesɛu mmi s xersum ad d yegri yisem is
ɛni ad ɣ teǧǧeḍ an nemmet imi ulac idrimen
wwten tt s yiẓṛa
ad as uɣalaɣ s lmendad

ala d awezɣi

ɣriɣ tt
nrennu di lǧehd

ur ttru ara fell asen

rrant asen tent id
ass mi terba tmeṭṭut iw tuli as tawla ɣer waḥed u ṛebɛin
necmumeḥ d
tbeɛ iyi d
ṭṭaq neɣ agnir
inɣa yaɣ usetḥi
ɛiwent t fket as afus ad yuɣal ɣer wayetma s
aṭṭan n temẓi d ussan
ma ur tezmireḍ kan ad tkecmeḍ ɣer ugraw nni d anedbal i k yesweḥlen
imi acerrig meqqaṛ d acu ar as d teg tfawett

aɣ
ur ɣelṭeɣ ara
mačči dayen ara teṭṭef
ssiɣ taftilt
s tezmert im
kečč d aɣilif
tikti a d ayen i t iceɣben seg wasmi i d yekker
nekk ɣur i tudert war tayri d layas
ma tkemmel akka ur d ttilint ara tefranin n tselweyt di yulyu agi
tfehmeḍ tt
yenɣa t wul is ula ɣef lǧin ma telsa t
tesruḥeḍ aṭas n yidammen
yusef inna as ad xedmeɣ akken i t id tenniḍ
heyyi iman ik
din ay nemlaqa
nniɣ as iwulem ad t id ssiẓergeɣ acku d tamsalt i nettidir yal ass
ay aqbayli ur ttakk ara lwi ur ɣeffel ara aki
ad sent tt tɛeṛḍem
yelli d lwens n yifadden
ɣur i yiwet akken
ɣef iɣes iw yezwi uksum
leswam ttalin ɛla ḥsab n wayen yellan akked wayen ṭṭalaben yimdanen
iṛuḥ yeɛqub ɣer baba s inna yas a baba
swingmet as
ur nḥiseɣ ɣef yiwen
tettbinem d tcebḥem
ad sɛuɣ rebɛa nniḍen am kunwi
icudd ufus is
amek ara uɣaleɣ ɣer baba ma ur iddi ara yid i uqcic agi
udem nni i ttcedhin t wallen iw
s uɛmam d uqendur i xerben lumuṛ
yiwen ur d yehdiṛ
icfa d i lebḥeṛ mi yeṛɣa
ttaɣen d kan syin ɣer s tettɣima d tettwaḍeggar
ggin iyi d at tqerbuzt
mkul asemekti ad tt id yesru
yeffeɣ it leɛqel
ad ḥasbeɣ kra n umdan ara yessizzlen idammen n gma s
nuḥ isɛa d tlata n warrac cim ḥam akked yifit
melliḥet
ad ak jebdeɣ leḥnak ik
ur sɛant ara
deg tullisin is yeqqar kan yewweḍ d i zzwaj kkren ad s d xeḍben
neffeɣ kan cwiṭ i taddart mmugren aɣ yimcumen nni n lɛesker
imiren ṛuḥen xebbṛen yasuɛ
nelmed leqran
ilaq kan ad ẓren yimdanen d akken ala ifecka n uɣbalu yeldin ara nessidig
yenqer uqacir ik
yeffeɣ
yekna as i zman
awit asent d ad ččen
uraren mgal ifulka n atlanta sendiḍelli
meẓyan yewhem
iger as amcic deg uqelmun
ad nruḥ wakali
yuba d akanadi
tameṭṭut mm ubuḥcic
taqcict ur tt nesɛi

tiziri tneqqes anef ɛad a bnadem
qqimen ɣef yisennanen
ɣaḍen k widak
tikwal kan
yella kra n yiwen i yeṭṭalayen tom
tella kra n yiwet i d iṛuḥen
iceyyeɛ ixeddamen is i wakken ad as d muqqlen uccen
lfahem ifhem aɣyul iwhem
ad t neǧǧ kan ad d iflali
aɣref ileḥḥun s tɛellamt n weɣref iḍen ḥseb it yemmut
akessar d akessar ṛebbi ifka afus
d wayen akk yezgan yid neɣ
ikemmel yasuɛ ihdeṛ asen s temɛayin
ma yerra t waggur akin d turart s tarwiḥin
aql i nniɣ awen t id si tura
amek ihi
tzemreḍ ad telḥuḍ
wissen ma yewjed imensi
anda akken i teffreḍ asefk nni n nuwel
anda ten akk lehduṛ nni
acbali irreẓ zzit tɛelleq
sami yuḍen
qqaren d deg lǧennet s taɛrabt i ttmeslayen
ur tt ttxalaḍ ara
anwa abrid i yessuffuɣen
tidet isgaǧ itt ṭṭmaɛ
meyyez uqbel aneggez ddunit tettɣuṛṛu
yelha ufrux deg yigenni mačči daxel n tfergact
imeslayen iw s yidammen ik uriɣ ten
tettinnit tmeṭṭut iw acku terfed tadist
ad nebdu s uxbac
tḥemmleḍ gma xir iw
ddem it
ɣlayit tkeryas di lezzayer
ddwa umencuf d azegḍuf
yettban iyi d ṣṣut is am wakkan d sin neɣ tlata n yemdanen
ahat llant tmental n tismin n tdamsa neɣ ahat n tsertit
ad iyi d ttawḍen am lewḥuc yerna ma rriɣ asen d nekk i d yir taqcict
ɣelben iberriqen amzun leɛmer ẓran iṭij
yuba yeǧǧa leqraya
aṭas i tettṛaǧumt seg s
igzem afurk iɣef iqqim
tura ad as tiniḍ awal s yedrimen i t id yettaɣ
tṛebbam aksum
amzun tesliḍ d i usiwel iw
wukud llan
a dda ɛli awren yuli
tebḍa yas t id
yeggan d tinnegnit
di leɛwacer ttemyettakken medden tunṭicin
yunez am wul yekna
ur iḥemmel ara tarda n leḥwal
wicqa
melmi ara nruḥ
mi ara ɣreɣ aḍris aseklan ad afeɣ awennet di tazwara yettvan iyi d icemmet aḍris nni
aya yesɛa azal aṭas
ɣef wayagi i s tsemma dan yeɛni iḥkem
yeɣmez
tesfeqdeḍ tent
ad s t id awint
d nnger im
ur yelli seg m ara awiɣ
ad t teqqen yelli ṣaḥa s
arm iyi ikkes reffu i deg lliɣ i d faqeɣ i wayen i xedmeɣ
tfakk ak ten
yeqqen itt id lbaz ukyis nnig teɛyunin
d wa i d asteqsi inem aneggaru
ad agaden
massi yegguma ad yegzu iḥulfan n umddakel is
ad ffɣeɣ deg tubeṛ
yuba iḥulfa yeɛya
truḥ
islamẓriyen d aggaz kan i sɛan d tiririt
akka ara t nxedmet
ad xedmen i yexdem umger i yiger
dayen ttuɣ
d timcumin
lsem lqecc nwen
aha qqim tiɣimit ik
lameɛna hudd tiɛencuṛin nsen rreẓ itent
fransa i tt ceggḍen d tamurt n leqbayel i as d yettaran tiɣrit
s tutlayt n llufan
gen di talwit a gma nekali abderraḥman d awezɣi ad k nettu
nɣant iyi ten
anda telliḍ akka
aqiḍun n temlilit asenduq n cchada aɣummu n usuref yettrusun fell as akked dduzan meṛṛa n uqiḍun
lmut d tamassaṛt
ad m tt id yawi
tenɣam iyi tt
nwerreq iten
sekreɣ kem id
tedɛa i yillu ad as d yefk llufan yesɛan tazmert yelhan
ttu tom
cqan i medden ma nnan ul iw yettḥibbi lbanan
ḥemmleɣ ad ɣṛeɣ
kullec irab ɣar lsas
acimi i nettjeddir di tmurt a ṣbeḥ meddi
tebḍa yi tent id
ibabaten n warrac umren ayendin s leqdic a igerrzen ladɣa imi iselmaden a ur d ssutren ara lexlaṣ
tekksemt t id
anida
s tafukt ad telhu tfelwit
iččernennay ur izmir
maca ma yessufuɣ ubrid ik wicqa
aqcic a yuḍen anezyuf
anwa ara lumment
d lawan n rrwaḥ s axeddim
d nekk i d teskaneḍ
tiṭ tenqes ugel ikkes
lliɣ deg idurar
beṛka ken asuter n ssmaḥ
ad ilint tnagiyin sɣur yimeddukkal is n uxeddim d wayen nniḍen
la ken ttnadin
ǧǧet iyi
ad as tent id tawiḍ
yuɣal yejja t
ssebba n tirwas d aɛaddi n tilas
kksen tent id
si rezqi tura yuɣ itent yeɣli di tezmert is
a lḥif im ma d kem ara igen axxam
yerfed iman is
tettwali deg wudem is ḥala tebrek
tura yasen tabrat iḍelli
i udellaɛ i mu yekkes lqaɛ d acu ara as d gen yifassen
rdan t di lbaṭel
a wid mazal di tudert ur qebblet ara ad tilim d aklan
d nutni ara ken iḥasben
tceɛfeḍ
swiɣ afenǧal n lgazuz asemmaḍ
ad irwi iẓẓan s ufus
tzemreḍ ad yi d tesɛeddiḍ lmelḥ ma ulac aɣilif
muqqel iyi d
ur ẓriɣ ara tesneḍ ad temmeslayeḍ akka a tabandit
acuɣer aɣlan azzayri yettawi d lecyux aɛraben ɣer tudrin nneɣ

ɣas akken lḥif yetbeɛ iten meɛna ɣelben t s tayri i yellan gar asen

a teddumt yid nteɣ

times a meqqret tendeh d seg uqadus agejdan i yettmuddun lgaz ɣer tzeɣwa n ujmaɛ deg yiwet n ufares tapitrukimyawit
iwacu theddnen akka merra
sliɣ belli llan yirden di maṣer

iṣeffer
tugiḍ tiseɣlit i yebḍan taxelqit
teɣli d tinnegnit
yewɛer aṭas ad tessirdeḍ tikerciwin
ɣef tlelli d tugdut
iɛǧeb ak lfilm nni i nwala iḍelli
i ubrid win i yeffɣen ur k yettɣiḍ ma yegrireb
ma tečča tečča ma ulac d aqeṣṣer
smektan tt id s wussan n zzhu
iɛawed tom axeddim
i wuddem n yillu
fkiɣ as amawal i gma
ad iqḍeɛ lbabuṛ s uɣyul
jules verne yura daɣen ungal iḍen qqaren as asikel ɣer wayyur

yuɣal tom yettwassen

d amcum
ad as ternu deg leɛḍam d wafud akked ṣṣeḥḥa

mennan d ad ḥewwsen ar legniz

s kra i d iyi yuɣen

ad t id tekkseḍ
briɣ akent
d kečč ara tt igezmen deg rray
ad tent teddmemt

ayagi d lweɛda

zuzen mmi ad yeṭṭes
d ayla w
tettara d ɣef wid teẓra meɛnen
ad kkreɣ kan ad sahleɣ

leswar zzin tawwurt teɣleq
ay aberwaq lḥal iḍaq
ar tikkelt nniḍen
teṛwa iṣuṛdiyen

keyyfeɣ mi meẓẓiyeɣ
ala yiwet n tidet i yellan

ad sen ten id awin
ad d tawim lhemm

s wallen n ccbaḥa

d tijdidin kunemti
ur ɛad d wwiḍen
ihi yewhem d acu d akken ibedd kan yettweḥḥid
ttnadint fell i
yella ḥedd ad y iɛawen

ṭṭfit id
neɣ imi yessen baba medden akk snen baba
ad terɣemt di tudert ad ternumt di laxart
ekk seg tezniqt agi ssakin af teffeɣḍ ɣer unnar n ddabex
yejbed iman is
ur cfiɣ ara yakk

sellmen
rran ak tent id
kemmlemt ccḍeḥ

mkul yiwen s targit is mkul targit s lmeɛna s

anda akka ara teffɣemt

skecber

ur d tsawala ara

zemreɣ ad n ṛuḥeɣ
ulac wi irekben ur iris
yiwen ur yesmuqul
ur iwwi ur irri
nɣiɣ am t
tura tesɛa sin n warraw is tafsut d yidir
dayen ur temẓim ara am zik
ur ceffuɣ ara i tirga w
tesdub ikem tayri
tessenfali tt id tfekka nsen
ayɣer i tṣebreḍ i wakka
ass wis tlata d ass n umulli n ferɛun
win ur nesɛi
aṭas ara iḥewsen ar ṭelyan
selleɣ i kra n tɣawsa
amnenniḍ n usismeḍ
ikcem it id nnefs mi d yuli deg tedrujin nni

zemreɣ ad kecmeɣ
yella kra i tebɣamt
ad yemyeḥmaẓ di taddart
ansa i tɛedda tecict nni tabesṭuḥt
d ṭlam deg berra d asemmiḍ abeḥri yettseffir
d lɛib fell ak a meẓyan
ur ttṛuḥuɣ ara zik

kfan lehdur

tama n ufella

ad t tesseɣlim

ur cččiɣ ur swiɣ

imir nni ad d uɣaleɣ

teḥmamt

a tamagadt
ciddeɣ ass a asaɣur iw
issemɣi d acciwen
ur tezmireḍ ad tɛiceḍ akka

tcebḥem

simmal
qqimeɣ ɣer yiri s

ay abuneqqar kečč ur d qqar nekkni ur d neqqar
teɣli yas tḍebsit deg ufus
yekkat ubeḥri
akniwen d akniwen aɛebbuḍ ifreq iten

a nnger ik a yul tarigt tuɣal i uɣyul

mi ara iǧǧuǧeg lemleḥ ad isɛu uɛdaw ṣṣeḥ
ḥebsem
ajdaɛ d mmi s n tegmert
d acu ur tesɛiḍ
ṛṛeẓq ur t iṛwi ḥedd
yeffeɣ d seg wissen ansi
yeččur umedyaz d iḥulfan
ɛeslama nwen
ad yili ṛebbi d tlawin mi ara d rẓen leqcac
wali amizzwer n uselkem
tesɛiḍ cwiṭ n waman deg tkeṛṛust im
iṛucc yes s aɣrab n tqeṛṛabt sebɛa n tikkal
ḥnuccḍemt ma tabɣamt di taddart
iḥar
tinnegnit ad nejgugel
ad nɛeddi ad nečč tura
ceɛfent
d mmi s n yemma
syin yedhem d ccwal yerẓa d tiwwura yenneqlab uxxam a ɣef uqerru is yiwen ur yefhim d acu i iḍerrun
qqaren as aẓrem neɣ ajeɣdan
aɛdaw nneɣ d aferṭas acciwen d nekni
ay ameɣcuc i k isbezgen ad ɣ iṛuc
teqqerṣeḍ seg userwet
ad d fkeɣ idlisen iw iqdimen
tura yella skype mačči am zik d tilifun kan
deg lawan nni nettagad tiqcicin
mi d yeswa iteddu yettemderkal d abrid ur t yeɛqil
ggumaɣ ad xellṣeɣ
usiɣ d iman iw
d tiɣin n ṣṣrima uqbel aserdun
imsexdeɛ baba s d mmi s
llan imawlan ttaken aɣ d affud s wawal yelhan
ussan imezwura ad asent yeɛǧeb lḥal
ḍleb as i menwala
a yiwet n tmagadt
nɣan akent tt
yecweḍ wul fell am
tnac n iseggasen i llan ddaw n uzaglu n kadurlaɛumir lameɛna aseggas wis tleṭṭac kkren d ɣur s
tettazalemt
yal ass ttargun s teqbaylit
d kemm i yebɣan
anta
ad k ɣnuɣ ma iɣna k ṛebbi
tetteddu tettxemmim ɣef wayen hedren
ɣliɣ yakan
acuɣer i tṛuḥem
rrant d
mi d tṣuḍeḍ s wanzaren ik ad nnejmaɛen waman
d kemm i iɣelḍen
sliɣ i kra n yiwen yettɛeyyiḍ
ur asent rrin ara azal
tmeččḥeḍ iḍebsiyen
amsafer ur iɛeggu ur iṛebbu
yiwen n wass ad n tuɣal
nebzeg ur neksi
ɣeẓẓan t id yifassen is yebɣa ad yaru
yak ulac draɛ deg wannect a
ɛeṭṭleɣ acemma mi d wwḍeɣ
tuɣ d taqendurt turqimt
arem wa
ttwajerḥeɣ s lmus
dda sliman d amedyaz ifazen akk
ulac d acu ara xedmeɣ
ad t iclex seg wafriwen mebla ma iferq iten
ad t tseggem
mi d inna ḥatt ini as batt
aɣmis n yimaziɣen efk aneɣ d tamuɣli tamatut ɣef yisenfaren n usideg d wanda wwḍen
zgiɣ ttḥewwiseɣ ar tmurt nni
ziɣen ɛaceɣ deg tirga
ɛni kemm mačči n da
anwa ten warrac nni
yexdem laksida s uvilu
rnu yas
ɛerḍeɣ lqut ɣef lmelḥ
anda akka i terriḍ
ijexxer lpuṣt nni ɣas ḥbes it
ala ul iw ur t id wwiɣ ara ttuɣ t in ɣef rrif n lebḥeṛ
arrac n at yeḥya musa ḥemmlen ad ɣren taqbaylit
tettidir s teqbaylit
yeḍsa d
maɛna d acu d yewwin lmeɣreb ɣer lɛica 
qqimemt cwiṭ yid i
anwa yelhan akk gar imdukal ik
umneɣ awal ik
iruḥ ad d yawi tunt is yufa tekfa tmecreṭ
nekni nettḥebbiṛ ṛebbi ittḍebbir
ẓriɣ kan ma tessusmeḍ ɣef lehlak a acku tuggadeḍ ad hedren fell ak madden
ttejṛa s ihba tt maras
sɛiɣ azref ad amneɣ neɣ ad qqimeɣ
ur iḥṛic ur iḍric
a win yeqqazen iẓekwan
ḍumm d taxxamt
tsemma yas acir yeɛni sseɛd
tettḥewwis axeddim
xẓer d ɣer da
tkemmel axemmem ɣef wayen hedren
yella win i ixebcen takeṛṛust iw
ayen ixdem umger di texsayt
isenajen akked bumaɣis d tuddar n tɣiwant n iflisen n yilel
d taqbaylit i d tudert ik
tom atan deg lḥebs
acḥal n tefyar i skelsen
iruka d dduzan n wexxam yecban ameṭreḥ ṭṭlaba taxzant
armi i ssiwḍeɣ xmesṭac n yiseggasen i bdiɣ ttfaqeɣ i tuzzuft
lemmer ad d iɛeggeḍ ɣur i ad s d sleɣ axaṭer nekk d bab n ṛṛeḥma
abṛaham izdeɣ di bir cibaɛ
aqjun anmeḍri ur itett iɣsan n uxxam
yella kra i ak d yuzen tom
stummneɣ as i wass a abeḥri tili
ccah yehwa yi
akken tenɣiḍ ara temmteḍ
anda i trewleḍ
nettidir
ẓṛiɣ d acu t
nelluẓ
awi d kan azuḥ
qwan wurfan fell i kkubrin d ɣur i amzun d munupri
qqim d taqbaylit
teɣreq
irgazen d tlawin d yigerdan
qewmemt waki
yuba yettban yerfa
tzemrem ad tɛumem
nuker asen tikti nsen
ɣur m ad tḥesbeḍ lehdur iw d aɣurru
yahuda yenna i baba s isṛayil eǧǧ aqcic ad iddu yid i
ad issemɣer tameɣra n zzwaǧ is
ɣiwel
tɣaḍ ikem tinna
azzel neɣ qqim
i lqerḥ akked lferḥ
a wiṛwan udem is a wiẓran amek tella
segnemt t
issukk it di tzulixt
tettamneḍ t
ḍefreɣ kem id
ittwarna deg kra n ismal akken ad isfuɣel tirziwin inek akken daɣen ad d yesken timahaltin am tqefalt n beṭṭu
kifkif a win ixanen a win yukren
ayay
ddiɣ ḥafi ɣef tergin yerɣan
yelha ma yella uran tt ad tt id afen wiyaḍ
tura yekker d ufrux yesselqaḍen baba s
belxir muḥemmed arezki s yisem is n tẓuri belxir muḥemmed
tḥerreḍ t id
sgugceɣ
meqqer maḍi kan
yuba aṭas i d iɛiwen
ira yuba tafransist
yenqec tizemrin is
ass nniḍen weḥd i
ifakk aɣ tent
aḥeddur iqsed i teslit
ziɣemma yeskiddib fell i
txedmeḍ ugar iw
kemm d tameṭṭut amkan im deg tkuzint
nwala tɛerḍeḍ kra n yilguritmen akken ad tegzu tmacint tajerrumt n teqbaylit
widak aɣyul i ttqadareɣ fell asen
yettraju ad as d terr awal
isṛayil inna dayen
sendiḍelli n ssebt ass n usmekti wis sin n tiddukkla agi tadelsant
ula deg uḥric n lebni aṭas i nuẓa ɣar sdat
fell aneɣ ad d tban tafat
ur d tefkiḍ ara udem
s daxel is aṭas n lebniyat
baba yebɣa ad d fɣeɣ d abugatu
ttun iyi akk
d ssiwan im
inim d ayen tebɣam ur ken ttamneɣ ara
acku nɛeṭṭel
ad am d cnun s uẓawan
inna yasen di leɛnaya nwen ay atmaten
iɛeyyu uqcic
ur d tsawleḍ ara
adlis a n wurar s wawalen i d yeffɣen di teẓrigin n ccix muḥend ulḥusin
ččureɣ d tiktiwin
tura err tameṭṭut i wergaz axaṭer d nnbi
ɣef talɣut n yiɣallen n usellek d uḥuddu n uɣarim n wehran
nedmeɣ imi ur ṣfiɣ yid k
lebla k buddeɣ t i wiyyaḍ
deg wen i yella
ma yexḍa sswab i wawal ma ad yili sswab di tsusmi
nebɣa ad tt tawiḍ
lemwaǧi ɣumment ten zedren ɣer lqaɛa n lebḥeṛ am yeẓra
rewlen anda ara afen aman
nɣan iyi ten
tɣaḍeḍ ten
ɣeṛṛbent wallen is
deg unebdu idehhu d d tẓurin akked tbexsisin
yetteqraḥ mačči d kra igezzem yettajraḥ iteqqes
ɛuhdeɣ k ur k ǧǧiɣ
iḥtuten iw ur uwiḍen ara d acu akka i yeḍṛan
tiwi afus iw ɣer tebbuct is tazelmaḍt tin iqerben ɣer wul is
bḍan awen tt id
ad t id temmektiḍ
uɣalen akk d imussnawen
ad ldiɣ ciṭuḥ ṭṭiqan
ssiriden tuɣmas nsen yal ass
yuɣal ad d neṭqen yiɣraben n uxxam ar netta xaṭi
d acu i tḥesbem iman nwen
ttzuxxun yimawlan n yuba s mmi tsen
ass a uɣaleɣ d tufza deg imi k s lqubat ik
kelfeɣ fell am lbacir buclaɣem a nasima
nettat tella tettraǧu ad yeskiddeb fell as
am tjeɛbubt n lfeṭṭa
beddleɣ
kra ur d yettas akka kan
ittɛawaz aṭas yilemẓi a
yebded
lameɛna win ara yenɣen amdan d lmut ara yemmet
ma yella teffɣeḍ syin ad iɛreq
imednab ad xellṣen
ahat yessetḥa neɣ ur yesɛi ara tabɣest a t id yini akka srid udem s udem
yemneɛ seg uhuddu
ay asmi nbedd am yiwen
nneɣ
yelli tella yal ass tettuɣal d ɣef ṭnac n wass
akka ara teḍru d lǧil agi amcum
ṛuḥ rǧu deg tkeṛṛust
teldi as d tesdawit n lezzayer tiwwura
a wer d yekk lɛib sɣur i
yenna yasen i lɣaci
ulac ula d yiwen n wass i deg i ɣriɣ tutlayt iw deg uɣerbaz
yiwet n twacult tettidir di lḥif d wurrif
ini d iwumi ara iliɣ
lukan kan nbeddu lxedma neɣ taɣuri ɣef lɛecra n sbeḥ
ad as zluɣ aḥuli
ibda yettaru adlis ara d isuffeɣ qabel
zzwir

ansi d tzedmeḍ ay d squccḍeɣ
ur d tfaq ziɣ ccbaḥa tmessu
atta ya tefsut
igḍaḍ ɣur sen icuṭaṭ
awal am talast n wakal
fakkent iyi t
ur as d terri ara awal
yella d diɣ wawal ɣef wazal i tesɛa teywalt deg tmetti taqbaylit taqburt d wanda tessaweḍ teswiɛt ass a

uɣaleɣ ufiɣ lxedma
tilelli ur tettnuz ara

ulac tameṭṭut
yuba yettnudum
tecɛel tmes deg wul is seg wass mi iṛuḥ

iwacu tsellmeḍ
rremt t id
mačči d asemmiḍ ass a
tutlayin tiqdimin am tmazight neqḍent
ad ssenseɣ tafat ad ssaɣeɣ zimu ad rnuɣ igarru
yimɣur
ɣer din mi yewweḍ ad iru
yebɣa ad isker ṭṭrad
deg s ma drus ɛecra n yicennayen ilmeẓyen n taddart agi
ssawḍeɣ ak d iɣeblan iw
yerẓa yi usemmiḍ
lameɛna illu n baba yella yid i
mačči ɣulleɣ ten wah nekk d acu rebḥeɣ
tqefzeḍ deg usewwi
aṭas ara ibeddlen deg tudert ik d ttexmam ik mi ara teɣreḍ adlis a
ad sent tt teɛṛeḍ
tifawtin deg ujerbub ay ṭṭfent
yufa d sin iniɣman yeddem yiwen
maca tettwaceqqeq tuddsa agi deg useggas n alef u ttɛemya u xemsin
yuba axxam ur t yesɛi
lemmer uksaneɣ ar n steqsiɣ
ṣṣaba d leɛwam tayerza d ddwam

yefcel
awal i t iferrun d awal

ɛerqent as i saɛid amsaḥ anwa abrid ara yaɣ
ad d zziɣ yiwen n wass

ilul deg tmurt n lpiṭrul netta ur t id iṣaḥ ci
mi ara d teḍilleḍ a tiziri
bilha terfed s tadist tesɛa d aqcic i yeɛqub
yerra yam ten id

nerra d

yumes userwal ik
tẓerreḍ d argaz im di lḥebs neɣ ala
d ageffur n tegrest i d ixedmen akk iremjen nni deg ubrid

lḥeṛma tettban s anyir
ddment ten zgelli

win testeqsaḍ
mi d iwweḍ yisɣi tban tefsut
amedyaz ur yeṭṭafar ara nḍamat n usefru amensay d utrar deg isefra nsen
yettidir d twacult is tameqqrant

mi ara d tessers twacult učči tetten deg yiwen n uḍebsi

eǧǧ yuba weḥd s
yiwen ur yeẓri
neɣ tḥesdeḍ iyi imi i lhiɣ
nnan as iwacu telsiḍ short deg taddart

aql i yid k yerna ad k barkeɣ
tura ẓriɣ belli tettagadeḍ illu
urzen as allaɣ is
ad d ners ar wannar tuddar idurar
llan ssexlaḍen gar tullist d tmacahut
yeddem itt zgelli

ṣṣuṛa d ayeddid ul d agellid
deg lawan nni sima tfuk lmakla
terra d kan nnehta
yebha
lmeɛna ɣer lefɛayel mačči ɣer ṣṣifa
asebddad agi ad yili i yennayer sin igiman d tẓa n twinas d ṣa n tmerwin

ad ten id kksent

ad yefres yal d iman

taklit ad as d tettagem

ssudneɣ tt ɣef yimi
xeṣṛeɣ
a tungifin
win iččan lḥeqq is issidir i wallen is
isegzawalen s umata d idlisen izuranen
tekker texdem as ssem s daxel n rfis
yella qeḍran d yilili
tḥemmlemt ad tnadimt deg aman
tasdawit n uṭawa d yiwet seg tesdawiyin timeqqranin di ddunit
mi tweffreḍ lḥaǧa ad ak d tini anɛam
xedmen ṭrad zik nni
yal tafsut s tefsut is
tlaq tikli ar zdat
mi ara mɣareɣ ad d ffɣeɣ am kemm swaswa
nebɣa ɣer sdat ad nesseqdec tawuri n tsuqilt tawurmant i yellan deg facebook
ɛni tsawlemt
d kečč i yeẓṛan
tesbeɣ iyi tent
kra din yuɣal berrik
aṭas i nessen
yal taggara n ddurt tkeččem d newwara si tesdawit
ur ččiɣ ara tikermusin
ur as tufiḍ ara aqerru i taluft nni
teǧǧa ken ṣṣeḥḥa
nemsefham ad nerr azal i tmaziɣt nneɣ d umezruy nneɣ
yekkat apyanu
ḥemmleɣ urar n terbaɛt n barcelona
ṛuḥet ar uɣerbaz
anta ara yeddun

ur heddṛem ara

ur ččin acemma ass a
d affug i yuffeg mi yesla s lexbaṛ

ilaq ad neḥbes
ur ẓriɣ ara izen iyi d turiḍ
fren yiwen
argaz nni yenna as d acu ten lumuṛ agi
ur cfiɣ ara fell as
d taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt nneɣ fiḥel ad d nexleq tutlayt
bɣiɣ ad yi terjuḍ
trewlem i tmara
ur tt mmarkan ara deg tɣiwant armi iɛedda useggas ɣef tlalit is
a yemma urgaɣ targit
yeɣra tabrat nni akken ttazzalen imeṭṭawen ɣef leḥnak is
ur nettuɣal ara d taḍṣa i medden
yebɣa tom kra n tɣawsa nniḍen yemxalafen
mi yetti idis yuɣal ɣer tnafa s ad d griɣ din waḥdi am bururu baba s yeffeɣ yakkan seg texxamt
tasaḥlit tbeddu seg tizi n berber akkin metwal sṭif d jijel
ad iyi tent teɛṛeḍ
ilindi yiwet n tikelt mačči ẓriɣ k
wwteɣ aṭas iman iw akken ur ttxemmimeɣ ara fell as
ḥusseɣ iman iw d tamednubt
d lɣemza seddaw timmi

iqquṛ uqeṛṛuy is

la heddṛeɣ weḥd i
yuker ḥedṛeɣ yeggul umneɣ
tufam iman nwen yid i
win yesɛan axxam yehtutan xas ur yekkat ara lǧiran s yeẓra
yiwen ɣef uẓelmaḍ wayeḍ ɣef uyeffus
a t an ḥewsen

ziɣen yeɣleḍ deg leḥsab

ma teɛyiḍ lqeḍ idɣaɣen
tura ɛeqleɣ ken id
tḥemmel it s tuffra
tessexlellim iyi
gan t akk weḥd sen
ur lliɣ ara heddreɣ
ma yella ur tcemreḍ ara i yiɣalen ik
a yemma anwa i ṛuḥen ar tmurt n baba ḥnini
ad ten tseggmeḍ
ur zmiren ad bdun ma ulac iyi

di leɛnaya k steqsi ḥedd nniḍen
nuɣal d tameṭṭut d tmeṭṭut is
mi ɛeddan kraḍ waguren terfed tadist
tḥemmleḍ ad tiliḍ weḥd k
fakeɣ asent tent
d rray n lɛali
seg wasmi i iruḥ ur d yuɣal
d lekdeb ma tella tefsut deg temdint
aql i ttidireɣ taceqquft n umezgun ur nettfakka ara
yiwet n tmettant maca aṭas n ssebbat
mačči d ayen ara ɣren
mačči d tidet
tekkreḍ i wedrar s tqabact
tewwi as d yemma s tameṭṭut si tmurt n maṣer
iɛemmed ad teḥazen ilefḍan
yiwen usalas ur ittseqqif axxam
yusa d yuba si boston
d ayen i d yeglan s tyitiwin d uḥbas n waṭas n yimeɣnasen
awal isefsay uzzal
hbej meqqar ayakka tzemret
tuɣal as lqahwa d ccemma
a tawaɣit n lɛulama n ccariɛa akked ifarisiyen
tewwim d iman nwen
qelbem tawṛiqt
kra i ḥawten deg s ur d yenni awal
tin n yilmeẓyen ur tekcim tḥerci
tgiḍ tt am tezwart uqbel ad tebduḍ tullist ik
ẓenneg
timɣureḍ txedmeḍ fell i
ad as ten tefkeḍ

aṭas i xeddmen aya
tṛebbaḍ aksum
am wakken daɣen yetturaǧu ad d yili uttekki n waṭas n yinaẓuren ara yilin ugaren akk tizrigin i iɛeddan
ayen i d ifka wass yečča t yiḍ
ad as tent id tawim
ur ssineɣ ara leṣlaḥ iw
ta d tarzeft i kečč
bɣiɣ ad ṛuḥeɣ ar uɣerbaz s tkeṛṛust mačči ɣef uḍaṛ
amger ur iwala ara leɛwej is
a weḥci a weḥci qqimeɣ weḥdi
netta yella ikerrez tewwi as ad yečč

wali amek i itteddu
ur d ayen ara m iɛeǧben
ma yella kunemti teɣramt yerna teḍra yawent akka
yessedhay llufan nni i t izedɣen
d taddart n saḥel di tɣiwant n buzgan sebɛin n yikilumitren ɣef temdint n tizi uzzu
fkiɣ asen umlan yelhan
rran asent tt id
ad t yegg rebbi d sseɛd

laqen iyi idrimen

ad aɣ sseɣlin
d učči yelhan

ɣṣeb

amecṭuḥ yif ameqqran

ad as nales

d acu tt twaɣit agi

zger abrid

ttum tom

tameṭṭut nni terra as d azrem i yi iɣurren dɣa ččiɣ
nemlal d deg usarug
ur yezmir ara ad d isali azegrir n iɣewwaṛen
ur iyi teǧǧi ara maca ḥulfaɣ i yiɣisi gar anteɣ
ur d yuɣal ara seg udrar
ad izwiɣeɣ ad ttwaliɣ akkin d wakka amzun wid iyi d yezzin kecmen deg wallaɣ iw
ssneɣ k akken i iwata akken ad k amneɣ
awer nečč amessas awer neddu ḥafi
ad d teddu seg wat mlawa
ad teččenčen ɣriba tizebgatin n uẓref
tewwi t tiṭ is
ur tt ḥemmlen ara
ɛni yefka yak lmelḥ ufus

ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣaleḍ ar boston

ayen ur sɛiɣ ḥedd

tura aql aɣ di tallit tatrat
yuɣal d uḥdiq

nawa ara d afen ɣer tama nsen
ad nerr alim gar yiqbucen
d aneɛṛuḍ uwasif

d lqahwa i itess

telhiḍ

di leɛnaya m qqim da
twejdem akk
ṭṭezdam nni i tufiḍ wissen ma n tom
beṛka ken aɣenni
ma ur ssawḍeɣ ara ad ten ceyyɛeɣ ɣer tseqqamut tamcarekt yettabaɛen ɣer tselwit n tesdawit n tizi uzzu
ay afṛux ɛjel ɛelli
yerkeb di lbabur iruḥ iɣab am yetri
ur ttmeslayemt ara
ṛebban iyi d ad ttaggadeɣ tafekka w
d akayad
akken xeddmen akk yinuban gar asen
yewwi k nadam yakan deg kra n temlilit
rgagint tgecrar iw ur ẓriɣ ara acu ara xedmeɣ

xtaṛent tt
helkeɣ lehlak d imexfi wehmen ṭṭebba ɛewqen
rnu xemmem
arma d melmi ara teqqimem deg japun
tura mi twala iman is s tadist teḥqer iyi
nḥemmel tudert s yijeǧǧigen d waman ḥlawen
yasuɛ issečč xemsalaf n yirgazen
mi kecmeɣ ufiɣ afrag yeččur d tidencin iɣef tefser tazart
taɣenust thegga
ad tizmireḍ ad iyi d tesɛeddiḍ aman ma ulac aɣilif
am wi ittqezziben i umcic
snummen as ad tettlusu lḥiǧab seg imi tessaweḍ ukuẓ n yiseggasen
tesla i zzhir n tkerrust n urgaz is teḥbes d ɣer tewwurt
anda yewwet ubeḥri ad t yawi
anwa i d aqjun ik
d ayla w wiyi
bezzaf tḥerseḍ iman ik ɣef wayen ur ibanen ara
uhulibama tesɛa as d yaɛuc yaɛlam akked quraḥ
tteɣraṣet ma tenwam
lemmer medden akk am kečč
tezhiḍ
ad nidir ussan nneɣ
d azɣal aqli sekkfeɣ snat n tebyirin
imir nni knan seǧǧden zdat s
iyyaw ad nurar ma tebɣam ulli d wakraren
taxsayt iw gar yimsenda
d tayri ines tamezwarut i iruḥen am waman n udfel
iceyyeɛ ak n tom kra n tɣawsa
bḍan asent t id
tura ɛeqleɣ ken
seg udaynin asmi s d bran ur yumin ad yesɛu ccan
tesnuffus s tmara
ttweṣṣin iyi ad uɣaleɣ ad mmeslayeɣ akked yimdukal iw
meɛqulit at iɣezfanen n ufus
tewwet iyi tefremlit tissegnit
ur teẓriḍ ara
ssusfeɣ
i wakken ad teddu tigawt agi ddu ɣer iɣewwaṛen sakin efk tasiregt n tkatut i usnas
d itran i t ittwanasen
ilaq taqbaylit deg uɣerbaz amezwaru
ḥemmleɣ tiḥdayin imi skiddibent
ul is d ahaggaṛ
yeccetka fell as
cukkeɣ tḥeqqreḍ iyi
askuti d ungal n saɛid seɛdi
wi k illa
n wanta tamurt kečč
azekka ad d yas
nḍaɛ
yeqquṛ uqeṛṛu yim
yekrez unyir is
ass n ttlata sin mraw u xemsa yunyu sin n wagimen u mraw yiwen
ay at yiɣil n at ɛissi
d aṭṭan kan i tuḍneḍ tura aql ik teḥliḍ
tura fehmeɣ t id
fukkent tent
tsettemt akken iqwem
ma nniɣ i wayeḍ yya ad d iṛuḥ
wekkden d i tikkelt nniḍen s keffu n lebni n tnezduɣin deg taggara n useggas
tettazzal
tefram taluft nni
caḍeɣ ur swiɣ
yeqqes it uzrem
ad asent t yefk
d irgazen i nella yerna d atmaten
i wawal aqesḥan err awal aẓidan
yuba yecḍeḥ d mary
illu iwala belli tafat d ayen yelhan
tbeqqa i temddukal is slam
assa d lḥedd
lḥubb iw yeqdem d sḍid gar yiɣsan im
acḥal yelha
sser ma drus ma igget messus
d amehbul winna anef as
ffeɣ a laẓ kcemm a tawant
ikfa ṭṭbel ifra wurar
mkul yiwen d acu yurga mkul targit s lmeɛna s
rǧu
abeɣḍi ur iḥemmel agḍi
awal ɣef usmeskel amutlay
rran as t id
simmal yettwaway uqbayli s tesnakta i as d yennan ilaq ad tesɛuḍ taflest s teɛrabt simmal tɛerreq teqbaylit iderrem yidles
ur ttebdad ara deg tlemmas n ubrid ad tettmmeslayeḍ ruḥ ɣer lqahwa
teddiḍ asen di nneqma
theddnent
yuba d amarikan
sɛiɣ kan tayri ad am tt muddeɣ i lebda
yuba yenɣa t leɛziṛ
fakken awen tent
cukkeɣ d ta i d ssebba iɣef ur wen ɛǧibeɣ ara
ur terrimt ara aḍar
ur yecfi ara fell asent
teǧǧa tt ṣṣeḥḥa
gulleɣ ar nenfu wala laɛquba ɣer yilfan
tislit n unẓar tcebbeḥ igenni
lalla m d tasedda yehban s ṣṣifa
ɛni temxellem
ɣef kul taɣaṭ mmi s d izeṛzeṛ
ahat d nekk ara k imeḍlen
adfel deg udrar ssemm is deg uẓaɣar
lexwal d izmawen aḥerbi ur yettrus
ǧǧiɣ imawlan iw fell am
ini as ayen ik yerḥan
aten a ttrajun aɣ
awtul yuɣal d ačeqlal mi t yeẓra yizem yerwel
mmesfalten taxessaṛt
sarameɣ ad sɛuɣ aṭas n yedrimen
nettɣaḍ kemm d nekkini
ifka yas times i teẓgi
wwin k yid sen
tella deg yiwet tkerrust tettqabal d tawwurt tameqqrant n tkebbanit
ɛeddi ad teččeḍ imi yeḥma wučči
teqqim armi terɣa teccuyt
nwiɣ tebɣam ad terjum
ittel yiles iw
akken i as yenna bṛiṛuc ayen iyi sbezgen ad k iṛuc
sit da
ihḍeṛ d tom
beɛden ɣef wallen n wid i ten yessnen
i icennun d urrif i iceṭṭḥen d lkif
terfed d ɣur i allen is abrid s lɣaci yeččur
iṭṭef itt id ansi zuret
ittas d ɣer da snat n tikal deg yimalas
ilaq ujeṛṛiḍ n tuqqna i telɣa tilawt n usendeh
wi d arraw iw
eǧǧ iten
ad isebbel umcic tacriḥt
ad ɣ t fken
nefka yak t id yakan
ani yekka buseḥṣel ad d yekk busellek
ur yebɣi ara ad t yeǧǧ iman is seld tadyant yeḍran
d tin ara ixedmen axxam is
aqcic a yeɣra aṭas
yemla asent d acu ara xedment
meslay s ttawil
tella d tmeddit illa d ṣṣbeḥ d ass wis sin
s anda i tettedduḍ
acḥal ur neqqerṣ ara
i tenna nna mennun
d wagi i d isem iw ay at leɛraḍ
tamazirt mm yebriden
yugurten u muḥ iqureɛ tiziri tagawawt
nekk ddiɣ d tugdut
tḥulfa i tseggnit tenta deg yiɣil is
yecbaḥ ad d naru fell as
ayɣeṛ i teṭṭalayemt tom
ad tent tseɛfemt
as d ad iyi teẓṛeḍ
arma tnuda tufa
lukan ad tzewǧeḍ yid i ad am sselseɣ tayri w deg uḍad im
neṣber am iqnac di tessirt
ad ɣ t tɛeṛḍem
sliman u muḥ yettemsefham d tiziri tagawawt
d acu kan ur ttawi ara mmi ɣer dinna
smektayen iyi d acḥal yelha mi ara tegreḍ irebbi i mmi m
bḍan akent tt id
ay ass fell i yefran
amek i m qqaṛen
yessaggad uzekka
tsebɣem asent tt
ineɣma ur tt yufi ara
yettmeslay diɣen yuba taɛrabt
telha tmacahut ma tettfakka s lferḥ
wi yezlan rric ḍemneɣ as lɛic
ur t ẓriɣ ara
deffir udrar zdat udrar abrid arama d anar
nettat ur d teclig deg wacemma
tagnawt fell i ad temmar
nniɣ as telliḍ txeddmeḍ
taneqqiṭ a d taxatart mliḥ
bɣiɣ lukan ad m d cnuɣ yiwet n tezlit akken kan i tt uriɣ
feṭṭuma tenna d argaz iw s idammen ɣef ddemma n ṭṭhara
icedha aṭas arraw is
ad teddumt yid neɣ
sliman u muḥ ur yerri ara tiririt i tiziri tagawawt
ay aɛessas n uxxam
yekker ubaxix
afemt d amcic nni
tefhem
inalmaden ṭṭreḍqen d taḍsa
akken win yellan yettru
ẓẓur deg neɣ yetḥennec
am win issenduyen qeḍran
temlaya ɣ d timentilin is
ddiɣ d inebgi s axxam
yella kra ur neɛdil ara
aselmed deg zzayer yif it lḥif
ansa i tɛedda teqcicit nni
yiwen ur yebɣi ṭṭraḍ
ur itett ara imensi
tazitma d tamrart s wayes ttarzen atmun ɣer uzaglu
ma yella teffeɣ d i lmul nni n lxedma d leqraya
a tt an tarwa n farḥat farḥat isɛa d dda bṛahim naḥuṛ akked aṛan
bezzaf n tfenda i d terra marie
isuɣan d yimeǧǧiden n tlawin
yal yiwen s ccɣel is
d acu i tebɣiḍ ihi
ha t an ɣer tewwurt n tnezduɣt yettwali aɣ d
bɣant ad d awint akanic ar wexxam
arraw n yahuda ɛir unan cila firiṣ akked ziraḥ
d ayen ara d yeḍrun
kkseɣ ak awal rriɣ ak tamment
ad tettnezzih ɣer temdint yettnuddumen ciṭ ciṭ arma yiwi tt akk yiḍes
yeṭṭes din din
čenčen zebgi ixreb leɛqel iw
kulci ad iɛeddi
berrḥen d anejmaɛ
d lawan n ṛṛḥil ar uɣerbaz
rriḥa s ad teɛǧeb i umeɣlal
yella yesmikriḍ
wwiɣ d lviza ar kanada
iwwi tafat s wudem
isurifen n uɣyul almend uẓekkun i s tefkiḍ
iweṣṣa yi
nniɣ as kker yugi
kečč d aḥric seg unezgum

wwint k yid sent

yeqqim
yetturaǧu ad yettwafraq deg tmeɣra n usfugel n yennayer n sin igiman d tẓa twinas d ṣa tmerwin
wali amek i iteddu
taqcict nni ixedmen am urgaz i asen selleɣ qqaren deffir i
ad sent t id awint
win ara yesseɛlin iman is ad d ittwanfeḍ
yeccelqef itt s yiwen n yiɣil
tecbeḥ ddunit
twezneḍ iman ik
anwa arebit ur nenguga
tinhinan tḥemmel amayas
ur k ttaǧǧaɣ ara lameɛna ad xedmeɣ ayen akk i k d nniɣ
igerrez as lḥeṭṭa
yuba yuɣal d awraɣ

taṣebḥit aya i d nemlal
bḍu yas tt id
ttkel
d awezɣi ur cukkeɣ ara a tt yexdem
msefhament
ad m d ruɣ ad m d sḥissfeɣ
amek i t nudan
tthabet amkan iw iqedsen
nehḍeṛ idelli

ɛiwed swadda
anwa i tessen
iḥbes ugeffur
i gma k anda i yella yusa d neɣ yeqqim
mcettament seg yiḍaṛṛen armi d aqeṛṛu
rsen deg yal tiɣmert deg texxamt nni
swakka yusef iqqim dinna di lḥebs
gen di talwit a gma ifis remḍan d awezɣi ad k nettu
fakken asen ten
mačči nwen
ḥbsemt tom
teẓẓel ɣef tgertilt
txedmeḍ ccɣel nni i am fkiɣ
tfakemt as tent
yella d aɣbalu n laman i d yettak i yal yiwen deg uxxam
yuker asen tikti nsen
a mm tqamumt n tyaziḍt
ddin yettarra aḍris aseklan yettabaɛ kra n tesnakta
awtul n beṛṛa d izem n uxxam
ifrax leqḍen iwzan
yal aselmad yesɛa ass i deg ara iɛas deg ubaraz
ula d kunemti
ḍeqqer amrig nni
ayɣer i teggummam ad d tinim tidet
ayla w atan dihin
ma tebɣam
tsellem tikwal i uẓawan aklasiki
muḥemmed buḍyaf d aselway n lezzayer yettwanɣan srid ɣef tilivizyu tazzayrit
d tamɣart a d griɣ weḥd i
tesmektiḍ iyi d meqqar ddwa inu
aḥric amezwaru send ara t tenɣeḍ aḥric wis sin seld ara t tenɣeḍ
aṭas n uwennet i ufiɣ
ad s t fkent
yefhem
tedduɣ akked jeddi ɣer taksawt
ad iyi tseɛfem
ɣef wacḥal ssaɛa i yennum yidir itett imensi
ṭṭfeɣ t id
ur tekkateḍ ara uzzal
ɣiwel s axxam
amek ara yefru ssuq is
amennuɣ i usizdeg n tesdawit seg tuddsiwin yeskuffren tilelli d tugdut
imdanen ttun d akken sɛaya ur teɛni ara kan idrimen
lewkil nni ixdem akken i s d inna yusef
zgiɣ d lmut i ttarguɣ
haṛun irra as di leɛnaya k ur reffu ara a sidi
tɣabeḍ ussan a
ur ssiriden ara ifassen nsen uqbel ad ččen lqut
ur tettruḥu ara ɣer tesdawit
ma telliḍ tamdint tefreḥ iberdan is d lmesbaḥ
la ismejgir s wawal
ṛajumt daki yakan
simlil itt neɣ ad tt simlileɣ
ay aɛeggun
tewɛer tesnakta a tamaynut armi llan yirgazen i kkatent tlawin nsen ɣas ur ten ifent deg tezmert
daymi i ttwalin kra n waggagen yewwi d aḥader seg tikti a i izemren tegber tikti nniḍen
d tajapunit kemm
yal tirect s ukwerfa
d afermas
ad yesteqsi rebbi fell am s lxir
tebda
ɣef waya tira tgerrez ama deg usenfali neɣ deg umawal
d aḍummu i ṭṭummuɣ arazen a nnger nwen
kcem tura ɣer tama n tarawt
temxellemt akk
tella tin i yeṭṭalayen
yal tagnit tesɛa awalen is
deg tsuret imedyazen ameskar n leqran iwet d deg wid akk yessefrawen
ur wwiḍent ara tlata n sswayeɛ i ɣ d yegran
ibeccan
iban
melmi temẓi ifilku mi d ikker irekku
atan gar icangalen
teslamt as neɣ ala
wama dagi deg tmurt iɣunfa zzman yugar ucerrig tafawet
xḍu k i lekdeb
awal d amezwaru aneggaru iwwi t waḍu
anda i d tezga tesdawit n bgayet
tagi yiwen is yella

jerḥen yemjuhad
ur ruḥeɣ ara ɣer temḍelt
ad iyi ten tefk
mi truḥ tekfa ad as yexlef
ur ibeddel deg s wacemma
tṛuḥem ɣer bgayet yakan
ulac aɣilif
tebra i wallen is
aql iyi ur xeddmeɣ ara
beṛka aḥṛiṛet
am akken negrent tissas
mennaɣ as iḍ yelhan
ccah di ṛṛay nneɣ

tkellxemt iyi

yenna yid zgelli

teffeɣ seg iger s asuki
tebha
tafaska n ufexxaṛ neɣ n talaxt tettili d di temnaḍt n mɛatqa di tizi wezzu
ssurefet iyi
ad k tt teɛṛeḍ

iserreḥ iyi ad ruḥeɣ

iwacu tugdem

d inelmaden iw

imi tḥemmel itt mliḥ

atan la yettali lefjer kul wa axxam is ijmeɛ it
ferḥen s tikliwin

ttnadin ad s hedṛen

uddin as

d leqdic

urgaɣ targit ma ulseɣ tt i udɣaɣ ad iru

ur tuminem ara tom yak
d tuffra n uɣyul deg utemmu

dda ɛli isɛa d karim akked ḥamid akken i llan iderman nsen

acku iḥuza t wayen i as d tenna

telluẓ
ḥemmleɣ timacinin

d netta iwumi i yefka ayen akk yesɛa

fkan tt tezwzǧ ar lɛerc n at menṣuṛ

teẓṛam t

neslek

ad d tawi udi ur icuḥ
deg tallitin yezrin
ceḥḥa tugi yusef asbizzer yugi ɛmaṛa

ad uɣalent ansa i d kkant

nḥac

am buxus yefkan afus

mi ara ineqqec iger wellah ar yif tayuga
zuɣer icifaḍ ar tafeḍ isebbaḍen

yemmut

aqcic a d aqeddac

qqimen di lḥebs acḥal n wussan

ɛerqent iyi

mḍel lmegget ik

ur teẓwireḍ ara deg s

d acu i ɣ ixuṣṣen
ur zmireɣ ad azzleɣ ttqerriḥent iyi twerẓa w
tusa d ad yi tawi
welleh ar d ɛemrayen
tefṛeḥ
kra ur ɣ icewwel
tebda kan tekkat lehwa yemmekta d mm uxelxal
ad s ten iqeddem d asfel i tečča tmes

d netta i d aqerru n uxxam
mlelliɣ

ur tnuda fell aneɣ ur aɣ tufi
a sidi di leɛnaya k ma ur tezwareḍ zdat n uqeddac ik

rebḥent

tfaz deg lecɣal a

nekk d tacinwatt
ziɣ ur tuklaleḍ
wwin tent

učči aqbayli bnin

tugimt ad tserrḥemt
yerra yasen ten id
d nekk ay terza tyita
yeṭṭarḍaq useklu

ifṛeq itt

yiwen n lxiḍ i d ad t yeṭṭfen
s wakka i yeṣber isḥaq ɣef yemma s
ad tent id mmagren

twalaḍ amɣar nni yettlen deg ubernus
ad ak d yerr adrar d luḍa

qqimet dagi tɛiwzem
ddunit seg zik tessaram ad tt id mmagrent treḍbanin

ixeddem tom

yuzur

mmtemt s leɛqel
acimi i tzeɛfeḍ
d baba iyi d yennan
kullec iɛedda akken iwata

tebɣam učči
deg anwa asensu ara tittiliḍ

qṛib

ad t tamnemt

anida ken a yirgazen

ilaq ad twaliḍ amejjay
ferɛun isemma yas i yusef ṣufnat faɛniyaḥ

tessufɣeḍ tt i yiberdan

ad tent id yekkes

kečč d afransis
ur sawḍeɣ ara ad as iniɣ yella kra n diri iyi d iḍerrun
tfettet tḥedduft teggergeb itt tweṭṭuft meqret taluft tkeḥḥel tceqquft
tuɣal tettxemmim ɣef uzekka n warraw is ara d yekkren d igujilen
ula d win i d ilulen deg uxxam is ad yečč
ldiɣ tabburt ḍalleɣ ɣef umcum
ulac win yellan

ad neqqel
ay administratif teǧǧel telkett yenaya s ukured akem aɣeɣ
musa yenna i haṛun d acu i k ixdem ugdud agi armi i t teǧǧiḍ ixdem ddnub yecban wagi

amdan fiɣef ur tettkilleḍ ara
a timeḥremt n leḥrir isem im melluca
a tagmart yeččuren abrid

ales d isem im

ur teččimt acemma
ad d yas tameddit a

yeɣli

d kemm i xtareɣ
ɣelben aɛraben s umceččew
