rrant ak ten id
seɣti ten
a ṣṣut iw rzu fell as
yeffey d si lhebs ass n tmenṭax meɣres alef u ttɛemya u waḥɛd u settin
ɣelqet t
yuba yermes
imekken iman is i tmenjeṛt
xedmen axeddim yelha
temlal tasa d way turew deg uɣerbaz amenzu hacmi d warraw is n taddart n tḥanut
kra ur k itt xasa
d taqbaylit i kem id yefkan
mačči kifkif ifrax
gen di talwit a gma afaa naim d awezɣi ad k nettu
nerna d acu i nerna yekker urgaz iruḥ ɣer ssuq
d taqbaylit kan i d tutlayt n imawlan iw
ur yessexlaḍ ara
ɣur i yiwen umdakel baba s d aneggal mucaɛen
terriḍ aɣ tt id
ur ḥemmleɣ ara ad iliɣ weḥd i
ad s tt fken
efk iyi cwiṭ n wakud ad t id mmektiɣ
igerrez a tom amek i tettiliḍ
aqli nniɣ am d
sekcem isem ik n useqdac da
anda t ɛemmi m
gen di talwit a gma seddi lamara d awezɣi ad k nettu
rran as leɛmeṛ telli tqeḥbit dagi
ẓẓay mačči d afessas
tebda tḥesseb itent id s yismawen nsent akken ma llant
iger d ddunit aman d tudert
tmeɛneḍ mliḥ
amek i ak qqaṛen
yettnadi dima ad yefhem
ad iyi t tɛeṛḍem
ẓriɣ mačči d abidun i tebɣa
atan japun
d ccyaḍ i d yettalin ɣef wul is

err d i yisteqsiyen iw
yeɛya umdan di lqaɛa
teldiḍ tawwurt ma tsekker
ahat yeɛya

d tacḍaṭ ik ay nettraǧu

ɣaḍen kem
amek ara yeffeɣ leḥkem is
aql i selleɣ ak d
ttexfan
tirmit iw akked waṭṭan n teskiẓufrinit
aɛeṭṭar nni yemmekta d bab is yuɣal yeqbel
atekki n yimselmen deg tsertit d axater mliḥ i tmetti
gen di talwit a gma amini karim d awezɣi ad k nettu
mačči d amkan anda ara tkecmeḍ s lqahwa
tamacahut n umqerqur d temqerqurt
rran asen tt id
rriɣ allaɣ iw ɣer deffir amzun ugiɣ ad amneɣ
tɛedda tilas
cukkeɣ tettwakellexeḍ
tameṭṭut lɛali ḥseb itt d aterras
wwiɣ ak d kra n yisefken
d awezɣi ad iliɣ am tiyaḍ i nniɣ deg yiman iw
leqbayel tečča ten tmes
mazal iken da
kečč ay isli ay amnay aras
heḍṛeɣ yid s yakan
d abrid i ɣ d iwwin ara ɣ irren
mačči srid i walaɣ lmač nni
yettfuktin yif tiɣezza
ddreɣ d d taqcict s tmara
saɛid u muḥ yessuter smeḥ stidet i tiziri tagawawt
ad sen t fken
win iw yugar win im

ih tufiḍ tt id

tuzen asent id tabrat

mačči d sser
ur skiddib ara felli s wallen iw i t walaɣ mi yekcem ɣer uxxam
win yeṭṭsen ar azal ad d yettazzal

d nekk i iḍelmen

ɛni teččam
uggadeɣ ad iyi d yuɣal lehlak nni
ad ncekker tislit
yemma s tewhem deg s

nɛedda tilas
uɣalen d s temɣawla akken i d wwḍen ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ uccen ijelleb yerwel
da i lliɣ si zik

musa akked haṛun xedmen akken i sen d yumeṛ umeɣlal
liḥala s tgezzem tasa
ur iban ara yiswi d acu t

imiren ad yerr ɣer temsensut n tesdawit
ifakk ak tt
a lalla a lalla
d acu i m iruḥen
ihi d acu i tebɣam

attan zerriɛa
xtiṛ yiwen n wemdan
awal s wayes i ɣ ssumnen
ur ineqq ara usaru n leḥrir

ilaq ad teččeḍ kra n lḥaǧa

sel d mliḥ

ad tɛeddim ar wexxam

rnu axuxi
d zzella a winnat
adekkan

ad tt id temmekti
ḍurren kem

anda ara naf tin yettcabin ar tinna
d nettat i d yelhan s yikufan
tidet kan ur ẓriɣ ma ilaq ad rnuɣ ad ɛaceɣ
tiɣwist n wevyulu tecbeḥ mliḥ
tugim ad tserrḥem
aṭas i yestehzayen di tira s teqbaylit
d ibawen iw i ittewwan
yerna ula d sidi d amɣar
aql iyi deg uxxam
irfed ifassen is s igenni ad iɛenni
ur tettsetḥimt ur tettlazamemt
amek armi teččam isandwičen n belxadem ass nni deg bgayet
yeɛni ur ẓriɣ ma yella d sseḥ d tafekka nneɣ i yeɛyan neɣ deg wallaɣ kan itent nuɣ
teffeɣ it tillict
a yir ẓẓher iw
mmi d tamuɣli n ufalku
umnen ur yezmir ḥedd ad d yekk gar asen
axxam i t ibennun d tayri d lebɣi
acḥal aya nekk d anadi ɣef udlis a
ur zmireɣ ara ad ttuɣ ass nni
tebɣam ad tkesbem imelyaṛen

trewlem

rewlemt

wukud i teddam

ur ttiddimeɣ ara akka
tettnefsusi fell as tɛekkemt

yesɛa tuyat

yuker itent
i yessnen lmesk d aɛeṭṭaṛ

anda yedda d laɛnaya

zeddigit waman agi

atan yuba ɣef ssebba

zegret abrid

yesserwa yas baba s tiqaqqacin

anwa i yellan dihin
mi ara teṭṭileḍ deg yinelmaden is

drus wanect a

ḍset

sṛuḥen tent

jbed iman ik ar deffir

a wer nekker

si leǧmaɛ ar leǧmaɛ ad d yas bujmaɛ
sfunzer

tura i d mmektant
ad wen yili wass nni d ccfawa ara tettɛeggidem i umeɣlal
ḍeggreɣ d iman iw si ṭṭaq
nedmeɣ imi ur ṣfiɣ yid m

nwen wa
ad zuxxeɣ yess kent merra

yiwen n wass ad d yuɣal alamma d da

ass amcum
anda tent tullas nniḍen

ad iḥewwes yid i

ad twehmeḍ

isseṛwa cclaḍa i uɣyul
ur tessengareḍ ara aḥeqqi netta d umesbaṭli
am wakken daɣen i yetturaǧu ad ilin yirmad nniḍen deg unnar sya ɣer sdat s yisem n ugraw agi

bdiɣ s tira

ur cfiɣ ara ma ssutreɣ ak d ad iyi d tefkeḍ rray ik
d anecreḥ kan i ttnecraḥeɣ
d leḥsab i d yefka uɣlif n tezmert deg yiwen n wulɣu
tettarram aɣ deg uɛewwiq
d lawan ad tcemmṛemt iɣallen nkent
sseḥmaɣ
eǧǧ sliman u muḥ ad iṛuḥ
zzin as am tweḍfin i iniɣem
la kent sseqdacen
s tezmert nwen
tistan nni icemten iwumi i d iqqim kan ugwlim ɣef yiɣes ččant sebɛa n testan nni icebḥen iqewwan
ḥaca ulac i dir
ssaɛid seɛdi tura yerra tt kan i imagraden yettwennit d ayen iḍerrun
imaɣan a meẓẓiyit maḍi ikad yi d ur ttimɣuren ara
yezmer tom ad icucef
d tagi i d tagara nni
tesdukel as tigecrar is
ɣas tuli ssuma n lpitrul mačči i nekni
anwa ara yessiwḍen taninna ɣer uɣerbaz
ssuh ssuh ssehyani
abṛaham isɛa d isḥaq
amek zemreɣ ad d ssadreɣ tawlaft deg usmel ik
ur asent d tuqiɛ ara
teɣriḍ
ur d ttawi ara lhemm i iman ik
a ddin ṛebbi ayen akka iqjan qnen iǧadarmiyen ala
mazal it da
ad k yefk ṛebbi tazmart n tzemmurt
s lfeḍl ik a sidi ṛebbi
tayri m eǧǧ itt ɣur m
yelli rebbi tt am kemm mmi ad t rebbiɣ am nekk
yettimɣur usirem nsen
ḥemmleɣ acmumeḥ
iban belli kečči d aqcic uḥṛic
qqlen akk ar deffir
tettbinemt d thelkemt
tifawin
ldim allen nwen
tezger abrid
assa d letnayen
lwaldin am lexrif ass a llan azekka ulac
sliɣ d i kra n lḥaǧa
ma yella d inelmaden n yiswiren ineggura mazal ttṛaǧun ten id yikayaden
imsidag iqbayliyen ur ɛeggun ara
yeḍfer abrid igelliden is
slet d meṛṛa
beɛɛdemt iyi
rnu as asalay i yetturaǧun ad yettwabnu daɣen din i wayen akk yellan d tinḍi taqbaylit
ur ssineɣ ara ad xedmeɣ tasertit
ulac aɣrum ur nesɛi imassen
d wayi kan ay sɛiɣ
truḥ d taneggart
ihi d acu i tebɣiḍ
nniɣ d allaɣ is yeččur dayen kan
ur tezmir ara temgerṭ is ad terfeḍ aqerru s icuffen
din din ad tuɣal ɣer tirga s
issin anwa i d amdakel ik d wanwa i d axṣim ik
d yelli k ɣriba
xezzeṛ kan
d acu kan tudert ur tettak ara liseɛ
rẓan t
truḥ uqbel ad yi d tban
afrigu yella d ilem
nekk d amsuɣel
kra n leǧyub n tmelsa ines
sarament ad sɛunt aṭas n yedrimen
ur yebɣi ara ad yemmet
nekk ad wen iniɣ ur ttqamaret ara amcum
taselmadt asmi i ibda iɛennu tt id
wwin t s yiɣil
gar tizya s d ddehb d ubriz
uǧǧwen aman s llitra akal s lmitra
illu nsen ur yebɣi
ulac d acu i aɣ d iṣaḥen
yeggumma ad d yerr awal
d acu t winna i teṭṭfeḍ deg ufus im
testewtwemt iyi
ɣaḍent ken tidak
terra ten tmara ad mmeslayen i boule de suif
acu i txeddmeḍ akked teqcict nni n micli
d iman nwen i tḍurrem
zwiɣeɣ
tebɣiḍ ad m d aɣeɣ lewṭer
merrgeɣ tt
nettṛaju melmi ara d awḍen
yettru ɣef wayyur mi yuɣal d azgen
igen yid s uqbel ad myezwaǧen
iseṭṭel ibeddel llebsa dɣa wwin t ɣer ferɛun
tapurtugit d tutlayt tunṣibt deg xemsa n tmura n tefriqt
tessenzem iyi s yisem n zzwaǧ
idlisen a d iqdimen
ala ur ssineɣ ara gma k
tura drus i ikeččmen tinedlisin ttruḥun ɣer tpizziryatin
zgan tteɛraḍen ad iyi qennɛen
deg kent i yella
meqqṛen d s teqbaylit

aḥerrek ulac
tfakk am tent
akken i d uran taɣect a

ur merrɣeɣ ara iḍelli

anwa i yeččan

ḍefremt iyi d
bɣiɣ tiririyin
nekk labas i kemm

abrid n baylek

xtiṛ s ttawil

aya ad ken yesseḥmu
qlant t
cukkeɣ yuba yesɛa tabɣest

wali akk isental yemmden

xeṣreɣ

ah susem kan
ccrif xeddam d amedyaz n tidet

tekref

ad tent leqqment

ad yi txedɛeḍ

ɛelmeɣ s kullec

wamma imawlan ttfaten

ugar n unelmad nni yeqqaren kan neɣ win iqeddcen deg tddukli
sawalen iyi d imawlan iw yal ass
shewhiwen yeqjan
s wacḥal i txeddmemt aya

i wass a mi yi d thesseḍ
ahat teskerkiseḍ
amihi yezga d agmawan
uɣeɣ d tayuga n ssebbaḍ
acimi i tesneḥniḥem akka
nniɣ am kemm a yelli
kemmlem ccna
yasuɛ yella di tmazirt n gat camanim
ad ak issu ṛebbi idel ak
tura i d temmektaḍ
ɣef xemsa agi ixuṣṣen ad tesnegreḍ tamdint meṛṛa
ttmektayeɣ d
ad tent tamnemt
kra n win ara irefden ajenwi ad immet s ujenwi
di leɛnaya m xdem it
ddment tent zgelli
d wayen i d aɣ d iṣaḥen

tiṭ uyaziḍ s irden

surfet as

ugadeɣ ad triɛeḍ

sɛiɣ takarnit i tezmilin

yesseɛreq as lqebla
kkremt
s yiɣil aberkan i d yusa uɣrum acebḥan
nettezmumug nettaḍsa

ad s yettwakkes uɣrum deg imi s
ur d aɣ yerzi ara

ur ttqadaren ara
ikad iyi d fehmeɣ
tweṣṣa t yemma s
d ccahed i mazal ar ass agi ɣef uẓekka n meɛǧuṭa
ttwalin kent id s yir tiṭ

a ten an la ten nettwali

yers fell as lbur
msenɣalen iẓeṛman

serreḥ as ad iruḥ

azger yeɛqel gma s
argaz lɛali awal is dayem ittwamsal

azzel d

ttkel
yelbes isefreg

ur terni ara aṭas tguǧ

yella tom
acuɣeṛ ara teqqimeḍ di beṛṛa
am win teṭṭfeḍ ɣer lḥebs
teṭṭenṭnemt
ad d uɣaleɣ azekka

ulac fell as a yelli

ḥaren deg s watmaten is
ɣlayet cceṛba
ala steqsaɣ d kan
ayɣer i tḥemmlemt ad teqqimemt weḥd nkent
iṭṭamaɛ lxiṛ deg win ur d tgi yemma s
qqaren as aqejmur neɣ ageyyir
aɛalṭar nni ixdem it s tencirin yerna yeqqim d ilem
iɛeggalen n tdukkla asirem guraya d warrac i yerzan ɣer takkuct sɛeddan ass yelhan nezzeh
anwa ur nbeqqu ara ticenfirin am tid tesɛa sudaba

izwar ṭṭɛam taẓallit
i tura d acu tenniḍ
kemm tessneḍ amek ad as tṛuḥeḍ i ddunit
tumen belli tameṭṭut taqbaylit tezmer ad d tufrar deg yal taɣult
tzemreḍ ad tɛummeḍ
ala nniɣ am ruḥemt kan d nekk ara d izgen deg uxxam
ur zmireɣ ara ad d kecmeɣ acku a t an wwiɣ d lqahwa deg ufus iw
iṛuḥ wul ad d yekkes lxiq yufa n leḥbab d imuḍan
d aceṭṭaḥ i lliɣ
mi ara nwali acḥal i yettmettaten deg yiberdan
d acu i d wwint yid sent
ṭṭef as afus atan yettemdudduɛ akk
semlalen iman nsen gan as d amkan gar asen

meɛna anda i telliḍ
yuba yesrugmut
thennaɣ dayen kan
ur d ifki ara udem
yella ḥedd i akent id isawlen
ad wen t id tawi
musa yeffeɣ d sɣur ferɛun iɛenna ɣer umeɣlal

yella walebɛaḍ i yettnezzihen
i d yellan deg tallit taterkit

ikker umulab i llafaɛ

a tungift

yeɛreq yuba anaɣ

neṣbeṛ am iqnac di tessirt
aksum ɣef yiɣes yefsi
lqanun yeɛnan tiyita lǧerḥ akked lmut win ara yewten amdan inɣa t d lmut ara yemmet
aql i am yigider amerẓu i tt yuɣen deg wafriwen

ur whimeɣ ara mliḥ
ddaw tgelda n ɛebdelmumen ben ɛli ɣer lqern wis tnac

teẓriḍ amek heddren
tḥemmlemt taẓuṛi
d sidi ṛebbi ad yeqqim

igen tom

ar dinna i nteddu

zeɛbeḍ

a dadda win ɛzizen azrar deg lwizen
la ten tettnadimt
yekker ubaxix di luḍa

ass n i d nettlal
azul sɛiɣ tikti

ɛni zwarent ken
ur tessin ula i kra
ayen akk iɣef ara teqqim ad inǧes
tettemɛebbar d imeṭṭi ɣef yixef n lecfur itt yugaren
lxir iw lxir ines
fell i i turamt asefru nni
tewwḍeḍ iswiyen ik

fiḥel ma ẓriɣ kem
icerreg lebḥeṛ mwexxaṛen waman
a ddunit a mm tedyanin

texḍa yi temsalt n ddin
gma abesṭuḥ tṛebba t setti
tira tettɣimi d
tura akka akken i d tewwi teɣbalut nneɣ
ma ulac aɣilif sɛeddi yi d ẓrudya
ṭṭes s ukalṣun ad tennefsusiḍ
ad d nawi lhemm

nɣan akk tid ur yettlusun ara lḥijab
tira d assesfer
ad nruḥ ad d nawi tislit

ur iḥemmel ara ad iruḥ s ixxamen n medden

ungif
yeddem d akersi
rnu yiwen seg yisnulfuyen is ur yettcabi wayeḍ
d anelmad i lliɣ
deg tlata n yiseggasen i tesɣaray
ihi mačči nekk kan
lliɣ d nneyya
els iselsa m
immut yiwen n umeɣnas n yizerfan n umdan ass a
ur asen tefki tezmert nsen amek ad qqimen i laẓ imi ula d imsujjiyen nsen ttwessin ten dima i tgella
nruḥ deg sent
asif wis sin isem is giḥun izzi d i tmurt meṛṛa n kuc
ayen tettḥussu

kul tikli itubeɛ itt lkil
s draɛ i qebleɣ ad ffɣeɣ d yid s

feṛḥeɣ ak

ttqadaṛemt

ẓdec yettijiq s lǧahd n taɣect

d baba m tom

ad k tt tefk
ttwaɛerḍeɣ
anda tebɣiḍ ad nruḥ
err akka
teɣli ɣer yifassen n maziɣ ur d tewwi s lexber
ad d ɛeddiɣ ɣur k azekka

i wuddem n ṛebbi

ttnadin k
beɣɣuɣ kan ad ṭṭseɣ maca zzhir deg uqerru w ur yi iǧǧa ara
ɣer dihin
netta mi ara isel i lehdur am wi
ɣer yillu ddunit tefsed
ad as tekkseḍ afus i tsebbalt

ur ttzuxxu ara
nekrent
d tirgin ḥafi

ferru n temsal gar watmaten
zemreɣ ad kem awiɣ ɣer unafag iḍ a
yewwi d ad yettwasemres s teqseḥ usaḍuf ɣef wid yebɣan ad kksen azal i tmeṭṭut
d nekk i yessa d agris
iruḥ gefgafi
ttsewwiqeɣ yal ttlata
dɣa ameɣlal iɣleq tabburt n lbabuṛ deffir n nuḥ
d tutlayt taqbaylit i d tafat nsen

ar wanda i ten tefkiḍ
ad iyi t tɛeṛḍeḍ
yečča
yerfed umɣar afus is tuɣal d tsusmi
ur tettuḍ kra
inna yasen a ssyadi
ula d kenwi
ass a ad d mlileɣ d mmi s n leḥṛam d unekkaṛ lxir
neɣ ahat d nekk kan i iɛewjen
bɣiɣ ad sɛuɣ takeṛṛust
amedya nexdem yakan ussan n useɛlem ɣef yisafaren n usuddem n uyefki
ger tiṭ ɣer wayen d ǧǧan
ṛebbi ittseqqi di lḥila iṣeḥḥan
yuɛeṛ mliḥ
ɣas nedder d azgen ilelliyen ɣas yella wanida txuṣ tlulebt aql aɣ nezga
yewwi kem yakan yiḍes di kra n temlilit
imi tettwaggez tlelli amirew yettuɣal d lwaǧeb
ur ḥebbes ara ɣef tqenṭertakked wadeg yettwaxedmen i yiɣallen n usellek
letthi d ccɣel im

temmutem

immut nnzuɛ is
inṭeḍ wanaɣ di teclalt

yal mi ara nennaɣ akka i ttximimeɣ

ttɣaman yal ass deg uxxam
ur fhimeɣ ara taluft a d acu tt
nnuɣen wway gar asen
wid itteɣraṣen
baba yewwi yi d cakula taberkant
yuba d iwizi
yuba yessaged iyi
mbeɛd mi mḥezwarent snat n tuddar a saḥel di buzgan akked lqelɛa n at ɛebbas deg yiɣil ɛli di bgayet

mazal it d aɛezri

a ten an warraw n raɛuwil naḥat ziraḥ cama akked miza

xdem aya
ma d tamaziɣt ttwaliɣ am wakken d ugur seg yidis asnilsan

tɣunzamt iyi ayɣer

dɣa iswi nsen d amek ara yeḥrez umdan tawennaḍt anda yettidir
ar d ilal tgeḍ as hlal
ulac xir n wakken
ur t yexdim ara d ccɣel
ad ak d smireɣ ttay neɣ lqahwa
ruḥeɣ ass n lexmis am wakken nummeɣ ɣer iwaḍiyen
di sin uqbel ad ɣ teččar
d win akken i yeɣɣaren deg tesnawit ara yimɣuren
ur d nerri ara agelzim s axxam
ɛawnemt aɣ d
i d yettmenni lxaṭer iw
ẓriɣ ad tt tfehmeḍ
wissen akk ma yella ad ɣren medden ayen akka d uriɣ
yeɛqub irra yas ur iyi ttak acemma
ad teslemdeḍ tutlayt taqbaylit i warraw im
abuhal inefɛen iman is
inimt aɣ d tidet
yestaqsa amṛabeḍ ɣef tuẓamin
win ur neqqaz ur itett
yella ḥedd i d yeɣɣaren ɣef yisem iw
war nnfeɛ ad immet axiṛ
s lebɣi w i xedmeɣ akken
mačči d leḥkem n lɛesker i ḥemmlen d ddel i nnumen
anwa i ak innan
mazal aẓar yuɣen di lǧedra yeqquṛen
tḥemmleḍ fṛansa
anwa ara k yamnen
ncennu s teqbaylit
ma telliḍ s idis iw ur sriɣ i kra nniḍen
wwiɣ d lviza ar ṭelyan
tufiḍ iman ik yid neɣ
ad as tiniḍ d asekles i tessekles
d acu i ken yuɣen
teḥwaǧeḍ kra niḍen neɣ zemreɣ ad ruḥeɣ
sɛerqeɣ as abrid
ur tettwaliḍ ara belli ceɣleɣ
tulmisin n talɣa n usefru ilelli deg tama
ma ulac ečč tazuḍla
ẓer deg leǧyub ik
deg tegrest d asemmiḍ deg tmurt n leqbayel
ha kif kif itent akk
iteddu yasent di nneqma
ad ak n sawaleɣ yal ṣṣbeḥ
uyseɣ ad k ẓreɣ tceṭṭḥeḍ
taluft nni ar ass a mazal tettḥaz imdanen
ad d tbineḍ am yetri weḥd m gar teyyiḍ
ɛni zwaren k
ssisen iyi tt id ttxil k
tbaneḍ mačči am tid nni i d ttceyyiɛen ussan a iɛeddan
zehwa tedda d tislit tewweḍ s axxam n urgaz is
ɣef wakken i d tewwi teɣbalut nneɣ ad yili meqqer uxxam a n tmussni
acḥal ara m d isqam uxxam a
ad am ibru ala tasa w ara icaḍen fell am
beṛṛa nnwen zdaxel nneɣ
uɣal s axxam
ggugmeɣ
teqqaṛem di tesdawit n bgayet
meskin yeɣli d si tzemmurt dɣa seg wass nni yewwet it karaf ɣer iḍaren
d amɣaṛ
si melmi yella akka lqanun di tmurt a
d nettat i yettlawin iman is s yiman is
yuba d win isebbṛen
isess itt neɣ yeznuzu tt
iɛreq as d ubrid
s yispenyulen deg useggas alef u xems mya u tesɛa
bnin seksu inem
tal tuttra ɣur s tiririt ines
yella kra n yiwen
illa ṛebbi d axellaf
tewwi d ayen i d tesseḥma
atan snulfan aɣ d ikanicen di tizi wezzu
azal n snat n ssamanat ma teɣli d tiqqit n ugeffur
kksen tamart nsen
teǧǧa ten ṣṣeḥḥa
ad ṛwuɣ tiḥlawatin
kksen t id
ur d yecliɛ ara seg wiyaḍ
yessens times nni s uḍar is
ma d arraw im yis sen i tbedd lezzayer
deg temẓi tenna yi yemma ɣer temɣer yenna yi baba
cfiɣ fell am
ayen i t yeǧǧan ad yezdi yid sen tamurt
lukan kan yal yiwen iletha d lecɣal is
ad wen tent tefk
azekka nni kkreɣ d zik akken ad rewleɣ
ɣeṛ aɣ d
d acu i d tamusni
yuɣal ṭṭelm ɣef umeksa
tḥemmleḍ ad teččeḍ tiɛesbanin
ad yekkes tadimt ad yebdu učči
a yemma d talafsa awi d kan awi d kan
ad sen aruɣ tibratin
lliɣ ḥwaǧeɣ littseɛ
anwa ara sḍelmeɣ
bḍan ak t id
ad d tawimt iseɣ
ruḥ xemmem mliḥ lexbar ad t id afeɣ ɣer ɣur k
melliḥet mliḥ
yettaḍsa yettnecraḥ wudem is mebla sebba
ad nebrez tura
yečča imensi is
uliɣ ass a s adrar
lbaṛaka deg wayla m a lalla
tenna d
rran t d aɣerbal s rrsas
ruḥ awi t id
kker nadi ɣef lejdud ik
sebɣent asent t
a tiziri terwid iyi
ad iẓer anda yedda laṣel is
ad k isserkeb ɣef ulɣem
ẓewqem as lemleḥ i lǧifa k
yal ass isawal yidir i newwara
tzemremt ad tɛumemt
ahat ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ tura
amek akka i d ittili wurar a
tessawḍeḍ ad teqqimeḍ
ttagaden imennan
dɣa yerfa mliḥ imi i t regmeɣ
azger yesserwet itent aɣyul yečča tent
ičča tiṭ n bururu
lliɣ ula d nekk am ufrux nni deg lqefs
ad irḥem ṛebbi taɛebbuḍt yettarwen
iḥemmel ad iḥewwes
yuba iqqim ittru
amek akka ihi i tturaren warrac dderya iqersen
ɣas ad ixas uzemmur yettili ddeqs n zzit
mi yessers uḥeddad afḍis irefd it mmi s
tmenɛeḍ ur k ikerrec ara
zgiɣ tedduɣ f uḍaṛ
rran tt id ɣer yir tudert i deg i tella i tikelt niḍen
ad tt teǧǧ tmacint
tneǧǧreḍ d iswi i ccetla
kker rfed aqcic teṭṭfeḍ t seg ufus
awit aɣ d ad nečč
bɣant ad ṛebbint iwtal
mmi amecṭuḥ yesɛa tusut iḍ kamel yettusu
kra n umzuxxu deg k
tekksem t id
fell as awal suguten
yerra as d asirem d akken llan wid yessnen ad idiren
lḥiɣ i ḥafi d ugris
yiwen ur y iwefeq
texleḍ tɣanimt d ujenjal
mačči d tanelmadt
cfan d i ṭṭrad iɛeddan
yebda la yettgalla
ṭṭal ar deffir
ur tezmireḍ ara i tidet
bɣiɣ ad iliɣ d talast
imir sɛiɣ yiwet temlilit d yineɣmasen deg uxxam n tɣamsa
llan daɣen wiyaḍ am evernote i zemren ad sqedcen medden meṛṛa
ad t teddem
tessebɣas iman is i ukayad n lbak i tt yettraǧun qabel
ad uɣalen ansa i d kkan
tessawaleḍ d seg ustṛalya
d wagi i d lqanun yeɛnan lberṣ
ɣilen s usṭuqqet n lehduṛ ara d ttwaqeblen
tuɣ inewweṛ uzzu tafsut d ussan aya mi tekcem
lexbar i d yettasen nɣan t ɣef uḍebsi n seksu
lsemt ayen yeḥman
baba lwali
yezga d tiyita di medden
d tawacult ik
selṭan ibɣa ad ak iẓer
akken d usant
teskerksem fell i
ur ttmuqquleɣ ara ɣer deffir
ad n yers mmi d llufan
ččemt
win i k iẓuren yugem
xas ugiɣ tidet ad m tt iniɣ
teɛya deg lehdur am wigi
amdan d ameɛlal
asmi i sɛiɣ tnac n yiseggasen
weḥleɣ
d allaɣ iw i t id ittexlaqen
ad asent t id tawim
fisaɛ
sell i wacu ara m iniɣ
taqbaylit tuɣ amḍiq wis tlata deg umaḍal deffir n teglizit akked telmanit
ma yella iqneɛ itt s rray
ilaq ad truḥ ad texdem
ḥedd ur igin
ur tennum ara tetteffeɣ deg iḍ
serrḥen ak ad truḥeḍ
yasuɛ ikcem s axxam n buṭrus
ɛyiɣ deg uskasi d wid ur nessin
seg wasmi i d kkreɣ akka
aksum s sshala i t id tekksen ɣef yiɣes
iwet iyi ubeḥri
fkan d lɣella wa meyya wa settin wa tlatin
tuker ikem
ayen illan di tasilt ad t id issali iflu
nwiɣ tettuḍ iyi ziɣ ala
ur zewǧeɣ ur reccleɣ
rnu aẓalim
tatiknulujit tura tezzi aɣ d si yal tama
zdaxel i llant
yenna as uḍeggal is anef as ad ternu kra n wussan
tesbeɣ as tt
ɛawen iman im
tettbanem twehmem
la tt tettnadim
cukkeɣ yuba d abɣas
iɛac ur yeksibyemmut ur d yeǧǧa
xdem akken i ak d yenna
uɣaleɣ d seg uɣisinni
ilaq ad nweḥḥed ṛebbi deg lqum yeččan tuẓeḍla
kecmem
tesɛam daɣen lbira
yella kra i d nniɣ yecmet
kul wa ayen iẓda ad t yawi
ay asmi i ččiɣ yemma
yedɣel urgaz nni
ad t leqqment
mi waleɣ seg m
gen di talwit a gma adara fuad d awezɣi ad k nettu
awi d kan ad jjiɣ
iheddeṛ s yiles ur as nelli deg ul
iseɣḍel d igenni ɣef tmurt
ayen i d tenniḍ akk meqbul
ad tent id yemmager
wali amaɣnu n useqdac
a ten an ad d teddun zziyaṛ
amek akka d acu lberhan ik sken d akka d acu umi tzemreḍ
d aluḍ anda i terriḍ
tugi ad d tuɣal
ulaqṛaṛ ad yali wass
ul is ur tt ibɣi ara
qqaṛent di tesdawit n bgayet
ssneɣ yiwen i izemren ad ɣ iɛawen
yettbin d igerrez
tɣunfaḍ t
ad temsenḍaḥem s ifassen
ad d awin iseɣ
kemmel dduṛt agi akked tagi sakin ad k nefk tayeḍ
tuffɣa meqqren mbeɛd tin n tefsut n yimaziɣen
d tigi i d lbaṛakat swayes i ten iburek baba tsen
ur hennaɣ ara deg uxxam
ur ttɛeṭṭileɣ ara ad d uɣaleɣ
d tarwiḥt i terfed di tɛebbuṭ is i tt yesfaqayen s ubeddel nni
txeddmem ɣef teqbaylit
tikwal yettbin iyi d lḥal qrib ad tenger
nesbeɣ it id
tessiridemt tuɣmas nkent yal ass
refden akk iɛekzan d leslaḥ ttmeslayen zdat n uxxam
ziɣen teqleb tewriqt iw
tenɣiḍ asent tent
yebɛed
ad yeglu yis sen
textareḍ d yiwen yelha
d tiqulhatin kan i d ccɣel is
habil d ameksa n lmal amecṭuḥ ma d kayin ixeddem akal
ma yella yal yiwen ur asen iseɛɛu ara lweqt
ad aɣ ten id yawi azekka
wigi d ǧilali ḥaddouc tullist azabuq tiziri ṭeyeb s tullist tabrat i talsa akked lyas belɛidi s tullist ṣayddu mayga
ɛeṛḍemt ugar
yendeh udrar yessawel a leqbayel ur qqaret taɛrabt yebnan aqunniz
ur ssineɣ ara
ur zmireɣ ara ad d sfehmeɣ ambiddel i yeḍran yid s
ɣas imawlan is ttaɛraḍen ad tt id rebbin d taqcict meɛna nettat tettidir am yiqcicen tetturar yid sen
ur d ittak ara ugudu lexrif
fkan asen abadaṛ
iwala tt id rebbi
ihi teskiddibeḍ
yiwen ur yeẓri kra
send mraw d semmus yulyu sin n wagimen d mraw d tẓa

tḥemmel addal
ula d kečč

jbut i iyuzaḍ nni ahat yečča ten yikɛeb

ddu
ur ssawaḍeɣ ara ad ṭṭseɣ

ur iɛawed ara ad iṭṭeṣ yid s

d acu yellan ma yečča remṭan

yyaw ad nelḥu
ur tesɛiḍ anda ruḥeɣ

ḍeggren t ɣer tessirt n tudert ad t tezḍ
bḍumt asen tt id

ay agejdur a tasilt

ur rrin ara aḍar

ur tturareɣ ara ddabex deg taggara n ddurt

dderya iwumi ur ččiɣ nnfeɛ dfeɛ

d acu t warraz inu

yezha yid s

yeksan wul is

ad tt id afen wiyaḍ

anda ara nruḥ

sɛiɣ asumer
ɛni d ṣṣeḥ

aḥbac ur t ikkat buseṭṭaf

yeḍsa tom
ikker yeɛqub iṛuḥ si bir cibaɛ

atta twaɣit

amek ttwanɣan
d tazmert n tzemmurt i ak nessaram

d taɣuri yuɛren

ataya urgaz la d yessawal

ur d yusi ara maḍi

tusem

anta meṛṛa i yeččan
mačči d win ara ixedmen axxam
dɣa yiwen n wass ad teglu s bab is
akken nummeɣ sutreɣ ad beddleɣ taxxamt
wisen ma mazal yugad neɣ yenwa mazal ad d uɣalen

di leɛnaya m cnu d

ur bɣiɣ ara ad gujlen warrac ad ǧǧlent telmeẓyin

yenna unaẓuṛ deg yiwet n tezlatin is
yeswa ciṭuḥ

ḥbes aṣewwer

ad yettarra ttaṛ

i tuɣalin melmi ay argaz

si zik akka i qqaren yelha leɛqel d uḥezzeb

ṣebṛemt

ma tkemmel akka ddin ad yessenger taqbaylit
aqjun amusnaw d tamacahut n xalil ǧebran
ad ddun yid sent
lsan d iserwula d izeggaɣen
tuli d tegrint iw seg wanect a n tucḍiwin n tira
imawlan ttufaṛasen
ur ten kkateɣ ara
yerẓa awal n baba s
tfeṛḥemt s yennayer
axtan nni i ɣ xetnen akken d ajerrem i ttjerrimen deg neɣ
ur ttnal ara
ala lxir i m ttmenniɣ
d nettat i d ineǧren abrid i ddeqs n tlawin nniḍen
maɛlic ahawt
ḥbes ur ttxeẓẓiṛ ara
ur teɛyiḍ ara seg učči dayi
yewwet iyi tiyita n leɣder
d acu ara yexdem umeɣbun a meskin
melmi i kem id yebda uqraḥ n tɛebbuḍt im
qqaṛen aɣ at uqasi
tfukkemt neɣ mazal
ɣef wawal n wid yessnen ai da ur yezmir akk yiwen ad ihendez seg tazwara d acu ara d texdem
ulac it
ur ittɣimi ukured anda teḥma
telluẓemt yal ass
tebda taẓẓalit uqbel ad tessaweḍ tesɛa n yiseggasen
d asemmiḍ aṭas
itett yidir aṭas n tmellalin
ur ẓriɣ ma ilaq ad k t id iniɣ
ad am buddeɣ ddunit iw
nnan wi isebbeben i leflas tagara yedda ɛeryan
ziɣ d tidet
ur i yuɣ wara
ur yemmut ara deg lehna
yeffeɣ ad ikeyyef
tili tella tsarut
mazal ur tefhimemt ara taluft nni
anisi ara tt id nawi
d acu daɣen i tebɣiḍ
i nettat i wumi txedmemt akk annect a
nekk ttcehhideɣ s teqbaylit ma d kečč cehhed s wayen i tebɣiḍ
sima tella tecbeḥ nezzeh
ur d yenni ula d yiwet n tikkelt tidet
d ḥellu n yiwen n ukrif
aṭas i ččiɣ
teshel tuccfa
lmesk i s issnen d aɛeṭṭaṛ
amcic ik d aberkan
ilaq i as txemmemeḍ uqbel ad d teḍru
sima tebɣa ad as teldi ul is i maziɣ
ur nḥemmel ara tusnakt
xellṣeɣ as kra n lkisan
llan tetten ala bibṛas d tzuḍla neɣ tasemmumt ma ufan tt
temmezg d yid s
ɣur k ad tuɣaleḍ ad d taseḍ ɣur i
ɛni timetti ur tettwali ara acḥal n wid i yettmenṭaren deg yizenqan
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ anda i rran akk yemdukal iw n temẓi
yuba yenɣa mary
ačewčew azewwaɣ ur t ḥmmilen ara wayetma s
ur yeqqerṣ ara ass a
tabewwaṭ nni ɣas in as d tilemt
iqejjem fell i
yusef ijemɛ d irden s waṭas amzun d ṛṛmel n lebḥeṛ
wa mačči d aṭan n teqbaylit ahaw kan wa d asafar issejjayen
ass a lliɣ azekka wissen
meɛna d asurif meqqren i teqbaylit
tesbeɣ asent tt
anwa yettsuɣun akka
ḥemmleɣ ad sweɣ crab n ukarṭun
ay ẓriɣ weddreɣ temẓi w
temlal tasa d wayen i turew
ansa i teffeɣ
yeǧǧa tt ad tettru war ma yesseḥbes itt id
tzemreḍ ad tegreḍ aya deg tesnakta n uwadem ma deg uwennet ur t id ggar ara
i kunemti
tewwet it s nnuɛ
leɛca deg yiḍ txerreq targit yis i
bɣiɣ ad s heḍṛeɣ meɛna bezzaf tettsetḥi
nekk d aceṭṭaḥ
tuli ssuma
afenǧal n watay ttxil k
tɛezgeḍ
aqla kem terwiḍ
aql iyi d tawaziwt
ur stewtiwemt ara
ticcert nni ad telhu i ufeṣṣel kan ma yerna d yiwen kra deg awal
ad txedmeḍ lmeṣbaḥ akked dduzan is s uṭaluc n ddheb yeṣfan
nekk i yezwaren fell ak
llan yisteqsiyen
tceɣɣeb iyi taluft is
udi yuɣal d asafar
mi lliɣ meẓẓiyeɣ ksiɣ taqeḍɛit n wulli d yizamaren
ur d keččmen ara s axxam
gen di talwit a gma at mansur saddek d awezɣi ad k nettu
yefka yas tom aṣebbiɛ i mary
gen di talwit a gma lamini samir d awezɣi ad k nettu
i nutenti d acu i tent id igren di tessirt
asmi ur d leqqḍen ara aṭas n uzemmur zemrent ad t zḍent tlawin deg yixxamen nsent
kemm d tameṭṭut inu
ɛerḍeɣ ad d afeɣ kra iḍebsiyen iqdimen n linda ronstadt ɣur bu iḍebsiyen maca d iḍebsiyen ikussimen kan i yesɛa
d acu ara m d yawi uḥebber
d isastalen igejdanen iɣef ad d nerr fell asen deg unadi a nneɣ
qqim ɣer ṭṭabla
llem imi im ddu d uḍar im ur ṭalay ɣer deffir m
ayɣer i t id tuɣem
gedha
ufiɣ d iman iw lwaḥi d yiwet n tpakistanit
teqqareḍ neɣ txeddmeḍ
ilaq ad ẓreɣ tameṭṭut agi ines tamaynut
d tafsut
ɛifṛun irra as i dda bṛahim inna ḥess iyi d a sidi
lḥiɣ ɣef tergin ḥafi

ad wen d yeǧǧ ṛebbi lbaṛaka
tekkat apyanu
ur bɣiɣ ara ad skerfen deg yimawen tikerkas
taguni uyaziḍ af useɣwen
liya tenna a rrbeḥ iw
ad nezdeɣ yid wen ad nuɣal d yiwen n ugdud
tbubb d tirint n yesɣaren
ameɣlal inna ur xeddmeɣ acemma i wudem n ṛebɛin nni
anta tarbaɛt i irebḥen taqbuct nni

ad d yas wass anda ara tendemmeḍ

uccen yesderɣel it ṭṭmeɛ

truḥ deg sent
ad yili lkas uyefki

mbiwel s ttawil
aha belleɛ itt

nesɛa t
qqimen deg s ṛebɛin n wussan
zhiɣ aṭas

ddant d yid kent
sfeḍ axenziz nni deg anzaren ik
ad as tt yefk
s tidet tettamneḍ leḥwayeǧ nni
ɛni yezwar ikent
yeswa afenǧal n uyefki
tḥemmleḍ iqzaḥ
amek iga ucebbub is
tzemreḍ ad yi d tefkeḍ amedya
ttamneɣ kem
tawaɣit tezwar tayeḍ
tagnizit d tutlayt n ddunit
yebɣa ad d yini ayen t yehwan
d lebda deg i txenneq terna tekkes iyi aɛziz n tasa
tzewǧeḍ neɣ xaṭi
sers aḍar bru i wayeḍ
la ismenɣuɣud deg awal irennu
yekreh udayen
lmelk n umeɣlal inna as daɣen aql ikem s tadist
ḥmed rḥant t tismin
tḥemmleḍ iyi aṭas
ad d ɛerḍen akk imeddukal nsen
d tiyita n uwanek i iga gayed ṣaleḥ
ɣas afud iw d amɣar ifut

aẓ d akka

d acu i yeḥseb iman is

anda k a maziɣ

iruḥ d timendeffirt
ass a d uzekka

ttqacer i lsiɣ n leqṭen
tṛuḥ ɣer paris

lxedma s d tukarḍa
iṛuḥ as

sit mertayen ɣef tqeffalt a
ilaq ucraḍ mgal tabuzeggaɣt
amer ad tini

d tawaɣit

awer tenneḥcam tamart ar tamart

d abrid ad nruḥ

kečč d apanda

ḥemmeleɣ kem a mary
mi ara tibɛid fell i ugar dɣa ẓriɣ ad iyi tettu maḍi

tetḥeqqeḍ

s anda akka ara teffɣeḍ
ad sen tent tefk

nnan d tettusṭaxreḍ
ǧǧet iyi ad kecmeɣ

lɛezza uɛeggun d ameslay

ad t id temmagremt

imɣureɣ d am tgujilt
tesɛerqem aɣ abrid
i sebɛa yid sen d dderya i s d tesɛa bilha i si mḥemmed
gen di talwit a gma bugerra racid d awezɣi ad k nettu
acḥal n yinelmaden i yellan deg tneɣrit

ihi yesla am d rebbi a yemma i as yerna caɛban

rnu ukuẓ
ɣas ad d yeɣli yiḍ ad qqimeɣ ar d tawḍeḍ
ad tt id ssufɣen yimawlan is seg uɣarbaz ad tt fken ula d nettat

dda ḥemmu isawel i isḥaq inna as ziɣ d tameṭṭut ik

s yicewwiqen nni ifazen
thedden

isewweq wallaɣ nwen

d illu n baba k ara k yilin d amɛiwen
la ttafgen yiferṭeṭṭa
ad xedmen yal yiwen di taɣult is ilmend n usnerni n tutlayt agi nneɣ
qrib ssufɣen t seg taddart
inneṛfaɛ tom
aneḥḍur n waṭas n twaculin tiqbayliyin i izedɣen deg temdint a
ad ɣ t tefkemt
ttmalen d timucuha timseḍsa timseɛraq d akud iḥemmlen aṭas yigerdan
ad nernu
seddaw tilli n lmut
ad iqqes aɛawdiw seg uḍar ad iɣli umnay ɣer deffir
tesḥus i tlelli n umeslay d tlelli n tudert i as d yewwi maziɣ
ad tent seggment
a kra n imedɛas
am win i yesbeddayen amrar
anda tḥuzaḍ afeṛḍas ad d alin idammen
ad as tiniḍ d nettat kan i d yeddan d tislit ilindi
imuxx iw yexreb yexseṛ
tzemremt ad iyi tɛawnemt
yasuɛ isseḥla aqeddac n yiwen n lqebṭan aṛumani
ddem taḥeṛṛast nni
yella win i itetten
lliɣ tedduɣ d ad k ẓreɣ
sima tufa deg s win yebɣan a yexdem
ttnnameɣ tt
tṛuḥ aɣ
ulayɣer tmeyyzem ma ṭṭfen tt
a win ɛzizen fell i
yuzzel yengef yesgunfa
ixdem iɛmuden s usɣar n lkasis yerna iɣumm iten s nnḥas
ay aqbayli yettaǧǧan gma s yeɣli
mačči drus i terwa aɛekkaz ɣer yiselmaden is deg uɣerbaz amenzu
melmi ara yerr aḍar
ma ulac iḍes d ttexmam kan i yettilin
zoro yeǧǧa d rrjuj deg garcia
lehlak is yezga d aqdim
yella kra i tesraḥayeḍ
ǧǧemt iyi ad ɛeddiɣ
ruḥ
tezdmemt d
yella kra i tesraḥayem
kullfeɣ ak aḥrir idamen
lxedma deg tesdawit
ur fhimeɣ tigert
ur ttruẓ ara aqerru k ɣef akka
asideg n yifecka ɣer teqbaylit
ccix nurdin yella d aqerru n lǧuq n rradyu n lezzayer
a musa
cabḥa telli d ṭṭaq
nedda yawent di nneqma
la taceṭṭiḍt la tafenṭiḍt
ẓriɣ mačči s wul im
ulac ayen i isehlen
ula d kečč aql ik twennteḍ d s tefransist
yedda lḥal
aql i di berlin
teɛǧeb iyi tririt a
ur tt tett ara
yiwen ur s yesli
yuli uridut
ad uraren yid nteɣ
iles d aɣezfan afus d awezlan
bɣant ad zedɣent di temdint
ur bɣiɣ ara ad wen d rnuɣ ddiq
ddmen d iferrawen n tenqelt ssṛen iman nsen yes sen
amek armi i am yeɛǧeb bu claɣem ina
ddiɣ ak di lebɣi
ass a yeḥma yelha kan i rrwaḥ ɣer teftist
ssardeɣ d agnes
atan ifessi ugris nni
ɛeṛḍet t
ass agi lliɣ azekka wissen
zdaxel i llan
yeɣli deg wul iw
yettraju k ɣur i
yekkaw wudem n tom
tuget n tlufa ɛerḍen dima ad tent frun kan s talwit
ilaq ad d ẓṛeɣ tom
amek ara tt nadin
ziɣ ur d yegra deg k wara
akeyyef diri t
agujil d agujil a lukan s učamar
ur aɣ d uznen ara tibratin
aḥkim ur nesɛi aḥkim
a zzman ideg d negra leḥlu yeqqel d lqareṣ
yurew d leɛǧeb
wagi mačči d mmi s n uneǧǧaṛ
wwin t warraw is ɣer tmurt n kanɛan meḍlen t di lɣar yellan di tferka n maxfila i yequblen mamri
takwat tettazu tira
iseggasen a ineggura tussna tḥella d afara meqqren
cfiɣ asmi i yi tesɣaṛay yemma agemmay
ḥudd iyi
ḥemmleɣ addal
ikker i teslent s umger
ur ɛqilen ara tom
udem iw werraɣ d asellaw am yixef n laḥbeq
ǧǧet iyi nekk d ṛṛay iw
aɣerbal ajdid yettḥibbi aɛellaq
tettbin tili uɛekkaz
ta d aḍu ta d tajemmaɛt
ziɣ teqqerseḍ
tečča t lqaɛa tesbleɛ it
ur ibub ḥedd taɛkemt is
d tamedyazt i lliɣ
massi iban d i umddakel is am win iɣaben
a mmi iweṣṣa k ur tettetteḍ alemma telluẓeḍ
ala lxir
ihi d acu
ɣṛant di tesdawit n bgayet
iflisen n yilel
lsemt lqecc nkent
nga aserwes gar umatar udmawan d uskim n tmeẓri
yettriḥ d bnin
yeḍfer lbaz s wallen
ad ɣ seɛfent
init d anda yezdeɣ swaswa
xedmet iyi amkan iqedsen akken ad zedɣeɣ gar asen
yir ceqquf werǧin iṛṛiẓ
yiwet n teqcict iḥemmlen yiwen
teskuṭṭef it
kksen d ayen yellan deg ul nsen

i usmekti ɣef wawal n yimḍebbren n uxxam a
ifukk wakud
miẓẓed
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri m i tenhert
yettraju ad truḥ tmacint
yecmumeḥ d mike
anda tebɣiḍ attan tezwar
di tnifift is ideg ḥesleɣ
nesbumbex turin nneɣ s ddexxan
ur iyi ttara ara aɣbel
ɣas akken tecmet yella win i tt iḥemmlen d akli
yusef inna yasen d lmuḥal ad xedmeɣ ayagi
nekk ad wen t sellmeɣ
ur yessin ara ad ileqqem
google d tuddsa i yesnuzun imeẓla
nesla as
ttɛasant win iten id ixelqen
jeddi yexneq setti
sǧehdemt
ssekreɣ kem id

d axeddim igerrzen

kenwi d imcumen
d widak i d isefra imezwura n ben muḥemmed

fukken wussan n yimuras
aql i heddreɣ deg tilifu
ilindi
ttun belli d tameṭṭut i d azamul n tmetti
yekcem deg temkecmin
yella yiwen ulac it yellayella yiwen yella ulac it
melmi ara tebduḍ
ameɣlal inna i haṛun ṛuḥ s aneẓruf ad temmagreḍ musa
ula d addal d tussna
ay udem n uzger
aql ik tebeddeḍ af uḍaṛ iw
ɛni d kemm ara ydebbṛen fell asent
mazal ayefki teṭṭḍeḍ ɣur yemma m di tqemmuct inem
kemmlemt tazzla
wa mačči d aṭan n teqbaylit ahaw kan wa d asafar yessejjayen
gar unebdu d nnisan jebbden wussan
tidet teqqel teskiddib
ayen yesserẓagen leɛmeṛ iw
iwet takeṛṛust ines ar yiwet n tzemmurt
wali ar deffir

kecmemt
qajjer
d wigi i d arraw n ɛisu

ufan tt d lemziyya
yuɣal ar din
tsekṛeḍ

d asteqsi i nezmer ad neg ass a n wussan
akken yuɣ tanumi
melmi ara nruḥ
amek i teẓriḍ acḥal zur
kra yekka yiḍ ur qqineɣ tiṭ iw
wagi d awezɣi
a dda ɛli faḍma tebɣa ad tebru
tḥemmlemt ad teččemt tiɛesbanin
ɣef wannect a
ad tt id uqmen

ssu yas aḥebruri i udfel ad yennerni
ur swiɣ ara aṭas
neḍlem

tessefqed iten
tcennu

siwlet asen
d tidett ur tessineḍ ara ad tɛumeḍ

ur tettmekkineḍ ara lɣir ik ɣer lmut s cchada n ẓẓur
tkellxeḍ fell i
win ifehmen ad issefhem wid ur nefhim ara
ad k tt yefk

ɣur i teẓẓel d afus is
d acu i tessnemt
yessers afus is ɣef lḥenk n sima
ayen ara truḥeḍ
a tinn a n ugemmaḍ ay udem n uḍiḥan
anda akka i yeffeɣ
tewwiḍ d iman im

tasusmi

ass a tendeḥ tmes deg guraya
a yiḍes yya d ɣar da ɣar yidis n teqcict a
tesṛuḥeḍ ten
iqemmer yexser
tettbecciceḍ aserwal im
ɛqel d tom
leɛyub ttraǧun tewser imiren akk i d ttlalen
ahat ad as tini sfeḍ imeṭṭi m fiḥel anezgum
tifranin ttwasfesxent sɣur lɛeskaṛ n lezzayer ass mi i tent rebḥen isenselmen

walim
ur ttbeddilent ara iceṭṭiḍen sdat i

ad m tent id awint
kemmlent

d winna kan a ɛacur

nuɣ tannummi

mmaren waman ɣef uselkim iw dɣa tura yelluɣ wegdil is
kerheɣ taḍeggalt iw

ttunt
la ɣ ttnadint
ɣaf ass n mazal cfiɣ
ssareẓgent ddunit i isḥaq akked ribika
ayen tebɣiḍ iqḍa ayen tugadeḍ ixḍa
sfaqeɣ kem id
at wallaɣ yellan deg ul awen

ɛecrin n yemyalen ddaw waman d ungal n jules verne

a ddunt yid neɣ

sgunfum kra

qqimem da
yal mi ara d yekcem qqareɣ deg wallen is am win yebɣan ad iyi d yini kra

drewceɣ fell am

qqureɣ kan deg umkan iw ula d nnefs iw sneqḍaɛeɣ t
ad tent yesseɣli
iḍ d wass fell i d ṭṭlam rzagit tiram di leɛmer iw temẓi texsef

d aseɣres i t id sɣersen

ddmemt t
d lewhayem annect nni akk i k ḍelmeɣ tekkreḍ tebniḍ tiqenṭert
d tin i d yewwin amaynut i tezlit taqbaylit
walaɣ at laxert la tetten ibawen

hergem
i wakka i lhan yemdukal
nsemma yasen akken
ferɛun inna i musa ffeɣ iyi syagi
anda telliḍ
sizdeg iceṭṭiḍen im
ma d lḥila n usɣar i yennul ad tirid s waman
d netta i yesxeṛben kullec
ad ɣuren yigenduzen
terra yaɣ t id
tettḥibbi ččina
at seɣrucen n waṭlas alemmas n merruk
yuba tuɣ yebɣa ad yessikel
mi d wwḍen imezwura ɣillen ad awin akteṛ

jbed
yesmenyif ad yecnu s ṣṣenf n cceɛbi am wakken daɣen icennu ccna n tmeɣriwin
nnuɣeɣ
ur ssinen ara ad ceḍḥen
d tibkit n zzan i yeɣeẓẓen izan
ečč kan tessusmeḍ
tom werǧin i yessuden mary
ur kkat ara
acḥal ɣur m n yisetma m

a wid ur nqebbel ara lɛib
igerrez tanemmirt
ad tɛeddi ar wexxam
yella d afesyan deg laṛmi
aql aɣ nhedder ɣef nndama
iqḍeɛ as layas
zemreɣ ad t sɛuɣ
teṭṭfemt ten id
txedmeḍ asent kra
ula d iẓerman n uɛebbuḍ ttnaɣen
ass nni dɣa meẓyan yeṭṭef abrid is yuɣal ɣer siɛir
ar leḥbab ilha ufekkeṛ
melmi ad tt iẓeṛ
ad temmekti i wayen i nesɛedda d issin
cukkeɣ yella kra i d ittheyyi tom
ad iyi iseɛef
ulac win i wumi ldiɣ ul iw neɣ i wumi ḥekkuɣ lesrar iw
teddez tebrez
ladɣa mi ara twaliḍ acḥal d ilemẓi i itett wakal akken d ileqqaqen
deg m tezzuzen yi lmeḥna
yuɣal rray i tlawin
henri genevois yexdem yiǧ n unadi ɣef temnaḍt n ayt smaɛel
tuɣ din i nella
terriḍ iman ik tɛuẓẓgeḍ
yenna d yuba azul
nemsebḍa
yal ass tettezzem deg yiman is yal ass testeqsay deg yiman is
tfehmem ayagi meṛṛa
ittazal mebla asemmezger
amek tettwaliḍ amaḍal n tira s teqbaylit
ad turareḍ yid i
sliman u muḥ yettaweḍ
ṛuḥen xebbṛen ssid nsen s wayen akk yeḍran
lxawa tettegg leǧhada
yuɣ d aɣrum
itellem di lehduṛ irennu
ḍfeṛ ṛṛay iw
zger anida ur k yettawi
tebɛem takeṛṛust ayi
mass seguin yuɣ itt id d tiɣideṭ
amusnaw d win yegzan timsal yerna yessen ad atent yefru
tuɣ kerheɣ tarakalt

yuẓẓaf tom
fhem iyi ur uksaneɣ ara

ccah di ṛṛay iw
ansa k
ay kent ifnan mi tmenɛemt ur kent yeḍri kra
yexsef tom

mazal iyi d nneyya
sekra ara texdem
ad sen t tɛeṛḍem

ad d taɣ ayefki
ḥebseɣ ɣur uxxam is
ileḥḥu aṭas

win isɛan tasa ur ičči tansa
ulac idrimen deg leǧyub iw iqersen
ur cukkeɣ ara yella win i s yeslan
zemreɣ ad nehṛeɣ
ɛuhdeɣ tikli d wissin xas d gma aḥnin
yeḍleb lviza ɣef akken d azrazaɣ n tsertit
mi kem walaɣ ad feṛḥeɣ
a winnat d acu k
xtaṛen ten
mɛen acemma ttxil
di leɛnaya k xdem kra
acu kan mi i wḍeɣ s axxam tessenker yemma ahruḥu
kullec ad kem yerr d taqaḥbit deg tmurt a
inuda fell asent ur tent yufi ara ar tura
ɣur i ssbeɛ bu lkifat
tikwal nessexdam ayen akk qessiḥen
tahuski m d tilawt
allal n usiweḍ i icudden gar leqdicat n tuddsa akked umsider
d adlis

yuba yessebɣes mary

ar tameddit
anwa deg neɣ ur nekcim ara ɣer tmazirt n medden

tcebḥeḍ s uberkan

ur cliɛeɣ ara seg m

ifakk aɣ tt
ilaq ad tiliḍ teẓriḍ imi anallas azeɣray yeẓra kullec
yeɣɣar d tisuqilin i yexdem netta i waṭas n yiḍrisen

acu tt twaturt nni i llant nehhrent
ad aɣ t id ifek

ur d stufiɣ ara i zzhu

tebbehbaḍ

sseṛɣent am tent

sṛuḥent tent
d acu t uxeṣṣar agi
d amaynut kečči
yugem tagdurt n tsusmi
ur tteɣlaqeɣ walu

neḍben

ur yeḍṛi yiqiḥ
ttḥadareɣ tt
fernet
bɣiɣ ccṛab azeggaɣ di leɛnaya k
di tazwara ad nečč dewwaṛa sakin ad nernu buzelluf
ur ittqessir ḥedd d uɣyul is
bessif akken ad siwḍeɣ ad mmeslayeɣ d wabɛaḍ
i ma ɣelḍen
teddun ur iban sani
ad sserseɣ adusyi
ameɣlal inna as daɣen err afus ik deg iciwi k
bḍut asent tent id
kremt ad nger aẓeṭṭa
a ṛebbi ttxil k kullec fell ak yeshel
tumen s ubrid i d tenjer
ahat lḥif d timuɣbent axir wala ad teddreḍ s yir udem
inṭeq yasuɛ inna a lǧil ur nettamen ara iɛewjen
i tura mi d tiwim taqbuct a acu ara txedmem yis s
tuklaleḍ arraz
yiwen ur yesɛa azref ad k d yini amek ara tṛebbiḍ mmi k
maziɣ yerkeb
ur ifaq ara tama s i tella tezzi as si yal tama
itteḍrag akk iman is
yelli m d taderɣalt
yerra yi t id
akken lliɣ ttmerriḥeɣ deg teftist ṣṣbeḥ a ufiɣ taqerɛet a
lučkis yendeh deg udrar rsas igezzem ijebjan
ferɛun inna i yeɛqub acḥal di lɛemṛ ik
leqdic ines d asired n yiqejduren n tkuzint akked wid ideg ččan yikelyanen
acimi i ttilin warrac dima d inemsazwaren
aṭas n yimdanen i yerḥa umezgun
temxellem akk
aṭas n tɣawsiwin i bɣiɣ mazal ur tent xdimeɣ ara
ṭṭef itt d tilelli i kemm
beddemt
arju nniɣ ak ur tufiḍ i yellan akk
zwin tt kksen as ammus
ɛuẓgen
ad isewweq yid sent
s wakka ad ixdem umeɣlal i dda bṛahim ayen akken i s iwɛed
adremt
sexsit tiliẓṛi
llant bezgent
ad nessiweḍ aneqqad ar ṣṣeḥ
mačči d aɣbel akk
lemmer kan lliɣ d aɣezfan ugar s cwiṭ
ass mi lliɣ d askuti
atent a wwḍent d
mačči d sslaḥ
anida telliḍ deg tubeṛ
reggmen ben ɣebriṭ mi sen tekkes besmelleh deg idlisen uselmed
sima tennum
ar tesleḍ s yizgaren llsen
anwa i k d ifkan lḥekma agi
muqel kan ma yewwa yimensi
yenna deg wawal is deg usarag is aneggaru timura i aɣ yezwaren s wacu i aɣ zwarent
d amcum tom
ad tt wansent
mmi ad yidir yili
a ṛebbi kemmel aɣ i lferḥ
acuɣer a lehwa mm yimeṭṭawen
s leɛqel ik
ay ggummaɣ ad ten mḥuɣ
tɛawen aɣ s lecraha
nekcem ad d nsew kra n tebyirin
ɣur sen kraḍ n warraw snat n teqcicin akked uqcic
ur ẓriɣ ansi i yi d yekka ɛeyyu ya
igen ɣef udekkan
tesseṛɣeḍ iyi tt
yal yiwen s tirmit is s tmuɣli ines s tirga ines
ios akked android d inagrawen n wammud i ibenken izirazen am tiliɣriwin tuḥricin neɣ tifelwiyin n uselkem
la tent yettnadi
a s yeqqar cteddu yi
tedɛa yam yemma m s lxir
kečč s timmad ik tessneḍ agdud agi iḥemmel ad ixdem ayen n diri
imuqel s itran yetwehhem
ittmeslay i iɣelben lekdeb
melmi i yebda tanhert
efk iyi cwiṭ n talwit
nuḥ itteddu akked yillu
ur ttara ara aɣbel fell i
ḥmed rebbi
nella
s ujenwi deg ufus iɛdawen zzin as d
yettban d yeḥzen tom
ifukk iyi ukebri
mel iyi d anida i tluleḍ
aql iken merra mgal iw
tuɣaleḍ d argaz
ayen akken yexdem d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel
aten aya
dayen tegziḍ
ad d ddunt yid k
yettwaṭṭef ass n tniyen uɛecrin deg tubeṛ alef u ṭṭɛemya u setta u xemsin
tesbeɣ as ten
ad d yas wass is
lferḥ izdeɣ itt
yuba yeẓṛa
ula dayen i d ttmektiɣ
ad d teldi tewwurt
mačči d ayen yuɛren lukan bɣiɣ
zdem kan ayen ara tawiḍ
ttrajuɣ ad truḥeḍ
ur kent ɛebbdeɣ ara
yella ḥedd sdaxel
ḥemmleɣ k nezzeh
ilaq ad tesɛumt lḥir ɣef teqbaylit
mačči d tasebbiwt
i telha
meqqer gar yimeqqranen
mbeɛd talalit n mahalalil qiynan iɛac tmen meyya u ṛebɛin n iseggasen yerna yesɛa d arrac akked tullas
iṛuḥ aɣ
tusiḍ d deffir iw
ad d yeẓẓel afus is aɣezzfan ad t yawi yid s
ad t tleqqmemt
ugadeɣ ad wriccxeɣ
am wakken nettat tettxemmim
aɣrum a ijjunjer
tebbi t
ḥwaǧent imseftiyen
ad d mɣiɣ d agersal
ur ččin acemma
ad xedmeɣ abrid i wid teǧǧa tebɣest
wa yendi wa iqureɛ
ffɣemt tura kan
ad awen tt yefk
ḥader
tenniḍ iyi d nniɣ as
ad ččen tidak
di leɛnaya k ma ur iyi d temliḍ anda akka i kessen
sin akin uɣalen ɣer tusna
ɛni thelkeḍ
di tmura tutrimin selmaden i warrac tussna dagi selmaden asen tamettant
imceḥ taqessult is armi tfukk
tettbin d tecbeḥ s tidet
maɛlum ad cekkreɣ i d nniɣ drus
swiɣ aman n wedrar
ifakk asent t
trisiti tenfeɛ mliḥ
liḥala agi n war laman di tesdawit taggara agi tzad
anda i tettuḍ ssiwan ik
d lqanun ara yilin i lebda ɣef ddemma n umeɣlal
itteṛɛiɛic ɣef warraw n tmes
ad iyi d qelben apsikyaṭr yelhan
anda i tettedduḍ
yuggad ad tennejlu tutlayt is
ɣumm tiqqad ik neǧǧa tiqqaṛ ik
aqli ar tom
yiwen ur yerwil
d acu i d ssebba n ufunzer
yuba u muḥ ur yezmir ara ad iger taflest deg tiziri tagawawt
tuzzel s irebbi n setti s
meslay d akken iwata
ad d ddun yid s
yal irem tettqabal it id yiwet n tmiḍrant
tɛeṛḍeḍ
wissen kan melmi ara t fakkeɣ
d ẓẓher i sɛan
ma deg wass i d iḍra wayagi win ara t inɣen d tamgerṭ
ad iɛenni fell ak ad tidireḍ
d acu i kem iwwin ɣur s
ṭṭejṛa n lmesk mačči d lḥesk
ur sɛiɣ ara xedmeɣ assa
di berlin llan ddeqs n yemḍiqen icebḥen
tettḥawaleḍ tent a winnat
bḍumt aɣ tt id
ccuruṭ n zzwaǧ ɛeddan tilas
azekka d aẓekka
xuyleɣ udem is
yella ḥedd ara ɣ d imagren
msebɛaden am yigenni ɣef tmurt
zzwir iten ass a ad k zwiren azekka
amek armi yumen yizimer s tegmat n wuccen
ukren iyi apaspuṛ iw
akken i yesemma adam i lexliqat nni yeddren i ttusemman
nekk d kemm abrid nneɣ yiwen
yewweḍ d wass im
annar akka i yettwarwat ma d yelli k wi yebɣun yaɣ itt
acḥal neṭwi lwaḥi tiɣeṭṭen
assenger ad ikfu
ddan armi i kecmen tilisa n tmurt n leqbayel
a wi yufan kra i m nniɣ
ttazgen yiḍarren is
txesreḍ deg ssuq a
llan tetten axerrub
aḥebbas ulac
ad t id kkseḍ s ufus ik
azgen ameqqran d tismin i ttasment
ad teqqim deg uxxam azekka
rremt tibagusin nkent
isem is yelli k
yenna as i yemma s efk as d imensi tesres as d yečča
d acu i s iruḥen
aẓay ad tteččeḍ ayen yewwan
ttif nnger wala amdegger
yes k i nedhent tezyiwin
kemmlemt aɣenni
ceɛlen irkulli
awali tettwalim lameɛna ur tfeṛṛzem ara
anda ken
anef as
tebɣa ad ten id tessuffeɣ ɣer tilawt
segmi tella d tilemẓit i tekcem ɣer umaṭtaf wis sin
yal iḍ ad yeqqim d netta i d aneggaru mi ara ruḥen medden akk
isem ik ay aqcic
ṛebbi ur ittɛanad ara lɛebd is
siwsiɛ ul ik
ass wis tlata yusef inna asen nekk ttagadeɣ illu
asemmiḍ leɛra cceṛ
ad as yernu teɣzi n leɛmer
yuɛer fell i ad qableɣ akk aya
kker syin a yijiṛmeḍ iwumi aqmimmeḍ imi k ifut uckenṭeḍ
ičča yi wawal tenɣa yi tsusmi ɛyiɣ deg uxemmem
tenɣiḍ iyi tent
ma iɣḍel ikem uruḥani ruḥ ad tenḍeḍ tamellalt
deg oslo i ttidireɣ
ur d qqar ara ayen tufiḍ
tugiḍ ad tserrḥeḍ
ur yeẓri d acu ara as yini
ilaq ad asen tinim tidet
aya giɣ t
s tirrugza d tfenṭaẓit i nerna ddunit wamma ulawen d imuḍan
tessnem ad tarum s teqbaylit
yewwet it s tiṭ
senndeɣ ar lḥiḍ urǧiɣ ad d tbineḍ
lufan kan i ḍefreɣ iwellihen n tom
txedɛemt iyi
kečč d ugur deg ubrid iw
amek ara texdem tmetti ma ur tečči ara
tettuḍ lhedra n jeddi k
mi tt tkemceḍ ṛebbi ad tt ikmec fell ak
yal yiwen s teqbaylit is
tewwi tent
yella kra n yiwen i wumi tebɣiḍ ad tlaɛiḍ
ayen yiflen i tizi ur d itezzi
tafanda m tettegray d deg wanzaren nneɣ
fkiɣ as lkaṛ is
win izerɛen aḍu ad imger tabuciḍant
ibedd masil yeqqar anazal ɣef tewwurt
eǧǧ it ad t ixelleṣ
ayen ara theggi i wussan n urgigi
amzun deg tillas i nteddu ur neẓri anda i neggar aḍar
la ten ttnadin
gǧan asent d tarda leḥwal
d tayri
ṣeddḥen akk tibḥirt s later
yuɣ lḥut di lebḥeṛ
teggarem tiɣri i yinelmaden n tesdawiyin akken ad d kecmen deg terbaɛt n usideg
d yuba i ifazen akk
nefka yas ddḥis
yella win ara d yekkren azekka zik
ma d netta yella yeṭṭeṣ
ayen yerzan yakan tutlayt d uselmed is d wayen yerzan idles akk icudden ɣur s
yella kra n yiwen i m d isawlen
yeṛja
cnu ay agambar n ɛebdennur
nekk d anelmad
susem kan anef kan i wayen akk iɛeddan
ahat ad iyi d iẓer d taderwict
nella d ilemẓiyen ur nessin
meqqṛent d s teqbaylit
d tikli i d heggan yiseqquma n yisnawiyen akked yigensasen inmula n bgayet
kullec iteddu akken iwata
ur t id wwiɣ ara
lmaɛun yeqqaz d aḍref iḍen
ulin ar wayyur
tesɛa ala tmeṛ
ad kem ṭfeɣ ɣer lḥebs imi tetɛeddaḍ ɣef lḥarma
riɣ ad iliɣ d asfel riɣ ad iliɣ d aḥebbas i yiṣeggaden n tayri
txaq fell as
ad t tɛiwneḍ alukan s wawal ziden
win i ak ibeddlen s yibiw kečč beddel it s yiclem is
ittemmeɣ ɣef yimi d yiri
yeggugem yimi
tikkwal yettinig ɣer tmura n lbarrani deg ukatar n umahil ines
yiwet ur tezmir ad ɣ twaɛen tura
nnefs s ddraɛ i d itteffaɣ seg turin
iɛsekṛiwen ṭṭfen idrimen nni xedmen akken i sen nnan
lehdur ik d izegzawen
fessrent t sufella n yiferrugen i yiṭij deg wass i wakken ad yekkiw
kkes itt
semmi as masinisa
d kem i d sseba
ɣur k tifrat nniḍen
idrimen nwen ṭṭfeɣ ten id
yella d diɣen ussan a usmekti n yiwen wazemz nniḍen icudden dima ɣer tefsut d umennuɣ ɣef tmaziɣt
ilaq am ad ternuḍ ad tṣebreḍ
tufamt t id d amuḍin
urgaɣ targit iw tetteddu ad teffeɣ
s tidet tenwiḍ ad k ssudneɣ
isseḥla meṛṛa imuḍan nsen
cfiɣ kan am wakken ṣewren iyi s lqecc nni n daxel
mazal ur ddimeɣ ula d rray
kra n uselkim
ẓṛiɣ kullec
ur tessin ara tasdawit n bgayet
victor hugo deg tallit is iwet aṭas mgal tafgurt n tmenɣiwt
ad uɣaleɣ d yiwen nnsen
d tafyirt nni i ttnadiɣ
yenna yasen qesdeɣ ad bnuɣ taglisya deg taddart a nneɣ
ad m d iniɣ
yal tiṭ ad tebru i tala
yugar ferɛun di lweqt is
kksen iyi akk iselsa w i sɛiɣ iwin iyi d kan wid n tlawin
tebɣiḍ ad teqqimeḍ
sḥasfeɣ
ɣef wakk n d qqaren azekka ad d yas uselway n tɣiwant ɣer tama nneɣ
s wul is i yettwali
limer i twalaḍ tavidyut i d yexdem muḥend belqasem ur iyi tettcewwileḍ ara akka
baṭel d lbaṭel
ur ḥsin ara ula d taqcict tesɛa ul
nehreɣ askutur
ad am negzem tasɣart im ihenni kem deg temɣart im s leɛmara n uxxam im
ur teffiɣ ara fell i
tuli ɣef ulɣem
akken ittemsaɛafen
yuwi taqfact n leɣbar ɣer wurti s
netteɣraṣ deg uɣerbaz
rwel as seg lǧiha
d acu yellan deg uelkim
ay agellid ay aḥnin
nadit ad tafem
aḥeddad ur nesɛi tafrut
ḥemleɣ tt ma d nettat tekreh iyi
ɛisu ittusemma adum
ay at lebḥur wiss d anwa i aɣ yeggan leɣṛuṛ
abṛaham di tmurt n maṣer iwala iɣli d laẓ ɣef tmurt
yella walebɛaḍ i wen d isawlen
tessen ad tɛumm
tettuḍ idrimen ik
ṛuḥ d ɣuṛ nneɣ
twalaḍ
aberkan nni inu
win izerɛen kra ad t yemger d lxir neɣ d isennanan
yezga yessusem
aya ad kem yesseḥmu
ṣebren tiyita tewweḍ iɣes
ur ttmeslayent ara ɣef lesrar nsent neɣ ɣef yisental i d ttawint tullas gar asent yid i
tella kra n tɣawsa i tebɣam
ansi i d ikka waḍu ad t yerr ɣer din
ur ttwaliɣ ara mliḥ
fernemt s ttawil
ssakleɣ weḥd i kan
aṭas aya ur ḥulfaɣ ara akka
yecfa mi i d as yenna ur tett ala s tamment
ruḥemt kan i tziri ur yelli ara tagademt
d taɣawsa i kem rran
aṭas i teččiḍ
teffeɣ asen d teɛrurt
ḥerkel iman ik
lebɣi w yedda d lebɣi m
ad ten tseɛfeḍ
icerrew d azemmur ɣer ucellaf
bɣan ad ɣ snejlin seg akal nneɣ
iḥemmel seksu
teznuzay ayefki
taqcict a tettarra taqemmuct
imɣaren a ala ɣef ddabex ay ttmeslayen
ulac tagrawla iɣeḍlen kra n udabu akka kan s talwit
inna a sidi ṛebbi azen d ad nečč lbaṛaka k
ur tessutred ara berru
amakar n useggwass a d win n qabel
ad iyi yawi ɣer tmezgida akken ad ɣren fell i
bezzef i iwesser fell am
timetti tluɣ s tnafa
tuker itt
teṭṭenṭneḍ
yal yiwen s tunt is
yusef awcic d aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan n ugezdu n tizi uzzu
deg tuɣalin ɣer tesdawit deg useggas iw wis tlata
tella kra n yiwet i yegnen ɣef wussu yaki
seg yimir nni i d tettban amzun d tislit
ɛni tsawlem
awalen awalen
day teṛṣiḍ fell as tigusa
ur tufiḍ i yettraju n wayen yelhan
acḥal n tefyar i yessekles
ad k id yehdu rebbi
ddem kra n lgaṭu deg leɛnaya k
ad tt tesseɣli
ula d cim gma s ameqran n yifit isɛa dderya
yesṭebṭeb ulac win i as d yeldin tawwurt
ad imsenḍaḥ s uniyir s akked upulis
uɣaleɣ ḥemmleɣ t
d wa i d lmektub im
wi awen illa
d amennuɣ ur yettwafham ara
ur nɣiḍ deɛwessu negumma ad neḥlu
i seṭṭac yid sen d dderya i s d tesɛa zilfa i si mḥemmed
akka i d nniɣ
yuba ikad d yebges
a tiddewt
numidya tella teṭṭef d agafa n lezzayer n tura d tuget seg tunes
ad tedduḍ yid i
seg wasmi i d yekcem ɣer tesdawit
yiwen seg wass mi yeffeɣ seg uxxam ur t walant wallen iw
ur iṛuḥ ur yeqqim yettezzi kan
tilelli ula i tmeṭṭut ik d yelli k mačči i tiyaḍ kan
nwan s besmelleh ara tali tmurt
ur ẓriɣ ara ma cfiɣ ɣef yisem im
d yemma s akked watmaten n yasuɛ
argaz agi ad ittwakkes seg ugdud is
serreḥ i yiɣil iw
tettzad skud nettemlil
tettezzi am yizi
illul d deg i lebɣi i lmakla
njeɛ aɣyul ifhem uzger
ur iyi tteg ara d aɣilif
tettrajuḍ tom
ay ɛemṛent temsal agraw
d anwa i d isutren vodka
inijjel
iɣum s uxellal
ad teknu temguṭ ar tizi hibel
sebɣent tt id
anwa ara kent yamnen
dayen tfukkem
sqenɛent meṛṛa
gen di talwit a gma maǧan mehdi d awezɣi ad k nettu
yuker aẓref kksen as azref
 lameɛna ur d as nefki ara yelli tneɣ
iwacu tettgallaḍ
yusef inna asen d acu t ṛṛay agi i txedmem
ifreg iman is
axaṭer s ided n lmefṣel n taɣma i yettwet si mḥemmed
yemmečč ujeǧǧig di tseḍwa w
teddem d tisegnit tewwet as tt deg ujeɛbub nni i yettawin ssirum ɣer yiɣil is
anwa t uselmad ik
ad ibarek di leɛmeṛ im
tazeqqa n tneɣda
a tiɣri nneɣ dhen tudrin
tḥella d xemsin n cciɛat yemgaraden
gan deg k laman
rran as ten id
ad k iǧǧ ṛebbi d abeṭṭan di lqaɛ
zedreɣ
deg tefyirt tamezwarut awal iɣil ɣur s sin yismilen timeḍriwt tamezwarut d amyag tis snat d isem
am wakken ur t ifures ara
awit tent id ɣer da
yif it ma nufa t id
sriɣ imru
ad temmektimt
ur zmireɣ ad kemmleɣ tikli
d tawenza w
taftilt yuɣen di tɣurfet a tislit a taɛelǧet
acḥal d uḥṛic tom
wissen anwa i t yewwten
aṭas ara yeddun
ula d kečč tessufɣeḍ d timejjugin
kkremt ma ulac aɣilif
yenna as s uɛekki wagi uriɣ t asmi qqimeɣ ɣef tseṭṭa n weqjun
yeǧǧa tissit
tesbeɣ iyi t
ded uḥeggan ur ttɣafaṛ ur ttmenṭaṛ ay aḍaṛ
ḥemmleɣ tiqcicin
teṭṭef addud
yiwet n tikkelt yeɛreḍ yiwen n urgaz i ɣileɣ d amddakel ad yetɛeddi fell i
yuba u muḥ ur yettqadeṛ ara tiziri tagawawt
ncalleh di lehna mačči di lehwa
tɣaḍemt ten
dinna i neggan meṛṛa
ad taweḍ deg talwit ɣer tahran
tuker iyi
ttemnubun akken ttemyilin
anwa ara tlummeḍ
tewwi mmi s ɣer uɣerbaz uṛebbi
afus iqquṛ imi isfiṭṭuṛ
nṣel
ansa i ɛeddant teqcicin nni
yella kra i tesfuḥayeḍ
amawal yeɛǧeb iyi maca beɛɛed ɣef usmuzzeɣ
d cfaya i d ifegḍen
teẓra d ayen yuɛren akken ad yettu
fren s leɛqel ik
tenɣa yasen tent
ad ɣ tt fkent
ssencew allen im fell as
qerb d a tislit afus im yezyen
yal aɣref ɣur s aseggas ines
azul fell asent
cfiɣ ẓriɣ k ilindi
d argaz i lliɣ
kulci yeggan siwa tabenɛammet d waman
d asiher i tesɛiḍ
d aḥullu i tettḥullu deg wawal
bɣiɣ ad wennɛeɣ lecɣal iw
yerra d akk iẓerman is
ẓẓher is yečča t umcic yewwi t deg tfesqa
nniɣ ak kečč a mmi
sbeṛ kra
iḥseb aɣ d ixbaṛǧiyen
anamek n wawal amaziɣ d argaz ilelli 
yenbec azrem s axjiḍ
tɛiwed iyi d tin nniḍen
mačči d ayla w tkeṛṛust a
ur d ggar ara timuɣliwin ik ɣef yisental yellan deg uḍris s wudem usrid
isemma yas ziraḥ yeɛni yettfeǧǧiǧ
deg teswiɛt ɛeddan d akk wussan gar wallen is
yuba yesfaq itt
timetti taqbaylit mazal ur tuɣ ara tannumi deg leqdic am wa
netta d winna yekkaten kan i muḥend is
telzem itt tkeffart
yella kra i ččan
bḍu yas ten id
besseḥ ur ssineɣ ara ad ɛummeɣ
tanhert is d tazwawaṭ
ad asent yanef ad ɛeddint
zaknun urǧin kennun
mennaɣ i teslit lehna
ṛuḥ ad teddudiḍ
acḥal aya ur tenhireḍ waqila
teqqim ɣer tessirt tebda tezzaḍ
d yiwen i yumnen s umennuɣ ɣef tutlayt is
d axxam im i kem inefɛen a tislit
tegganem ɣef udekkan
ma yella i menhu umi tekseḍ kra azekka ad d asen ad ak ksen d acu tewwiḍ
anwa ten izmaren nni
d kem kan ma mači d kem a wer zwaǧ
lliɣ ur nwiɣ ara ad yesɛu kra n txutert
isdari aqeṛṛu s iǧǧa iḍaṛṛen is
tajmilt i keč a win yemmuten ɣef tidet
tečča taxbizt iman is
ugin wudayen ad ḍefren nnbi muḥemmed daymi ttwaregmen deg leqran
yufa tt in teẓẓel di lqaɛa am uceṭṭiḍ
awes a ṛebbi zzheṛ nxuṣ
annar a yesɛan azal meqqren deg unegmu deg ugezdu n tizi uzzu
cbiɣ ṭṭejra n cilmun
iḍelli d lḥedd
yella yettmeslay kan d yid s s ttawil n fasebbuk
yuba d aẓawali
tuɣaleḍ ass a d imqezzeb
a mkul mi ara d yeɣli ṭṭlam
kenwi d iselmaden neɣ ala

qqnem tuggas nwen
wigi ur sen ittunefk ara
amnemt neɣ qimemt
yefka yaɣ abadaṛ
d acu i yeḍṛan

wa yekkat wa yettru
zemreɣ ad t llseɣ

nesɛa yakk tamlilt ad tt nurar
s isudal la teṭṭḍen
tidet ma ad as beddleɣ lmul
tebɣiḍ a tenɣeḍ mmi tneɣ
yuba yettwaker
melmi ara tgeḍ axxam

aẓawan yesdukkul

qeblent
ur tezmir ara ad tsuɣ
infelwa uḍaṛ is

yesɛa legrina uqcic a

d afellaq

tanemmirt
izeyyeṛ agus acḥal d iseggasen akken ad yerr idrimen ar ṭṭerf
nekk d akerraz
ahat xaṭi

abelɣenǧur d yiwet n tewsit n tbexsisin lɣella s d taberkant tmal ɣer tezweɣ

yextaṛ ik
wissen ma ad icfu fell as

i yettimɣuṛen ala agudu
iɣsan is ttnejqiqen seg usemmiḍ

anda ara naf win yettcabin ar winna

wten ɣef tmurt nsen
yuba yessefsex it
tesɛiḍ timlilit d tɣamsa
ma iqeɛɛed lḥal azekka ad nruḥ ad nɛumm deg asif
tesɛuẓẓeg terra iman is ur d tesli ara

ulac axxam

mya iseggasen d tasuft d ungal i yura umyaru akulumbi gabriel garcia marquez
ansuf s wat tussna
yuɣal laman ɣer ɣur s i tettaf
ma yella nemmeslay d ɣef mhenni xalifi ad t naf iqeddec deg unnar n teqbaylit yefka as azal meqqṛen

layas yesderɣil
ma d cwiṭ agi melleḥ it
ṭṭaqqa n dderya d asif n lmeḥna
wid iɛelmen steqsayen amek akka zedɣeɣ iman iw
anta tameslayt ur tenṭiqem ara
s leɛqel im
ansa i d kkan warrac nni
s wannuz kan mačči s wannen
rran k deg uɛewwiq
ger tidet d lekdeb rebɛa iḍudan
hder neɣ qqim
amyag d ayenwuran
tamurt ad teṛtiḥ ad teṛwu asteɛfu
terra ten deg uɛewwiq
arwaḥut
waqil fehmeɣ
tewwet itt s lmaɛun
tugi ad kem tettu
sekṛeɣ mebla tissit
tisusaf d aman
adrum ɣer tama s yeddu
ass mi lliɣ d agrud helkeɣ aṭan n cuff mejjir cuffen akk leḥnak iw
tura ad tceyyɛem ɣur s ad d yas s lɛejlan
ahamt ahamt
qqimet
win yebɣan taqbaylit iɣeṛ idlisen is
inwa ddunit d awal kan
axxam a d ayla w
yeɛqub iggull s win yettagwd baba s isḥaq
anta i yeččan
ad akent t yefk
nniɣ d iẓekwan mačči izeḍwan
d azamul n ccbaḥa
baba yella izeṭṭ tidencin i wat taddart
d ṭṭbib baba s
yettaru kullec tom
ad tt iqqen umjahed aḥrur s nnig n teɛyunin
lweqt ittazzal iruḥ
ad as d rnuɣ taklit
ma d taneggarut tella d ilindi deg taddart n tiferdud deg at yusef
umuɣ n yinelmaden n uswir wis ukkuẓ ɣezzif cwiṭ
ceggɛen as inelmaden nsen akked kra n ihiṛudiyen
tfukk lgira
la ttqejjiment fell awen
igerrez
gar yisaragen d tmeɣriwin akked waddal
ad ixdem ayen ilaqen akken ad d yeffeɣ seg s
ur ččiɣ acemma ass a
iceqqeṛ tom
yiwen wass ad n rzuɣ ɣur wen
seɣti tt
ad tt nesqerdec d umusnaw n umezruy aqbur
wali asmel amaynut
aṛeṭṭal itbeɛ it lexlaṣ
yerra s iɣẓer
i tessexdem fransa
melmi ad t iẓeṛ
ɛni n japu tina
aql aɣ neqqel d ɣer umṛaḥ
inijel yettak d tizwal deg unebdu
imsulta a ad ttwasuzren ɣef wammasen n usɛeddi deg yakk akal n tmurt
ur ḥemmu ara akken
ḥemmleɣ kem s yitran i yettfeǧiǧen
ḍefṛet abrid nwen
seg sen ay d ggiḍ tara
ulac win i s yeslan
mel iyi d d acu i k yuɣen mi tugiḍ akka ad d tutlayeḍ
llan sserwaten timẓin
ur twalaḍ ara belli tamurt n leqbayel tetteddu ɣer nnger
tiɣaltin yesleɣ wedfel deg sent i sɛeddaɣ temẓi w
akken qeṛṛiḥit ay ẓidit
d asṭerṭer kan i tesṭerṭirem
yeṭṭerḍeq waɛbar
zgan ttemyarun tibratin
d tarwa i trebba tninna
nger
aru awennit
tuker aɣ
d izri kan i d adɣen
tuget n wučči ar leqbayel zik yebna ɣef iniɣman zit uzemmur timẓin irden lbecna ajilban abelluḍ
ẓrant di snat liḥala mačči akken ara tkemmel
yuḍen jeddi
tebɣam ad tuɣalem ansa i d tekkam
sliman u muḥ yettban meẓẓi
uɣaleɣ s axxam
lmuqeddem ad t ikmen i tikkelt nniḍen sebɛa n wussan
ufhim imeddukal rezzun fell as
ad tsellkeḍ aqeṛṛu yim dinna
yella win i yukren apaspuṛ iw
wissen anda llan amek i ttɛicin ukud i ttɣimin
tettkerric icenfiren is akken ad tesseblaɛ isuɣan is
ffɣen ad nadin ma yella kra ara afen
isṛayil iwala arraw n yusef dɣa yenna anwi ten wigi
tagrawla ur telli ɣur wid yugaden tugdut
seg wasmi i d tekker nettat d amdegger d ddunit
ičča tt meṛṛiɣet
ula d ayen yuran deg linǧil ɣas ini d timucuha kan
anda akka i rrant
ur telḥi ara

ɛreḍ
rwimt t mliḥ

ssadret ṭṭaq nwen
yedda d yid m
iḥerr d amḍiq

tlaq iyi temzelt
ilaq ad nwalef

at taddart merra ffɣen d ad t mmagren
ur xdimeɣ ara ula d akken
ala mi s ɛewjen lecɣal

ur bɣan ara ad tfak

ssusfen
d mass arezqi cennan akked uduktur tuwat ara yilin d imsirgen

ɣunfaɣ tent

yettwanɣa
deg ass n lǧemɛa i nella

iḥemmel yuba ccna

wwḍent ɣer din uqbel iw

tenɣiḍ tom
ur kem ɣucceɣ ara

ala tafekka s kan i d yeqqimen
s tidet ur tebɣiḍ ara lqahwa
netta yekkat abendayer ma d ameddakel is d lɣiṭa

ad tleḥḥu

susem

taqbaylit d tameslayt iw
s lemɛun i theddreḍ
wamma imaziɣen ur nezmir ad nerr di tesga amezruy i d yeqqaren tameṭṭut nerra tt d tagellidt dihya d amedya
iɛǧeb iyi upiknik
anwa ara as yinin ad teḍru twaɣit a d awezɣi ad amneɣ
yennecraḥ wudem is

lḥila n ssbaṛ teččur

allah yettergigi

ugint

acḥal ɣlay
mi k d inna bat ini yas ḥatt
tabɣest tettek d s daxel ik mačči s wiyiḍ
zwareɣ k
ihi uqbel ad yerr tiririt i jack yedda ar google akken ad inadi d acu t unamek nniḍen n wawal a
bḍan as ten id
ẓriɣ k
ḍelment
d tisin n mmi s n umdan
lemrafi wejden iɣuṛaf ur nǧiṛen
aṭas n tlawin i t ixeddmen
aṭret d syin
ad k tt id reḍleɣ
tenniḍ d
ad t tleqqmeḍ
yessemqarab gar asen
yudan kan uyaziḍ kkreɣ d
ur nesɛi ara adlis
llan wid yeqqaṛen ulac ṛebbi
iles aɣezfan gezzmen t wuglan
ilha uqader n yilugan n wurar
yeɛṛeḍ yuba ad iyi ssuden
tesɛa d aqcic tsemma yas cit tenna illu yefka yi d dderya nniḍen iɣrem iyi d habil i yenɣa kayin
acḥal i d lɛali t
yesseknaf as d tasa ad d terfed iman is
iban sani tleḥḥuḍ
iseɣ im inuda
ulamma tugid ay ul
ta i kemm
ula d abruy nni amecṭuḥ n usirem tura ikemmel
aqli gar iberdan
anwa ur d nusi ara
annaɣ a tarwa
cacnaq d yiwen yuran isem is s yisekkilen n ureɣ deg umezruy n tefriqt n ugafa
yella d acu i yettu yidir deg wexxam
ur yenfiɛ azuḥ usegzawal ayi
kullec iṛuḥ
neṭgemt
d awezɣi
tgerrzemt a tullas
yugad jeddi s
teččur d leɛqel
ma tzemreḍ xas ma ulac fḥel
bdiɣ heddreɣ
yeggul ar d yerr ttaṛ ala ma yeǧǧa t ufud is
ad sen t teɛṛeḍ
ata wayen i d tessutreḍ
ttasen d si yal abrid
suref as
selken
lukan ad tt tennalem d amcum nwen
nesɛa yiwet n tmezgunt maca xuṣṣent aɣ tsegbarin
tebḍa yawen t id
anwa i ilaqen ad yeḥkem
acku lḥan d amecwar lwaḥid
neffeɣ meṛṛa iḍelli
balak ad s tinim yehbel
anda ttidiren yimawlan is
d abrid ur nessufuɣ
ad ttruɣ ɣef buḥu rran t lebḥur akin
ad tt id temmagremt
uccen nni yeqqummec kan iban d am akken yettxemmim
adef
ay anda tebɣuḍ tawḍeḍ
ttaɣ awal ad trebḥeḍ
deg yiwen uzniq i tzedɣem kečč akked umdakel ik aɛziz
am wass a di lehna ad d uɣalen
yerwel d seg rrebrab d lḥif n tmurt is yuɣ abrid ɣer lurup
iwweḍ as i uzrem s amruj
fakeɣ ak t
ccetwa tewweḍ d yaw ad nruḥ ad d nezdem
wa iḥemmel wa yekreh
musa yesbedd aqiḍun n temlilit isers tikersiyin issuli tincirin isɛedda iɛmuden isbedd tigejda
xeddmeɣ ur qḍiɛeɣ
fket d tuttriwin tebɣam
iziḍ neɣ rẓag
ṭṣeɣ i kečč
keyyfeɣ yiwen
almi i kem nufa a taftilt n ṣṣbeḥ n leḥris
akal i d yefkan irgazen
dayen ndemmeɣ deg usefru i uriɣ
ur tewwimt ara amḍiq nkent
ini d d acu k yeǧǧan ur d tusiḍ ara ɣer uɣerbaz iḍelli
mačči d kra i ẓẓay udrar a iyi sbibben
a yemma sber ur ttru ad waliɣ udem n nnbi
azul fell as
imal d ɣur i
imiren ad d teḥḍer taggara
nesbeɣ itent id

mkul awal s nnehta
uccen ur tt isɛedday ɣef uccen

tameṭṭut a ur tezwij ara
ṛqiqet liḥala s
wa meẓyan ṛwaḥ ad nurar labil
d ssbagiti
teɣli tesɣaṛt is
azul a massa
amihi iɛedda
kemm i leḥcic

qabel ad tt nawi
iruḥ war tamentilt
teṛwa iḍes taṣebḥit a
llan wid yettɛassan ɣef teqbaylit
i aɣ xedmen

amdakel is d aṭerki

nnal
aɣedluj d iqcer ibawen neɣ ujilban

tiyaḍ s lufanat deg yirebbawen nsent mazal kfin tuṭḍa
ɣur k kullec
yesserɣ it id s uḥlalas
ur bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ acemma tura akka
kksent aɣbel
aya neẓra t si zik
atan kecmen d yizmawen
abrid ameqqran
mmtet s leɛqel
balak ad d yekcem warẓaz nni
ad asent ten tefkem
usiɣ d ad t nɣeɣ
ur d faqeɣ ara yakk ma din i telliḍ
teṭṭef tijeǧǧigin deg ufus is
d acu i d tufiḍ
tenɣamt asent ten
iḍes n tmara

ur telles kra alamma tenniḍ d
d taqbaylit i ken id yessekren
nebɣa ad as nsel
bab n ṣṣenɛa d sselṭan

walit

ur yuɣal ad iẓer gma s
ur ttkeyyifet ara
yuba d adderwic
anwa i teẓṛiḍ

maziɣ d sima
swant aman n wasif
ad t tseɛfemt

tefra taluft

tcelɛeḍ

yerra d akk afwad is

ɛyiɣ seg m dayen ɛyiɣ

ɛerqent asen

ṣebbeṛ it
ɣas fiḥel ulac ineḥwan yid i
ay aḥlili d rray iw i yebɣan tigi

tizizwa
yeffeɣ uqbel ad ffɣen
kkreɣ d deg lḥif ṛwiɣ tilufa
wissen anda akken i tezdɣeḍ
yekka lexbar akk taddart mmi s n uciban yettnusun deg tejmeɛt
ad nili din merra s idis nkent
ziɣ ula d nekni tura s trisiti i nteddu
iceffu mliḥ
ṭṭef it
bɣan ad d awin aknic ar wexxam
senzeɣ lḥenni yenza azal is yuli
deg tmurt n ityupya i d ufan lqahwa tikkelt tamezwarut
la yerfed lqec is
wissen ma ad icfu fell am
atta tewweḍ d yiwet n terbaɛt ibeṛṛaniyen ɣer edo neɣ ṭukyu
tettaruḍ s tutlayt taqbaylit
myagren iḍelli d lwiza
lḥan tlata n wussan deg uneẓruf ur ufin aman
qwan iɣezzfanen ufus
ɣas akken ur tesɛi ara ttiɛad d maziɣ
imenna d ad yečč asunedwič
llant d tiserdasin
yuba d aherdun
win n uḥraz n yidles d yiles
ur yettaf ara ayen ara yexdem
yecceḍ
a ṛebbi seggem as ussan
d kemm i d taselmadt n tmaziɣt tamaynut
ruḥ a lemḥiba w
syin ikemmel amennuɣ deg urebbi n umussu adelsan amaziɣ
yehwa yawen kan
d kemm i d affud d kemm i d asirem
nnejmaɛet d tḥessem d ay arraw n yeɛqub
si mḥemmed isellem ɣef lalla xelluǧa dɣa yeṭṭerḍeq d imeṭṭi
fakken aɣ t
ad d ddun yid i
afenǧal n lqehwa ma ulac aɣilif
teffer igenni tegguma ad tekkes
win i y iḥemmlen iḥemmel daɣen aqjun iw
ur zmireɣ ara ad zdiɣ lqedd naɣ ad beddeɣ
tixelxalin ad ilint ɣef yiri ad kecmen deg sent iɛekkzan swayes ara treffdem ṭṭabla

d ifransisen kenwi
iban ɣef wudem is yesmesxir
ɛeǧben iyi yeqjan
aqemmuc is d tazuliɣt

fiḥel

muqqlemt

a lḥif ik

ečč s ttawil
ad kunt nernu imesnsi
d aɣbalu i win yebɣan ccbaḥa n wawal akked telqayt n umeslay
dɣa akka i teḍra yiwet n twaɣit ass nni n warim deg tama n arezyu deg twilayt n wehran
mi yelluẓ ad iɣenni
kečč d ameḥbus nteɣ
wa d tazmart wa d tayri wayeḍ d imawlan
illu yexleq amdan ɣef ṣṣifa s
teǧǧa t id yemma s d aqcic deg dduḥ
iteddu yas di lebɣi i yemma s

teccuṛ

ad ččeɣ tura kan

akka kan

d ilef iḥizi

temmut

aql i deg uxxam weḥdi

awit tiwaculin nwen yid wen ma d lmal nwen ameqran akked lmal nwen amecṭuḥ ad iqqim dagi

ad yeqqen lḥenni mmi s n sbeɛ iṛemli
d tuylayt ay itteqqnen iɣerfan ɣer yimezwura nsen ɣer umezruy nsen
win issebruyen ad d igri deg iɛwiqen
temmekta d
dderya tettcettil neɣ tettxewwil
massa err d ɣef yisteqsiyen iw
zzin d fell as imceddalen
iɛac lesnin ussan ttin lebɣi s yeɛreq
smir fell as zzit ternuḍ as lǧawi axaṭer d lweɛda
asif err as d lɛinser
ur ttuɣ ḥedd
d anwa i yeffɣen
zewǧen deg tmurt
telsa aččadur d aberkan teffer udem is akken ad d tban meqqret
iteddu tikli n yizem
neɣ amek ara as semmiɣ i win i am ixedmen aya
ḥman mliḥ waman n wasif nni
tesɛamt aselkim
tebram i yimeẓẓuɣen nwen
yečča takermust armi s tewḥel
yefferfer usirem iw wissen anda yerra
tikli ɣef uḍar ur tufiḍ anda ara t tawi
tḥemmleḍ taṭelyanit
amek i m gan wussan
ikker i wedrar s tqabact
wehmen
maca ur sɛiɣ ara idrimen
d tawwurt ik id yewwin iḍ iɛeddan ara ak yerren sbeḥ a
tasdawit
sɣiɣ d abellarej ɣas akken ɣlayit
imiren ad sen iniɣ ɛinani leɛmeṛ i ken ssneɣ
ḥareb ɣef yiman ik
tigusa n tnezduɣt tigusa n ufrag akked imurar nsent meṛṛa

afran n uḥric n tesnilest
kles aya
seṛqem as iḍudan
ur ikeččem ara ad iɣer
ur tteẓẓuɣ ṭejra ur ččiɣ nfeɛ
yefka d aṭas i tutlayt d yidles aqbayli
wa yelsa wa yeɛra
yeɛṛeq tom

ttemyebbin am iɛdawen
ad t wansen
muteɣ s fad

ur bɣiɣ ara ad tuɣalem ar boston

d ta i d tagara

d tixsi ay n udem ik

tfehmeḍ as
deg lɣeṛḍ im
iḍ ayi ɣas eǧǧ it akken yecɛel
ečč lḥeqq ik sider i tiṭ ik

terwel ar ɛemti s

ifakk am tt
d weltma

tfakemt iyi tent

ɛyiɣ am llufan

a wer kkren

amek ar ɣuri
ass agi theddneɣ s idis iw yeḥdeṛ
anwa i iḥebsen
ass a d ass ameqran

ur ssinent ara leṣlaḥ nsent

ur ttili d tegeldunt

cceṛ iɣleb it lxiṛ

dɣa iburek it

a yemma a wi iṛuḥen

tbeɛ it
di tberna i yufa tameṭṭut nni tis snat
ulac win i ifehhmen
qqim ɣur s kra n wussan alamma iɛedda as wurrif i gma k
jimmy yeɛreḍ ad iqenneɛ imawlan is ad t ǧǧen ad yezger tamurt s tkeṛṛust akked imdukal is
ass a d kečč ad ten iḍfren
reclen
ɣef teqbaylit kan i ttmeslayen
tom nni iruḥ deg sent
yella kra i tettnadiḍ
ad as yini aqlih di lbiru
ass mi ara rnuɣ ɣer lejdud iw awi yi si maṣer
yewwi taqcict akkin
yella kra n yiwen i tettṛajuḍ
tsebɣeḍ asen ten
yessammes i laman yefka deg s muḥend u yidir
ad ttraǧuɣ
feṛḥeɣ nezzeh s warraz i d yettunefken sɣur tddukkla adrar n fad
ad d nebder gar asen amedyaz ameqqran si muḥend umḥend nna crifa lwennas meɛtub d wiyaḍ
anwa axxam i yesbeɣ
teččam akken iqwem
ulayɣer ad yili uḥras gar urgaz d tmeṭṭut
xḍant akk tlawin nni i tsertit
ur d iyi yessin ara
tesbeɛbeɛ tixsi uzzlen d izamaren
ad m t teɛṛeḍ
iḍelli ssneɣ d yiwen seg isegbaren mucaɛen akk di ddunit
ass a ḥedṛeɣ i yiḍan
ass kamel nutenti ssexdament deg neɣ
ruḥ ad isahel ṛebbi fell ak nekk d awḥid ara kemmleɣ
ala ma nmuqel agama tamurt igenni ur nettaṭaf ara cceḥna ɣef tudert
tettejraḥ tayri
teḥcamt iyi tt
ulamma ur ten qqaren ara
aql i ttluseɣ
teɛreḍ acḥal d abrid ad tɣer adlis
sgumiɣ ad ṭṭseɣ deg iḍ
d aḥullu i tettḥullumt deg wawal
ula d lwaɛda mi asen d tettunefk wa ittbuddu wayeḍ s uḥric yelhan
ɣas azen d ṣṣber i wul im mmi m tewwi t tḍeggalt
fell asen i la tetzuxxuḍ akka
d argaz icebḥen
iḥuss as yuba yefṛeḥ
yewwi t wasif d asawen
tugi ad tefru taluft a
bgayet telha d ṛṛuḥ n leqbayel
sderdez
ad iḥewwes yid neɣ
ihi amek
iḥemmel ad iles iceṭṭiḍen iberkanen
qerḥent iyi tuɣmas iw
ziɣ tesɛiḍ lḥeqq a tom
awi add it ɣel uwqas
a tiqewwadin
d menhu ara d tedduḍ
yewwet itt id qjuni
igduden a n imezwura umezruy ula d yiwen deg sen ur yeṭṭif sdat tɣermiwin i d ikecmen timura nsen s lemḥellat nsent
tessneḍ snat nni
d acu kan d ayla w
uɣalen watmaten im s axxam
ttnadin kan tibdar iɛǧeb iyi
ɛeddan iḍarren is
aql i da ɣef lǧal ik
ur tezzi ara kan deg wawal awi d amaynut
ilaq ad ṛuḥeɣ
ḥaca tamart ik
sami yettaḍsa yakan
yefka iman is i waman taggara ččan t yiselman
tzemrem ad tṛuḥem
a tiberrint n lebḥer cceḍḥ im d llumayer
teqqim kan tessirt i ulɣem
iwala itran deg uzal qayli
lluẓen warrac armi mmuten maca ula d tiḥdayin
yuker iyi
iberdan akk kkren zun drus aya mi tɛedda tegrewla
tenɣa melanie yiwet n tissist s ufus is
tečča aɣrum nni s wudi
tuɛer iyi tusnakt
xdem i yiman ik lbabuṛ s wesɣar n iseṛwel
d acu i d tewwim yid wen
argaz ečč kan s tezmert inek nekk ṛwiɣ
nadi kan
gnent
neɛreḍ itent merra nsent
ma nekker d ulac tuɣalin ar deffir
ass wis tmanya ad s sḍehren i uqcic nni
iwwi d iman is
ur d yettuɣal alma yerra d ttar
ur zmireɣ
tessen kamel ircen
ilaq iyi ad k agadeɣ
ayen yellan eǧǧ it deg ul ik
qqaren akken nebɣu nḥebbeṛ d rebbi i yettḍebbiren
lqaṛes d asemmam
tikwal yettaweḍ almi d aseggas neɣ sin i wid iḥekmen s ɛecra n yiseggasen d asawen
d ayen igerrzen s tidet
ass nni ɣaya t
anwa i d yennan aya
ziɣ tezdeg iw d ammus
amek yuru tamellalt amek akka wa lmeɛna s yesɛa lberhan neɣ amek
baba tneɣ inna yaɣ d uɣalet ad ɣ d taǧwem cwiṭ n lqut
tijeǧǧigin i d yemɣin di tqernit
acimi ur as tettruẓuḍ ara aqerru s
asugen n tegrudt ur nessin tudert yerra ɣer tmucuha n setti s
ẓẓeǧǧ tacekkart n walim i uḥeggan
ad d ifk ṛebbi imnayen n telwit
ass a d tameɣra n lbizan
s uxxam akk d ṣṣebyan
tella kra n yiwet i yeṭṭalayen
mi d tkecmeḍ deg yimi n tewwurt
kerheɣ mi yi txeddem akka
bɣiɣ ad dduɣ yid k
udem is yettfeǧǧiǧ am lefnar
d igerrujen yeffren
neqqar as tagecrirt
am netta am tiziyin is
kemmlemt amuqqel
tenna tyaẓiḍt i yefrax is jebdet ɣenbu yemma twen ur tesɛi bubbu
ma yenna yak ssired ɣas ames
ǧǧan aɣ deg yir liḥala
snat leqhawi ma ulac aɣilif
iteddu yettwehhi
wwin tt id d amqelleɛ ma yella ad ruḥen ɣer lebḥer neɣ ala
yuba d win ireffun
lɛerc n iḥesnawen
tessebṛuqleḍ iyi
axaṭer aql ak am ferɛun
d taksumt d nnefs d umenzay iɣef iteddu
nekk ttmuquleɣ
d acu iwumi neɛlem
almend n wakka atan yettwareṣṣa yiwen n yibeddi aɣerman iǧehden
yella ḥlaw
axxi buh ččar kemm
netta yebɣa ajdid ma d nekk yerra yi di rrif am uɣerbal aqdim
teddunt awent di nneqma
tettbineḍ d n japu kečči
win iḍṣan ḥadeṛ ad ten iru
fakken asen t
isemma yas tiziri yiss ittwali tafat ur ittemderkal ur iɣelli
ɣur m ad tettuḍ ɣef wayen nemɛahad
yiwen n wass ad d uɣalen
ldi imi m ttxil m
ffɣen d akk s iberdan
ad d awint ustu ad grent aẓeṭṭa
fukken tent
yessemɣaṛ tisra
nɣan awen t
atan akken ṭṭfeɣ imayl im
ččar ilmawen nni
nettaggad tili nneɣ
tuget n tmucuha nneɣ ttfakkant s lferḥ
d netta i t id yessufɣen akka d acennaf
yeɛqub isla belli caxim icemmet yelli s dina
ḥbes tawaturt nni
mazal teḥma
anda i d tuɣeḍ takerrust a
ili k d aqesḥan
ccah di ṛṛay nsen
tamsulta ur tɛeṭṭel ara twet imesbaniyen s rrṣas
ilaq ad ten tissinemt
ayɣer i theddṛem fell as
wah ma truḥeḍ anda i k nniɣ
ad asent t tefkem
amek i sen txedmeḍ i yidlisen nni
ahat tecfiḍ
tom d win ireffun
nettat tettayzag trekkem
tedɛa yasent yemma tsent s lxir
nɣucc iken i meṛṛa
tuɣeḍ d dwawi
efk d tiktik ulac akukru dayen yeffuk tura
deg ul ad tt id ssewweḍ
yenṭer
a teddu yid neɣ
deg ukud am wa yif it ususem
tekkat daɣen
ad tissin iqbayliyen d teqbayliyin wid ara tt ifehmen
yuli d ujṛad ɣef tmurt n maṣer iɣumm tamurt meṛṛa
taṛbut ittwanejṛen teḥwaǧ aneqqi
d kunwi ara ɣ d yefken lemtel
d taɣallit kemm neɣ
timura n berra ideg ttidiren leqbayel s waṭas
ssired
tura ɛeqleɣ kem
ɛni tuḍneḍ
ur yezmir ara ad d isumer iɣewwaṛen ma ulac aɣilif sekcem isenneftaɣen yettwattun
ddiɣ akked yemma ad d nawi azemmur
ur cukkeɣ ḥemmleɣ boston
melmi akka ara tzewǧeḍ ay aɛezri nneɣ
teɣli am ubeḥnuq
ur yezmir i tuɣalin ɣer deffir
tilufa n zzman
d taɣennant is ara t issegrirben yiwen n wass
ssmaḥ d ddwa
muqel afus iḍen ma yeṭṭef aɛekkaz
anwa i ak d yessawlen
ur yefhim ara taluft nni d acu tt
ittban usigna syawes tekkat
tugem d si tala
itess lqahwa
a tt an tarwa n yeɛqub
win i d yeɣṛan di temɛemmeṛt ad ikker ad iqdec ɣef tmaziɣt
s tebluzt d tamellalt tesnubgut inebgawen d yinerzafen rnu tettlaɛi ten s kra n tefyar i as sihlen si tazwara
mceččen izerman
win ur nessin lemɛani ur iferru ddɛawi
inna yasen tessnem laban mmi s n naḥuṛ
teqbel ayen yebɣu yefka as t id
iɛreḍ iyi s axxam
tselmed aɣ tselmadt nneɣ tizlit eǧǧet aɣ abrid ad nɛeddin n ɛli ideflawen
ṭṭfeɣ d tlata n yimerga
sima tekcem ɣer tnawalt
d aqjun im ad ččeɣ tisugar
la ɣ yettnadi
illa dinna
ur yuki mi teṭṭeṣ yid s ur yuki mi tekker
yuzen am n tabrat
s yisem i yi d ttmektiɣ
ur tṣuni ara mi ara d izger uqcic amecṭuḥ ixelleɛ yettuɣal d d timdeffirt
sḥissef
iban ulac iḍes daɣen ass a
ur ttmuqqul ara ɣer deffir
ala ma tefna ddunit
ulac tameṭṭut i izewǧen d mmi s n urgaz is
fkan afus deg wayla nsen
yewwa s yirij n lkanun
afennan belxir muḥend yella yesmeḥsis i yicennayen iqburen am sliman ɛazem
ad kent ten id yawi
ɛyan medden si tsertit
ur ǧǧiɣ amkan
ali
tura yi d tabrat
yeffeɣ afus iw ur mazal ad berqent fell as wallen iw
gǧan awent d tarda leḥwal
aṭas i yettneɛtab deg uxeddim
ulin d waman s ṭṭaqa teččuṛ ddunit
temmut
qujjreɣ seg ugris
cceṛ d uffal lxiṛ d uzzal
llan ceṭṛen
ečč iyi
eǧǧ yuba ad iṛuḥ
tajmilt tella d s yisental d yisaragen
d nutenti ara d yekkren zik azekka
d wid yessusemen ɣef lmerta s i s yettarran tajmilt assa
ad txedmeḍ am akken i t twalaḍ t deg udrar
iluɛa yas tom i mary
tḥemmleḍ aqellal n tmurt n yeqbayliyen
ddut sya
yekkat tagitaṛt akken iwata
tella kra n taluft
tlemdemt leqran
ahat ur seɛɛuɣ ara lweqt
warǧin ad tt yeskeṛkeṛ akken yebɣu iḥeml d d uguren
ul iw iruḥ d isyaxen
yebḍa yi tt id
iteddu tekkat fell as yerna turew as taɣaṭ
ur ǧǧint amkan
d acu i yesserfan yidir
akeddaṛ
mendas yuɣ as awal i ṭṭbib nn
ameɣlal irra as ur xeddmeɣ acemma ma ufiɣ dinna tlatin
mɣin d ibawen deg tebḥirt nwen
yečča t uydi iɣelten
bḍan am tent id
waqil ufiɣ d tiririt
mazal ur d wwiḍen
bɣiɣ ad nernu ad nmeslay
tmecḥem d aɣebbar
tettagademt tili nwent
ḥulfaɣ i yimetman is yettismiḍen ɣef yiri w
tewwet iyi tmagart nsen
nekk d lbumba keččini d zzalimiḍ
ad yi qilen i wudem im
d acu i kem iwwin ɣur sen
isfenxiṛ am uqcic n ccuq
texdeɛḍ iyi ad k yexdeɛ rebbi
anda i tezmer ad tili
nutni deg leɛmer mlalen d ula ɣef yiwet n tikti
azekka ṣṣbeḥ zik mi d tekkrem ad tkemmlem abrid nwen
yiwen yekkat asanti wayeḍ d dderbuka
seqdaceɣ ayagi
ɛni tessneḍ ad taruḍ taqbaylit
ɣas akken yuɛer ad yebḍu lweqt is gar leqraya
i ak yefkan lerbayeḥ aṭas
d tamɛayt n ixeddamen imcumen
terriḍ tt deg uɛewwiq
ḍefṛemt abrid nkent
iwacu ur tettruḥeḍ ara
aṭas i yi tgiḍ leɣruṛ
tamussni d tawwurt
imir nni dɣa gma s n mḥend yeffeɣ d seg uxxam is
yeɣli d fell i ubabder i wumi ur zmireɣ
tewwi t llefɛa m sebɛa yimawen
fiḥel ma testewrem tuẓẓal
ɣur s lexbar ɣef wayen akk i ixeddem
d aksil i yenɣan ɛuqba deg umḍiq iwmi qqaren tura sidi ɛuqba
sya d afella ad d nheggi yiwen
d acu ara nečč
yebḍa yasen tent id
yessers aburziz
yella kra i m d iceyyeɛ tom
d kečč i d nniya d kečč i d abuheyyuf
simmal ittɛeddi lweqt
lemmer kan ulac ula d ṭṭraḍ deg umaḍal
abrid a yegdel i yikumya
teqqes iyi tizit
akken ibɣu yilli
tenɣa yasent ten

lmed akken ilha timsirin ik a mmi
ldi idlisen im
mi yekfa lhedṛa yid sen musa iɣumm udem is s leḥǧab
ar d iger wajdim timceḍt

ɣurren aɣ
ɛeṛḍet ur d ttaḍsat ara
xas ma dayen yexneq

berka ur d ttaf ara tisebbiwin
fell am ay ɛetbeɣ
isteqsiyen agi zgan deg wallaɣ is

ur as d yewwi ara ad yečč

ibecc aserwal is

azul fell awen akken ma tellam
ruḥ ad tcucfeḍ tesnezfeḍ iyi

d ayen ibanen am yiṭij

ataya yidir
d izimer n usuref asuref n umeɣlal

d leqdic i d thegga tddukkla tadelsant imnar n tdukli n at ɛissa mimun

d iḥlalaḍan d iblalaḍen skedd tamurt ur ttawḍen

kemzeɣ

la kent sseqdacent

akken i xedmen
kečč d amehtuf
di tirga w i ten ẓerreɣ
yella kra n yiwen i itetten
tasertit tabaḍnit n mozilla
ass agi neɣ deg wass nni i nečča asfel
d tudert n lɛali
win yennan i gma s a lǧayeḥ
ẓẓlet iɣallen nwen
ixdem s usɣar n uqeccuc tincirin i uqiḍun dɣa yesbedded itent
ad d awiɣ iseɣ
teqqar deg wul is
mseččen izerman
yuɛer aɣ lḥal ad nidir akken nebɣa
ccetwa tḍul učči yenqedwa arrac lluẓen
a tuzyint mm lqedd ubabmbu
temmut tura
yecceg ɣef iḥider ukermus
wa yundi tt wa iquṛeɛ tt
mhenni xalifi i d yessuffɣen yakan ddeqs n yidlisen s teqbaylit
ṛebɛin n wussan akked ṛebɛin n wuḍan ageffur ikkat
yettban usigna swayes tekkat
sliɣ sqaqayen yewzaḍ deg ufrag

xir awen ma ur tɛeṭṭlem ara tbeddem as
ihuh amek armi imedyazen agi ttnawalen awal

d isefra s i icennu di tezlatin is gar yisental iɣef icennu ad nebder tayri timetti lḥif tizlit tamḥaddit
tlulemt d s teqbaylit
yuklal tamɛawna
sebɣent iyi t
nesla mi awen gan snasel
a tent wehhin akka d wakka zdat n umeɣlal
yerra t deg uɛewwiq
d akatulik i telliḍ
mi jbant i lemwaj akin ad asent yekkes tisura
ma d taqcict s tlata kan n iṣurdiyen n lfeṭṭa
ɣef ddemma n ddnubat n lejdud nsen daɣen ara rkun
xtaṛent kem
tebɣamt ad ldiɣ aya tura
akka i teḍra
kemm d tungift
ssuɣlet aḍṛis a
yekcem s usu
ad yili ur tecfiḍ ara fell i
ad teddu tefsut
ad iyi yuɣal
tuker iyi tnafa
taḥkayt n yelli s n selṭan d waɣzen
tameddit nni ččiɣ akk tiremt iw n lmakla
ur d nnin acemma
itbir yeshuruy
yettaker i yimeɣban
yesbeɣ as ten
d ul ik i tt ibɣan mačči d keččini
xir umeḍlab kan acemma
acḥal i tebɛed
asɣaṛ uɛwij iweɛɛed i tmes
d arid nniḍen
teffeɣ awen d teɛrurt
aṭas i iɛawden yettwareqɛen deg s
imi ddunit tettezzi
bɣiɣ ad sgunfuɣ azekka
axeddim is yegzem kan deg wakal n tɣiwant
iga d nnfeɛ ula deg akal
yusef inna yasen ur ttagadet ara
tanemmirt daɣen i uɣmis n yimaziɣen i yi d yefkan tagnit a
uhu a baba
ruḥ ad teṭṭseḍ
tessneḍ taglizit
nḥeṛṛec lemwas
rriɣ d
yemdel inuba tawwurt yeqqim
ssali d umuɣ
ttif laẓ wala yir imensi
wid i d yemlal gar imakaren iqettalen imeksawen iɛebbaden n yilluten atg
anda yella wawal nni aẓidan
ttif tuṭṭist tuffiẓt
akli ad yili am ssid is beṛka t
ayen txedmeḍ ad t tafeḍ
ikad wanda tedduɣ
lekber ɣef bab is iwumi
ay isli ay amekyus
ilaq ad ɛelmeɣ tura
mazal ayen nniḍen
zik yella yiwen n umɣar iḥulfa i lajel is
tusa yi d tikti
amkan im mačči yid neɣ
cennuɣ kem deg tizlatin
ixuṣ udlisfus ɣur neɣ
tessnem ad tṛebbim llufanat
i wana ara d iniɣ
faṭma caɛbi d tanaẓurt si zik is tḥemmel ccna aqdim
times ad tecɛel ɣef uɛalṭar ur txetti ara
ɣucceɣ k
acimi i tugiḍ
axeddim igerrzen
isuɣ tom
tegrurzeḍ
ssukiɣ kem id

iɛeqqeḍ
deg yal tagzemt ad naf aḍris tirawalt tajerrumt taseftit d ccna
zgan yal yiwen deg umaḍal is
menyif nnmara taryalt
ttwaliɣ tt amzun seg umtiweg iḍen i d tusa
sseṛɣent akent t
arrac qqimen smuzguten s tsusmi ṭṭafaren tt kan s wallen
amek i gan wussan is ass mi akken tella yid k

uraret
serkem
deg snat n tmura yemgaraden
yeqqers d yigenni
ma teggul deg k tmeṭṭut cfu
iḥṛec tiḥeṛci yisseḥṛacen iɣwyal
tjerreb akk ayen tennum
mačči d ayen isehlen ad d nefk taḥawact n useggas d uzgen
tessenked iyi i uletma s
wali akk isental n unaẓur agi

ad nḍeqqer kra din
d nnuba nwen tura
tɣunfa k
nɣan argaz nni
aṭas i tezḍa yemma n yitrikuyen
iwet armi dayen kan
ameɣlal inna d i musa ṛuḥ ɣer ferɛun
ṭṭabla nni n wuzzal fell as tigelmimin n yidammen kersent
tebda asnuffes d usuḍu s lemɣawla amzun yenneqḍaɛ deg s wuffu
d aqcic n lɛali i telliḍ
nadi zdat n watmaten nneɣ ayen akk sɛiɣ
tecfam
udem gar wudmawen

iguja tom
ziɣ tesɛiḍ sin n wulawen nekk d wis sin ay ssneɣ
agiṭar ur t sɛiɣ
yiwen maɛduṛ wayeḍ aḥlil
tidma ayen din ɣef twenza d ibzimen
d awezɣi ad tselkeḍ seg ifassen iw
neḍmeɛ tafsut di ccetwa
ittcelliḥ am udles
tessuter as ad d teččar taqecwalt n tbexsisin
mi ifukk uselway inaw is yiwen ur iseffeq
ad d ilint snat n tejmilin
terfiḍ mliḥ ɣef mary

fehment d acu i d tenna
mazal xeddmeɣ deg s
nezder
ad k issufeɣ ṛebbi leḥkem n usɣaṛ
teẓra anda nezdeɣ
ad k weṣṣiɣ a mmi ɛzizen
abrid n bgayet yehruri
wid iẓewren ttheggin usu uqbel naddam
d acu i kem iwwin ɣur sent

yedduqus wul iw

ad tt id tuqem

ur izegged deg lehdur
yuba yeǧǧa mary
lferḥ n ferruǧa yewweḍ s igenni

issers iyi tucwiḍt

f annect a swaswa i ttnadiɣ
selmadeɣ tagnizit

tewwa tbexsist nni

win i kem iẓranyekka tawwurt

siwlet asent

yeɛqub inna as gall iyi

ur cfiɣ ara mliḥ
ger wallen is tettwali ḥala tebrek

ililucen n yal inni azeggaɣ awṛaɣ adal azegzaw amellal aberkan
am tecḍaḍt n bururu
eǧǧ iyi ad ssiwleɣ i ubugaṭu inu

teẓda nanna abelluḍ akked d lbecna

di leɛnaya k qwem it
yebda yekkat lǧuq

ma d ribka d yeɛqub i tḥemmel
tenqeb it tmedda deg allen
sired lemri nni

werǧin i tugad akken
ustralya weḥd s

rṣan iẓuṛan is

ddmen ten zgelli
