ur seqsay ara menhu yi nekk sɛiɣ ak ccɣel ad t id txedmeḍ
akka axir
tura ǧǧan medden tira s ustilu
ad ten teddmeḍ
mazal iken meẓẓiyit
tejbed iman is
akken i d uccanen
ur ttrebbiɣ mmi s n medden
d anehhar n lɛali
yiwwas ad d yebges
menwala iɛelleq ssaɛa
yebra i kra ma yessen it
bɣiɣ ad ṛebbiɣ awtul
ur ssinen ara ad xedmen tasertit
tura aql ik d argaz
amek i nezmer ad naweḍ ɣur s
ɛeggḍet
yuba yeṭṭaxer seg uɣerbaz
ur ak ɛniɣ lbali
acu i k yesxelɛen
ad ssemɣin deg umkan is asirem d teflest deg yiman
aqel ik am yiṭij
rret ddhen nwen
d tabuhalt acemma
ur tessin kra
kečč daɛdaw iw
yiwet n tikelt i tt ẓriɣ ur tt tettuɣ ara
ad tkerseḍ absis
mi ɣaben yizmawen ad sreɛrɛen yiḍan
d ayen iḥwaǧen akud d trusi n leɛqel d tezmert
imceyyeɛ ad iqeddem afṛux nni ɣef uɛalṭar
tom yeddem d adlis seg leqjer
ad nezwir deg s ad t neɣḍel
dɣa ɣlin ɣer lqaɛa seǧǧden zdat s
ttseqqin kan ɣer berra
nekk mačči am tidak
sellek tom
susmet kan
yelli m ha tt an s tadist
simmal tettfukti simmal tgemmu
ur gezzem ara lxiḍ a
ulac taluft i t izegglen
mačči da
rwiɣ ayefki
yiwen ur isseqneɛ
ifukk it akk
dɣa tɣumm udem is s umeḥrem
kker ad d tawiḍ aɣrum
ikad iyi d ad yelhu
argaz ameṛkanti d win ikesben meṭṭu ibennun
sima d maziɣ seg wakken ttemsefhamen
nettakk as udem n tilawt
ma tebɣiḍ ad tent id tsedduḍ seddu tent id s wudem arusrid
iṭṭes di tṛakna yina as ccetwa teḥlem
tissirt ma tuɣ itent deg rryac ula i as d xedmen iɣuraf
aferdis n usedwel
tefkiḍ asen abadaṛ
bɣiɣ ad ẓṛeɣ
kul wa efk as lkaṛ is
ulac imejjayen n tnefsit d aselmad i d kullec
aya ad aɣ yessiweḍ ad d nini ɣas aṭas i ibeddlen deg tmetti nneɣ maca mazal abrid ɣezzif aṭas
yuɣ asen d baba tsen iserwula
ḥennec tom
tameṭṭut ihin tessawaḍ iqannan
ifka yasen d ṛebbi tajeggaḥt
qqimemt
mazal ikem din
yal ass ḥemmleɣ kem ugar
tesseṛɣemt iyi tt
yufa k tettheggiḍ iman ik ad truḥeḍ s amahil
ruḥ ad d teqḍuḍ
icfa ɣef uxxam i yella ufrux
semnennit di tmusniwin
ɛerḍeɣ ad s beddleɣ tiktiwin maca ur ssawḍeɣ ara
tṛuḥ ɣer ibaraki
yewwet it yerra t d azegzaw am nnil
aṭas n medden i yeqqimen zzat unazal
lbaḍna ma tettwamla tettwanna
ɣaḍen ten
yella kra i ččant
bɣiɣ ad issineɣ akter n waya
django yesseɣli d deg sen rrehba
d aḥullu i ttḥullun deg wawal
tɣunfa ten lmut
asentel iɣef uran fell as aṭas yimedyazen d tayri
ad rnun
argaz iḥar amek i uqcic ur d nettru ur d nujjaq
iferrawen n tejnant d ihrawanen ɣellin as deg umwan
imiren ad yerr i mkul yiwen akken i llan lefɛayel is
rrbeḥ mi d yedla fell i ur iyi d yufi ara
yeḍleq as ɣer lqaɛa akken i teḍleq nettat i tɛelǧet is
yya mt
tecfa fell asen ar ass a
ad t id kksent
qwant tɣirdmiwin dagi
a meɣres bu sebɛa tnila
aṭas i ɛerḍeɣ ad ɛiwdeɣ ttrebga i wul iw uqbel ad gezmeɣ asirem
nnan as di bit liḥim n yahuda
s ujenwi k ara tɛiceḍ ad tuɣaleḍ d aqeddac ɣef gma k
ahat telluẓem mliḥ tura
tessers itt i tili
welleh a lukan ad ṭṭseɣ deg iciwi s
yuɣ iyi d tamrilt
teɛǧeb as nansi ɛeǧrem
tettḥelil iten ad rren lwelha ɣur s
ad as aruɣ i tom
yezga yettxemmim ɣef tudert i t id ittrajun
idermen deg yinekcamen i d yellan
ad asen t tefkeḍ
neẓṛa
mi wwḍen watmaten n yusef seǧǧden zdat s
mi sḍefrent wulli zdat n iɛekkzan nni ttarwent d imecṭuḥen iberqacen yesɛan izaggen yerna reqmen
ur d nuǧew ara zzit n uzemmur aseggas a
ur y iṭṭif kra tura
sɛiɣ yiwen ula d nekk
nerra t deg uɛewwiq
yura deg unyir is
ad d nezziad nettwali
xdem akken tebɣiḍ
yeqqur uqerruy is hdeṛ neɣ qqim
si dduḥ is ad d yettaḍṣa
ay asmi rran uccen d imḍebber
usiɣ d ɣur m
ih d leɛǧeb d ayen ur tettamneḍ
ur ttamen asif asusam
thenna deg uxxam is
amasay nni sṭaxren t
ɛyant wallalen iw seg tɣuri
sexsimt tiliẓṛi
ad nesseḥbiber xerṣum cwit
sami dinna i yella
ad kem yewwet ɛezṛayen ur kem yezgal ara
nnan ddunit tbedd ɣef yicc uɛerrum
a tiɛeggunin
ilaq ad kkreɣ fell i
tenna i maziɣ
issared udem is s useɣwen
qqimeɣ ɣef yisennanen
yečča tom s uɣiwel
lluẓeɣ bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ
d kennemti i yeẓṛan d acu i kent ilaqen
cukkeɣ ad tt isellek
ffeɣ si tkuzint iw
ulac kra
ssawḍeɣ t ar wanida yebɣa
d afṛux i yeleqḍen iwzan
yettwali tom mary txeddem
nehṛet
irra d cci nni meṛṛa
ad awen ikellex umennuɣ
ttḥadaret tiɣurdmiwin ass n waḍu
terra d lḥenni deg wacaren is
umnen tt dɣa
d kečč i t iluɛjen
mi meẓẓi yella d ameɣnas ɣef tmaziɣt
teṭṭerṭer tmurt a
ad nelmed tutlayt taqbaylit s wul nteɣ
arrac ssefṛaḥen sseqṛaḥen
azen tuṭṭfiwin ik n ugdil
akken d yeɣli yiḍ teqqim temɣert zzin as d warraw n warraw is
ẓriɣ t d aɛeryan
yerkeb iten lɣiḍ meqqren yimawlan n tnezduɣin
adlis meqqer
yal wa akken yura deg twenza s
yeḍfer tizrawin is deg tesdawit n bgayet
yewwi t s axxam nsen
uriɣ asent tibratin
d wigi meṛṛa i yuɣalen d tnac n leɛṛac n isṛayil
yenwa akka ara s tdum
tesseṛɣemt aɣ tt
ma yella ɣef uṣaḍuf n wurar a ama s wudem aglawan neɣ aratak
trebḥeḍ
yeɣra s wul is
myelhin d di tyita wa deg wa
awimt iyi d lkemmun
ur ẓriɣ ma ttqenniɛeɣ iman iw neɣ regleɣ i wayen yellan
ur qqareɣ ara
ugadeɣ ad ttuɣ
yella kra ibeddlen
ula d uccen ur yufi ayen ara iqewwet
ixelq it ɣef ṣṣifa n yillu
ayen teɣriḍ deg yedlisen d tidet yella
afud nsent d tutlayt taqbaylit
ad cfuɣ ɣef lecɣal nsen
cennun akk
a rebbi ini yi d acu ilaqen ad t xedmeɣ
fkan tt i jjiḥ
ruḥ s axxam im ahat ad tt tafeḍ tezwar ikem ɣer s
i d nudaɣ deg tmura rniɣ d tiɛwinin
tekbel tamacwart is akken ilaq
s limin n yirgazen ur nḥennet
cewwlen ken widak
ad neẓẓeg tileqqaqin ad nernu timegguyaz
agdud simmal a yettbehbi
ssneɣ tasenselkimt
teqqur tala
sidi ad k iḥrez ad k iṣun
ufant iman nsent yid neɣ
awal d aciri mačči d asmiri
d abrid i ten yettawin tasebḥit
ur t tmelleḥ ara yemma s asmi d ilul
ittḥezzib qebl ad teḍru
qeṛṛḥet
ẓriɣ qqaren as tihin tettzuxxu
tṣub lḥamu ɣer xemsa n tseddarin
tzemremt ad tṛuḥemt
ad tent yeddem
twalam tagellidt
iṭij yettali d ɣef useɛdi d usexḍi
leɛtab ur t id nettader
yuba itett s leɛqel
beddlem lqecc nwen
ma d tikelt a terra tajmilt i tmeṭṭut tamaziɣt s umata
s teqbaylit kan i tettzuxxuḍ
tewser d mm laɛyub
nudan as d anwa ara s d ifken tigẓelt
uraren n zik ur d ttuɣalen ara
tuga d raṣ lmal is
ad t id mmagren
ayɣer ad ak d slen atnin ceṭḥen
isem is i yemma k
tura kullec igerrez
ad iyi tent fken
rwimt tent mliḥ
ula d abeṛṛani izedɣen gar awen ur itett ara idammen
ttbineɣ ak d d tin ihennan
d wer nelli
cukkeɣ tusam d ɣer twizi
ilaq kan ad cemṛeɣ iɣallen iw sya d asawen

ugadeɣ ad kem ẓreɣ

d azgar i yezger
kukran merra
turzeḍ iman im
ur ttneẓnuẓemt ara
kerzen yes sen tamurt
rrus legliz d marikan ɣelben lalman
imdanen ɣuṛ sen allaɣen annect ilaten
amek i k qqaṛen
ɣriɣ adlis nni n kateb yasin
yiwen ur yelḥiq
a lferḥ i ferḥeɣ

lbarud yebda aseqseq rsas yeɣleb timriwin
yekker rebbi i uleqqem
zuxxeɣ aṭas s tom
d amakar i telliḍ
ad ruḥeɣ ad ɛummeɣ azekka deg wasif

ṭṭfet
ḥbes ur ttɣenni ara
d wagi i d ɛisu i d iǧǧan idumiyen
qelleb ad tafeḍ
wufqen
yuɣ d yuba aṭas n tbeṣlin

wissen acu la testewtiwemt akka
ur tezmireḍ i tidet
a tin yeḍran yid wen
teḥmam
ṛwiɣ ayefki

akka i tebɣiḍ
ayen akk yerzan tudert n tmetti ad t tafeḍ deg wass n ssuq

ttamnen tt
ad m nernu imesnsi
ccwi kan ur teqqim ara d tuzyint nni n zik
mi yeɣli yiṭij iɣli d ɣef dda bṛahim yiwen n naddam d ameqran
balak ccḍeɣ
d tayri nni n tidet
ala win kan ara as d ihedren ɣef tuffɣa neɣ ɣef temɛict
yendeh as amek tfukeḍ axeddim
ḥader aḥaki
yuba yettban yeɛya
ur yenfiɛ i wacemma usegzawal aki
tabrat i ak d tuzen teṭṭfeḍ tt

lqanun n wacu

adrar n ǧerǧer tečča t tmes
cfiɣ amzun d iḍelli

qqimeɣ
tenɣa yak t

tedda yid s
ad yeɣli ugeffur

tɛerḍeḍ t

ulac ccekk d akken yezgel tamacint

a winna

tesnehmuyem
ass d iman ik
ad myeḥmaẓeɣ akken ad kecmeɣ
ɛiwen iyi ad mmektiɣ atan deg iɣef nyiules iw
anwi i m iḥettmen ccɣel agi
aɛekkaz yugi ad yewwet tehriruc
lqay lǧerḥ
wwin kent yid sen
iḍyiq ijjiq a yaɛeggal ur neḥdiq
ad ḥadreɣ
atan iɛessasen n lḥebs ad gen yiwen usunded ad yeṭṭfen tlata n wussan si ttnac n yiḍ d asawen
amcic iw semmaɣ as cnunnu
ddmen d iɣiɣden nni ṛuḥen ɣer ferɛun

teččefčfeḍ

win umi ara temleḍ aya ad yeqbel ɛecra n yimelyan mačči d cwiṭ
bu yiles medden akk yines

shum
tamacahut tettrebbi tella d nettat i d aɣerbaz nneɣ
ddan aɣ di nneqma
dɣa akken ad yesɛu udem d amaynut ad yimɣur di tallunt
d ilaw wannect a merra

teslemdemt iyi tt
deg tizi wezzu arraw n bgayet ternuḍ tubiret
amayeg ufella iteffeẓ ur yesseblaɛ
terra yaɣ tt id
tzemreḍ ad yi d tesɛeddiḍ lmelḥ
ur tessin ara ad tecḍeḥ

anta ara nesteqsi
muqel iyi d

imi d nuder aẓawan aklasiki anwa ameẓẓawan i tesmenyifeḍ
sfaqeɣ ken id
ikcem as uzrem deg ukebbuḍ is
melmi ad ken ẓṛen
ikad iyi d akka swaswa

d ayen iɣder it yiḍes
meyyez qbel aneggez
d amenɣay i telliḍ
ur sbehdilet ara

sin n yiberdan kan gar as d uxxam nsen
tcewwel itent tinna

imeslayen im meɛnen

nnejli

yesbeɣ as tt
ad tezzaǧǧaw deg imeṭṭawen
iteddu yettemderkal
dduqseɣ d mi yessusem baba s ɣef tikkelt
ɣur k ttiɛad
ad d imdel tawwurt i lqahwa ḥed ur yettaẓ ɣer din medden akk myussanen
aṭas n leqdic i sɛiɣ
ɛerket ayen ara tɛerkem sewwet ayen ara tsewwem
yuɣal yuba d ameslub

d iri ten i tissit
ttekki
sseṛɣent awen ten
d taqbaylit i lemden ar yemma tsen

acu tebɣiḍ

ffɣet sya

dɣa yettru fell as
tesɛam lḥeqq
d ayen i yeswehmen aṭas lḥakem
imi s d ameqqran afus is d aquran
ljameɛ uɣur d rezzun si mkul tama n temdint
acmux ineɣlen d acmux iṭenṭunen
yeṛẓa lḥerma ines deg lḥara s yerna d netta i as yettakken aɣṛum is
txedɛeḍ iyi
ssarameɣ ad ilin yimukan n lxedma aseggas a
ad yerreẓ
wwint d akanic ar wexxam nsent
tesɛamt asegzawal ass a
mi ẓdiɣ ad ig ṛebbi tsaq
d ccna sefhem as lemtul
isɛukkuz deg awal
a lmalayek tiḥbibin
bɣiɣ ad iyi tebnuḍ yiwen n lḥiḍ n snat lmitrat di leɛli
axaṭer akka i yi d ittunefk lameṛ
selleɣ i ifrax ttruḍen
slant akk tuddar
d ifassen n wefṛux i yesɛa

i kečč acuɣer i tnekreḍ sgellin mi k id steqsaɣ fell as

igen

sɛiɣ t

anwa laẓ telluẓeḍ
ad asen awiɣ akaram
tesfeqdemt tt
diri win yettzuxxun
akli yeɛna ten
tumneḍ t yeɛni
ur iẓri ḥemza anda tenza
ayen i yas d tefkiḍ ad t issebleɛ
yerẓa awal nsen
ad yeqqim tom
iṛuḥ iwwi d iɣiden nni ifka ten i yemma s
xedmen akken i sen d inna umeɣlal
nasima xuxi terẓa yi aqerru w ass a
ahat tceɣleḍ mliḥ ussan a
kkreɣ mrawet n tikkal ad sfeqdeɣ amecṭuḥ
tḥelles tmeṭṭut i ccɣel
ikcem gar tasad way turew
isḥaq iɛreḍ iten ɣer lmakla
teḥka ak jida
neyya n tzimert d tixsi lxuf n uwtul
ini t id akken iqwem
neḥemmel iten
am timmi sbin d udem im
amen iyi ar akka i teḍra
akk d ureqqeɛ i ibedden ɣer wass a
ikellex as zzman ur yeẓri ansi s tufeg
tsebɣeḍ asent tt
ikad d d ayen ur nemɛin
tettejɛuɛuy tettemɛuqu s yiwen n ssut s yiwen n lmizan war ma teḥbes
aqendur agi ad isɛu imi di tlemmast anda ara yettɛeddi uqerru
cmumḥeɣ
tezham meṛṛa
ɣenni iyi d ssefhem iyi d
tuget deg sent ṭṭalayent ɣer ssɛaya
aql i am seksu ddaw texsayt
ad d teddu yid sent
ma tesliḍ i taɣratin d yimeǧǧiden ɣef tikelt ḥṣu rran d i lbak
afus yella maca nesra ugar n waya
ssali afrag ɛelleq aḥeckul i tebburt is
ur wwiɣ si tirect wala seg ukerfa
ini as kan ma ad iddu id neɣ neɣ ad iqqim deg uxxam
ccna di tallit nni d lɛib
tɛeqqleḍ albaɛḍ
ahat ur tezmireḍ ad thedreḍ d tom
d acu yeɛni ixeddem yizi dayi
acu akka ɛni ay k id isrezfen ɣur i ay imjeddeb
ad ḥebseɣ yir iberdan
as d yid i tura
d agris d ɛawaz n ctawi
d agehguh n tidet
acu d yiwin anect a ɣer yelli ur d nban ara
cukkeɣ ẓran aɣ d
ɣucceɣ lqahwa
ayen yebɣu yenna t id ur t ttamen ara
yettɣiḍ iyi lḥal mi ara sleɣ i waya
ad ten id temmagrem
ma tenniḍ d tidet axiṛ
ay asmi teǧǧel telket mi s yenna ukured ad kem aɣeɣ
tnehṛem
mmesteqsan amek ttilin imiren kecmen s aqiḍun n aderbad
terramt tt kan i ucali
bɣiɣ ad ɣreɣ s tmeslayt iw
amyag yesɛa anagar yiwet n twuri akken yebɣu yili umkan is deg tefyirt
yewwet it wugur yeɣli
yesṛuḥ itent
timeslayin yewwin ccan d yiseɣ d tiyaḍ nettat ur tt id iṣṣaḥ ara umkan ameqqran gar asent
taggara aya tuqqna internet ur terkid ara
i tikkelt nniḍen ttaɛren as yimeslayen iwakken ad ffɣen
wali iman im
ɣilleɣ am medden akk ara ɛiceɣ
yelli s nni teččur d ineḥwan
gar asen tameɣra n ukermus
mmi ad yeṭṭes deg tɣurfatin
teqqim itt ɣer tarit tastant akked tarit n tmetti
eg it tura
teqqim deg ufrag i yiṭij
llin imawen nnsen am teɣṛasin
melmi ara d asent
waqil yewḥel
yemlal it id deg ubrid yedda yid s
fakken asent ten
nnif ur yettnuz ara
mbiwel sya
ad iyi tent tefkemt
ččan
amzeɣyul d amusam
abhim nni ɛerqent as
terɣa ddunit kenfen lɣaci
ruḥeɣ ɣer ssuq ad d aɣeɣ kra n tednect ma tella
ḍsem
isḥaq isɛa d yeɛqub
yessalay leḥsab yessattar
sukk d afran nniḍen
efk iyi t id
tfukk tiɣin n wawal n warrac n tura
anwa i teẓṛam
gma k d win akken yezgan s tqemjet tadalt neɣ ala
aql iyi di lemṛemma
tessneḍ gma s n tom
sexten
aqjun iw ur yettkerric ara
temmektamt d
yif ciṭuḥ amattar
lqesba n bgayet tettwajerred deg tegmi taɣelnawt
yuba yebra i mary
ffeɣ ssya
ḍfeṛ assemter iw
ad t taɣeḍ d asḍaḍ ad t tafeḍ d ablaḍ
tettarra tent deg uɛewwiq
yenna d ih
akken i asen yehwa mebla akukru neɣ imeṭi
nniɣ d zemm imi k
tuɣ tasga deg ussan is
kra n wussan mbeɛd mḥend yuɣal d
yettqadaṛ medden meṛṛa
iɣunza tt seg wassen ur yezzi ad iɣer adlis s teqbaylit
deg s tcubaḍ s lkil
sɛiɣ yiwet
kra n yicennayen n tudrin
axeddim yettak d tilelli
teɛqel itt temɣart is tetqelleq
ilaq ad sɛun lḥir ɣef teqbaylit
win yessirmen kra ad d yini
alak d amagday
yečča yuba s uɣiwel
asmi d yeḥḍeṛ ukeččum ɣer ustudyu tekkes as tt tebɣest
aha af d d acu
ur tecfiḍ ara ɣef temẓi k
mi d tuki i tikelt tis snat iɣegdan nni ttwaksen
walit d akessar
cukkeɣ nemlal yakan
kellxen asmi ṭṭfen adabu
bdut tura
beṛka ur ggar ara iman im
heblent
ibedd da acḥal
yesbeɣ iyi t
qḍan d ccɣel nsen taṣebḥit
drus i d yeggran
teqbeḥ mačči d kra
ansa i d kkant tlawin nni
ad temmektim
anwa ara as yinin ad d yili waya
ifri n tteryel yellan nnig temda n userɣi d arrac kan ara yettawḍen ɣur s
yella yettheggi leqdic nniḍen ɣef unaẓur sliman ɛazem
segmi d tban tiẓri n darwin adem d ḥewwa uɣalen d tamayt kan
tekkat mliḥ
yewwi as d lferḥ
anda zemren ad ilin
bdan ttmeslayen
theddṛeḍ aṭas
kain yenɣa abel
ur ufiɣ ara iman iw ayakka ur k xellṣeɣ
wa yeffeɣ wa yekcem
ruḥ steqsi argaz im
ttif ɛawaz yir asummet
bran as
ilaq ad yi tɛawneḍ ad tent id sellkeɣ
ilha ṣṣber
berkat tifukal
iwqem tamekrast
teffeɣ ar beṛṛa
di leɛnaya k qqim da
yenna yas ziɣ ɛmer zzahi d aqbayli
ferrnen kan tid yeččuren d leḥya d sser
kkret ad truḥem
seg wass nni ibxes it rebbi yerra t d ifker
ttsebbireɣ kan iman iw
ikna ddaw n uzaglu iqbel ad yuɣal d akli
anda i yessen yidir newwara
teɛreḍ
sfeqɛen t warrac uɣerbaz
asɣar s wurɣu iḥulfa
axaṭer deg unagraw n tutlayin tufa d iman is teṭṭef tama n wadda
tabrat i aɣ d tuzen neṭṭef tt
d wigi meṛṛa i d arraw n yuqtan
ldi aqṛab ik teddmeḍ d taktubt ik
yettaɛraḍ ad tt id yessufeɣ seg uderbuz ideg i teckem
d tewnef kan i yi yewwin
anda t lḥamu nni ines n zik
ih macca nekk xuṣeɣ deg kra yellan
anda wwḍeɣ ad d mmektiɣ
yufeg yitbir nni
rfed neɣ sers
ilaq win ara inebbhen fell as
ccib nnaṛ ittewqim ssem di taddart
akken uɣen tanumi
tuɣalemt d timehbal
ur sɛiɣ ula duru
acuɣer i d tenniḍ d weltma
ččiɣ imekli s uɛijel
yella win yessnen mmi s
abrid yessawen
mačči d ayen i d sutreɣ
i wass a yella kra n umaynut
yemma d tagmert nni yenna win ur nettarwen
qelbemt tawṛiqt
ziɣ yuɛer as i tgelda tabriṭanit ad teffeɣ seg tdukli n tuṛuft
yekkaw yiẓri s seg imeṭṭawen
ihi ẓẓadent tlawin azemmur a akkit deg yixxamen nsent
ulac d acu yellan
ay abeḥri i d isuḍen
tewjed ad truḥ
qqiment ɣef yisennanen
ad as tiniḍ d taɣrast i d itt serriḥen i tzizwa
ɛas kra
ulama yewɛer akken ad tafeḍ leḥsab ssawaḍen yirgazen n uḥraz n tẓegwa ad sɛun tikti
issexdam umenṭag ihin tiḥraymit
yuba d awḥid
rnu as aman a xali
ixṛez iyi tt am tin n musa usemmum
tilelli s wazal is
ɣef acu i testaxṛem tom
tesɛamt ẓẓher i ixeddmen
d ayen igerrzen tanemmirt ik
mjellaben ar wayen iɛeddan
cabḥa tezyen nezzeh
deg uxxam i ixeddem tom
teṣneṣlem iyi d seg umaḍal n yigerdan
dda bṛahim yerna yenna ahat ad ilin dinna ṛebɛin
d tidet ur iyi tesxaṣṣeḍ deg wacemma
werǧin tendem deg wayen texdem
yella yal mi ara d yekcem yettales as d amek yesɛedda ass ines di lxedma
cerken ten idammen
rekdent
yenna meɛtub lwennas d awanek aqbayli i d asirem iw
war tadist tettinit
qeɛd aɣ d annar i zzedwa
yenna meɛtub lwennas sarameɣ ad yili uwanek aqbayli
ass nni deg yemmut run yemdanen runt tjuṛ run ifrax run isaffen
imma jidda teṭṭef aẓaṛ tɣil d aḍaṛ
yya a mḥend ad k ṣerɛeɣ
err d f isteqsiyen a
sers d lḥenni s uɣerbal n lluz
tebɣiḍ ad neskasi fell as
yettarra tt kan i tɣuri n yidlisen
anta tt tin akken i wen d iheddṛen
tom mačči am kečč
itran ɣlin iɣerdayen ulin
katya bengana tettwanɣa zdat n weltma s
iwwet deg i wissen acimi
s lqis tezgiḍ d i lxaṭer iw
d tom i tettrajuḍ
ad neṛwu aḥewwes di champs elysees
zemrent ad ddun yid i
iqqim d diɣ amur nniḍen d agezdu n tubiret i t ixeddmen
bdiɣ qqaṛeɣ taktubt nni
ǧǧan aɣ d tarda n leḥwal
ffeɣ d seg tneɣrit
ayen i y ittrajun ɛaceɣ t yakan
s wakka akken i d issefra yusef tirga nni i teḍra
s axxam n sɛid at ɛemran
ur tessinemt ara tasdawit n bgayet
anda lliɣ
tazwert n ttejṛa d iɣes
ttwalin ten id s yir tiṭ
yelha usmel nni neɣ ulac akk
azekkan nni tasebḥit tbed as i wemjay ɣef umnar
yuba itess ma d kra
uḥwaǧeɣ kra n yiwen i tura
ṭṭef axenfuc ik
refdeɣ ifassen kecmeɣ seddaw n tarkiḍṭ n tarawt s teɣzi d tehri n tin yurjan tafsut
kulfeɣ as rebbi i lmut yuwin yemma
am aman akked yiɣi
ssneɣ abrid ar yiger
ur ilaq ara ad teṭṭseḍ
ččiɣ kra n tfirest
yemlal d massi deg lqahwa
yuba d anuriksik
bɣan ad kesben imelyaṛen
axxam iw at an ɣer tama umalu n uzrug
tusiḍ d iwakken ad ɣ tesmeremdeḍ uqbel lawan
waqil kullec ileḥḥu
tella kra n yiwet i ixebcen takeṛṛust iw
ad nesbedd taqbaylit nneɣ
aya menwala ad t yexdem
anda tt jida k
aẓrem ameqṛan d win deg yettaṭṭaf waṭan n krhon
dacu i ak yettakken afud
ma ggtent awi d ukan
ad iyi ten fkent
d kečč i ttnadiɣ
ɛuzz baba k akked yemma k akken ad yiɣzif leɛmeṛ ik di tmurt ara k ifk umeɣlal illu ik
amawal a mačči inu
icuddan n tayri i icudden ulawen nsen
ṣṣbeḥ itett ṣṣyada s tameddit iferreq ayen i d irbeḥ
ifakk akent ten
tettwafren d taddart n saḥel
tewwi ken yid s
zzux illa adrim ulac
teṭṭef ijifer nnig n tinezrt is tessebgan d kan yiwet n tiṭ
yurar unaddal a deg terbaɛt n waddal amaswaḍ idurar
iaɛdel n wayrad d inisi
dɣa tezmer ad ak tessiweḍ teswiɛt ad tbeddleḍ ayen i d tsumreḍ uqbel
ad d teddu yid neɣ
nehṛen
sseṛɣen awen tent
acḥal n lweqt
anwa i irebḥen

ur txeddmeḍ ara iṛebbiten s wuzzal yefsin

ula d dayi ɣlay
a mmi leɛca yella d acu twalaḍ deg tejmaɛt
ibeddel
baba yeḥbes tissit
ad k ten fkent
mačči akken i bniɣ i teffeɣ
yennum yettmeslay d tcixet is
s twenza k syen i d teffɣeḍ
d ayen yettmaggan
d asfel neɣ d aɛalṭar yettarran asfel d imqeddes
ad iḍum i win yellan uqbel is
anida i llan yixxamen nni i yulin s yifasssen ilmawen
sin akkin kemmlen hedren ɣef yisental nniḍen am leqraya
yarbaḥ a ɛemti
tɣilem fessus leqdic
wagi d baba k
efk iyi d tafakturt di leɛnaya k
isru k id tom
luleɣ d s teqbaylit
musa iɛeggeḍ ɣer umeɣlal inna as d acu ara xedmeɣ i ugdud agi
berrunt i yimeẓẓuɣen nsent

ad uraren yid s
baba iḥres itt nezzeh
inna asen ur t neqq ara

hennimt yi kan
d ayen i ilaq ad qableɣ weḥd i

ur d ttawi ara lhemm i iman im
kra yekka wass netta iteddu kan
ad iyi tent tɛeṛḍeḍ

ḥdaqreɣ

qqaren d yettwazdeɣ uxxam nni

ḍfer aɣ
lmeɣreb tessawaḍ lɛica tessawaḍ
deg wayen yeɛna učči nexdem ussan n useɛlem i yettaṭafen tikwal smana
sima tufa d tabɣest s wacu i teqbel dakken tettxemmim ɣef maziɣ
anwa iwalan isallen ass agi
tura a t an maziɣ yekcem d ɣer wallaɣ is
i yecbeḥ ilemẓi a

a t id yaf sdat s
beddlem lqecc

itteɛṛaḍ
lemmer ad s ssutreɣ kra ad yagi
ad as t tefkem
adlis a d aqdim mliḥ
tinna akken i ǧǧiɣ tettru mi ɛeddan laɛwam
laman wwin t waman
ad k iqqen ṛebbi d ayeffus
ara t yerren deg laman seg sya d asawen
llan tlata n yirgazen akked d snat n tlawin deg texxamt a
amuḍin nni tettaṭṭaf it tawla tameqqrant yettazzal aṭas uɛebbuḍ is akked daɣen tefɣent d tḥebbiwin timellalin deg yiles is

d ayen isewhamen
wexxṛemt fell i
ur d yeclig deg wacemma
tura akka aṭas i yettmesteqsayen mayella ai da d tanaẓurt

yekkes as aččadur is s lemɣawla
lliɣ d wis tlata din taṣebḥit a
ziɣ mazal nenger
bḍan asent tt id
anwa i d ucmit seg nneɣ a bu tnexsas
d kunwi i d yeccelqafen awalen seg lḥebs n tsusmi
zik yebɣa yiwen ad yezweǧ ad yaɣ yell is n ufellaḥ
iles aɣezfan ɣeẓẓent tt tuɣmas
yeǧǧa d lweḥc meqqren wadeg nni yeṭṭef baba s
mi d yekker ad yuɣal

tesbeɣ itt id

ur d tbeyyen ara iman is
wi t ilan waya
wwin aɣ id lqahwa ččuren tt id d ttelwa

uzzleɣ ahat setta ikilumitren ur ḥbiseɣ
ttsewwiqeɣ yal ddurt
ur ɛlimeɣ
ma d win ur nesɛi ara ad s ittwakkes ula d ayen yesɛa

jbed iman ik

ḥareɣ ad kem mlileɣ

ur ttbanent ara feṛḥent
ur tebɛid ara tala seg uxxam
qqaren iyi d nḥemmel axeddim im

ɣezzifeɣ aṭas
tbubbeḍ taɛkemt ẓẓayet
ass n zdat k ad tewwet deg i
mi teswa ad d ḍehṛen waman
ayen xeddmen d nekkni i t yettxellisen
ad tebdu taḍsa n wuglan
tebda tettɣenni
siwel iyi n s axxam
as d deg lweqt
mi yezger si mḥemmed i usaka n finyil icṛeq d yiṭij
eǧǧ iyi ad sirdeɣ iqejḍuṛen
waqila d iɣerdayen ara d iɣlin mačči d adfel
tettamen it
aman kan ma ulac aɣilif
acimi i tugiḍ ad k imuqel ṭṭbib
ittcuddu tagut s aḍu
ilaq ad as tinimt
mi nwiɣ yiwen n lhem yekfa
d acu i k yeǧǧan ay iles ur tesɛiḍ ara iɣes
ctaqeɣ ad gneɣ deg yiḍ
ɣef tmurt is acḥal yura i wakken ad tesɛu leqder
ad tlemdeḍ tutlyat taqbaylit s wul ik
ḥemmleɣ ileɣman
teččur d leɛqel

maziɣ ad inser

akken axir

ur ttɛawaden ara iɣsan tubbwi

tesɛiḍ cclaɣem
tafat tiziri ahya k a gma inu tigi d yessi am warrezg inu
nekni ur nwala ayennat waqila d iẓri i nxuṣ
ur nnumen ara tteffɣen deg iḍ

a ṛebbi huzz ammud is ma iččuṛ
tɛecqeḍ
nteg t
imawlan ur d aɣ ǧǧin ara ad neddu akken nebɣa ɣef sebba n teswiɛt n yimir n
d adeg n teksawt d win ibeɛden ɣef taddart semman as akka acku yettjal lmal ɣur s
iɛeyyen am

melmi ara tfehmeḍ
ɣef ufurek n useklu yebna ugḍiḍ lɛecc is

wiyaḍ merra rjan
drewceɣ fell ak

kecmet d s axxam

ssaɛa m tteddu

wa meɛduṛ wa d lḥeqq is

ad neqbel tiwtilin nwen

mi nella d arrac netturar tablibult
a ṛebbi wenneɛ asen ussan
ala a baba yiwen ur d ay d iluɛa yiwen ur d yejbi ɣur i
ad ɛeddiɣ qbel ik
asmi i t id necden i wakken ad yuɣal d aselway n lezzayer
akerra agi n lqaɛa i yettiflawen deg umaḍal am netta am yitran akk niḍen
ur teḥwaǧeḍ ara ad teskiddbeḍ

yensa lferḥ is deg teswiɛt

s draɛ i d yejmeɛ iman is akken ad d iffeɣ seg wussu
akken nettɛelli deg lehwa i ineqqes wuksijin
terɣa tkatidralt n notre dame de paris

d kečč i yebɣan

d sseḥ ih

izzenz taɣzut yuɣ aḥṛiq
anwa tesɛiḍ d aɛtiq ay ul
i tudert nsen sɛan aɛwin
ad ṛuḥeɣ deg tubeṛ
tzemreḍ ad yid tawiḍ taɣejayt
yessen as
deg usebter nsen n facebook neɣ deg usebter n tesɣunt neɣ deg yigrawen i d yessemliliyen iselmaden n tmaziɣt
ass a jeddi iḥucc d asaɣur
zellmen s yir tidmi qeddḥen ul yettcebṭiṭ
iban ad iffeɣ zik azekka
ilaq iselmaden n tmaziɣt ad issinen isenfaṛen a

lḥaṣul umneɣ k
asmi i teɛllem s wayen yeḍran
mmi d ṭṭir abeḥri
imger deg ufus tagelzimt deg wayeḍ
llan miyya u xemsin d aqeṛṛu i yulin ar tmacint
ma d wid i d iqqimen rewlen s adrar

ur tefhimemt tigert
ad d iban uberriḍ ines
ad d negri di silbubli
ad ɣ tt id awin

d ayen ur nettili yakk
ad isgunfu di talwit
i tyerras deg ulawen
cabḥa d tazehwanit

tneɛrem a saddat yeqqwan
i yisteqsiyen aki akk ihi mebla lmaɛna

iɛawed yuba iselsa
ibra i ṭṭbel deg waman
d tissit i ten tesseɣ
d aya i yi selken

ur yecbiḥ ur yecmit
d taqbaylit i d idles nsent

d acu i d yenna
ad tt id tekksem
ixuṣṣ deg ucala usaru nni
inisi d wuccen ur ttemkeyyaden
awal ajdid iteqqes
ad ɣellin ur illi win i ten id itebɛen

ur ttruẓuɣ kra
d tafat n wallen iw yess ay ttɛiciɣ
deg tegnatin agi i d yeslal budyaf akabar n tegrawla tanemlayt
fkan as d lviza ad iṛuḥ ad ikemmel taɣuṛi s deg fransa
ur bɣiɣ ad msewwaqeɣ d yiwen deg umaḍal
arraw n bariɛa ḥibir akked malkiyil
bru d i yilli
d acu i d sebba
shurun srebruben

ad d neddem azwu
yuɣal tom ur ittkeyyif ara
ttɛawazeɣ ɣef teɣzi n yiḍ
ilaq ad s rnun idammen i tom
uf fukkeɣ daɣ ass a
d lebɣi kan i d lsas n kra yellan
ẓriɣ ay aḥbib tuyseḍ
aṭṭan d awal ur nemɛin mačči d ayen i ibelɛen
mliɣ awen d acu ara txedmem

yettgergiz ad yernu tiɣrit
awi d kan ma d ayla nsen
yella win i yettnezzihen
yezmer ad yeddu tom yid neɣ azekka

stqerreɣ d s lfalṭa w
aha afemt d d acu
tuɣem d aɣrum
laẓ d war imeẓẓuɣen
teffeɣ nuna deg wackanen

am udfel yessa fell as
yuba yuɣal yettasem
qewwdet sya
ad wen tent id tawi
nnan kulci ḥudden as tilas yelha leḥsab d lmizan
snejmaɛen d fell as tarbaɛt meṛṛa
ṛwaḥ di leɛnaya m
maziɣ yettruḥ ɣer tesdawit
ur nehher ara mi teswiḍ aṭas
beṛkat acetki
ass mi i tt isbur i ẓriɣ
ad t tseggmemt
xas ad yesmuhbel yiles
ffeɣ seg uxxam iw
yelha yam i kemmi
waqila iswael d ielli
abrid newwi imi nedderɣel
ḥader itt tinna d rruḥ iw
ma tkecmem s albaɛḍ n yexxamen sellmet fell asen
d acu i kem id yewwin ɣur i
lemmer ay axerraz ad teqleḍ d lbaz ma d laṣel ik d axerraz
d ayen i sɛiɣ d ṣṣerf
nwiɣ ddunit d awal kan
yiwen ur d imeyyez annect nni
mi ɛeddan sḥab n tmenṭac ay igeḍman n remman
yenɣa yawen t
ad t id yemmager
akken yiwen ur tt isnusu
cfiɣ asefru amezwaru uriɣ t ɣef meɛtub lwennas mi lliɣ d anelmad deg uɣerbaz alemmas
ulac akk aswir ɣer sen
d acu i tḥemmel newwara ad t tečč
tqerreb mliḥ ɣer tewwurt n uxxam yellan ẓelmeḍ
d ifassen n wemcic i tesɛa
kra deg sen jerḥen
ẓẓher iw yeẓheḍ tabburt
tebɣamt ad teččemt
nheṛ s ttawil kan
imir nni i ttemsegrawen s waṭas deg yimeḍqan nsen ideg caḍen waman
aman is la ḥemmun
ctaqeɣ ad ldiɣ ṭṭaq seg zhir
twalam aqjun iw
ruḥ cnu yid i
seɛɛuɣ urnan
greɣ aẓeṭṭa weḥdi

aha ini d
ad ɣṛeɣ di tesdawit n bgayet
afgem ay afriwen iw
bḍut asen t id
musa yenna yasen wwtet tt ihi ass agi
lbaḍna nni yenna iyi tt id
yella kra ilaq ad t ḥsuɣ
tenṭeq d seg teɛrict
iḍ igerrzen a timmy
zzit n uzemmur trennu lbenna i lqut
bdu tura
kra n win i aɣ d iẓran yenneɛjab
lameɛna ajgu yellan di tiṭ ik ur t tettwaliḍ ara
ttaǧǧan imeɣnasen ttmettaten deg leḥbus u ad d qqaren nettnadi tugdut
ur sbehdilemt ara
ṭawes yuɣ itt yidir ilindi
sseɛdel asɣar mi zegzaw
aɣlif n ulmud unnig d unadi ussnan
tweddṛemt ten
ur yečči ara awal
ma ttaḍsan leɛwayeṛ ad nru
yuɣal ar tiqqaṛ is
yuli wass lgerra teḥbes ur tekkat ara
wagi d agzul d askuṭṭef limer ahat ad ken id yessemgagi
d nutenti i yesxeṛben kullec
nheddeṛ
ayen yuran deg twenza ur yezmir yiwen ad t yekkes
tura akka tezmer ad tettru ma tebɣa ad ttmeǧǧed maɛlic
ulac win ara iyi tt yekksen
bɣiɣ ad ẓreɣ d acu i y iruḥen
derrɛemt allen nkent
isem is itri
cidden asaɣuṛ nni iḍelli

newwi d yir tarmit syin
llufan mi ara d yini kra armi ittuweṣṣa
wwtet s umextaf
fakken iyi t
dayen ur tettɛawadeḍ ad teẓreḍ tom
ṣṣbeḥ zik mi yeffeɣ urgaz is ɣer lxedma teḍfer it deffir
akken i ttemsaɛafen
wexxeṛ akin ma ulac ad terɣeḍ

ad yecbu mmi s n tsedda

xeddmeɣ

tom ur yeɛlim ara anda ilul

ttaḍsan ɣef yiman nsen amek akken llan

ur t teččiḍ ara yak
yella kra i akent id iceyyeɛ tom
d taččurant d tagrurzant
aṭas n tlawin i t yeẓṛan

ɣawleɣ

theggaḍ
di yal tamurt gezmen asen awal mi d nnan tiquranin
ad t neǧǧ i uzekka
ur yelli d anwa t yifen
yeɣra di tmenqas
tabagust nni ad txiḍ ɣef lifud

ɣur m ad tebruḍ i usirem

d lɛaṛ fell aɣ
iɛeṭṭel
win i kem ikesben yeɣna fiḥel ma yuǧew nneɛma
ɣef lutu inem
ad nekkes ṭeḥwa agi
ma tḥulfaḍ tuḍneḍ aṭan am wa mmeslay d ṭṭbib
ayen akken yeswa n ccrab yerra t id
ur yelli win iḍelmen
yunez i tgellidt
d beddu n leqdic n yasuɛ di kafar naḥum
win d iḥellan ṣṣaba s tidi s
ur ttḥerrikem ara
ad ken ẓṛeɣ azekka
ilaq ad tegreḍ annect a g lbal ik
ax ad kem qadden wiki yerna ad am d grin ad txelṣeḍ imekli
yekker herwel di ṛṛeḥbat yewwet ṭṭbel yerna nnaqus
seg ubawal i d nezdem isɣaren

d ayen i tzerɛeḍ ara tmegreḍ
mmuteɣ s laẓ
wa yeqqar i wa kečč d amcum
ma tuɛer ayen ihi i tecbeḥ
amek armi i d tettmenni akanic
ḥemmleɣ mmi m
mmi s n dan d ḥucim
sɛeddi ketchup

aḥbib n ulqim ar din iqqim
ttagaden medden sbiṭar
fakk d awal ik neɣ susem maḍi
iɣmi tezzi yas ṭṭiṛa

jebdet

wa yettak wa yessutur

akka axiṛ

yunef as ad iɛeddi
anda i terra
uftalmolog d amejjay n wallen

iṛuḥ iyi

anwa deg sen i ixedmen lebɣi n baba s
tesfuḥem aɣ ɣer sid balwa akked iqeddacen is tefkam asen ajenwi s ifassen iwakken ad ɣ zlun
ur zmireɣ ad uɣaleɣ ma ur teddiḍ
sellket tt
amek ara inin lǧiran
ssaramen axxam n ddunit ara ten yesduklen
inna asen ɣef ddemma n lqella n liman nwen
yefka učči i tyuẓaḍ
serḥeɣ i kra din daxel n uxendus
ur ttmeslayeɣ ara yid s
mazal ur yefri ara wawal
slet d ay arrac
ur yeẓri amek it
ǧeɛfer yettraḥ d zbel
ggten ttawilat i yessishilen tudert ɣef umdan
isenfaren i yerzan tutlayt taqbaylit deg tetiknulujit d umaḍal umḍin
cfiɣ as d am tura
udem is merra wwten t yiḍerfan
argaz xerṣum xas d bu lehyuf neɣ d aceffar yezmer ad iḥulfu i tudert
ticraḍ tigejdanin
awi kan nher s asif
tḥemmel ikem aṭas
ini yi d anda swaswa i yezdeɣ
iswi nneɣ ad nessaweḍ ad d nemmel acu akk n yilelli i d ikecmen tamedyazt taqbaylit
tameṭṭut a tecbeḥ
teččamt
ad ruḥeɣ ad awen ǧǧeɣ taylut i yesmeɣren deg neɣ lḥes
teddem ayeddid teffeɣ ɣer tala ad d tagem
yettɛawan
mɛawanen fella s refden tt s ameṭreḥ
tḥemmlemt iyi
d azger bu yiwen yicc
ini i ferɛun ayen akk i k d nniɣ
iwakken azekka ur aɣ yettuɣal ara d aẓekka
rɣiɣ d
iwacu tura sbedden ablaḍ am wa dayi
isbehba k leɛceq
tṛebbamt aksum
rnu ɛad ma wessiɛet
yeǧǧuǧeg ujeǧǧig
tezga tejmaɛt tettargu tafsut
tesɛiḍ idrimen
ad aɣ d immager usawen
tusa d tikti ad d aruɣ ɣef temsalt a
tḥemmel ad tecḍeḥ
ur tqelliq ara
zik nxeddem tibeḥyar nteẓẓu yakk icakan
mmektaɣ d ussan nni
fakkent iyi ten
temmekta d ussan n tesnawit d tesdawit
d acu ara kem id yesneṭqen
acuɣer nugi ad neḥlu
ur zmirent ad walint wallen iw tayeḍ ɣer yidis ik
ur isawal ara tidet
anda yeqqel akk uɣrum nni
ḥbes almad
qqim akked i
cnu d kra n tezlit yid i
yesṛuḥ itt
win iṛwan ixdeɛ ṛebbi
a yizem i iṛebba lefḥel
mi bdiɣ ḥelluɣ suffɣen iyi d seg sbiṭar n yimexlal
ad iyi txedmeḍ aya
ur tnuda fell awen ur ken tufi
ad d ddunt yid i
d wigi i d iderman n wat betṛun
acu t uxessar a
tebɣes s wawal kan
tsenned ɣer lḥiḍ teqqim tettraǧu
yekkes iyi akk wejɛuɛu nni d yemɛuqan i d yessalayen tamurejt
tesɛiḍ ccrab
aselmad n waddal iɣɣar iyi abelbul
uzmir d win yittawin ddeṛk
d lawan ad tcemmṛeḍ iɣallen ik
ass a yessawel d lajel iw
tesfeɛfɛemt iyi
ibedd ɣef tneṭlin isberwi lmeggtin
ad d ggalleɣ ar aql ik teqqareḍ as wissen amek ileḥḥu
di lmeḥqur ay deg tetteg aɛemmuṛ
yezga d asluffeẓ
ɛawneɣ tom
zdit lqedd nwen ay iqbayliyen
yella kra i tesfuḥayemt
wissen ma teɣriḍ tasufeɣt inu deg facebook
teqqim huda ṭṭerf n ugezdu n taɛrabt deg ḥesnawa
tawacult n iɛemrucen d yiwet n twacult iman is
qewwed
d ambaddal n ṣṣifa n yasuɛ ɣef udrar
u d acu i txeddmeḍ
ttif lehna wala tawant
ɣas ur nesɛi idrimen maca nesɛa zzheṛ
hitler yenɣa ugar n setta imelyan n wudayen
sgelfeɣ
d wigi i d iderman n wat quṛaḥ
ur izgil yiwen
d ayen i ten yeǧǧan qeddcen deg unnar n tẓuri tagamant
ttduqquseɣ d deg uɣeddur n yiḍes
tzemreḍ ad d teẓṛeḍ
awer ikkes ṛebbi izem i teqḍiɛt
init aɣ d kan ma ddren
ḥemmleɣ kem a lila
zrin ɛecra n wussan yeqqel d urgaz nni aberrani almi d lqahwa nni
laban inna yas d acu ara k fkeɣ
anda i teǧǧa timelḥanin nni
ttimɣuren deg usmud
ḥerrek ssbaɣ nni s uɛekkaz
tessṛeɣ aɣ tent
tesɛiḍ lḥeqq
agdud yettargun ayen yelhan yettaweḍ it
yebḍa yak t id
innum ittali tiɣaltin ur ittkakru deg luḍa
sseṛɣent akent ten
ad iyi ten tefkem
nekk ur t ttraǧuɣ ara ad yesɛu
baba s ixeddmen di lebni yeẓga d iɣimi
ad nẓer ma ulac kra ara nexdem deg tesdawit
anda yerra ad yerr
tezdi ten tayri kra n wussan deg uxxam nni
ur d yeqqim uṭenṭun
s tinin i yeshel wala s uxdam
deg acu temxalaf tmuɣli k ɣef ayla s
yextaṛ it
ad ak tent in awiɣ azekka
d ilew i d aɣersiw meqqren akk deg ayen iteddun ɣef lqaɛa
ittru d umeksa itett d wuccanen
tefcel
adɣaɣ ɣef udɣaɣ ad yali uxxam
ssfeqɛeɣ k
nekk bɣiɣ ad sweɣ ccrab dagi mačči deg laxeṛt
bɣiɣ ad k d iniɣ sin wawalen
bezzaf ikeččem ik ccekk
cniɣ as d tizlit n yidir i yelli
nessen leṣlaḥ nneɣ
d acu kan ur ikeččem ara ad iɣer
s tayri i tettmeslay taqbaylit
terra ɣer berra n tesdawit akken ad tefḍer
zririn
qqim kra n tewiɛt dina
am ucwari mi yelli ileḥḥu tusna tettmar
ufiɣ tamɣart tettru iman is
tusam d ad teẓrem lesrar n tmurt
yuba yefreḥ nezzeh
naǧib meḥfuḍ wten t s lmus ɣef lǧal n yiwen n wungal i yura
nnant d
awtul yuɣal d ačaqlal
aṭas i tṣerref ɣef tuɣmas is
lxir s lxir win yezwaren axir
ur yi tettalaseḍ acemma
yecbeḥ uɣelluy a n yiṭij neɣ
taẓrigt tamezwarut n tfaska taɣelnawt n usefru amaziɣ iwumi fkan azwel n amedyez iflisen umellil
frumt taɣtest nkent
tettemyeḥmaẓemt imi twalfemt
azul nekk d tom isem ik kečč
mi yekcem s axxam qerrben ɣur s iderɣalen nni
swet s ttawil kan
lliɣ bɣiɣ ayen ara ččeɣ
aṭas i ruɣ fell awen
lliɣ as d tawwurt i tom
ruḥ deg leɛnaya k
irgazen nni ṛuḥen syenna rran ɣer sudum
ɛmer umuḥ yessexdam arrac n taddart is di tessirt
anda i teǧǧa tiqnedyaṛ nni
neɣ ad tendemmeḍ i wussan ik
telzem aɣ tkeffart
tɣaḍ iken
ur ssawal ara i yimsulta
a mmi ur tesɛid ayen ččiɣ deg idmaren ad k t id fkeɣ
acu tebɣiḍ ad t texdem
neɣ ad ineɣ win akken i tt ixedmen
zemren ad ddun yid sent
bu lehmum ur iggan ur ittnuddum
ur yi tettunefk ara
yerna teḍfer abrid a s tezdeg d ssfa
ferɛun inna yasen d acu i d lxedma nwen
awal is aneggaru deg ttɛa u ɛcrin yunyu alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin
ur ẓriɣ ara d acu i t yuɣen
yella ḥedd i tebɣiḍ ad twaliḍ
luleɣ deg tubeṛ
rrant as ten id
usiɣ d ad ḍelbeɣ lemɛawna k
ad warbeɣ tama n tesɣart fell i ad texdem taklit
ma yella truḥeḍ s axxam nwen
icennayen n unebdu rẓan ccna aqbayli
mazal it idder
ɣur k ad tettuḍ d acu i ak nniɣ
takerrust truḥ
get taqisust temyuṭṭafem afus deg ufus
neḥwaǧ awal amaynut
ayen ḥkuɣ ayen sefruɣ drus
takti ya tettfeǧǧiǧ
jim yeldi tawwurt
yif it ma tkecmeḍ tura ar wexxam
nutni wehmen ttmesmuqalen gar asen
igenni iṛeɛɛed lqaɛa tremmed
d acu tt ssiɛqa agi
warǧin refdeɣ afus iw ɣer tmeṭṭut iw
ɣas teččam ur tṛewwum ara
asentel nneɣ yerza taɣult n tesnilest deg yiger n tesnantala
mazal ikem d tameṭṭut is
tom yerra metwal tidrujin
yečča lḥir ɣef yimmal n tmaziɣt
ilemẓi ur niwiḍ ara ɛecrin n yiseggasen i tt id yettwalin di lemri n sdat
am ucewwiq yezgaray seg tsuta ɣer tayeḍ
yettwaker as umuṭu d awraɣ zdat n ssuq lfellaḥ
aḍar yugad asawen
akken ad nethenni
d netta
ɣef wayen icudden ɣer tsuqilt tawurmant nsenker yiwen n usenfar yakan i itezzin ɣef teqbaylit
yella win i am d isawlen
ini d anda t
s kra din yedda deg ucekkar yeqqersen
yečča taxbizt iman is
tella kra n yiwet i yemmuten
axxam yuɣal as d izem
zlan t
qqim d tom
ad myeẓḍaḥent deg ussu
yuɣ itent di ṛṛay
yella leqder gar aneɣ
theblemt ɣef teqbaylit
deg tmurt n leqbayel neɣ deg lezzayer sumata
tella d d allal yuɣen amur meqqer
tura ɛelmeɣ menhu
ur xeddmet ara ccɣel i txeddmem mkul ass
akka i d lemḥibba n temẓi
ulamek ara d tader ṛebbi di liḥala am tinna
ayen akk ara d ifk ad wen yili d lqut
yeqbeḥ yiles ik
tayerza w tewweḍ s aḥdid
seg zik mi llan yimdanen am wa mačči armi d tura
ad iruḥ waɣzen s reffu
ẓerfed taderkunt
tewwi tt id anda yeqqim maziɣ
ur as tessineḍ ara i tmacint a
lameɛna ad tserseḍ afus ik fell as akken ad tidir
tura ɛeqleɣ k
yettejmaɛ d tom tiɣawsiwin tiqdimin
yuba yebges
amek teddun lmuṛ
ur bɣiɣ ara ad qqimen yibabaten war ddexxan d ccemma
mačči d nekk d netta
deg lawan n uzemmur deg tissirt n ugummu a i yettmahal
kra din d imcac i t yeččan
yezzi as usigna mellulen
ad ḥewwsen yid s
ma ulac aɣilif ɛreḍ abeddel n tarrayt n usesteb ɣer tin nniḍen
si kra n wayen ara yexdem ṛṛay yelha ma iwzen it
ayen iɛeddan ur zmireɣ ara ad am t tbeddleɣ
amek i s tḥulfamt
bdiɣ axeddim nni
yefka asen ten
qqimemt yid i kra
win yebɣan taqbaylit ad iger afus is ɣer lǧib
ikkes ẓẓerb i umṛaḥ
ad ẓren
ttehhu ad am telhu tawaract n unebdu
ad m ittwaxdem akken i tebɣiḍ
d taqbylit i d idles nwen
akken i cebbaɣ yelli
ḥaca akniwen i d tettarew
ifakk asent ten
netta yesraɣay ulman
ɣef wudem n tmetti i nebɣa seg yidisan is meṛṛa idles tutlayt timagit d wayen nniḍen
ruḥeɣ ar ssinima iḍelli
yedda yas di lebɣi
yuba qrib yemmut
ma d ayen i d iteddun zemreɣ ad am tesselhuɣ
aṭas n usisnu i yečča
tebɣa ad teffer xas ma weḥdes i tella
am win itekksen isellufen i uqjun
kra tt ixuṣṣen ad as t id heggin
yiwen ur d icliɛ
yessaweḍ ula ad yeg tisuqilin i temsirin n tfizikt
farruǧa teffeɣ s iger truḥ ad d tekkes ibawen
tekfa d leqraya s di tesdawit n lmulud at mɛemmer
udem ubaqac
tiɣri i temsizzelt
iha iha a mm imezran ɣer waggus
ahat deg rray i ten uɣen
ur nesɛi ara taḥdayt
inṭeq d ɛumeṛ at maɛtuq
ečč s leɛqel ik
fad inɣa aɣunfu
sečč iyi sers iyi ssneɣ wi urwen iyi
ad cfuɣ ɣef lecɣal is
ma d nekk qenɛeɣ
irgazen am wigi ɣas ḥerkin lsan ddan d fransa mazal tezdeɣ deg sen teqbaylit
ad tt yeddem
qqaren as ibki iddew neɣ aḥallum
tesbeɣ asen t
ajernan gar ifassen yettaṭṭaf it meqlubi
ttɣawalent tektiwin i yemyerwin deg tqerruct n tegrudt
maca ass a d nettat i yebɣan ad tehder d maziɣ
ali d
d acennay n temnaḍt n at wagennun yeddan deg ubrid n yinaẓuren imeqranen n tama a
tewɛer temẓi
inser d am uɣyul
nekk seg ustṛalya
ad nehḍeṛ

ddheb n tmurt nni yeṣfa

ɣaya kent
anda t wugur tura
yya mt ɣer sbiṭar

anda t uɛewdiw ik

yella win i d iɣaṛen
teɛyiḍ si tudert
acimi ur truḥeḍ ara ɣer sbiṭar
ufiɣ yiwen n webɛuc ɣef ṭṭaq
yufa d waniwa ara yehder
d acu i tɣilemt ɛni

yeḥdeq uqcic agi
deg lweqt swaswa
ma tkemmel akka ad d ddun izuranen

uriɣ asen tibratin

ameɣbun meskin ixreb as yiḍes

ma tebɣiḍ ad d taseḍ yya
berka

d nekk kan i terza tyita

ad k tt id awin

d win yeččan lkacir
rewlent zik iḍelli

sihrew it

kkret ay ayetma ad truḥem ma d nekkni ad d yejbu lɛesker
ur ntettu ara ad d nebder daɣen kaysa xalifi

ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri is i tenhert

ḥusseɣ ɛerqeɣ

sliman ur yesteɛfay ara
fti ay agdud

ur ilaq ara ad nɛeṭṭel
akka neɣ mačči

d lmuḥal

iwwa zzbib is
ad cfuɣ fell am
nettat tesɛa sin n warrac
nsemɛen d ɣef berru
amdan ara yenɣen wayeḍ d lmut ara yemmet
sudaba ɣas akken tḥemmel aṭas tameddakelt is maca tusem cwiṭ
ṛṛay d ṛṛay is awal d awal is
sɛant t
senned d ɣer tayet iw
ini d ayen tebɣiḍ ur k ttamneɣ ara
anwa i yuklalen aɛuzzu i ixeddmen leɛǧayeb am kečč
deg leǧwayeh a i tzedɣeḍ
saɛid u muḥ yeqbel ad imudd afus i tiziri tagawawt
uzun t akken yedder
la yi teskerkiseḍ
acu yeḍran
yella kra n yiwen i yettnezzihen
yusef iḥzen ɣef baba s sebɛa n wussan
ɣur m ad t tḥemmleḍ winna d aḥewwas kan
tettrajuḍ tura akka
ulac adfel azeqqal
amer ittaf ala talwit ara yilin deg ddunit
aha init d
tewwiḍ imuras
yak kulec iban
asmi i t leḥqent ufant yeffreɣ
d tamerbuḥt tmeɣra yes s
tutlayt nsen d taqbaylit kan
tineɣrit tella teččur d inelmaden
yuba weḥd s
seg wayen id neḥka ad nefhem d akken yal wa di ddunit
rrant ak t id
yettban d yeččeḥ tom
iḥemmel ad yerkeb timacinin
ẓṛan ssusmen d wid yettṣeḍḥin
teččam abbaɣ iw
deg ubrid temlal ṛebɛa mačči zaɛma tmuqqel iten
teddewwil s ilemẓiyen akken tebɣa
tḥemmlem ad teččem tiɛesbanin
ifukk laman
yeɛreḍ ad yekkes akkin aweṭṭuf
ur kent yettawi ara yid s
yiwen ur k yegzi

ṛuḥ
tcennu julia
la skerkisent wallen im
telha tegmat

err ddhen ik ɣer ttfaṣil
nekret
mačči ayen yufa yiwen ad t id yessufeɣ deg facebook
iǧǧa d ṛebbi imebraḍen imefraḍen
d axxam iw tura
ungif ur d gri ara deg tudert is
ulamma qqaren d tizemmar is n usnulfu ar tura sɛant tilas acku tenǧem kan ad tsuneɣ neɣ ad tesbeɣ
d amcic
ṛuḥet ad tɛebdem ameɣlal am akken i t id tennam
suddsen irmad idelsanen
aneɣlaf amezwaru ijmeɛ d ineɣlafen n lḥukuma s s leɛjel
qqaṛen iyi amaziɣ
ad d yawi ul is d amejruḥ rnan si ṣaleḥ umedbuḥ
yettban d tom yeččeḥ
abṛaham iɛenna ɣer yillu dɣa illu yesseḥla dda ḥemmu tameṭṭut is akked tqeddacin is uɣalent ttarwent
ulac akk anda i walaɣ tom
tebɣiḍ ad kem nawwi s ibibbi ɣef yeɛrar nteɣ
yulin ɣef uqermud iḍegger ibernas
tɣuṛṛeḍ tamurt im
d ta i d tameṭṭut ad ak imlen tudert
tezga cceḥna gar watmaten
ruḥen ɣer mekka ad rejmen cciṭan
gen di talwit a gma cirani ali d awezɣi ad k nettu
am yal aseggas i lmend n teẓrigt n useggas n zuǧ alaf u tmenṭac zuǧ alaf u tteɛṭac
asluɣu n twennaḍt igellu d s buneggaf
qqel ar deffir
bnin seksu inek
ibeggen it id iḍelli deg yiḍ
nehṛemt
ɛeṛḍeɣ
tameṭṭut yesɛan dderya turez s tasa
yefka yas tom aṣelliɛ i mary
ad ibdu leqdic n tddukkla s talilt n telmeẓyin d yilmeẓyen ara d yecnun kra n tezlatin
beɛɛed ɣef uqjun nni
uɣal d ar daki
sɣur wumi i sent d kan idrimen nni
ssukren t deg uvilu
txeddem ccɣel s lferḥ
ini d
yuɣ iyi d baba avilu
inimt d d acu tettwalimt
ttwarseɣ ad xedmeɣ yid k
tessawḍemt ad teqqimemt
lyes belɛidi yewwi arraz wis kraḍ belɛid at ɛli n tullist ṣayddu mayga
kul ass isɛa tameddit
d netta i d ikerri aberkan n twacult
ur k iɣaḍ ara
meskint teqcict a
win ur nettaggad ittwaggad
d acu i tebɣamt ihi
anita deg sent i s iɛeǧben
dɣa ad as terr yelli s nni ad as tini
akken i d kkren akken i d tturebban
yettuɣal itt id yiẓri
ur iṣeḥḥa ara yiẓri k i tenherk
ur ttaǧǧa deg wayla m tardest
init asen
nxeddem aseɛlem deg merra taɣulin
tella kra n tɣawsa i yesserfan tom
ur heddreɣ ara tafransist am yidir
ttemyegracen am iɣyal
i wawal ma ad iyi d yali
cebḥent yessi k
tḥemmlemt ad telsemt llebsa n yeqbayliyen
ẓẓur fell as yeckunṭeḍ
ladɣa deg wussan n uzɣal
isṛayil irra yas anɛam
sḥassfeɣ aṭas
acḥal deg leɛmer umeɣrad
yal wa ad as d yefk ṛebbi almend n wul is
qqen taggest ik
yesbeɣ itt id
d arẓaz inebbcen deg leḥcic
i bniɣ d wi ɛellaɣ yal ṭṭaq deg s lemri
rran timedlin fell as
ḥemmlent tt
ad gnen iwakken ad kkren
ay azger
yella wayen i wumi selleɣ
twalam
meskin ijaḥ ṛṛay is
err itt id ɛad i yilmeẓyen
ad tuɣaleḍ ad tfehmeḍ
temḍerkal tmeskant iselsa teɣli deg usayes
tzewǧem deg tmurt
tettraǧu mary
wissen amek gganen yiqettalen
tugiḍ ad tsetḥiḍ ɣef yiman ik
qqaren zik win ur nesɛi aɣyul d netta ay d aɣyul
yebɣa ad yaɣ yelli s n xalti s
ad ṣelliɣ ɣef nnbi ad ṣelliɣ ɣef lxir
takaniṭ a d tilemt
agdud ad yeddu lwaḥid
siwa tilin ara d ilint sebbat n uɣelluy
yeṭṭes
bɣiɣ ad ɛiceɣ yid k
yella iteddu s zzerban
nnan ur d itekk usalas seg uxalaf umagraman
d leqrun segmi i sen truḥ i yedrimen tengawit nsen n lkaɣeḍ neɣ n umɣuz ma d tura dayen uɣalen d izwilen an deg uselkim
nekk d taxḍibt n tom
yuba yečča yakan
daymi i as fkan azal meqqṛen tmura n umaḍal
izdem d yidir isɣaren si lexla
nunef asen kan sfuǧǧuɣen
yečča sliman taxsayt
ttruḥen kan si lqahwa ɣer lqahwa
yessummel aɣ
sbehdlen tom
deg yiḍ yebda asemɛirew yezdin imeṭṭi d taḍṣa
qqimeɣ ciṭ aked kenza sdat n uxxam nsen nqesser
lliɣ zzenzeɣ yakan adlis nni mi yi d yessawel
ad t id temmekti
ad yettɛelli deg igenni

wa ihenna wa icewwel
xḍu k i ccemma ur tenfiɛ ara
ulac win i t id iwalan
bḍan am tt id
ad teččeḍ aɣrum ger wuccanen a
si musa n taddart ufella ad isserɣ ayagi deg tqeṛṛabt n si muḥ aɛebbas
ini as akk ayen yellan
ansa i as d tekkiḍ
ur ẓriɣ d acu tettnadim
bḍut as ten id
ad nuɣal
tfeṛḥem meṛṛa

kra ara d issis ad ittumessek
ur tqelliq ara
amisil swayes i d ẓedmen yewwi aṭas n terwiḥin
ass a nerna ten

sami yefqeɛ
urant as tabrat iḍelli
iha iha a taqabubt n tnina
sami yenna i baba s
tuwi d ɣef uwanek ad yili d allal n uɣref

ad ten yamen

kkes ugur

iqummec tom
amzun s teglizit yiwen wass kan ad uɣalen d imusnawen
ntteddu s axxam yiwet n tmeddit
bḍant ak tent id
zgiɣ kerseɣ i unyir iw heggaɣ i umcečew d wid iyi ittɛayaren
d nutenti i as d iqedcen
aniti ara ibedden i leqdic nni

d tibbuɣyelt

fiḥel awal fiḥel nhati
d kečč i y isseɣren

amatar udmawan deg umaɣun
ad tt yenṭel win i tt yurǧan
d amendil s i begseɣ ixf iw
unfeɣ as ad teglilez deg tikta w deg tirga w d yiman iw
yenna d tazemmurt
ur yeẓri ɣef wacu i yettxemmim
bɣan ad ten yeḥkem lɛesker d aya

teṭṭef tarzeft is

gezmemt

ṛebbi isserkab isrusu
yerra aɣ d
ikker wabbu deg walim ḥedd ur yeɛlim
ass n deg yideflawen
ur ittili ara deg s lɛib

tasɣunt aselmad
anida bɣuɣ iliɣ ad sdariɣ iman iw
ad as yanef ad iɛeddi

sɛiɣ ccɣel
d temẓi k i d temmektiḍ
akken nexdem neḥṣel
win yebɣan ad yečč lesfenǧ iḍher ak amek
ad d yefk ṛebbi tabburt

iɛedda lawan n bibras
gan tuɣdaṭ nsen

imẓiyeɣ

ur d iqqim deg sent uṭenṭun
wayeḍ ḥsu belli ad s d yenni
amek aken tura
i tikkelt tamezwarut i ẓriɣ iman iw sɛiɣ azal ɣer umdan nniḍen

ur tessin ara yakk ad taru
ur iḥemmel ara yidir ad iɛeṭṭel deg yiḍ di berra

sexdameɣ t

ilaq ad taɣem tanumi
ad ččeɣ alamma ṛwiɣ

asif wis tlata isem is ḥidiqil ittazzal di ccerq n acur

teččiḍ tibidas im
acḥal nuzzel ur nelḥiq
nnan axxam ur nesɛi llsas ur ittdumu i yimawlan
neɛya seg yiɣimi
ma kerseɣ anyir iw ɣer sent ad iyi kerhent ma sqizzbeɣ asent ad ɣillent yella wacu i bɣiɣ
ad yennerni leqdic d tektiwin ɣef tẓuriwin i d ikeccmen deg usnulfu n ssinima
kra ur ibeddel

rsen d seg lkar
ad sen yezzi s uɛrur

yumen
zemrent ad ddun yid s
ḥesbeɣ iman iw d ayyur ɣur i medden akk mmuqlen
ad yeṭṭes deg ṛṛeḥma
ad ten iwehhi akka d wakka zdat n umeɣlal
ma d massi yezga yeṭṭunuc
melken ten lehyuf
yesɛa tigletyam
ayen d ikkan seg usaɣuṛ d abaɣuṛ
ikfa ṭṭbel ifra wurar
anda teqqen i tebra
qqim a yaɛṛab ar tefsut
i as yerra maziɣ
irgazen nni tɛeǧǧben nnan anwa t wagi
ṛṛeḥma n ṛebbi s liser mačči s laɛṣeṛ
iɛṛeḍ ad d yekker zik
s yisem is d anemhal amatu n tkebbanit agi
theggamt ad tṛuḥemt
yuker d imukar ittru d wat uxxam
wid ijebbden lqus ffɣen as d d iɛdawen

yuba ifud
ur d qqar ara d si rezqi i d argaz im
yeɛfu yak s teɣwzi n leɛmeṛ
d acu t tura wagi
tesliḍ
ad t tamneḍ
leḥsab d useḥseb n wussan
ɛerḍeɣ ad qennɛeɣ yiwen n wemdakel akken ur izewweǧ ara
ur ḥtammeɣ ara
ur yeẓri ara yidir d acu i tebɣa newwara ad as t id yawi

aḥiwel aɣiwel

teẓriḍ yakan taɣyult
akken i ilaq ad yili
tuɣ d newwara lḥaǧa i yidir ilmend n umulli s
ansi ara t id nawi
yerra iyi t d tagust s iri
yella udlis n ccḍeḥ ɣef tnarit
anda ara neqqim deg lehna
tumrem yakk
yuɣ lḥal yiwen seg iqeddacen n uxxam ur illi dinna
gma k ad k iffeẓ ur k isseblaɛ
iḥmel d wasif
yeckenṭeḍ di lḥammu n yemma s d yiẓuṛan is
keṛheɣ tasertit
ɛerḍeɣ ad ruḥeɣ ɣer lxedma s uvilu maca ɣer tagara ufiɣ mačči d ayen i y iwulmen
anda ara naf tidak yettcabin ar tidak nni
gzem lbaṭaṭa nni
teǧǧa k ṣṣeḥḥa
ɣucceɣ kem
ur ihan i lihana
ifreḥ aṭas muḥend s tcacit i as d yuɣ mmi s yidir
nsan deg udrar i yetran tettfuḥ amzun d lqahwa
a tid iwumi ɣezzif yiles
tom d igellil
yuba yettɛeyyiḍ
ala ur as tekkes ara leḥjab i uqcic
zemreɣ ad kkeɣ timura zemreɣ ad zegreɣ lebḥur
ixdem asent kra
ɣer lfinga iyi ẓuɣṛen
ma ulac aɣilif ɛreḍ tikkelt nniḍen
yewwi yi aṭas n sswayeɛ wanect aki
ur yi d tuqiɛ ara
ur bɣint ara tudert aki n lḥif n tyita n lahyuf n ddel d kennu
mazal ur fhimen ara taluft nni
lliɣ heggaɣ asen
ikad iyi d tesruḥayeḍ kan di lweqt ik
tehriruc d yiwen weqcic amectuḥ ḥemlen warrac iqbayliyen
ur stewtiwet ara
balak ad ak gen leɣrur
ḥemmlemt akk medden
kfu d tura taqsiṭ ik
tfakk akent tent
cabḥa d yiwet n tlemẓit yettḥulfun aṭas
mi tefra ad neẓdem
mmi s n leḥṛam
acu ara tebɣuḍ ad tesweḍ
armi d cehwaɣ seksu n temẓin
staxṛeɣ yiwet
nesla am
wali akk wid yettwarnan melmi kan
mačči d taɣallit i telliḍ
ur d mezgeɣ ara nekk d yinaragen iw
asmi nella di lakul deg sin akken i neddukul
ur kkat a gma ineṭṭeḍ
telzem ikem tkeffart
tesɛiḍ tiqcicin
deg ssuq i ttemlilin medden
ṛuḥent as
d tudert i ččureɣ
tetteɣzaẓ tugar ajeǧǧiḍ
nniɣ ak ad yelḥu
mačči d ayen inefɛen akk
mmektan d
tettḥewwiseḍ ḥedd
timensiwin

fkan iyi ur ɛlimeɣ
tetteccef akken iqwem
iṛwa ubujad tamuḍli
bḍan asen tent id
tuklalemt ad kunt rnun deg lexlaṣ
bges s ubetṛun
berka asṭerṭer
ur cfiɣ ara acḥal yid sen deg uxxam
tḥeṛcemt mliḥ
amedyaz yettarra tt kan i tirga

ur ttɛeggiḍet ara

nesses

ad qqnen taywalt d snat n tuddsiwin

melmi ad tt ẓṛent
ɛebbaɣ ur ukiɣ

da i zedɣeɣ
d anebdu

yeɛqub ikemmel abrid is

gneɣ aṭas
tura i d ẓriɣ yiwet n tesgilt srid deg youtube
yebḍa yaɣ ten id
gen di talwit a gma bensalem murad d awezɣi ad k nettu
uɣalen ttmenṭaren deg unafag n lqahira
yeɛṛeq cced uyeddid
dduzan nni ixdem iten meṛṛa s nnḥas
ur isɛi aqeṛṛu wala iḍaṛṛen
tedda d yid kent
nɣiɣ akent tt
yeččur uqcic a d leɛqel
ad d ttwasneɛten ukkuẓ n yisura di remḍan
ḥader ad as tinim d tillas n yiḍ i t yerran d amaggad
ulac tuttriwin

ad tetturarem s wawalen i wakken ad tefkem ccbaḥa i yimesli
tesfaqeḍ tt id
rnu ḥerrek
ad d tawiḍ tifeqlujin

sɛiɣ amcic d amellal
ttxemmim cwiṭ

nwant ddunit d awal kan

ad tt tseggmeḍ

ad nerreẓ wala ad neknu
ad kent tt id awint
d acampanzi i d aɣersiw iqerben maḍi ɣer umdan

tenna tt id rradyu agi

abṛaham irra yas anɛam a mmi
isgerwiḥ ur d issalay
a tasekkurt ifreq aɣ rebbi ur nemmut

acku argaz d netta i yettqabalen aɛdaw n beṛṛa
firefox d iminig igerrzen

ḥarcent deg uɣerbaz
ur stufaɣ ara

yessers afus is ɣef lǧerḥ yeḥla

ay amcum deg neɣ yeffɣen
yella wasmi i d temmekta
yuba yella d leɛǧeb

mačči akka
d iḍes kan iyi ixuṣṣen

tella tin i yettnezzihen
ur ttili ara d yir aqcic
ttnejban am ddkir

nettkezziz meqrit tizza
ilaq ad d naf ayen s wacu ara neqfel ameqqur a
tuɣal tekkes iyi tuggdi n rrwaḥ ɣer lkabina
serrḥen am ad truḥeḍ

wissen ma tezmer ad iyi d tefhem

ur tebɣi ara ad tezweǧ
ad iṛeɣ uzegzaw s uquṛan
qerriḥet teswiɛt
yusef awcic iɛedda s ukabar n tirni n yiɣallen inemlayen
tewweḍ tyerza s aḥdid

d tasɣunt yerzan tawennaṭ d useḥbiber ɣef lqaɛa

ad tkecmeḍ ar waxxam

anwa i d yeslan
ad kent t fken

d aya iwmi mmugen yimdukal

deg s sebɛa n tezlatin anda i d yessefra s ccna
yuba yessawel i mary
tettak aɣ d afud d lebɣi ad neṭṭef deg s
sliman u muḥ yewweḍ d zdat n tiziri tagawawt
armi ur ufiɣ ara d iniɣ
mi yeswa tiqit yettḥulfu i yiman is amzun akken yettferfir
teksa yi acekkuḥ iw
ɣef ssetta n tmeddit tebda tmeɣra i d yellan ilmend n yinelmaden i d yufraren deg yikayaden
anda i tedda yeḍfeṛ itt
ahat ur cukteɣ d wid yeddren
d wi i d idrimen nkent
fukkent t
tura kan i yebda
ad ččen si lqut is
lebɣi yella ifadden kkawen
ar tura suffeɣeɣ d sin n wammuden ɣer tezrigin tafat
ili kem d tuḥdiqt
nefka lɛahed gar aneɣ
tzemreḍ ad yid tesɛeddiḍ tisent ma ulac aɣilif
tanqelt d aseklu i d imeqqin anda yella uzɣal
aɣaref d bu ccwami

d lawan ma ad d friwseḍ

tewḥel
d acu ara d tiniḍ ihi
d acu dagejdur a
ad s d xedmeɣ tamɛiwent ara yilin d tamtilt is

ur kent sefcaleɣ ara
teksa taɣaṭ is
yella kra i tettum
d llebsa

ad as t id tawiḍ
brizil tespwa setta uɛerin n twilayatin

tebɣamt ad tissinemt asewwi
ha t an ihi win yeččan ul is
terram asent t id

ansa i yeffeɣ

ansa aɣ

ad m tent yefk
aberray d allal swayes ẓẓaden azemmur yemmug s uẓru

d kečč i iḥeṛcen fell i
a zzin n tullas
ma tenɣiḍ iman ik ur d trebbḥeḍ kra
qqel d ɣer da

la ismezgir deg wawal
ad d nemlil ticki

yal iḍ nettaru d kra n tefyar i common voice
tcewwel it tinna
d imdukal
iserdasen bedden deg udem n unṭag n yeɛdawen
issames iyi abux

kra n umzuxxu deg s
buṭrus inna as d ibeṛṛaniyen

ṛebbi irad tuzzma tekfa

tgerrez

tidet ur tt ssineɣ

yeḍṛa yas kra i tom
yeṭṭef itt id qasi waɛli zdat s yiwen ufus ɣef wayet tayeḍ deffir n temgerḍt iẓmeḍ itt id ar yidmaren is yenna yas ḥemmleɣ kem a faḍma lḥusin
ur tlaqeḍ ara
dɣa ula d aselway is mass ɛemmar rabḥi yemmeslay d ɣef ccbaḥa n umkan a

ifassen is d izelmaḍen
ad m tt fkent
igufaf yeččan seksu ur yufaf

ɣur i aselkim
saɛid u muḥ yennermes tiziri tagawawt

timlilit nni i uzekka
ad nebdu tuta
lemdeɣ deg lustṛali

tura ixeṛṛef

ur yi d tesliḍ ara

a tewweḍ d tegrest
ur d tenniḍ kra
qleb tawṛiqt
mi yeččuṛ ad t id jebden iḥewwaten ɣer rrif n lebḥeṛ
dɣa isemma yas isṛayil
yufrar d deg tusnakt segmi meẓẓi
s kra kra zzit nni tettali d umbeɛed ttawint tt ɣer uxxam i wakken ad tt zzrent s leḥmu

anwa ara nesteqsi

uṛǧant

icbeḥ
ttif aḥezzeb wala aqezzeb
aql ak di lxelwa
tasumta mebla aɣanim
yir zzin terna leɣla
ibeɛɛacen d iqelwacen kkren d s izem ad t qqacen

tɛawen it
tazemmurt tcudd s akal is d ungal i yura belqesem at maɣzuccen
ur ttṣekkiṛeɣ walu
bɣiɣ ad issineɣ asewwi
a lmalayek d iɛussen
ur d ssakay tussna n waṛẓen
zzux lfux
seksu yeɛrek d aɣrum
beṭleɣ lakul
ugin ad lemden tira
d acu d nnan yiɣmisen ass a
d kemm i d tigejdit n uxxam iw
yuba yettaɣ awal
ur twalaḍ ara tamurt agi meṛṛa
ikfa ṭtbel ifra wurar
senqed qbel iman ik
nnan win ijerrben lmeḥna yeẓra meskin rẓaget
ad ten tafeḍ tteddun am yireqqasen n ssaɛa
d ifassen n wefṛux i tesɛa
tessenṭaḍ tmeqlit nni ɣas ḥiwel zzit
a nanna teqqar d tayi d lɣula ad ɣen tečč
yuɣal d seg ssyada akken
mačči ala ccbaḥa n tfekka i yeẓẓar
yebɣa ccix nuṛdin a t yessekles di ṛṛadyu
yefruri zznad

tfakk iyi ten
la ttlusuɣ iceṭṭiḍen iw
ḥemmlen akk tiɛleǧtin
d lawan
ad isewweq yid i

ansi ken
yeṭṭes ur yeẓri i yeḍran
qqimeɣ deg sbiṭar azal n smana d uzgen
lemdeɣ akk ayenni
nɣan awen tent
tugi ad ten tettu
ferḥen s wayen iyi xedmen
fki yid aɛrab yeṣfan ad ak fkeɣ adfel yeḥman
anwi akk ara yeddun d iqeffafen
ẓriɣ yejreḥ wul ik
cukkeɣ mačči d netta i yebɣan
d acu i d ssebba n umennuɣ nsen
cennun kan ɣef teqbaylit wamma d tiṛumiyin i sen iɛeǧben
isneḥniḥ deg lweḍyat
teddun awent di nneqma
tfakkeḍ aɣ t
wissen ma ad yurar
ayen i iruḥen ur d yettuɣal
win ur nesɛi lmal imal
ulac ciṭuḥ n waman
akka i d tenna
beṛka k acetki
ad ten twansemt
melmi i yuḥwaǧ kra
neẓra tettenɛettabem maca ad ternum kra
mi d teḍra tedyant a
ad as tiniḍ d tuddza n umehraz i yellan deg wul is
arrac ttazallen ḥafi
nexdem akk ayen ideg ara nessetḥi
d amcic
ur asent qqar acemma
lqedd is am tbiqest
ula d netta yettu t
yeqqar as ḥemmleɣ kem
ad ten lseɣ ad nesreɣ ɣer berra
ikemmel yenna d mi nekfa kan ikayaden ad ɛerḍeɣ ad fruɣ tamsalt a s uẓar
anwa ara tlummem
yeɛqub iburek ferɛun
tṛuḥemt deg sent
ad tzerrɛem ur tmeggrem d iɛdawen nwen ara iɣelten
nuɣ axxam
ḍsan ɣef tikti w
wa ijebbed wa ikerref
d asarag amenzu i d thegga tddukkla a deg waggur agi n remḍan deg usɣim n waggur azeggaɣ azzayri
bḍu yi tt id
tameddurt n temẓi s di taddart d ttin mu yecfa
sebɣen asen tent
yufa asent d amahil
s wazal n wukuẓ n twinas d semmus n tmerwin n wagimen n luru
yeggumma ad yali wass
yeḍɛef yuba aṭas

teɣli yak tmacwart

ur ssineɣ ara tidet
nɣiɣ am ten
argaz yuyes tameṭṭut is yeẓra tuɣalin ulac
ɣaḍent iyi snat yessi s d trumit mu d giḍ leɣrur
rran aɣ deg uɛewwiq
ula deg yisental ttawin d amaynut ssnen ad mmeslen taqbaylit akken ssawḍen ɣer uḍris imeɛnen
ǧǧet iyi ad t waliɣ kan
tban tuzert ɣef udmawen nkent
tameṭṭut taqbaylit xas akken aṭas i terfed maca lqed is yezga yezdi
nebɣa ad neqdec di talwit

ɣzet amdun alqayan
els iceṭṭiḍen ik

ɣelqent

i umbeɛd

ay udem uqejjun
ḥemmleɣ kem mliḥ

d agris n tayri i lebda
ad iliɣ deg ukamyun

nruḥ ɣer lebḥer

d leḥqer ɛinani

aru isem im
d lweqt i aɣ ineqqen mačči d nekkni i t ineqqen

ceqqren

dehmet

ad ṛwunt tiḥlawatin

yal tama deg wagrakal tesɛa tafaska
tewwet ik lmeɣwla
ad s d alseɣ ad am iniɣ

ur yeǧǧi amkan

d imeṭṭawen n yiddew
nekk aql i yid wen mkul ass alamma tefna ddunit
yessuter tom deg mary ad tneɣ john
ad asen yeɛreq wawal
zik qqaren taglimt n telɣaɣayt d tamerbuḥt
si tmurt nni iṛuḥ ɣer acur
d acu i tennam
anda tt tlemmast umeɣrad
ad ruḥeɣ ad awen ǧǧeɣ taḥjurt tin akken i teffer umlaɛbi
cwiṭ kan i d ǧǧiɣ seg yiwen n ṭṭaq akken ad yeffeɣ wabbu

meqqreɣ
yal ddurt ttasen d yimejjayen nni akken ad iyi iẓren
agḍiḍ daxel n tfergact am umdan daxel n usekraf
ur tḥemmlemt ara tusnakt
wakka yeffren deffir usaber
s tidet tebɣiḍ ad tebruḍ
ad d iniɣ d aɣlaḍ i ɣelḍeɣ

ad tent tesseɣlimt
iban d wabbu

anwa t bu tjellabt ihin yellufḍan
yesɛa gma s
ma d win ur neɣri meskin gar asen ur yesɛi amkan

msebḍan acḥal aya
wid i d yefkan afus n tallelt

ad m tt teɛṛeḍ

annaɣ

yak ur t yuɣ wara

yettawi yettarra

iffeẓ cclaɣem is
iruḥ ɣer tama nniḍen
iqaqqaḥ mmi tabasast is
tefser seksu anda i t iweɛɛa yiṭij d ubeḥri akken ur yettismum ur yettjinjiṛ
wissen d acu i yesnuɣnan yidir
am at tizi hibel i yettnezzihen i waḍu

ɣiwel els lqecc ik
ur ssinen ara tasertit

iɣawel
a ddin ṛebbi ayen akka taɣect a ur tettfakka ara
ulac win i tt ifehmen

qqimet yid i
bɣiɣ ayen nniḍen i wučči
yura aɣ d tabrat
iḍ nni dɣa sswent as ccṛab i baba tsent
anida i llan laɛwanṣer tibḥirin timẓin irden
sɛan aɣbel
zlu as asfel
anwa i ak iɛeǧben deg sen
ayen iwumi cfiɣ nekk d wayen iɣef i d ḥekkun yimenza nneɣ
mi ara tettẓallam ur xeddmet ara am wat sin wudmawen
ad ɣenniɣ weḥdi a xir
beṛka i tbeddleḍ asentel
ssuturent tlawin izerfan nsent
ama s tezrawin n unadi neɣ s tselḍin n yimussnawen n tmedyazt
baba yemmut ur yeḥdiṛ i tmerɣra n gma
azzel deg tsawent ma tebɣiḍ ad tefsi tassemt nni
ad iyi twansem
tenniḍ ad beddleɣ amḍiq
smeɛqleɣ deg s ddeqs armi i d mmektaɣ
tuḍneḍ aṭas
tagnawt tettibrik kter
srid seg otawa
ad ɣ t tɛeṛḍemt
iberdan regglen
abeddel deg lbeni n ufyir d tlelli seg tama n tmeɣrut d tesddarin d wakaten
ma dɣa teṭṭfeḍ igenwan
qrib ad leqḍen medden azemmur
sdat n tewwurt is temɣi d ttejra n ukalitus
win iɛettben ad iɣellet
ṭṭef axenfuc im
ikrez uzger ičča uɣyul
d lawan tura ad k nerr taqlaḍt ad k d nawi tameṭṭut

nnant iyi id

tjerḥem
ad n wexreɣ kemm ad tezhuḍ
am tadimt am lḥila

uran as tabrat iḍelli

d timugent kan i ttnadiɣ

ɣlin am id ibeccan

d acu t ccɣel a
yeẓẓar tilufa s wallen n tudert
ansa ara yeffeɣ
mennaɣ d ad ḥewwseɣ ar legniz
alamma teḍra yid sent akka i ttakent lqima i wid i tent itt qadaren
ad asen tent tefkem

iwacu tettazzalem
d agerruj
ddeqs aya ur ɣriɣ ungal
s yiwen webrid
tettekki diɣ deg teliliyin i texdem gar n yicennayen gar asen samir lusif
mi tbeddeḍ medden akk yinek
s teqbaylit i theddeṛ yemma
ur ttak cclaḍa i win innumen abuneqqaṛ
fukken aɣ waman
anwa i k id iceggɛen ɣur i
yesbeɣ iten id

kkawen ifadden is
ur ilaq ara ad nerr awadem n mali ad yessexdem tinfaliyin n leqbayel
adɣaɣ ifsi akerra acu ar ad d yini
ddeqs n iqbayliyen i ten yesseqdacen
iweṭṭen i tziri

tcukkem yeɛni deg i

ur d tettaseḍ ara
icceɛṛef am burebbu
terra yas t id
tḥemmleḍ ad teččeḍ ayen imellḥen mliḥ neɣ ala
yuggad tameddit
ad iffeɣ seg uxxam
teslemdeḍ iyi t
nniɣ as ahat ad tcedhiḍ kan učči ynu akem d yefk ubrid maɛna mmektaɣ d belli tḥemleḍ ad teččeḍ deg berra lawan i telliḍ d taxeddamt
yečča aɣrum aberkan
d baba d nekk i t yessnen

ḥeṛmeɣ t ula deg waman n tala
serrḥen iyi ad d ruḥeɣ

teḥmiḍ
wukud teqqimeḍ
ɛqel it tunfeḍ as

ad tt issewseɛ yillu ɣef yifit

eǧǧ itt ad tmeslay
ad k ten yeɛṛeḍ
lḥakem isteqsa t kečč d agellid n iyahudiyen
ɣur m ad kem iẓer yiṭij
d lqanun ara d iqqimen i wat isṛayil i lebda si lǧil ɣer lǧil
ḥusseɣ iman iw cwiya kan
tacriḥt icellḥen imellḥen werǧin tfuḥ
wali amaynut

terna tseṭṭa s isegman
tefkam tt i jjiḥ
ur ɛeddan ara fell as aṭas n wussan seg mi yemmut

thelkeḍ

jelleb tijellibin

eg afran nniḍen

d wa i d asaḍuf ar ɣur neɣ
isfel it cciṭan
wissen d acu i yebɣa ad d yini

ulac xali k di tessirt
ass n mi tt ɣriɣ
iɣli d fell as leḥzen akked leɣben
yewwi deg wul is amecṭuḥ ismektiyen n tayri ines tameqqrant
asenfar wis sin d abrid ameqqran ara yeqqnen gar temdint n tizi uzzu ɣar ubrid asammar amalu

ɛeyyḍeɣ

ur d yuri ur d isawel

yerra d awal
tbubb gma s amecṭuḥ

inelmaden meṛṛa nnan akken nni

farsemt

adif yegguǧ seg yiɣes iw

qqiment ɣer tselnin nni timezwura ɣef yiri n wasif
hder akken tebɣiḍ
ɣulleɣ ula d nekkinni
isbehba t leɛceq
rjut da
llan sin n yiɛeṭṭaren akken kan i ddukkulen

yemmut yuba deg taḍsa
uliɣ
afus ayeffus ur igezzem azelmaḍ
bru d i umzur timceṭ
ɛni d kečč ara ydebbṛen fell i

nɣant as ten
ur ttemyasamet ara gar awen
ittbeḥḥiṛ kan s yiles
ugint ad imɣurent

amek iɛedda umulli m

ur sɛiɣ ara lviza
d baba s i t iɛeggcen
ihwa yas kan truḥ d
ad t tamen
bḍumt asent t id

anda tt tsarut im
ad ten teǧǧ tmacint
ilaq ad tidireḍ tudert i ak id yettakken tahregt
ikad iyi d kullec ileḥḥu
mi ara ad iṭṭef deg yiwen ad iḥqer wayeḍ
ečč lmektub teqqimeḍ
d ayen lxiḍ tissegnit
ur tečči acemma ass a

sberber i lwens inu

ṛuḥeɣ

yeqbel

allen iw ur nneḥtament ara

dayen tfukkeḍ
i yimawlan i yi d isekren
tasdawit mulud mɛemmri
ur ttjellibeɣ am lleft
akal aberkan

ur ttqelliq ara d ayen isehlen
rrbeḥ a tafat
yessikid itt ɣer wallen
err d iṭij ma yeɣli

aql iyi wejdeɣ

baba m yettgalla
deg tesraft ar neɣbu rric is

timsi

tɣucc it

mkul yiwen ijmeɛ d kan ayen ara yečč
awamma en

ṭṭef lḥiḍ

ad nili din

d lmut ara mmten

inelmaden nni ṛuḥen xedmen akken i sen inna yasuɛ

kenwi d tafat n ddunit

teqmeḍ tqenduṛt a

amek i tt ẓṛan

sdukkel

ay urweɣ qqimeɣ d weḥd i
lḥut
gar tlawin a ad naf faḍma n summer
amigaṭamḍan d alef u rebɛa u ɛecrin n ikiluṭamḍanen
deg uswir n tesnalɣa i yerzan anagraw n umyag
maca ayɣer

ad yaf aɣilas

bḥal ayazi n ttmer
yes wen i nbennu cfawat
ṭumubil a mačči inu
sɛumt tabɣest
sliman u muḥ weḥd s
ur gziɣ ara tamuɣli ya inem
yuba yuɣal d amejjay
segmi i d tusiḍ d asawen
xas ini sliman u muḥ wurǧin yessawel i tiziri tagawawt
ur d necqi di falasṭin ur d necqi deg wudayen
imiren inelmaden akken ma llan ǧǧan t rewlen
dagi ara neqqim
qqareɣ as kan d tiktiwin i ixelḍen deg wallaɣ iw
teddun am di nneqma
teqfel
ta di ṭṭbel ta di tẓayeṛt
i lamara ni i ɣef nemsefham
ur d ttaǧǧa acemma
ansuf s yiselmaden
d tibbulɛeḍt i tesbbulɛuḍeḍ
xas ttemyeḥḍaṛen ulawen ur myelḥamen
ččan seksu
tɣum usu w i iẓelbebbin s yibeccan akked yilbixen n yidammen
waqil deg yiwen n lbabur i nella
yettwali tent id s yir tiṭ
la ten tettnadiḍ
imi tt nuɣ di ẓẓher ulac lweqt yelhan nezgel it
dacu i d tenniḍ tikkelt nni tamezwarut
annu ma iqwa ičča k ma iḍɛef ičča k
a wer tekkrem
aqcic a d afeḥcuc
tuzzel tɛebbuḍt ik
nezmer ad nečč tura
tterka tenɣa acḥal n imelyan d amdan
yella yettuneḥsab d asaḍ
d ḥellu n yiwen n uberṣi
adlis ayi ad yemmag deg leqjer nni n ufella
d acu i turiḍ
deg leɛnaya k ɛreḍ amek ur iteffeɣ uqjun nni ɣer berra
tilawin di taddart
acu d yiwin anect a ɣer yelli
ad ak yanef ad tɛeddiḍ
yezwi tazemmurt

ihwa yas kan iruḥ
a yemma uḍneɣ taɛebbuḍt iw
di lweqt nni lḥakem hiṛudus isla s cciɛa n yasuɛ

ad twalimt

ḥemddulah

tettunefk as deg lɛum

aqeccaḍ di tiṭ n cciṭan

ddmet t
ass a d tafaskarziɣ ɣer uletma tamaẓuẓt ɣufreɣ tt id
tesɛam aqjun
ttejṛa ur nerri tili ula wumi tt
tesseɣres tixsi rrebg is
xemmem ttxil k ɣef usteqsi nni
ur nnumeɣ ara xeddmeɣ deg berra
abrid duga duga
att an tewweḍ d tmeɣṛa inek ad ɛeddiɣ ad wwteɣ tabacmaqt
ma d asaru aneggaru yetturaǧu ad d yettwasenɛet ass n lǧemɛa taneggarut n remḍan
aṭas i teglalzeḍ deg wannar n taddart
ur as terri ara twehha kan ɣer uɛebbuḍ is
yettebririḥ ugrud mi ttdawin iǧerḥ is
ad iyi d yuɣal d ameẓyan
teffeɣ ad d tnadi aṭaksi
ttagaden abeddel

ad mejdeɣ yis m a tilelli

lmut tettawi d tirni
yebɣa yi tom
asmekti n tmenɣiwt n uselway budyaf
axxam agi d ujjuṛ
nella ɣas in s ur nesɛi kra deg tkuzint
ṛujaɣ
ixedm it d aḥbac
qqim din ad ak tent in awiɣ
ay agejdur a tasilt
tantala taɛrabt n ccam tebna ɣef tutlayt taseryanit
ul n ḥmed d aberkan
d bu tuyat
ilaq ad d tekkreḍ ɣef setta
d timdukal ik merra nsent
lmut tezwar ɣur s
serseɣ d adrim d lḥenni ḥedqemt a tid wer neɣri
sima tessusem
ulac limaṛa ara s d ittunefken siwa limaṛa n yuna
aql ik iman ik
akken kan
yiwen ur yettwaqbal
ur d tettqejjimeḍ ara deg warraw n tmurt ik
mass mebruk sennun farid idrisi akked tnaẓurt bahiya ḥamdi i yi d ixedmen unuɣ i wammud iw n yisefra
ay imehbal yedreɣlen
kkes afus ik fell i
d taɣaɣa i d aɣersiw meqqren akk deg ddunit
yekker ad iruḥ yenna as umɣar nni ur tt tettawiḍ ara
yusa d yeblel
ddan ɣef teflukt nni
ffɣen yizan tekcem d tizit
leɛyaḍ im iqerreḥ aɣ deg yiqerray nneɣ
tamacint tɛeṭṭel assa s ɛecra n ddqayeq
yecrew itt merriɣet
ad d xedmeɣ cwiṭ n latay
tezḍa tisist azeṭṭa s deffir umeẓẓuɣ is
d leḥram di ddin yugi t ula d asaḍuf
ur ttarra ara iman ik tessneḍ iyi
ḍemɛeɣ deg uɛeṭṭaṛ yittmetran

yeṛṛeẓ

zririɣ

ur netthegi iweryan

ečč

yexser

ad nesmuɛceq kra

ad tellaẓemt

isem im

allaɣ is yeddubbez
rnu awṛaɣ

ur sɛiɣ ṣṣber

teḥma lmissa

yeḥbes

ɛerḍen ad rewlen

s lxedma almi d iḥal snat n twaracin n ddheb yuɣal d

ad k rnuɣ amur ɣef watmaten ik
d lbaṭel i txedmeḍ deg yiman ik
ass a zdat k d asawen

la tent tettnadimt

ilaq mliḥ ad as tt iniɣ
yerna ula d amaẓrag yenna d axir akken
win yeččan yečča ma d wayeḍ teṛbut tekkes
kemm d taselmadt neɣ ala
amek teddes tmetti taqbaylit
ad ruḥeɣ ad am d aɣeɣ ddwa agi i ak d yefka ṭṭbib
ad as yeḥku lemḥani
mi n tufiḍ aɣezzfan yerwel d awezzlan i t id iḍefren
ttmuqul zdat m a tinnat
ḥemmleɣ tudert s yergazen ifazen d tjaddit d uẓar yeṭṭfen
yeɣza yuba agḍi
ad ibeddel tikli ines ad ibeddel tannumi ines
terra fell i
ur zmireɣ i leqriḥ a
irra as ad m d ceggɛeɣ yiwen n yiɣid si tqeḍɛit iw
azekka ara d ruḥeɣ ɣer temqeddemt n tmurt n kanada
ihi ma yeẓra kan lwali ilaq as ad yehder s taɛrabt
tedda yawen di nneqma
neqqar taǧǧalt neɣ tadyalt
ḥemmleɣ seku
awennet di tazwara
dayen ɛyiɣ seg lekdub nwen
d acu ara k d iniɣ
bexlaf ṣṣebyan deg dduḥ ɣer wasif n txerrubin
yesɛa yelli s tecbeḥ
deg m i tella
ad yefferfer bururu ad t yeḍfer uwaɣzniw
anef iyi i ɛawaz nnumeɣ
kečč d bu sin wudmanwen

semmeṭ

mlellin
da d lḥif din d aɣilif

leqbayel aten a deg umihi
ad asent ten yefk
ma ulac lmeɣreb ur tettili lɛica
kkaten ɣef tutlayt taqbaylit
d acu i ken iwwin ɣur sent
d aḍebsi kan iwumi tessal
yir tawellit muḥettmet i yimawlan is
ur ittak ara umcic turet
ismawen n mraw n yimedyazen i d yufraren
ɛni temxellemt
a gma ssutureɣ tafat

tameddit
bḍu tasufeɣt nni ma tebɣiḍ
ur t ɣriɣ ara merra
lliɣ tqelqeɣ mliḥ
igra ad tt issani deg ujedɛun asmi ggin imuras dihin
tella tin i wumi tebɣiḍ ad teɣṛeḍ
ma yella ur nudeɣ fell am
yiwet n tekti kan i yettezin i imelken iziɣer is d wallaɣ is
ad teḍṣeḍ
din ara tebdu ihi asuneɣ s uɣanib s yimru neɣ s tpansut
ttḥussuɣ am wakken selleɣ i leṣwat n tilifunat i yeččenčunen
ayen akk ara teqqim texla ad teṛtiḥ
issuli as aman d asawen
ayen tettaf deg ungalen
ad tt yesseɣli
ha tt an tuddsa nneɣ deg texxam n tnezuzt n temdint n tizi uzzu
ulamma ččewčiwen yegḍaḍ yezga wul iw yeḥzen
ur fkiɣ yelli
tettamneḍ tt

tigawt
terja t ad d yas s axxam
da i yeqqim tom
ad tefk tamuɣli
ttwacellfen iyi cclaɣem
irucc axxam yerna addaynin
ur ttiliɣ ara yid sent
yal mi ččan kra ad t id ṣewwren deg facebook
anda yella lebṣel yeţraḥ
irẓa abeṛdi i ucmux
di berlin llan ddeqs n yimeḍqan icebḥen
imussnawen nnan d d amdan i d ixelqen ṛebbi

ɛeggḍen

aqcic yewhem

ass a kul wa anda yeqqim
tennam d lehmum teddrem ten d wid i awen d yezzin
sraḥeɣ deg sen setti
yeggernen uqcic a
tesluɣem tala
yiwen ur icukket kra
ar azekka ma yebɣa rebbi
ttasen d si mkul tamurt ɣer maṣer iwakken ad aǧwen irden ɣef yusef axaṭer laẓ izad di tmura meṛṛa
ma ahat ad medlent wallen iw ad iyi tawi tnafa
ad am d mmareɣ d igefran

tmaleḍ
d yiwen uklucaṛ kan itessen lbira
ad asen tt tefkeḍ
iwḥel di tballaɣt
kemmini a cetla n ubelyun iha d smid ur nesɛi llun
tečča lbaṭaṭa d tmellalin
ttawiɣ awen tent id
d wigi i d arraw n meẓyan i s d ilulen di tmurt n kanɛan

nebɣa t
tadukli i ṛṛeḥma

ḥedd d izi n facebook ḥedd d amcic n lexla
atent a ɣellint d tefyar am ubruri skelset kan
d acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan ik

aṭas i yečča

amek i tgiḍ

ad mmektin
d argaz neɣ tameṛṛut uneṣ

zdi ad nezdi meɛna aḍebbeṛ d nekkini
d tamara i iteggen nnmara
llan wid d yuḥnanen fell asen
ad ten twanes
anfemt iyi
ruḥ tura seww d seksu nni
abrid a
ur cfin ara fell am
neffeɣ
ẓẓiɣ taneqlet
yella kra i tufamt
aṭas n tefyar i d mazal
ur ttaǧǧa ara ṭṭaq yeldi mi teffɣeḍ seg texxamt nni
d tagi i d lkalafa nneɣ neɣ i d tamasit nneɣ
ad d alin yiɛewwamen ad d mlilen d rric is
ur steḥqeɣ ara aɛiwen ik
tura zrin acḥal d aseggas segmi ten yecrek wusu n leḥlal
ɛṛeḍ ad twennɛeḍ tagnizit inek
ɣef cwiṭ n tewlafin a ur ilaq ara lḥerṣ am wa uma nekk aql i gar yimeddukal lemmer ad d txedmeḍ am nekk ahat ad neskasi akken iwata lḥal imi k qerḥen waktayen ahat ur tesɛiḍ ara widen yelhan 
terna ttejra teḍleq afriwen is
tbeɛ
ansi yekkes aḍar a t terr nettat
tefka tt i jjiḥ
s teqbaylit kan ara tili
d ayen txellṣeḍ kan ara tawiḍ
shutturen kan
ur ssaram ttelqim di ttejṛa n llim
ṛaju kra
ad ak d ifk rebbi ccfa
bḍut iyi t id
ccan is d win meqqren
tuki terwiḥt is send ad tt ifak s uleqqem
d ayaẓil i ɣ izzuzfen lḥif i ɣ izzin
bɣiɣ ad ḥewwseɣ ar marikan
ur k yekkat ara ur ttaggad
sliman u muḥ yeḥqer daɣen tiziri tagawawt
d ṛebbi i yeẓṛan amek i teẓṛam
tura akken d fɣaɣ seg ttberna deg ukfadu
aḥeqq wahi d wahi
ɛni teččamt
aɣyul n leḥbas ɛebbi u rkeb fell as
anwa ara cukkeɣ
ixdem deg s gerninuc

tessneḍ gma s
ttafgen yigḍaḍ
meḥsub ur tetteɣ ara akk igumma
cfu ḥader ad tettuḍ ɣef wayen iɛeddan fell ak
sellket aɣ
anwa i d tewwi
amek armi tassaweḍ tusnakt ad temtawi akk annect a d lumuṛ n tilawt nettat i d yekkan si tedmi n umdan ur ncudd ɣer kra n termit
d lmuḥal ad xedmen iqeddacen ik lameṛ yecban wa
wa d adlis nkent
atan yebded tom
qummec
terra yi tent id
ladɣa wid yeffren neɣ wid ur nesɛi ara allalen akken ad d banen
ruḥ kan ɣer zzat
awal d lfeṭṭa meɛna tasusmi d ddheb
mazal ur as d ssukkseɣ ara
tusa d sɣur kra n yillu
tlata iseggasen segmi nxeddem akka
anwa iɣef txaqeḍ daɣen
a tinn a n ugemmaḍ lalla m d mm uxelxal n ddeḥ

wissen anwa i ten yewwten

tweznem iman nwen

nekk feṛheɣ

a tin ɛzizen fell i

nezɛeḍ

akka
qqel d zik
tzemreḍ ad yi d tḥukkeḍ tuyat iw
d nnmara n uẓrem di lkanun
illu yenna daɣen i musa nekk d ameɣlal
iqqim d adrim n demma
amihi yesgugum
ugareɣ k deg leɛmeṛ
twalaḍ acmumeḥ nni
truḥ as yelli s argaz is di lḥebs i yella i as yerra umsaltu nni yesteqsayen guli
iṛuḥ deg ucekkaṛ

awit iyi s axxam
nchallah d aqcic
ad ččent ad swent

ad awen t id aɣeɣ
anwa ara iḥerken
ẓewreɣ deg leɣna
ttakiɣ d tikwal deg yiḍ
taqbaylit i nebɣa ad neddari d tin n tayri d tqemmucin ɛinani
thegga d ifeggagen tirigliwin iɣunam txuṣ itt kan tyaẓilt
d kečč akked tarwa k iwumi ara fkeɣ timura agi meṛṛa
bɣan warrac ad zhun
iqqim seksu d wudi irra tiqit
ur zmireɣ ad k zzmeɣ
d tagi i d ṣṣyada n wukyis

i kečč
ddren waddagen
ma ulac win ik yettalasen kra deg dunnit ik ur k id yewwiḍ

yettasem d leɛǧeb

tfakkeḍ aɣ tt
di leɛnaya nwen ur yi ttaǧǧam ara da akked tom

acḥal i d isqam waya

anwa ara ẓṛeɣ
am win iffullḥen ar xalt is

a tayuga tacerqit
iffeɣ fell as waɛbaṛ
ad tent wansent
siwlemt i gma tkent
tuɣ ɛerḍen kem

tisegnit d isem n wallal i umyag is

deg ugraw n ssumam i yeḍran deg ɣuct walef u ttɛemya u setta u xemsin
ur nezmir ad nemtawi ɣef kra
ixuṣṣ lmelḥ lqut a
ayɣer ur tḥemmlem ara ad teṛṛẓem iqeṛṛa nwen
xeṣṛen
hḍeṛ s leɛqel
awah diri lexdeɛ

anta i m tt ixedmen

wa yerbeḥ wa iqucc
din i ilul tom
yella kra i tettumt

tesɛa t

tessefla timiṭ is
ɛni tezwar iken

ih xuṣṣent tikta
kemmel asmuzget

axessar ur d yeḍri

besmellah ad ncekker mačči d leḥya
deg tmurt tamesbaɣurt ur ilaq ara ad ilin yimattaren

ilaq ad tt iwali lmuqeddem

ad iyi tesseɣliḍ
ad iyi tsamḥem ttxil wet
rran am tent id
acu kan llant yessi s n lilit

ad tt id temmektimt
anwa ay d ameẓẓuɣ ik a yaɣerbi
ɣiwlet awit d baba ɣer dagi
la tcennu keiko
d wigi i d lehduṛ i sen inna baba tsen mi ten iburek

tegla yes s
llant akka llant ugar
gren d iman nsen imir kan i usensi n tmes

kker a dadda ad iqqim netta
alɣem yettwali kan taɛrurt n gma s taɛrurt is ur tt yettwali ara
yuba yella yugad
ad am bruɣ di tmura
acḥal ara sen d isqam uxxam a
nekk tabaɛeɣ ul iw ɣef waya ur d ɣliɣ ara d menwala
iger d nnehta s wurfan ččuṛen ikufan
si rezqi d win ur nḥemmel ara ad t id asen yinebgawen
ḥemmlen akk tiɛelǧiyin
yettwaxelleṣ tom
ad tent id mmagrent
serwet a ɛli serwet

ṛuḥem tura
nɣan asent ten
cḥal deg laɛmer ik
ssarameɣ i kra yellan d amuḍin tujjya iɛejlen
tekcem itt tugdi tuzzel ɣer lkumisarya anida terǧa snat n tsaɛtin
awer iḥeddaṛ ṛebbi i qiriqac
wexxeṛ fell i
ili deg lweqt
ttnecnicen akka d wakka akken ad ḥellin amesruf s wacu ara ddun deg ddurt
allaɣ is ur as sseččayen ara ssekker
lferḥ n bu teɛyunin yuklal lxeffa n yifassen
werǧeǧǧi azehwani kra yekka wass la yekkat agumbri
ma tebɣiḍ ilaq ad qefleɣ azekka uɣal d ad teqimeḍ deg lqahwa azekka ad yili baba
aql i deg lbiru n lpusṭa
yuba ikellex mary
yeldi adlis is ad iɣer
mačči d tikkelt neɣ d snat i retɛeɣ inelmaden deg tesnawit

textaṛ itt

yuba yečča kra

ur ẓriɣ ara anta i d kemm

deg tdiwennit agi mass yusef awcic yemmeslay d ɣef yisenfaren s umata
di leɛnaya m ṛuḥ

ccbaḥa tettfat
iḥemmel aksum yecwan
rriɣ kem deg uɛewwiq
atmaten is uɣen as awal

d lɛebd ameksul
ad d ddunt yid sen
idel aɣ d yiwen uɣemɣum armi ur nẓerr kra
awal im d awal yenta deg ul yeggugem yimi
tarifit d tutlayt mačči d tantala
iṭṭes as ɣef wuḍṛef
yeɛqub izzwer kra seg iqeddacen is iceggeɛ iten ɣer gma s meẓyan i yellan di tmurt n siɛir di adum
ǧǧan asent d tarda n leḥwal
netta yesɛa tameṭṭut ɣas akka kan i myezwaǧen
gummaɣ ad amneɣ ixurḍan aki maɛna ur iyi tuqiɛ ara
teɣleb tajṛadt

tiselbi tuɣ lefhamat
menyif tidet isseqraḥen wala lekteb issefraḥen
tenɣa yakent ten
seg imiren bdan ttaddren d isem n umeɣlal
siwa nuḥ d wid akk yellan yid s di lbabuṛ i d iqqimen
tedda d yid k
s yiwen wawal kan terra ten merra d ilfan
heddreɣ awen tugim ad tfehmem
ma ulac zzit xas fiḥel
idrimen llan netta yestufa
tura kan i yekcem yiḍ
yessuffeɣ d uɛarus timejjatin is mi d tecxaclew lgerra
yuba ḥemmlen t akk yiselmaden is
acuɣeṛ i tegneḍ deg uzal
tturareɣ atinis
teɛbed it
tedda yasen di nneqma
qqim cwiṭ yid i
ur tetteɣ ara ifires
musa iḍegger asɣar nni s aman imiren aman nni uɣalen ḥlawit
deg seṭṭac yennayer alef u ttɛemya u tniyen u ttɛin yejbed cadli ben jdid iman is deg tselwayt n tegduda
d nekk i icebḥen fell ak
ɛni yufa ten id tom
wali akk amazray n tneflit
lameɛna yuli d yiwen n wagu si lqaɛa issew akal meṛṛa
ad yesserkeb tislatin
yirbeḥ a baba
isenna yas asenni n wur nettawi
uɣaleɣ gganeɣ kra
tazwara teɛreq iyi
xtaṛen k
aḍu yetthuzu afriwen
izwer lɛid s yiwen wass
ḥemmleɣ kem ɣas yefqeɛ yigenni
yal cedda tetbeɛ itt talwit
ɛictar d tillut i llan ɛebbden yiɣerfan akkadiyen at babilun d wacuṛiyen
ad d yawi awren nni i lmuqeddem
d yelli
siwa teṛẓeg ay ufiɣ
mkul ass ad itteffeɣ ugdud iwakken ad d ijmeɛ ayen i s ilaqen i wass
bru i wawal tura
iḥseb akk medden d leḥcic
nedderbez s axxam
ffɣent d akk tudrin
ayen i k yexḍan yexḍa k
yella wuccen deg tɣilet la d yesṭiccin
ur ttmeslayeɣ ara tarusit
lḥumt
amnemt t kan
anwa asif i yeɣezzifen yakk di japun
seg wasmi i d yecfa d netta deg uxeddim a
ẓriɣ amnaṛ ad t tekkeḍ
bɣiɣ ad ččeɣ lbaṭaṭa
kfiɣ yakan učči
gerzeɣ tanemmirt
ger iyi d iɣallen
uccen awah
xir iw lxir inu mmi deg yirebbi inu
win iḍṣan ḥṣu ad iru
ansa ara tɛeddimt
kemmel taɣuṛi
ad m beddeɣ
suffɣet ten akk
d leqrun segmi i sen truḥ i yedrimen tengawit nsen n lkaɣeḍ neɣ n umɣuz ma d tura dayen uɣalen d izwilen am deg uselkim
ad m ifiq ḥedd
d acu ara txedmeḍ yes sen
aɣ itt id a yiblis ad ak nefk nnefṣ is
siwel asen d s axxam
ala yuba i bɣiɣ
d tabujadt
nettat mačči d tameṭṭut
nekk d argaz n wass a i teqbaylit ad tt bnuɣ i uzekka
ad awiɣ wa
bḍan as t id
ayen d ittasen s tmara ur ittdum ara
ihi a mmi d tagi i d tamsirt
ad k ten tefk
d ayen i d greɣ deg lbal
yeɛqub inna i baba s d nekk
iqwem tura akka
tḥemmel ad tels taqendurt mm yijeǧǧigen
ajdid deg ccna
imeṭṭawen deg i ur llin ass n mi ad d ffɣeɣ
a taleqqamt n uḥemmam
yeqqel yuba d azeggaɣ
ur yezmir ara ad isenqed aya acku taneɣruft mačči d tanfalit tameɣtut
sliɣ as mi tḍegger tilifu s ɣef tɣerɣert tuzzel d ad tẓer acu yi yuɣen
ssens tafat
fella s talwit d argaz lɛali
rnut as ccḍeḥ s userwal aberwali
mi ɛeddan ɛecra n wayyuren uɣaleɣ ɣer uxeddim
rriɣ iman iw xeddmeɣ
tfehmeḍ adlis a
yelli s n ferɛun tṣubb s asif akken ad tcucef timeddukal is llant ttmerriḥent ɣef yiri n wasif
tweddṛem ten
d acu i d ssebba n waṭṭan nwen
amek armi yeqqel wul ik akken qbala
yerẓa awal n tejmaɛt
tella tesɣimt ilmend n llufan tettrus s deffir
ɣilen d uletma marie
ur nelli d wid itetten alamma ṛwan
seg zik ḥninet yerna tetɛeqqel
yeḥreṣ fell i usebbaḍ agi
kemmel timesliwt
ǧǧet tt ad yeskeṛ
ay atmaten zedɣeɣ axxam ur ksibeɣ
akken kan i as yehwa anef as
qqel d ɣer uxxam
awufan isaragen akk ad ttmaggan s teqbaylit
ad as teslem i ugrud ad yetɣenni ɣef timmuzɣa
lukan i tt tɛusseḍ mačči akka ara teḍru
d aḥdaq awsaq
asawen ɣef wudem n uḥbib d akessar
yegra afus is
lḥan deg s yinelmaden s wannay n lezzayer annay n yimaziɣen
kker fall ak
ggullen ɣef lmut nsen
diwan t
ṛebbi illa asif illa
yebda yettfuṛu seksu
iban sani ileḥḥu
mmi s n sbeɛ ay aḥmam
xedmeɣ d tavidyut ɣef tatoeba
nekk fehmeɣ
maca asteqsi ayen ḍarrunt cwalat taggara agi deg tesdawit n mulud mɛemmri
suqleɣ d kra n yidlisen si tsekla tamasiḥit
yerra yaɣ ten id

yumen kullec

d nekk i yuḍnen
ad d yeddu yid neɣ
cemmṛeɣ iɣallen iw
ur tt mmarkan ur s xdimen lekwaɣeḍ n tmettant

ḥedd ur iwala kra
d ayen ur iqebbel leɛqel
ṣeggen
ad ruḥeɣ akin i tagut
tifaf i ulɣem

yenwa yelha tsertit
ur neẓri ara d acu yaɣ
anta taqcict ur nebɣi ara ad tettwaqader s wayen tesɛa deg wallaɣ mačči s wayen terfed deg tfekka
xedmeɣ aṭas
ddmemt aya
tenɛettab
mm twenza n ureɣ yessawalen i rbeḥ
iḍall akkin i tiɣilt
sellen timucuha akken ad ttun laẓ
si lhebs i yesselḥay timsal n tfidiralit n fransa n tirni n uselelli aɣelnaw
win i d yessuffeɣ ɣer tezrigin tafat
war ma ttuɣ aselway n useqqamu aɣerfan aɣiwan n at smaɛel ɣef lḥir meqqren i t izedɣen ɣef teqbaylit
iselman deg wasif
ccwal i t iferrun d awal
wagi d asentel amaynut anagar kečč i d yemmeslayen fell as
qqim da
amdan ilhan ittarra awal aẓidan
tzemrem ad tɛummem
tettseḥḥireḍ aṭas
george yejreḥ wul is
aɛsekriw yeqqar ttif ad tettru yemma s wala ad tettru yemma
kullec ad yuɣal d asuki
yuḍen uzger qqden aɣyul
aql aɣ la nettnadi lmektub
ad ak iniɣ kečč a mmi
ay iṭij rujaɣ ad d teffleḍ tuyseḍ
ur xemmemeɣ ara ɣer wakken
iles ma ur nerri deg s igenni ad t id yesseɣli
alama qebḍeɣ meyya
qwem waki
ɛeyyeḍ mliḥ
qqerṣen si naddam
fakeɣ as t
d winna i d iwwin aman
ad d teffeɣ si gar yisekla
mi d ilul uqcic nni yahuda yufa t id lḥal di kazib
ibn ɛarabi ussnan n taderfgama n wandalus
yesla i wayen i d tenna
mary tɛawen tom
teswiḍ taqeṛɛunt n waman

afus iw d aɛekkaz

ur yettekki ara deg yisenfaṛen yekkren
iruḥ leɛmer ik waqila
d acu i k yuɣen a mmi

ḥemmleɣ tasekla
ceɣlent
anta tuɣmest i k iqeṛḥen
ay udem n tixsi
teswa aman n wasif
ɣer ṛebbi ad yeglu s wul is

ddwa agi yesseggray d aqraḥ n uqerru

nnan bu lxir yugar fell as muḥal ad t iɣurr zzman
yuba yerwel
a sidi ɛjel d s lxir
yif uzeggaɣ

i wudem n feṛṛuǧa ferɛun ixdem as leḥsan i dda bṛahim
ass amezwaru ad wen yili d ass n temlilit timqeddest
qim d ad nemmeslay
ad asen iniɣ tanemmirt i leḥwal nni n tḍebbaxt
d acu i k d tenna
teddam as di nneqma
tiẓgi taberkant

ilha umerreḥ timeddiyin
d amellal wul is
tsebɣemt as tent
ḥwaǧeɣ aɛiwen tura
ur tufiḍ d acu i d uwint yid sent
yeččaɛčaɛ d fell i s lǧehd n taɣect is
d tislatin iḥerzen
iɣli uqcic iddenden

yiwen ur iskadeb

syinna i d yebda aserbeḥ
tzemreḍ ad twaliḍ
llant tgaṭiwin deg lfur
gar yemcac i ubeḥri d ṭlam
ijemmeɛ d mkul ṣṣenf n lḥut

faqen akk medden
mdel allen ik

nnig wul
itett di lkun n ṛebbi

ttamnen ten
tḍemɛem kra seg sent
ur d sawalen ara
ax ul ḥrez it iman im kan zdeɣ it
ruḥen t ɣer tusda uẓekka
ikker wukrif nni dɣa iṛuḥ s axxam is
ur ḥsiɣ ara ad zemreɣ ad t xedmeɣ
i d yettmeslayen ɣef tmerniwt n bgayet
ɣer wacu ttemcabiɣ
ur ḥsin ara d nutni i yettuɣaḍen

arraw n gumir ackanaz rifat akked tugarma
ifakk iyi tent
ṛbiɛ n tmizar weṛṛaɣ
ma d tameddit sɛeddan tutlayt n tefransist i yiswiren deg sin

ṭṭef amḍiq
da i tettidiremt
ur tufiḍ d acu yellan a sidi selṭan
ula d taselmadt tettak as d akk ayen i yebɣa ad yissin
ččiɣ asfel makken uḍneɣ
argaz ɣur s tameṭṭut
acimi i yettaggad targit
ad yeqqen lḥenni lbaz amekyus

nancy tkad d teɛya
yif it ṛebbi
tɛedda ṭhur
ayakka txuṣṣ tmusni deg ddunit anda yeqwa leɣben idlisen am wa ad yili kan wayen ideg ara nefɛen

furren d akk lexlawi
suref iyi ur tkacafeɣ ara d acu ara yeḍṛun

jemɛen ten

ulac tigert

d ta i d tilelli iwumi ur zmireɣ ad as serḥeɣ
ur illi di jillul wala di millul
ur ttarra ara ssuma deg unezgum

a wer tekkremt

acku nutenti mazal bɣant ad qesrent akka cwiay

yerra yas s leɛweǧ
ula mi i t id teɛreḍ axxam
mi ara ten teẓreḍ ad as tiniḍ jmiɛ i tteffɣen neɣ acḥal n lesnin i ddan
d tuqqda i d ddwa n uqraḥ n uzagur
deg leqran yenna d itran mmugen ad trejmeḍ yes sen ccwaṭen

ad tsewweq yid i

ad kecmeɣ ar wexxam
tamuɣli d leɛḍil rnu ɛad ibeddi
rbeɛṭac deg yunyu d ass n weɣlan aqbayli
tettmalahem
trebḥem
tettmekta d ayen mmeslayen segmi i iffɣen
ẓriɣ tecbeḥ tudert
wa s wudem wa s uzagur
ur ittḥibbi ur ittmilli
ur ittxalaf ara mejjir aẓaṛ
yeḍfer iwellihen n umeqqran
tettwaker iyi texfet ass nni n lǧemɛa
tennam d
ma teffɣeḍ akken ur telsiḍ ara mliḥ ad kem iwet ubeḥri
anda telliḍ
d kem i inudan fell as
tinna mačči n wudmawen nwen
ad timɣur ad tegduda ad iyi tecbu tasedda
neḥwaǧ iken a wid yettarun taqbaylit
anwa i ak iselmaden tafṛansist
acuɣer ur testeqsayem ara ma yesɛa tawacult neɣ xaṭi
ɛyiɣ di tlufa nwen
iccuɛben ttexmam yeqruref seg wayen isummet d tissi
lliɣ bɣiɣ ad s iniɣ i tom iwacu
xdem ayen tzemreḍ
ddari
tella tezdayt di sseḥra akken nni ɣezzif yixef is
ur tessineḍ ara d acu i d ṭerṭara
tɛedlem akk amek i tettxemimem
wa yeqqaṛ i wa
mi ara yezweǧ d taɛezrit ara d yawi
gen di talwit a gma becca masinisa d awezɣi ad k nettu
ayagi d ayen iwumi teḥwaǧ teqbaylit nezzeh
ɣur k asigna deg ubrid ik
atḥa yeḍleb d tasiregt
ṛebbi mi ara d isteqsi yeɣleb llusi
