lukan i xeddmeɣ taḍuṭ
terwel as tudert is gar ifasen is
ultma teckel tafunast send ad tt id teẓẓeg
i yeksan ddaw n udrar
umnaɣ k
sebbaḍ ɣlayen d wamek i ilaq ad tbaneḍ s tugna iwatan
yuɣ lḥal llan ɣur neɣ sebɛa n watmaten
ttwaliɣ lbabuṛ d amecṭuḥ
tesfuḥeḍ akk axxam
tuker d tidet seg wallen n ṛebbi
tekksem ten id
inwa d anciwen ziɣen d acciwen
nessaram aseggas ara d ikecmen ad aɣ yelhu
teḥbes it
win yellan d ccaṭer yaẓ d aql i da
agujil ur t ttweṣṣi ɣef imeṭṭi
bḍut asent ten id
zik nni yella yiwen n urgaz d amakur
ccah di ṛṛay nsent
teskerkseḍ fell i
yiwen n yilemẓi yebɣa ad yinig
tessneḍ amek ad sen telḥuḍ i yigurdan
iwala asteɛfu d ayen yelhan tamurt tgerrez
tufiḍ ɣer ddwa nni i m d ifka umejjay
ad ten id yuqem
acḥal i nnuda n tmura
tceɣɣeb itt tufayt
nugad akk
ata wul temri t taluft
d aɛembub i yeɛna mačči d zzyen
imeɣban d yiwen n wungal meqqren aṭas n victor hugo
wwant
teltef as aɛrur is
d tigi i d tisutriwin ik s umata
nessewxar neqqar mazal
lehna n umeslay i tufa ɣer maziɣ
yečča lexber
tettaru yi d tibratin yal ass
ad yi tilim d imdanen imqeddsen
idlisfusen ur fuqen ara
cceyɛeɣ ak d akk ayen yeqqnen ɣur s
tesmenyaf lmut wala tudert yid s
suffɣemt tent akk
ala yir lɛebd i yeneṣḥen taṛbut
aṭas i tecmet
iwacu tetqllqeḍ
bdu tazzla
sber kan
mačči d nekk i iḍeggren akk taduli ɣef lqaɛa
ččan tamurt wid iɣ iḥekmen
acu tt tuzegt ik
qqimemt ɣer ṭṭabla
ilaq ad as neqqim i temsalt a
iswi i yella yesɛa t deg tudert ad yuɣal d ameẓẓawan
melmi ara teččent imensi
d tiqit seg umaḍal
d tameṭṭut is
a yul yebḍan ɣef sin yebɣa ḥsen yebɣa lḥusin
fek iyi d afus
nniɣ as ahat akken i yella lḥal
tayeḍ d iceṭṭiḍen izeddganen i d ssardent tlawin n taddart n tewrirt
tcebḥeḍ dayen kan
mačči d imdukal iw
igzem d afurek seg tzemmurt s tmenčart
ur yi d qqar ara acu ara xedmeɣ
ur d ttasent ara
icerriqen n yiṭij ɛeddan d si ṭṭaq
teldi tewwurt
ur ttlaẓeɣ ara
yusef ildi akk lemxazen issaǧaw irden i imaṣriyen
tettkukru ad tenher
tetteɣraṣem si ɛeggu
amzun ur nettemyili
mi temmut tegmert iɛalleq as asegres
heddreɣ asent ugint ad fehment
cemtent
ad kem seɛfeɣ
lḥut syagi
ad nwali
s leɛnaya n wat yigrawen d wat wurawen
igenni n ṛebbi tamurt d ayla s
yemmut muḥemmud uharun
ikcem uɛejmi deg uzeṭṭa
sgen it
teṭṭef abrid s axxam
ur ččiɣ ara ur swiɣ ara
ikerrez deg lawan n tyerza
tura kan i d qqleɣ seg tzeqqa n waddal
nnuɣent
a tamuqint n leḥbeq cceḍḥ im ass a yeḥdeq
mi ara d kkreɣ ur ttḥussuɣ ara s laẓ am zik
ɛni yella win k id itebɛen
ur tmesxir ara
fkiɣ lweɛd
ad tettcebbiḥ ad tettarra izebgan
berrik ul n ḥmed
kra n medden
qqerṣen akk di tmurt iqerṣen
d lmut i deg s yefrurxen
ilaq ad ḥerrekeɣ mulac ad qezbeleɣ
i ubrid usennan arkas azuran
d as d unt awiɣ mi di d yaweṭ lawan
fiḥel asnulfu n teqbaylit tajdidt
ur d gireɣ ara iman iw di lebɣi n yilu
tḥemmel ifelfel
amaziɣ si zik yeḥsa tameṭṭut d tayri d ccbaḥa d asirem d tudert
ad iyi tessendeh ad d aɣeɣ ayefki neɣ udi
ur ttḥar ara
amdan lɛali ur iheddeṛ deg imi ur ili
iḥemmel ad yazzel
lbaṭel azeggaɣ
amen iyi
ad nessektem deg yigran
ilaq ad nsiwel i temsulta
nniɣ ak d akka
arut yid i
dɣa imceyyeɛ ad s issuref zdat n umeɣlal
steqsi alex
tekker yemma ad d tniwel seksu s uyaziḍ nni
ad ten id tebɛen sebɛa n iseggwasen n laẓ
susem kan
d asaru amenzu n rida amrani akked ara d iɛeddin ad d yeglu s uskasi ɣer tagara n usaru
ntett seksu ubiṣaṛ
ad m d ḥkuɣ ayen i yi yuɣen
sɛaya teǧǧaba d iḥbiben
d awal is aneggaru
ɛni mačči ɣef ddemma n meɛǧuṭa i xedmeɣ fell ak
ddem d yiwen seg wakraren nni sakin haṛun akked warraw is ad sersen ifassen nsen ɣef uqerru s
ur d nettuɣal ara
ad aɣ yanef ad nɛeddi
ibna dinna aɛalṭar i umeɣlal
ɣas iḍul ubrid d uleqrar is ad d tban
melmi ara d tasemt
adrar ay uccen
anef ad inin anef awal yellan ɣef sin ad tarren ɣef xemsin
ur tessaweḍ ara ad d tass deg wass acku ɛussen tt wat taddart
acḥal i tesɛam
mfaraqent snat nni n trebbaɛ mebla iswiyen
asma ara ak d taweḍ temsalt
wwin t ɣer musa
ad iyi tawi ɣer tlemmast n ubrid
win yiwwi wasif ittaṭṭaf deg umagraman
sers afus ik ayeffus ɣef uqerru s
ḥesseɣ
d tagara
lehna n tudert ik icudd ɣer tɣara n tedmiwin ik
ur rebbḥeɣ ara yakk
ha ten a akk da
kul wa amek i t tgezmeḍ
ad iṛḥem ṛebbi kra i d iǧǧan beṭṭu
yekker d tom
yeḥṣel uḍar is deg wayen i as d igezmen abrid teɣli
tamɣart twala kan lṭufan nni amelḥan tekker tuɣ it s tiṭ
kenwi d aɣilif
ad d aɣen ayefki
wwet a xali muḥ wwet
rran iyi d gar yimdanen am wi
ɛni d kennemti ara ydebbṛen fell aɣ
ineggef bih bih
gen di talwit a gma caybet ḥusin d awezɣi ad k nettu
sexsi t
qabel ur ittruḥu ara ɣer tesdawit
maca nessexdam allaɣ mi ara yezli wul
swemt ayefki
bḍant ak ten id
d acu tesxuẓẓuḍeḍ
ǧǧet tt ad idewwer
irɣa uḥriq qqimen d ala iɣiɣden
rniɣ d lḥara i deg yella sbeɛ aṛemli
akken kan ad taweḍ iwakken ad as d tehder ayen tebɣa
susmemt kan
teɣleḍ
nnaqsa d aqraḥ n umelɣiɣ yettili d ugar ɣer tlawin wala irgazen
dacu i ččant
d times n waḍu
tecrek aɣ tgella d lemleḥ
ttxil k ḍebbeṛ iyi d kra n lxedma
amsider ara yeswen isafaren agi ur nettwaḥrez ara deg tasmuḍi
ula d lmut tugi ten
yuɛeṛ bac ad tamneḍ ayaki
ssersen d gar asen taqedduḥt n zzit tayeḍ n tazart d teḥbult n uɣrum
tbeddel ula di ṣṣifa
qqimeɣ zdat s
ɣef acḥal ssaɛa i d tewwḍem ar da
iceɣɣeb iyi yimal
bɣiɣ kan ad m t id rreɣ
atmaten iw
ass a yessusem
ufiɣ lbaz ara aɣeɣ netta yebɣa yi nekk bɣiɣ t
txedmem asen kra
ttḥulfuɣ amzun akken d nekk kan i teɛna temsalt n tadist a
deg tazwara ad d snekdeɣ iman iw
tal yiwet tessaram ɣur s i d usant
ilit d imqeddsen axaṭer nekk d imqeddes
